Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobernador di Aruba Sr. Alfonso Boekhoudt a duna su mensahe di Pasco riba 24 december ultimo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Christams eve, December 24, the Governor of Aruba Mr. Alfonso Boekhoudt gave his traditional Christmas speech

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por a wak e discurso di Pasco di Gobernador via e canalnan di television local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The governor's Christmas speech was shown at the local television stations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por lesa aki e texto integral di e mensahe di Pasco di Excelencia Gobernador Boekhoudt
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Read the full text of Governor Alfonso Boekhoudt 's speech

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan maximo 21 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum prices December 21, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 21 di december 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto. E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO, BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per December 21, 2019 the following prices are established for various products. The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel: 521-2400 ext.251
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel: 521-2400 extension 251

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa bo conveniencia por download e lista di prijsnan maximo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information see attached list

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Discurso di Pasco Gobernador 24 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Christmas speech Governor on December 24, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 24 di december 2019, bispo di Pasco di Nacemento, Gobernador di Aruba Sr. Alfonso Boekhoudt lo duna su tradicional discurso di Pasco via e canalnan di television local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Christmas Eve, December 24, 2019, the Governor of Aruba Alfonso Boekhoudt will give a Christmas speech on the local television stations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E programa special aki lo pasa anochi pa 8.00pm na Canal 22, DiarioTV-Canal 48 y Telearuba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Canal 22, Diario TV-Canal 48 and Telearuba will broadcast this special program at 20:00 hrs (8.00 p.m.)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta invita henter e comunidad di Aruba pa sintonisa television local diamars 24 di december pa e mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador Boekhoudt
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The entire community is invited to watch the Governor’s Christmas message on local television this Tuesday, December 24

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nota: Por uza e potret den anexo cu e siguente mencion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Note: The photograph in the attachment may be used with the reference

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Potret: Gabinete di Gobernador
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Photo: Cabinet Governor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siguiente condicionnan ta aplicabel riba e potret
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following conditions apply to the photo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gabinete di Gobernador di Aruba (KabGA) tin derecho di autor riba e potret den e seccion aki y ta reserva esaki explicitamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The copyright on the photograph in this section rests with the Cabinet of the Governor of Aruba (KabGA) and is expressly reserved

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin embargo, ta permiti pa uza e potret pa uzo editorial door di e medionan di comunicacion, pa exhib’e den lugarnan publico, pa uzo priva y pa meta educativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, it is permitted to use the photographs for editorial use in news media, for display in public places, private use, and educational purposes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin embargo, KabGA ta reserva e derecho di actua si e metodo di publicacion di e potret, segun opinion di KabGA, ta contra dignidad gubernamental, ta considera su uzo como di indole promocional (propaganda) of ta uz’e cu un proposito idealista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, KabGA reserves the right to act if according to KabGA opinion the (method of) publication of the photo is contrary to governmental dignity, can be regarded as promotional use (advertising) or is used with an idealistic purpose

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: KabGA lo no reacciona riba pregunta di tercera persona si tuma medida (legal) den algun caso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The KabGA does not respond to questions from third parties if in certain cases (legal) steps are taken

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamentonan gubernamental cera durante fin di aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Public sector closing days at the end of the year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur departamento di gobierno lo ta cera ariba dianan 24, 25, 26 y 31 di december 2019 y 1 y 2 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All government services are closed on December 24, 25, 26 and 31, 2019 and January 1 and 2, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Algun departamento lo ta cera caba for di 23 di december te cu 3 di januari 2020 debi cu e personal ta tuma vacacion colectivo cu aprobacion di nan respectivo ministro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Some government services will be closed from December 23 to January 3, as employees will collectively take their vacation days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Archivo Nacional Aruba (ANA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National Archives Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dienst Publieke Scholen (DPS)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Public Schools Service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Recurso Humano (DRH)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento di Recurso Humano (DRH)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Instituto Alarma y Seguridad Aruba (IASA)-Vondellaan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Instituto Alarma y Seguridad Aruba (IASA) Vondellaan

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Directie Cultuur Aruba (DCA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Culture

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Integracion, Maneho y Admision di Stranhero (DIMAS)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento di Integracion, Maneho y Admision di Stranhero (DIMAS)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siguiente departamentonan lo ta cera for di 23 di december te cu 2 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following services are closed from December 23 to January 2, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dienst Inspectie van het Onderwijs
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Education Inspectorate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inspectie Volksgezondheid Aruba (IVA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Public Health Inspectorate Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Aviacion Civil (DCA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Civil Aviation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Finansa (DFIN)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Finance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prome dia di trabou pa aña 2020 pa tur departamento lo ta diabierna 3 di januari
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first working day for government employees in 2020 is set on Friday, January 3, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Servicio di GKMB a ricibi mashin di fumigacion nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The GKMB has received new fumigation equipment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gele Koorts en Muskieten Bestrijding a ricibi ayera dos mashin nobo pa combati sangura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department Yellow Fever and Mosquito Prevention (GKMB) has received two new fumigation machines to combat mosquitos

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un inversion di mas of menos 45 mil florin cu Minister di Salubridad Publico a haci pa por sigui combati y preveni malesanan transmiti door di sangura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Public Health invested about Afl. 45000 for these 2 fumigation machines in order to help battle the mosquitos in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E mashinnan ta di marca Igeba cu ta produci na Alemania y DAL pestcontrol, cu ta nan agencia na Aruba a entrega esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These machines are German build by manufacturer Igeba and have been delivered by their dealer in Aruba DAL pest control

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata aki di dos aparato di cual e prome mashin ta un ULV (Ultra Low Volume) aerosol generator
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the fumigators is a ULV (Ultra Low Volume) aerosol generator

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E mashinaki ta uza volumen halto di aire na un presion abou pa transforma pesticida likido den drupelsnan cu por distribui den admosfera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This uses high air volumes in a low pressure to convert the liquid pesticide into fine mist to be better sprayed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E di dos mashin ta un Thermal fogger cual por produci gran cantidad di huma di pesticida cu ta uza pa fumigacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The second machine is a Thermal Fogger which creates a high volume of pesticide smoke for fumigation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo uza ambos aparato ora tin hopi molester di sangura den e barionan of ora tin alerta di brote di malesanan transmiti door di sangura manera por ehempel Dengue, Zika y Chikungunya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These machines will be used when there is an up rise of mosquitos in residential areas due to rain or when there is an elevated threat of mosquito-borne illnesses like Dengue, Zika and Chikungunya

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por uza ambos mashin tambe pa combati e sangura preto cu ta sangura di mangel, comun den e area di Savaneta y Pos Chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These machines can also be used to combat the black mosquitos in mangroves that are commonly seen in Savaneta and Pos Chkito

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu yegada di e dos mashinnan aki e personal di GKMB ta hopi contento pasobra nan por sigui eherce nan trabou, solamente awo den tempo mas cortico y nan ta bon ekipa y prepara pa cualkier eventualidad riba e tereno di combati sangura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The acquisition of these brand new machines will certainly be effectively used by the team of the GKMB as they can keep doing their job of combatting mosquitos quicker

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Anuncia aumento di salario minimo y e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 entrante 1 januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Increase minimum wage and wage limit Labor Ordinance 2013 effective January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministerio di Asuntonan Social y Labor y Departamento di Labor y Investigacion ta anuncia aumento di salario minimo y e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 entrante 1 januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Ministry of Social Affairs and Labor and the Department of Labour and Research announces the increase in the minimum wage and income limit for the application of the Labor Ordinance 2013 as per January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E suma di salario minimo pa un empleado cu tin 18 aña di edad of mas ta wordo ahusta entrante 1 januari 2020 na Afl. 1.815,35 pa luna y Afl. 423,40 pa siman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The minimum wage of a worker who has reached the age of 18 years will be adjusted as per January 1, 2020, to Afl. 1.835,15 per month and Afl. 423,40 per week

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un empleado di 18 aña of mas cu ta haci trabou domestico den un residencia priva, e salario minimo ta bira Afl. 846,92 pa luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For a domestic worker performing labor in a private residence, the minimum wage will be Afl. 846,92 per month

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e empleado domestico cu ta traha 22 ora of menos pa siman e suma di salario minimo lo bira Afl. 9,45 pa ora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For a domestic worker laboring 22 hours or less per week, the minimum wage will be Afl. 9,45 per hour

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como consecuencia di e ahustacion di e salario minimo e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 (Arbeidsverordening 2013) tambe lo subi entrante 1 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As a result of the minimum wage adjustment, the income limit for the application of the Labour Ordinance 2013 (Arbeidsverordening 2013) will also increase as per January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Ordenansa Laboral 2013 ta e ley cu ta regla condicionnan di trabou manera entre otro e oranan maximo cu por traha pa dia of pa siman, dianan di sosiego, pago di overtime ora traha mas cu e máximo ora permisibel ariba un dia normal di trabou y pago di overtime riba dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Labour Ordinance regulates the working conditions such as the maximum working hours per day or week, rest days, overtime payments and payments on holidays

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Ordenansa Laboral no ta aplicabel pa tur trahado pero ta conta solamente pa trahadonan cu ta cai bou di e limite di salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Labour Ordinance does not apply to all workers, but only to those who fall under the income limit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E limite di salario nobo lo bira entrante 1 di januari 2020, e salario minimo (Afl. 1.815,35) x e factor 2.5= Afl. 4.538,38
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new income limit as per January 1, 2020, will be Afl. 4.538,38 (the minimum wage Afl. 1.815,35 x factor 2,5)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta ensera cu trahadonan cu ta gana un salario di Afl. 4.538,38 pa luna of Afl. 54.460,56 pa aña of menos, ta cai bou di proteccion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 y tin derecho riba tur e condicionnan di trabou stipula den e ley aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Workers who earn a monthly salary of Afl. 4.538,38 or an annual salary of Afl. 54.460,56 or less fall under the protection of the Labour Ordinance 2013 and are entitled to all the working conditions this law provides

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor y Investigacion ta pidi tur trahado y principalmente dunadonan di trabou pa tene bon cuenta cu e cambionan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Labour and Research kindly requests all workers, and in particular, all employers to take due note of this adjustment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 10 tips tocante alimentacion durante dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 10 eating tips for the holiday season

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Aruba ta duna algun tips pa come saludabel durante e dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health Aruba is providing 10 tips for healthy eating during the festive days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E temporada di Pasco y fin di aña ta un ocasion pa reuni cu famia y amigonan, e celebracionnan semper ta bay acompaña cu cuminda y snacks
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The holiday season is an occasion for friends and family gatherings, that in most cases are filled with food and snacks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cuminda di e temporada aki ta specialmente traha pa nos come hopi di dje of pa nos come mas biaha di dje durante dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The holiday food is common to be prepared in bigger portions to be enjoyed in higher volume and more frequently during the day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asina nos ta facilmente yega na, of surpasa e cantidad cu nos mag di come y esaki tin como consecuencia cu nos ta subi di peso y por causa malestar di stoma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During these days, most people surpass their daily food intake and eventually gain weight and causing an upset stomach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos ta come facilmente 3 biaha mas cu lo normal y esey ta traduci na aproximadamente 6000 kcal pa dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is not unusual that the caloric intake during these days can be at least 3 times (around 6000 calories) the normal daily intake

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Imagina cu den combinacion di falta di actividad fisico nos por subi 1kg cada 2 pa 3 dia durante e temporada aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This in combination with less than usual physical activity may result in a weight gain of 1 kg per every 2 - 3 days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No solamente e cuminda den exceso ta e ‘problema’ tambe e cantidad aumenta di sucu y vet den e cuminda y bebida ta menos saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The excess food intake is not the only culprit, but also the increased amount of sugar and fat intake in the food and drinks we consume

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante pa mantene un alimentacion balansa durante henter e aña, pa cualkier festividad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Eat balanced food year-round even during festive occasions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Percura pa come suficiente fruta cu berdura hunto cu tur e otro cuminda pa asina no falta vitamina, mineral y fibra cu ta esencial pa nos salud
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Eat sufficient fruits and vegetables with any other meals to balance the vitamins, minerals and fiber intake essential to your body

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mantene oranan fiho di tempo di cuminda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Eat at regular hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No salta un cuminda, pero intercambia esaki cu un snack saludabel (fruta, yoghurt abou den vet of crackers integral) prome cu un cuminda grandi di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not skip meals, but replace these with healthy snacks like fruits, low-fat yogurt or integral crackers before any big “festive” meals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tene na cuenta e porcionnan di cuminda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Control meal portions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por ehempel ora di come estilo buffet ta duna oportunidad pa controla e cantidad di e cuminda y porcion di alimento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At buffets keep the portions moderate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Yena mita tayo cu salada y berdura, 1/4 cu e carni of pisca y 1/4 cu aros, batata of pasta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: scoop half your plate with vegetables and salads, 1/4 with meats or seafood and 1/4 with rice, potatoes or pasta

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scoge of cushina e alimentonan cu un forma di preparacion mas saludabel ora di come afor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Choose or cook the healthiest option when planning on eating out

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Algun forma ta horna, den un panchi cu tiki azeta so, herbi, gesteamed, etc
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This may include cooking in the oven, a skillet with very little cooking oils, boiling or steaming, etc

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa salada pone e dressing na banda y scoge uno di un base ‘clear’ enbes di un di crema
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Choose clear salad dressings for your salads instead of the creamy dressings

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: esaki ta conta pa sopi tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is also valid for soups

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reduci e cantidad di bebidanan cu sucu of alcohol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Avoid high sugary drinks and alcoholic beverages

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bebe 1 of 2 refresco of juice y e durante e resto di dia bebe suficiente awa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Drink 1 or 2 sodas or juices and water during the rest of the day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Come poco poco y kauw bon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Eat slow and chew properly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun investigacion ora nos come consciente nos ta sinti yen mas lihe y nos ta come menos
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Studies show that slow eating makes you feel full quicker and makes you eat less

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin laga afo cu nos ta disfruta mas di e cuminda y nos curpa ta probecha miho di e nutrientenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This way you will enjoy the meal better while your body takes advantage of the nutrients

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No stop cu actividad fisico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not halt any physical activity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stop di come ora bo ta sinti yen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Stop eating once you feel full

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No come forsa pero pidi pa hiba e cuminda cas pa come un otro dia of comparti cu un otro hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not force yourself to eat more, but rather ask to take out the meal to be consumed the next day or shared with others

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe por nenga cuminda of snack dunando un compliment: “e ta mustra hopi dushi pero mi ta hopi yen”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Skip the food by telling politely “it looks good but I am full"

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prepara cuminda y snacks na cas den un forma mas saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prepare healthier food and snacks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Enbes di uza hopi mayonaise uza of combina esaki cu yoghurt pa preparacion di salada
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Instead of using high amounts of mayonnaise, combine this with yogurts for salads

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Usa forma di cushina manera horna, den un panchi cu tiki azeta so, herbi, gesteamed, etc
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Cook in the oven, a skillet with minimum oils, boil or steam, etc

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Come y disfruta di e cuminda festivo pero controla e frecuencia y cantidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Eat and enjoy the holiday meals but with moderation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No mester sinti culpbel despues di a come un cuminda festivo pero si ta importante pa actua cu moderacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is no need to feel guilty after the holiday meals if you eat in moderation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 21 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison December 21, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado na Aruba y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 21 di december 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 17 y 18 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras December 21, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on December 17 and 18, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Consulta di mercado como e siguiente paso den desaroyo di Port City Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Market consultation as the next step in Port City Oranjestad development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba Ports Authority (APA) ta anuncia cu transformacion di e area di terminal di carga bieu cerca di e terminal di crucero di Oranjestad den un area de recreacion, residencia y comercio, ta drentando den un fase nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba Ports Authority (APA) announces that the transformation of the former cargo terminal area near the cruise terminal of Oranjestad into new leisure, residential and commercial area is entering a new phase

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na februari 2019, gobierno di Aruba a aproba e plan di desaroyo urbano pa e proyecto aki, yama apropiadamente Port City Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In February 2019, the Aruban government approved the urban development plan for this project, appropriately named Port City Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: APA lo otorga e prome parcelanan pa construccion na 2020 y p’esey, ta invita e participantenan di mercado pa presenta nan deseo y idea den un consulta di mercado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: APA will issue the first building lots in 2020 and is, therefore inviting market participants to submit their wishes and ideas in a market consultation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu desaroyo di Port City Oranjestad, APA y gobierno di Aruba tin intencion di trece una transformacion di e area, door di proporciona un combinacion atractivo di bida y trabou cu lo contribui positivamente na desaroyo di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the development of Port City Oranjestad, APA and the Aruban government intend to bring a transformation to the area, providing an attractive combination of living and working that positively contributes to the development of the island of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Port City Oranjestad lo actua como un magneet tanto pa e residentenan como turista, cu un variedad di programa di uzo mixto cu ta inclui hotel boutique, oficina y facilidadnan pa conferencia, apoyo na F&B y tienda, recreacion y vivienda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Port City Oranjestad is to act as a magnet for residents and tourists alike, with a variety of mixed-use programs including boutique hotels, offices & conference facilities, supporting F&B & retail, recreation as well as residential housing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plan di e proyecto di Port City Oranjestad tambe ta inclui un parke publico dilanti di lama entre e terminal di crucero y e beach di Bushiri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Port City Oranjestad project plan also includes a public waterfront park between the cruise terminal and Bushiri Beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Henter e area ta midi 20 hectarea, di cua 12 hectarea ta destina pa espacio publico y 8 hectarea pa desaroyo di real estate comercial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The entire area measures 20 hectares, of which 12 hectares are intended for public space and 8 hectares for commercial real estate development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta calcula cu e inversion total ta aproximadamente 575 miyon dolar mericano den e proximo 10 pa 20 aña, cu un inversion estima di aproximadamente 500 miyon di dolar mericano cu ta bin di inversionista priva y desaroyadornan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The total investment is estimated at approx. 575 million US Dollars over the next 10 to 20 years, with an estimated investment of approximately 500 million US Dollars coming from private investors and developers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: APA ta buscando desaroyador y consorcio cu tin experiencia den financiamiento conhunto y desaroyo di parcelanan similar, desde e diseño te su finalisacion y cu tambe ta inclui operacion di esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: APA is looking for developers and consortia that have experience in joint financing and development of similar plots, from design to completion including operation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas, APA kier utiliza e consulta di mercado aki para obtene un idea di e rekisitonan y deseonan di e usuarionan final y e operadornan, meta di esaki ta pa garantisa cu e oferta y demanda ta den ekilibrio ora haci e invitacion formal pa e destaho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally, APA wants to use this market consultation to gain insight into the end-users' and operators 'requirements and wishes, to ensure that supply and demand are balanced when the formal invitation for tenders takes place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo otorga y desaroya e parcelanan di e zona den fase
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The plots of the area will be issued and developed in phases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E consulta di mercado ta enfoca mas tanto riba e parcelanan na e parti west, cerca di e beach di Bushiri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This market consultation is focused on the most western plots, adjacent to Bushiri Beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un mihor comprension di e deseonan y ambicion lo permiti apoya e demanda di e mercado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A better understanding of these wishes and ambitions allows us to support market demands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: APA ta haci un yamado na e desaroyadonan di proyecto, operador di hotel y tur esnan interesa den Port City Oranjestad pa duna APA nan comentario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We call on project developers, hotel operators and other parties that have an interest in Port City Oranjestad to provide us with their input

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E desaroyo e area ta enfoca riba sostenibilidad y interes di nos poblacion local, ya cu ta desea di crea un area cu por beneficia Aruba den e proxima decadanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The area is to be developed with a focus on sustainability and the interests of the local population, as we want to create an area that can benefit Aruba for the decades to come

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plan di desaroyo urbano di Port City Oranjestad ta resultado di un colaboracion estrecho entre APA y Ministerio de Turismo, Salud Publico y Deporte, hunto cu Departamento di Infrastructura y Planificacion (Directie Infrastructuur en Planning, DIP), Departamento di Obra Publico (Dienst Openbare Werken, DOW), Aruba Tourism Authority(ATA), como tambe e Port of Amsterdam International den su rol di consehero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Port City Oranjestad urban development plan is the result of a close collaboration between APA and the Ministry of Tourism, Public Health and Sports, together with the Directorate for Infrastructure and Planning (Directie Infrastructuur en Planning, DIP), the Public Works Authority (Dienst Openbare Werken, DOW), the Aruba Tourism Authority (ATA), as well as Port of Amsterdam International in an advisory capacity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion tocante e consulta di mercado y e documentonan relaciona, por bishita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information about the market consultation and the underlying documents thereof, please visit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aumento Pensioen di biehes, viuda/viudo y huerfano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Increase in general pension

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banco di Seguro Social (SVB) ta informa cu Conseho di Minister, riba proposicion di Minister di Turismo, Salud Publico y Turismo Dangui Oduber, a dicidi di aumenta pensioen di biehes di siguiente forma entrante 1 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Social Security Bank (SVB) announces that by the decision of the Council of Ministers, the pensions will be increased based on the proposal of the Minister of Tourism Public Health and Sport, Mr. Dangui Oduber, Effective January 1 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pensioen pa soltero ta aumenta di Afl. 1.132,- pa Afl. 1.157,- florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the retirement pension for unmarried people will increase from Afl. 1,132 to Afl. 1.157,00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pensioen pa pareha ta aumenta di Afl. 1.906,- pa Afl. 1.948,- florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the retirement pension for married couples will increase from Afl. 1,906 to Afl. 1.948,00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pensioen dividi pa pareha ta aumenta di Afl. 953,- pa Afl. 974,- florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the individual pension for married people will increase from Afl. 953 to Afl. 974,00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pensioen pa huerfano y vuido ta keda adapta cu e mesun porcentahe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the orphan's and widow's pension is increased by the same percentage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta recorda cu pensioen pa e luna di januari 2020 ta keda paga dia 27 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As a reminder, the pension for January 2020 is paid on December 27, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cobransa adicional di winstbelasting 2014 lo sali den e proximo dianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The tax office will soon mail the additional tax assessment on profit tax 2014

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan cu no a cumpli (na tempo) cu e pago di e declaracion definitivo di winstbelasting 2014, lo haya e cobransa menciona inclui un boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients that did not pay their definite profit tax declarations for 2014 in due time will receive the tax assessment including a fine

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mescos ta conta si acaso e cliente a paga un suma menos cu locual el a declara na winstbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The same applies to clients who paid an amount not equivalent to the declared profit tax amount

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no a haci e pago di winstbelasting of no a haci e pago na tempo y corectamente, e boet ta maximo Afl. 10.000
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The fine for not making any profit tax payments or late or incomplete payments can be up to AWG. 10.000

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 17 di december 2019 ta cuminsa acepta pago di impuesto di vehiculo di motor 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients can pay their vehicle tax starting December 17, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta informa cu riba diamars, dia 17 di december 2019, nan ta cuminsa acepta pago di impuesto di vehiculo di motor di aña 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Department is announcing that they will be accepting payments for Vehicle Tax 2020 on December 17, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tarifa di impuesto y gasto di plachi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Vehicle Tax rate and license plate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tarifa di impuesto di vehiculo di motor di aña 2020 a keda mescos cu aña 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The vehicle tax rate for 2020 remains the same as in 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa plachi di nomber e tarifa ta Afl. 600 pa auto priva cu motor di gasolin y pa auto priva cu motor diesel e tarifa ta Afl. 1.000
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The custom license plate is Awg. 600,00 for personal gasoline vehicles and Awg. 1000,00 for personal diesel cars

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gastonan ta Afl.12 pa e plachi grandi y Afl. 8 pa e plachi chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The large license plate is Awg.12,00 and the small license plate is Awg. 8,00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pago den un of dos biaha pa aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payments in installments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e siguiente categorianan di number mester paga e impuesto den un solo biaha: D, AG, BR, GAR, MFA, MFD, MFV y plachi di nomber
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For all vehicles with the license plate in the following categories: D, AG, BR, GAR, MFA, MFD, MFV, have to pay in full including the license plate fees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa tur otro categoria por scoge pa paga e impuesto den un of dos biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For all other categories, payments can be in full amount or 2 installments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E termino di pago di e prome mita di aña 2020 (januari-juni) ta caduca dia 31 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first term for 2020, (January to June 2020) is due on January 31, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E termino di pago di e di dos mita di aña (juli-december) ta caduca dia 30 di juni 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The second half’s term (July-December) is due on June 30, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Haci pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Making payments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por haci pago online via banco of na tur oficina di Departamento di Impuesto, pues tanto na oficina principal na Camacuri of un oficina den districto (MFA's)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients can pay by online bank transfer or at any office of the Tax Department, the main building and all MFA’s

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta bon pa tene na cuenta cu no ta posibel pa paga e impuesto di aña 2020, si no a paga e impuesto di aña 2019 of di aña nan anterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients cannot pay their vehicle tax for 2020 if the vehicle tax for 2019 or any previous year is not paid

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pago via banco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Bank payments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan cu ta paga via banco mester menciona e impuesto di vehiculo di motor (“MB”) , persoonsnummer, e periodo di pago y e number di plachi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Bank payments should include the “MB” number, tax number (persoonsnummer), the payment term being paid, and the license plate number

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E secuencia cu cliente mester yena e informacion online ta lo siguiente; MB-persoonsnummer-periode-nummerplaat
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The sequence the online form has to be filled; MB-persoonsnummer-term-license plate number

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e contribuyente ta bay paga mas cu 1 number via banco, e mester haci un transaccion di pago separa pa cada number
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event vehicle tax is being paid for multiple vehicles online, each transaction needs to be individual

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No mag di paga un solo suma den un solo transaccion, debi cu esaki lo trece tardansa ora di procesa e pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payment of one amount in one transaction for multiple vehicles is not allowed since it will delay the processing of the paid vehicle tax

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora di paga via banco, mester inclui e suma di gasto di plachi tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Online payments should also include the amount for the license plate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si paga solamente e tarifa di impuesto, e cliente no lo por ricibi su plachinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If only paying the vehicle tax and not the license plate fee will result in the customer not receiving the new license plates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plach’i number
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: License Plate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E color di e plachinan di number di aña 2020 ta fondo blanco y cifra/letter cora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 2020 license plates will be white with red numbers/letters

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plachi di nomber
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Custom license plate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plachinan di nomber lo ta disponibel caba despues di dia 10 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The custom license plates will be available on January 10, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan cu ta desea un plachi di nomber (cliente nobo) mester registra e plachi dia 3 di januari 2020 y haci e pago corespondiente na Departamento di Impuesto mes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New customers that want a custom license plate should complete the registration on January 3, 2020, and should complete the payments at the Tax Department

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di pago, e contribuyente lo ricibi un carta, cual e lo entrega na e compania indica pa laga traha e plachinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once payment is processed, a letter will be sent to the company in charge of making the license plate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo avisa e contribuyente ki dia e lo por pasa busca su plachinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once the custom license plate is complete, the customer will be notified that it can be picked up

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan cu ya caba tin un plachi di nomber , por haci pago na Departamento di Impuesto of banco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Those who already have a custom license plate can complete their vehicle tax payments online, bank or at any of the offices of the Tax Departments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan cu a paga via banco lo mester busca e carta na e oficina anexo di Departamento di Impuesto na Camacuri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Customers who paid at the bank should pick up their letter at the annex building of the Tax Department in Camacuri

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No ta bay laga traha e plachinan di nomber delanta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: No custom license plate will be made in advance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues cu e cliente haci e pago di impuesto, e ora lo bay duna e carta cu e ordo pa laga traha e plachinan di nomber
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: only when payment has been received, the custom license plate will be made

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seguro valido
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Valid insurance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta recorda tur automobilista, cu na momento di busca plachi di number, lo controla e comprobante original di seguro di auto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As a reminder, the Tax Department emphasizes that the new license plates can only be received with the original proof of valid car insurance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e seguro no ta original y/of no ta valido, e cliente lo no ricibi su plachinan di number
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Without the original proof of insurance, no license plate will be given

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta recomenda pa haci e pago mas lihe posible mirando cu e cantidad di automobilistanan ta grandi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The tax department urges everyone to complete their vehicle tax payments as early as possible due to the enormous amount of vehicles that need the new license plates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No ta recomendabel pa warda te na ultimo momento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is not recommended to wait until the last minute

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Cultura Aruba (DCA) ta cera pa dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Cultura Aruba (DCA) closed for the holidays

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Cultura Aruba (DCA) ta participa cu en conexion cu dianan di fiesta su oficina lo ta cera riba dianan di fiesta for di 23 december 2019 te cu 3 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Culture of Aruba (DCA) announces that its office is closed on the holidays, from December 23, 2019 to January 3, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DCA lo habri bek pa publico riba dialuna 6 di januari 2020 den su orario di oficina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DCA will resume its activities on Monday, January 6, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta pidi disculpa pa cualkier inconveniencia cu esaki por causa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DCA offers its excuses for any inconvenience this may cause

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Director, staf y personal di DCA ta desea henter e pueblo di Aruba un dushi Pasco di Nacemento y un feliz Aña Nobo 2020 yena cu salud, creatividad, prosperidad y alegria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The director, staff, and personnel of DCA wish the Aruban community a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2020 filled with health, creativity, and happiness

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ban celebra y apoya nos tradicion di fin di aña, nos festivalnan di Dande den union familiar
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Let celebrate and support our New year ‘s Eve traditions, our Dande festivals united as a family

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cultura ta nos y ta nos ta cultura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Culture is us and we are culture

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ciere di fin di aña na biblioteca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Changed opening hours library due to the holiday

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta anuncia cambio di orario pa e dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In connection with the holidays, the National Library announces its changed opening times

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca National na Playa y sucursal na San Nicolas lo ta cera dialuna 23 di december 2019 te cu diabierna 3 di jauari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The library in Oranjestad and San Nicolas will be closed from Monday, December 23, 2019, to Friday, January 3, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca lo ta habri normal dia 6 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From January 6, 2020, the library will resume its activities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Recurso Humano lo ta cera pa dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento Recurso Humano (DRH) closed for the holidays

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Recurso Humano (DRH) ta informa cu nos lo ta cera dia 23 di december 2019 te cu  3 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Human Resources (Departamento Recurso Humano -DRH) announces that due to the holidays, its office will close from December 23, 2019, till January 3, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DHR lo ta habri bek pa publico dialuna dia 6 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DRH will resume its activities on Monday, January 6, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur persona cu ta desea un verklaring y/of ta desea pa entrega formulario pa loonbelastingvermindering por haci esaki te cu diabierna dia 20 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Customers who require a declaration and/ or wish to submit a wage tax reduction form will have until Friday, December 18, 2019 the opportunity to do so

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera custumber diaranson (18 december 2019) DRH lo ta cera desde di 12’or pa publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As customary, the DRH will be closed on Wednesday, December 18 at noon

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Staf y personal di DRH ta desea tur hende feliz dianan di fiesta y un Prospero Aña 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DRH staff wishes the Aruban community a Merry Christmas and a Happy 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Coriente ta baha entrante 1 januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reduction electricity rate effective January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 12 di december 2019, Gobierno di Aruba a anuncia entrante 1 di januari 2020, coriente lo conoce rebaho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On December 12, 2019, the government of Aruba announced that the electricity rates will go down as of January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Rebaho di coriente entrante 1 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reduction electricity rates per January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tipo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Type

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Consumo di coriente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Electricity consumption

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Categoria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Category

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tarifa anterior AWG/Kwh
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Old rate AWG/kWh

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tarifa nobo AWG/Kwh
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New rate AWG/kWh

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Rebaho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reduction

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Domestico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Domestic

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Comercio chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Commercial small

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Misa, Skolnan, Fundacionnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Churches,schools, foundations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Comercio grandi (hotelnan etc.)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Commercial large (hotels etc.)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Straatverlichting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Streetlighting

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prive-straatverlichting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Private streetlighting

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta posibel pa baha e tarifa di coriente 1 di januari 2020 debi un maneho financiero responsabel combina cu e decision di cumpra fuel oil pa na un prijs mas abou pa full 2020 (Swap)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The rate reduction per January 1, 2020, was possible due to a responsible financial policy and by purchasing fuel oil for a lower price for 2020 (Swap)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 14 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison December 14, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 14 di december 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 10 y 11 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras December 14, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on December 10 and 11, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Celebracion di conmemoracion di 100 aña di e aereolinea Avianca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: AVIANCA AIRLINES celebrates 100th anniversary

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 10 di december anochi a tuma luga celebracion di conmemoracion di 100 aña di e Aereolinea Avianca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On December 10, 2019, Avianca Airlines celebrated its 100th anniversary

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Avianca ta e aerolinea di mas bieu di Sur America y e di dos mas bieu di mundo despues di KLM
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Avianca is the longest-running airline of South America and the second oldest airline in the world, following the oldest airline KLM

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde december 5 di 1919, e aereolinea a cuminsa opera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Avianca started its operations on December 5, 1919

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Y awe, Avianca ta e compania di aereolina mas grandi na Colombia y e di dos mas grandi den Sur America cu un lista di destinacion extenso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: And is currently the biggest airline company of Colombia and the second largest in South America with a growing list of destinations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a felicita e aerolinea gradiciendo nan pa hunga un rol importante den e industria turistico na Aruba desaroyando e mercado Latino Americano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes showed gratitude for their huge contribution to the tourism industry of Aruba, for being an important partner in the South American tourism market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Awendia cu e situacion dificil na Venezuela, Bogota a bira nos hub pa Sur America
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current situation in Venezuela has made Colombia our South American hub

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e crecemento di comunidad Colombiano na Aruba y e acuerdo di diferente programa di Salud Publico na Colombia, a estrecha mas e lasonan entre e dos paisnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The growing Colombian community in Aruba in combination with the medical partnership in Colombia only makes our ties with Colombia even stronger

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes: “100 aña di existencia y e legado di Avianca, ta testimonio di e fortalesa di e aereolinea"
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the Prime Minister: “100 years of existence and the legacy of Avianca only resembles the strength of the airline”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin duda nos mester para keto un rato y puntra nos mes tur loke a wordo logra den e ultimo 100 añanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to stand still and admire all the accomplishments in those 100 years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un momento berdadero pa celebra y como un di e aereolineanan mas bieu di mundo, nos ta comparti hunto e logro grandi aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is indeed an occasion worth celebrating together; being one of the world’s oldest airline companies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba, como un participante principal den e industria turistico den nos region, ta aprecia hopi e asociacion solido cu e aerolinea y su nivel halto di flota
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba, as one of the region’s leading tourism partners, is very grateful to the solid airline with its high-quality fleet

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Promer Minister a felicita e accionistanan, Star Alliance Group, staf y e trahadonan di Avianca rond mundo y specialmente esnan di Aruba, cu e 100 añanan di Avianca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister praised the shareholders, Star Alliance Group, the staff and employers of Avianca worldwide and in particular those established in Aruba with the milestone celebration of Avianca

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta orguyoso di ta socio den e celebracion aki y ta expresa nos gratitud na Avianca pa su sosten na nos isla y pa conecta Aruba cu Sur America y mundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba is very proud as a partner in the celebration and expressed gratitude for the support and for connecting Aruba to South America and the world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E celebracion excepcional aki ta fortalece mas ainda e lasonan entre Colombia y Aruba no solamente cu e sosten den nos turismo, pero tambe den e lasonan economico, social y familiar di ambos comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This celebration only strengthens the ties between Colombia and Aruba, not only in the tourism industry but also economically, socially while connecting our families

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diferente otro orador a hiba palabra e anochi aki entre otro Ronella Tjin Asjoe-Croes di ATA, Joost Meijs CEO Aruba Airport Authority NV y Pamela Flores, Regional Sales Coordinator Centro America y Caribe pa Avianca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Other speakers included Ronella Tjin Asjoe-Croes, CEO ATA, Joost Meijs CEO Aruba Airport Authority NV and Pamela Flores, Regional Sales Coordinator Center America and the Caribbean for Avianca

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tawata tin un bunita show di e cultura Colombiano y a corta bolo pa celebra y e grupo Vallenato Plus a clausura e evento cu ritmo y musica Colombiano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The evening concluded with a traditional Colombian presentation, cake cutting, and Vallenato Plus delighted guests with Colombian tunes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No mester di tramitador pa regla bo papel na DPL
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: No broker needed to handle DPL documents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministerio di Asunto Social y Labor ta informa clientenan di Departamento di Progreso Laboral (DPL) cu nan no mester di un tramitador pa regla nan papel na DPL
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Ministry of Social Affairs and Labor informs the clients of the Department of Labor Progression (DPL) that they do not need any broker/ facilitator to handle their documents at the DPL

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta bon pa tur hende realisa cu e servicio di DPL ta completamente gratis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The services rendered at the DPL are completely free

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cliente cu kier haci uzo di servicio di un tramitador, mester realisa cu esaki por tin como consecuencia cu nan por bira victima di estafa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Anyone using brokers should be aware that they may be subject to fraud

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Newsletter di proyecto SISSTEM di Universidad di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Newsletter SISSTEM project kicked off at the University of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 1 di augustus, 2019 a cuminsa cu e Proyecto SISSTEM na Universidad di Aruba, un programa ambicioso cu tin como meta e desroyo di capacidad critico pa Solucion Duradero pa isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On August 1, 2019, the SISSTEM project kicked off at the University of Aruba, an ambitious program aimed at the development of critical capacity for Sustainable Island Solutions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SISSTEM ta promove maneho di sostenibilidad riba un nivel academico, ta apoya e capacidad di recupera y adapta di e islanan chikito, y na mes un momento ta educa un generacion nobo di academico cu tin e habilidad y capacidad pa realisa e manehonan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SISSTEM advances sustainability policies at an academic level, supports resilience in small island states while educating a new generation of academics that have the skills and capacity to make these policies a reality

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den nan newsletter por haya informacion actualisa di e Proyecto SISSTEM
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In their newsletter, you will find updated information on the SISSTEM project

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe por haya mas informacion tocante nan bachelor program, master program y proyectonan PhD riba nan web page
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You will also find more information on their bachelor program, master program, and Ph.D. projects on their web page

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba lo no legalisa cannabis recreacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recreational cannabis will not be legalized in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba ta informa cu lo no legalisa cannabis recreational
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba announced it would not legalize recreational cannabis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ya pa algun tempo Gobierno ta trahando riba legalisacion di cannabis medicinal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba has been working for a while on the legislation of medical cannabis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki pasobra hopi ciudadano ta uza e azeta of crema di cannabis pa motibo medicinal y ta mira efectonan positivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This to meet the demand for the use of cannabis-derived oils, creams, and its positive effects

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero Gabinete Wever-Croes kier crea un base legal na Aruba pa asina por importa e azeta y crema di cannabis, di e forma aki e ta bira mas accesibel pa tur hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This should be changed according to the Cabinet, Wever-Croes The import of cannabis oils and creams should become legal in Aruba making it more accessible for all.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora bo mira e efecto positivo cu por ehempel azeta di cannabis tin riba pashentnan di cancer, bo kier legalisa esaki mas lihe cu ta posibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The positive effect these oils have for cancer patients should be the main reason for the legalization of medical cannabis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E azeta y crema di cannabis no tin e efecto cu marihuana tin riba hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The effects of the oil and creams on humans are not similar compared to those of marihuana

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hopi famia ta sufri cu efecto di adiccion di marihuana di nan yiunan y Gobierno lo yuda crea mas sosten y facilidad pa e adictonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many families suffer from the effects of marihuana addiction by family members and the Government will assist these families with support and facilities to help addicts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero Gobierno lo no contribui na mira mas hoben bay perdi door di droga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: But it will certainly not contribute to the deterioration among the youth due to substance abuse

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo actua cu man duro contra violacion di leynan di droga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The use of illegal drugs will be prosecuted by the law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pesey e legalisacion medicinal di cannabis lo bay cu condicion hopi estricto di control
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The legalization of medical cannabis will be submitted to strict conditions and regulations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta empatisa cu ta trahando riba legalisacion di cannabis medicinal y no recreacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government will legalize medical cannabis but not recreational cannabis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. mr. David Passchier a huramenta como ambtenaar na Raad van Advies
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: David Passchier was sworn as a civil servant at the Advisory Board (Raad van Advies)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 10 december 2019 sr. mr. David M. Passchier a huramenta como ambtenaar na Raad van Advies
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On December 10, 2019, Mr. David M. Passchier was sworn in as a civil servant employed by the Country at the Advisory Council

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Secretaris di Raad van Advies, mr. Albert Braamskamp, tawata e persona apodera pa Gobernador di Aruba pa den su nomber efectua e huramentacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The oath was taken in the hands of Mr. Braamskamp, Secretary of the Advisory Board, who was mandated for this by the Governor of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mr. Passchier a drenta den servicio di gobierno dia 1 di januari 2018 den funcion di consehero legal na Raad van Advies
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Passchier joined the government on 1 January 2018 in the position of policy officer at the Advisory Board

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na e ocasion aki mr. Braamskamp a felicita e ambtenaar cu e huramentacion y a subraya e importancia di su trabou den interes general
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On this occasion, Mr. Braamskamp congratulated the civil servant on his swearing-in and emphasized the importance of the independent performance of duties within the duties of the Advisory Council

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Number nobo Biblioteca Nacional Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New telephone number for the National Library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta anuncia cu entrante diamars 11 di december 2019 su number di telefon ta cambia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library informs that it has a new telephone number as of Tuesday, December 11, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E number di telefon 528 1500 ta e number central pa tur tres localidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new telephone number 528 1500 is the general telephone number for all three libraries

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca na Oranjestad den George Madurostraat
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Library in Oranjestad, located at George Madurostraat

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: biblioteca San Nicolas den Peter Stuyvesantsraat
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Library in San Nicolas, located at Peter Stuyvesantsraat

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Arubiana na Oranjestad den Bachstraat
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Arubiana department in Oranjestad, located at Bachstraat

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scol Saludabel Aruba hopi satisfecho cu resultado di e siman di Training
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Healthy School Aruba is pleased with the results of the weeklong training

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Grupo di trabou Scol Saludabel Aruba ta hopi satisfecho cu e resultado di un siman intensivo di training cu a tuma lugar na e ultimo siman di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Taskforce for the Healthy School Aruba is very pleased with the results of the week of intense training that took place during the last week of November 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un total di 16 participante di 8 scol preparatorio y basico, a sigui e curso pa Coordinador di Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A total of 16 participants from 8 primary and secondary schools followed the Healthy School Coordinator course

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E scolnan aki a inscribi nan mes y a cuminsa e proceso pa bira un Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These schools signed up and initiated the process of becoming a healthy school

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata aki di Paulus School, St. Dominicus College, Prinses Amalia Basisschool, St. Franciscus College, Mon Plaisir School ( preparatorio y basico), Scol Primario Kudawecha y Cacique Macuarima School
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The schools that are in the phase of transitioning into the healthy school are Paulus School, St. Dominicus College, Prinses Amalia elementary school, St. Franciscus College, Mon Plaisir School (primary and secondary), Scol Primario Kudawecha and Cacique Macuarima School

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E actividadnan di e siman a inclui tambe un bishita na diferente scol cu ta den e proceso pa bira un Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The week also included a trip to the schools in the transitioning phase of becoming a Healthy School

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scol Saludabel Aruba kier gradici Ministerio y Departamento di Salud Publico pa nan apoyo pa por a realisa e bishita di trabou y training
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Healthy School of Aruba is thankful to the Minister and Department of Public Health for their field trip and training

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas Scol Saludabel Aruba kier gradici Ministerio di Asunto Social y Labor y Ministerio di Enseñansa, Ciencia y Desaroyo Sostenibel pa nan apoyo y sostén
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: but also the Minister of Social Affairs and Labor and the Minister of Education, Science and Sustainable Development for their support

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Busca permiso di construccion aproba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pick up approved building permits

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Algun tempo pasa a aproba un gran cantidad di peticion pa permiso di construccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A large number of building applications for obtaining a building permit have been granted for some time

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No a ser busca varios di esakinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, building permits are not always collected

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun e maneho di departamento di Supervision di DOW y e condicionnan mara na e permiso di construccion, e permisonan di construccion honra lo bira invalido, si no busca esaki dentro di un aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In accordance with the building policy of the Supervision Department of the DOW and the conditions set by your building permit, building permits that are granted and are not collected will expire after one year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na nomber di Minister encarga cu infrastructura lo revoca e permisonan di construccion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This building permit will be imposed or deposited by or on behalf of the Minister

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso cu no busca e permiso di construccion honra, lo supone cu no tin interes mas den e permiso di construccion, pa cual motibo lo tuma paso pa revoca e permiso di construccion honra entrante 1 di februari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the building permit has not been collected by this deadline, it is considered that the applicant is no longer interested in the building permit, which means that it will be imposed or withdrawn and deposited effective February 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Atencion: ta trata aki di e permisonan di construccion cu a ser honra te cu 31 di december 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Note: These concerns applications that were granted up to and including December 31, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Comision di Retiro ta tuma reces di 12 di december 2019 te 8 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recess Termination of Employment Commission from December 12, 2019, to January 8, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor y Investigacion ta informa tur cliente cu e Comision di Retiro ta bay cu vakantie di 12 di december 2019 te 8 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Labor and Research informs its clients that the Termination of Employment Commission will recess from December 12, 2019, to January 8, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Director di Departamento di Labor y Investigacion ta ricibi conseho di Comision di Retiro cu ta delibera ariba tur peticion di retiro entrega na Departamento di Labor y Investigacion pa un of mas dunado di trabao cu e meta pa por ricibi un permiso pa termina un relacion di trabou cu un of mas trahado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Director of the Department of Labor and Research obtains advice from an independent committee consisting of employer and employee representatives in the process of dismissal applications submitted by employers who seek permission from the Director of the Labor and Research Department to terminate the employment relationship with one or more employees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur peticion pa por termina un relacion di trabao ta keda den proceso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The pending applications will be processed through the normal procedure

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Peticion pa werkboek december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Request workbook December 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor y Investigacion (DAO) ta informa cu en conexion cu dianan di fiesta venidero, ta acepta y procesa peticionnan relaciona cu werkboek te cu dia 13 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department Labor and Research (DAO) informs that in connection with the coming holidays, requests for a workbook will be processed until December 13, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 6 di januari 2020 lo cuminsa ricibi y procesa werkboek normalmente bek
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On January 6, 2020, requests for a workbook will be processed again

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DAO ta pidi disculpa pa cualquier inconveniencia, y ta desea pueblo di Aruba un feliz y saludabel dianan di fiesta y un feliz 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DAO apologizes for the inconvenience and wishes the Aruban community joyous holidays and a happy 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa luna di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Consumer Price Index for the month of October 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina Central di Estadistica a publica e Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa luna di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau of Statistics published its Consumer Price Index for the month of October 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den nan relato adhunto por haya informacion detaya tocante Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached press release you will find more detailed information over the Consumer Price Index for October 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cambio den prijs di productonan petrolero 11 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New prices for petroleum products December 11, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Finansas, Asuntonan Economico y Cultura ta anuncia e prijsnan nobo di benta di combustibel entrante 11 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture announces the adjusted prices for petroleum products starting December 11, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan ta inclui BBO/BAZV/BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: BBO/BAZV/BAVP is included in the prices

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: REPSOL no ta sigui cu exploracion pa petroleo of gas den e subsuelo di lama rond di aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: REPSOL halts petroleum and gas explorations in Aruba waters

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E compania estatal, Compania Arubano di Petroleo (CAP) a informa Gobierno di Aruba riba e decision di REPSOL encuanto exploracion pa petroleo of gas den e subsuelo di lama rond di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government company Compania Arubano di Petroleo (CAP) has informed the Government of Aruba that the REPSOL has halted the exploration of gas and petroleum in the surrounding waters of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: REPSOL a dicidi pa no drenta e siguiente fase 4 di e contracto cu e tin cu Compania Arubano di Petroleo (CAP)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The REPSOL will not proceed with phase 4 of the agreement signed with the Petroleum Company of Aruba (CAP)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contracto firma pa ambos partido na december 2012 a yega su fin 30 november di 2019, despues di un periodo di 7 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The agreement signed in December 2012 was terminated on November 30. 2019, after 7 years of explorations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E rason principal pa no continua cu e campaña di exploracion ta e resultadonan di e proefboring, Bon Bini-1X, panort di Aruba, cu a resulta den un “dryhole”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The decision was made to halt explorations after unsatisfactory test drills of Bon Bini-1X located north of Aruba, which resulted in a “dry-hole”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Door di e corelacion aki por a reevalua e prospectonan bieu y kisas haya prospecto nobo den e awanan teritorial di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The correlation made it possible to reevaluate the old prospects with the hope to find new prospects in the waters surrounding Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di e reevaluacion aki REPSOL y e hecho cu no a logra haya otro partner pa e proyecto di exploracion cu ta hopi costoso,  REPSOL a dicidi pa no sigui explora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After reevaluation by REPSOL and the fact that REPSOL could not find another partner for the costly exploration, REPSOL pulled the plug

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba ta gradici tanto e Compania Arubano di Petroleo como e compania REPSOL pa tur esfuerso haci e ultimo 7 aña y tambe kier a duna danki na tur e institucionnan, organisacionnan y stakeholders incluyendo e Ministerio di Asunto Economico di Hulanda cu a yuda den un forma of otro pa laga e varios operacion cu a tuma luga bay miho posibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba thanked the Petroleum Company of Aruba, REPSOL and all stakeholders, organizations, and institutions for their efforts during the past 7 years,the Government is also thankful to the Minister of Economic Affairs of the Netherlands for their assistance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta den e fase pa busca conseho riba e decision recien di REPSOL
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is analyzing the decision by REPSOL and is seeking a second opinion

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e fase aki, Compania Arubano di petroleo (CAP) ta hunga un rol crucial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Compania Arubano di Petroleo (CAP) has a crucial role in this advice

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Vacaturanan na Bureau Sostenemi. Aplica awo!
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Job vacancies at Bureau Sostenemi. Apply now!

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Bureau Sostenemi tin vacatura disponibel pa e siguiente funcionnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At the Bureau Sostenemi vacancies are available for the following positions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si bo ta interesa, manda bo carta di solicitud y CV prome cu 31 di december 2019 na Bureau Sostenemi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If interested you can send your application, accompanied by a Curriculum Vitae to Bureau Sostenemi before December 30, 2019
