Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion tocante e funcion of con pa solicita, por tuma contacto cu Sra. Daphny Tecklenborg riba tel. 5881010 of via email
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information regarding the position or how to apply, you may contact its director Mrs. Daphny Tecklenborg at tel. 5881010 or via email

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DAO cera henter dia riba diabierna 6 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DAO closed all day on Friday, December 6, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor y Investigacion kier a participa na tur cliente cu diabierna 6 di december 2019 nan oficina lo ta cera henter dia en conexion cu Dia di Personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Labor and Research informs its customers that its office will be closed on Friday, December 6, 2019 due to staff day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna 9 di december 2019 DAO lo ta habri bek pa publico segun orario normal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DAO will resume its activities on Monday, December 9, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur consehero por manda nan lista di cliente pa asina por busca e paketenan di loonbelasting, BBO/BAVP y BAZV di aña 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Tax consultants can pick up their client's tax forms like income tax, BBO/BAVP and BAZV for 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na e momentonan aki Departamento di Impuesto ta preparando pa cuminsa otorga e paketenan di loonbelasting y BBO/BAVP/BAZV di aña 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office is getting ready to give out the tax forms containing the income tax forms, BBO/BAVP/BAZV for 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mescos ta conta pa e paketenan di toeristenheffing, speelvergunnings-recht, BBV y BBVAM
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Other tax forms that are available for pick up are the tourist levy, gaming license tax, BBV and BBVAM

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo manda e paketenan via post den luna di december proximo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These forms will be sent by postal service in the month of December

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e conseheronan fiscal of oficinanan di administracion lo tin un servicio special
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is a special service for tax consultants or administration offices

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta dispuesto pa otorga e paketenan personalmente na e conseheronan si manda un e-mail cu e peticion na tempo y si cumpli cu e condicionnan rekeri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office is willing to provide these forms to the tax consultants personally only if they request it timely by e-mail and meet the requirements

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E servicio special pa consehero ta valido pa e conseheronan cu tin mas cu 10 cliente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This incentive is applicable only if they request these for 10 clients or more

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta manda e lista di cliente pa Departamento di Impuesto via e-mail: pakket@impuesto.aw
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Client list should be sent by email at pakket@impuesto.aw

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e lista mester contene e siguiente informacion di cada cliente: persoonsnummer, nomber, adres, e-mail, tipo di belasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The list should include the following information per client: tax identification number, name, address, e-mail, Specification of which of tax form needed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta manda e lista den forma di un MS Excel file
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The needed forms should be included in an MS- Excel-file

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e fecha final pa entrega e lista di cliente ta 13 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The deadline to submit the client's list is December 13, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di e fecha aki lo no procesa e peticionnan nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office will not accept new requests after this date

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: lo notifica e conseheronan via e-mail ora cu e paketenan ta cla pa busca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The tax consultants will receive an email when the requested forms are ready for pick up

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: lo bay notifica e clientenan di e conseheronan tambe via e-mail cu a entrega na nan consehero nan pakete
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients will also receive the notification email that the Tax Office gave their tax forms to the tax consultants or administration offices

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto kier reitira cu e cliente ta keda responsabel pa e pakete di formularionan di impuesto, lo no bay otorga duplicado si a entrega e pakete caba na un consehero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office emphasizes that each client is responsible for their own taxes, forms, and that under no circumstances they will give duplicate forms in the event they already gave it to the tax consultants

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: ultimo dia pa busca e paketenan ta 18 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The deadline to pick up these forms is December 8, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di e fecha aki Departamento di Impuesto lo manda e paketenan post
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After this date, the tax forms will be sent by postal service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante pa menciona cu na februari 2020 tur comerciante por cuminsa haci nan declaracion di impuesto mensual completamente digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to state that as per February 2020, every company can declare their monthly taxes online

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki a scoge pa otorga solamente 6 luna di e formularionan menciona, pa duna tur comerciante chens pa registra nan compañía(nan)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is the reason that these forms will only be available for 6 months, given businesses the opportunity to register

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas lihe registra, mas lihe por stop di para den rij tur luna pa entrega e declaracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The sooner they register, the sooner they can stop standing in line each month at the Tax Office

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Haci un cita mas pronto posibel pa asina haya acceso na e portal “BO impuesto”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Book your appointment as soon as possible in order to receive your access to the “Bo impuesto” portal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Decreto gubernamental 1 december 2019 tocante atake cibernetico na dr. Horacio e. Oduber hospital prolonga cu 3 dia mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National decree 1 December 2019 extended for 72 hours; Cyberattack on dr. Horacio Oduber Hospital

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e Team di Maneho di Calamidad Nacional ta informa cu e crisis cibernetico na Horacio E. Oduber Hospital a drenta su di dos siman di cual pa e ultimo 6 dia a maneh’e conforme loke ley ta prescribi pa medio di un decreto gubernamenta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National crisis Team just announced that the cyberattack at the Horacio Oduber Hospital has entered its second week, for which the National Crisis Team has been activated over the past 6 days, as stated by the law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decreto gubernamental ta duna e Team di Calamidad Nacional e espacio necesario conforme ley pa mantene e crisis conteni y haci e adaptacionnan necesario pa loke ta trata e obhetivonan y maneho di e crisis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National decree gives the National Crisis Team leeway to handle and contain the crisis within the boundaries of the law, enabling them to contain and adapt as needed with the objective to solve the crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister President Evelyn Wever Croes mes momento ta sigura cu e salud di pashent y salubridad publico ta garantisa pa Hospital y Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister assures the community that patient’s health and general healthcare is guaranteed by the Hospital and Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamentonan di gobierno ta cera pa 3or di atardi riba 5 di december 2019 en conexion cu celebracion di Sinterklaas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Government services closed at 3:00 p.m on December 5in connection with Sinterklaas celebration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera ta custumber e aña aki tambe ta duna e personal di gobierno e oportunidad pa celebra Sinterklaas (San Nicolas) riba 5 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As customary, this year on December 5, 2019, government employees will also be allowed to celebrate Sinterklaas (Saint Nicholas)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si trabou ta permiti, ta duna e personal e oportunidad pa bandona nan sitio di trabou mas tempran pa 3or di atardi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Insofar as the work on the public services allows, the staff is allowed to leave the workplace at 3 p.m. on that day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E oficinanan di gobierno den districto di Noord, paradera, Santa Cruz, Savaneta y San Nicolas lo cera pa 2or di atardi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The auxiliary government offices in Noord, Paradera, Santa Cruz, Savaneta and San Nicolas will close at 2.p.m

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Siman di training di Scol Saludabel Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Training week for Healthy School Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scol Saludabel Aruba a organisa, cu colaboracion di Ministerio di Salud Publico, un siman intensivo di training for di dia 25 te cu dia 29 di November, 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Healthy School Aruba organized during November 2019 25-29 a week full of training in cooperation with the Ministry of Public Health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Poco poco mas y mas scol preparatorio y basico ta interesa pa bira un Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Slowly but surely more prep schools and primary schools are getting intrigued to become a Healthy School

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proceso pa bira un Scol Saludabel ta encera entre otro guia di un consehero di Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Becoming a healthy school includes receiving proper guidance from a Healthy School Advisor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba tin actualmente 4 consehero di Scol Saludabel cu a haya training na Hulanda na 2016
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Now there are 4 Healthy School Advisors on Aruba that received adequate training in the Netherlands in 2016

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Debi na e interes creciente pa bira un Scol Saludabel, e cantidad di consehero di Scol Saludabel lo no ta suficiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Based on the growing interest of schools to become Healthy Schools, the amount of Healthy School Advisors is not sufficient

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki Scol Saludabel Aruba a scoge pa trece 2 profesional di Hulanda, señora Monique Boonekamp y señora Muriel Weltens
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: That is the primary reason for the Health School Aruba to hire 2 advisors from the Netherlands, namely Mrs. Monique Boonekamp and Mrs. Muriel Weltens

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mirando e oportunidad unico aki a dicidi di inclui e training di coordinador di Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Based on the circumstances, the opportunity is there to include training for Healthy School Coordinator

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E coordinador di Scol Saludabel ta miembro di e team di salud di e scol cu ta traha pa e scol por bira un Scol Saludabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Healthy School Coordinator is a member of the Health Team of the school that is in charge of turning the school into a healthy school

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna 25 di november mainta a cuminsa cu un presentacion pa minister y director y representante di e instancianan cu ta directamente envolvi cu Scol Saludabel Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The event started on Monday, November 25, with a presentation for the ministers, directors, and representatives of the stakeholders involved with the Healthy School

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A conta cu presencia di Minister di Enseñansa, Ciencia y Desaroyo Sostenibel, Sr. dr. Armando Lampe y Minister di Asunto Social y Labor, Sr. Glenbert Croes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Education, Science and Sustainable Development Armando Lampe and Minister of Social Affairs and Labor Glenbert Croes attended the presentations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E representantenan di 3 schoolbesturen, SKOA, SPCOA, DPS y representante di Dienst Inspectie tambe a asisti na e presentacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 3 school boards of SKOA, SPCOA and DPS and delegation from the Directorate of Education Inspection were among the attendees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: GKMB ta hayando hopi criadero na e casnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: GKMB is finding many mosquito breeding places in residential areas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico tur aña di nobo ta recorda comunidad atraves di nan campañanan di conscientisacion riba e peligernan di malesanan transmiti pa sangura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health needs to remind the community every year about the dangers of mosquito-transmitted illnesses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seccion di Gele Koorts en Muskietenbestrijding (GKMB) ta yuda den e tarea di combati e sangura door di pasa cas pa cas controla, señala y educa cada individuo con pa controla rond di nan cas y con pa cuida awanan para cu tin uzo domestico pa nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Yellow Fever and Mosquito control department (GKMB) has the task to visit each home in Aruba in order to educate homeowners about the methods of preventing the spreading of these illnesses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur e trabou aki GKMB su team ta haci pa na momento cu awa yobe cada persona sa con pa controla rond di nan cas y sa tambe kico pa haci y dicon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The GKMB team prepares the community and provides them with valuable information on how to prevent mosquito breeding in time for the rain season

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lamentablemente seccion di GKMB ta encontrando masha hopi criadero mes rond di e casnan cu nan ta bishitando
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Despite the efforts by the GKMB, they still find multiple breeding containers full of mosquito larvae at many homes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na e momento aki e cifranan di e malesanan transmiti pa sangura ta relativamente abou, pero esey no nifica cu nos tin pa warda te ora baca hoga pa nos tuma accion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current data indicates a low number of cases; however, it is essential to make sure these numbers remain low in order to prevent outbreaks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico di Aruba ta haci un yamado na comunidad pa tuma accion y controla rond di nos cas enbusca di e criaderonan di sangura y deshaci di esakinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health also urges everyone to help eliminate the potential spreading of these mosquitos by making sure they have no open containers to breed in

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seccion di GKMB su so no por atende cu e problematica aki, nos mester ayudo di comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Preventing the spread of mosquitos is a task that the GKMB cannot complete by itself and needs the help of the community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu GKMB
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information contact the GKMB

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Frontera cu Venezuela ta keda cera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Border with Venezuela remains closed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a anuncia cu e frontera cu Venezuela ta keda cera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba decided that the border of Aruba with Venezuela will remain closed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cierre di frontera cu Venezuela ta keda prolonga for di 10 di december cu tres luna, pues te cu 10 di maart 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It will extend the border closure with three months from December 10, 2019, so until March 10, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba como e otro paisnan den cercanía, a haya un fluho grandi di migrantenan ilegal for di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Both Aruba and other countries in the area have seen a large influx of illegal migrants from Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta pone un peso grandi riba capacidad y recurso limita di e paisnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This puts enormous pressure on the already limited capacity and resources of the countries

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actualmente tin alrededor di 2000 peticion pa asilo entrega cu lo trata segun e tratadonan di derecho humano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At this moment, around 2000 asylum applications were filed in Aruba and will be processed taking into account human right treaties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta monitor y evalua e situacion masha di cerca, pero ainda e condicion na Venzuela ta difícil y no ta apto pa habri frontera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government of Aruba closely monitors and evaluates the situation in Venezuela,however the condition is still critical, therefore the border will remain closed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conferencia di Prensa extraordinario en conexion cu atake cybernetico riba hospital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Extraordinary press conference in connection with cyberattack at the Hospital

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia diaranson 28 di november 2019 pa 11.00or di anochi Gobierno di Aruba a tene un conferencia d prensa extraordinario unda Prome Minister interino Sr. Otmar Oduber a informa comunidad riba e crisis na hospital causa door di e atake cybernetico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On November 28, 2019, at 23:00hrs the government of Aruba held an extraordinary news conference where the acting Prime Minister Otmar Oduber informed the public about the crisis caused by the cyberattack at the hospital

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde e atake cibernetico, cu a afecta gravemente e sistema di IT di Dr. Horacio Odube Hospial, e staff medico a bay bek na e sistema manual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since the cyberattack, which gravely affected the IT system of Dr. Horacio Oduber Hospital, the medical staff returned to the manual system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa preveni escalacion di e crisis, cuminsando 28 di November 2019, e crisis plan di Oficina di Calamidad ta reactiva, segun e Ley di Calamidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To prevent further escalation of the crisis, starting on November 28, the crisis plan by the Crisis Management Office act will put into force, according to the Calamity Act

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta sosode segun un Decreto nacional, manera stipula den e ley di Calamidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The crisis plan, as laid down in the calamity act, will be executed through a National decree

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta haci posibel cu lo tin e sosten y autorización necesario pa e deparamentonan di gobierno por haci tur loke ta posibel pa evita cu e situacion empeora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will make it possible for the necessary support and authorization for the government agencies to do all that is necessary to prevent the situation to worsen

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E fondonan tambe lo ta disponibel pa maneha e crisis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Funds will also be made available to manage the crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Oduber no duna información riba e ransomware cu a infecta e sistema, ya cu e ta bou investigacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Oduber has not revealed details about the ransomware that infected the system since it is still being investigated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Oduber ta urgi pueblo pa unicamente bay Eerste Hulp na Hospital den casonan di emergencia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Oduber urges the public to visit the Hospital Emergency Room only in emergency cases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pacientnan cu no ta rekeri atencion medicio urgente por bay nan dokter di cas of IMSAN
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Patients who require non-urgent medical attention can go to their family physicians or to IMSAN instead

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministernan di Asuntonan Economico di Aruba cu Corsou a reuni tocante cooperacion economico entre e islanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Meeting of Ministers of Economic Affairs of Aruba and Curacao about the economic cooperation between the islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Minister di Finansa, Asunto Economico, y Cultura mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro a reuni cu Minister di Desaroyo Economico di Corsou, Minister Mc William durante cual a discuti algun punto di importancia pa cooperacion economico entre Aruba y Corsou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Minister of Finance, Economic Affairsand Culture Mrs. Xiomara Ruiz Maduro, met with the Minister of Economic Development of Curacao, Mrs. Giselle Mc William in which they discussed the possibilities of economic cooperation between the islands Aruba and Curacao

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Certificado di Origen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Certificate of Origin

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un formulario cu lo facilita e comercio entre Aruba y Corsou, Antes tabata uza un formulario di Europa, cu awor lo bira obsoleto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This form, that replaces European form, will facilitate commerce between the islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Certificado di Origen lo ta di un forma digital pa asina facilita e proceso di comercio y lo drenta na vigor entrante 1 di januari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Certificate of Origin is a digital form that facilitates the entire commercial process starting January 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo uza e formulario aki den cuadro di e zona di comercio liber entre Aruba y Corsou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This form will be used in connection with the free commerce between Aruba and Curacao

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Onderlinge Regeling Vrijhandel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Free Trade Agreement

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Maduro a informa tambe cu a finalisa e proceso di negociacion di e zona liber di comercio entre Aruba y Corsou pa asina pronto por firma un Onderlinge Regeling Vrijhandel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Ruiz Maduro also announced the culmination of the negotiations regarding the Free Zone of Aruba and Curacao and that soon the Free Trade Agreement will be signed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta encera cu por exporta producto traha na Aruba sin barera na Corsou y vice versa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This means that products produced in Aruba can be traded in Curacao without any restrictions and vice versa

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un noticia positivo pa economia di Aruba y Corsou, ya cu esaki lo genera mas actividad economico y tin oportunidad pa crea mas trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is positive news for the local economies and should create more economic activity and create more job opportunities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conexion maritimo entre e islanan y Fast Ferry
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Inter-island maritime connection and the Fast Ferry

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A reuni tambe cu Minister President Sra. Evelyn Wever- Croes y Minister di Transporte, Comunicaion y Sector Primario Sr. Chris Romero pa asina por a discuti e posibilidad di por haci uzo di e conexion maritimo di e barco Don Andres
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A meeting was also held with the Prime Minister Wever-Croes and Minister Romero, in order to discuss the possibilities of using the Don Andres ship to connect the islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta e barco cu ta navega entre e islanan ABC
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Don Andres already frequents the ABC islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pronto Don Andres lo bay cuminsa cu su ruta nobo for di Sto. Domingo pa Corsou pa asina por trece fruta y berdura for di Sto. Domingo pa Corsou y cu Aruba por haci uzo di e oportunidad aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: and will soon be adding the Dominican Republic to its itinerary transporting produce from the Dominican Republic to Curacao, creating the possibility to include produce products for the Aruban market as well

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A trata varios punto pa asina awor por sigui traha pa concretisa esakinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Various aspects were discussed to realize this project

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Ruiz-Maduro a gradici Minister Mc William y su conseheronan pa a tuma e iniciativa pa bini Aruba pa asina por a atende e puntonan di importancia aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Ruiz-Maduro thanked Minister Mc William and her delegation for initiating the meeting in Aruba and discuss these important topics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe a gradici e expertonan di Departamento Economico y di Aduana cu a guia e proceso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The minister showed great appreciation to the Department of Economic Affairs and Aruba Customs for their input

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Encuentro informativo “Study in Holland”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Informative event “Study in Holland”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Arubahuis conhuntamente cu Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba ta presenta un encuentro informativo pa esnan cu tin interes pa bay studia na Hulanda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Arubahuis together with the Department of Education of Aruba are presenting an event for all those pursuing higher education in the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pais Aruba ta brinda studiantenan cu kier haci un estudio na nivel di Bachelor of Master na Hulanda un prestamo pa financia e estudio: “Arubalening”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba provides the opportunity of a student loan called “Arubalening” to students that will be attending a bachelor's or master's degree in the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di informacion tocante financiamento lo papia tocante seguro, e opcionnan di vivienda pa studiante na Hulanda y e pasonan cu mester tuma pa por haya vivienda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Banda di informacion tocante financiamento lo papia tocante seguro, e opcionnan di vivienda pa studiante na Hulanda y e pasonan cu mester tuma pa por haya vivienda

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe lo duna informacion di escogencia di estudio y e guia cu Arubahuis ta duna na e studiantenan na Hulanda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Attendees will also receive valuable information regarding the choices of education programs and the guidance available through the Arubahuis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur esnan cu tin interes pa bay studia na Hulanda, tur mayor, studiante y publico en general cu kier mas informacion tocante studiamento na Hulanda ta cordialmente invita pa e anochi di informacion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event is specifically for parents and students planning to study in the Netherlands, as well as for the public interested in studying in the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento lo tuma luga diaranson 27 di november di 7.00 pa 9.30 di anochi den e Auditorium na Colegio EPI.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event takes place on November 27, 2019, from 7.00 pm to 9.30 pm in the auditorium of Colegio EPI

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di e encuentro informativo, Arubahuis conhuntamente cu Departamento di Enseñansa ta organisa un workshop pa esnan cu kier bay studia na Hulanda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides the information event, the Arubahuis and the Department of Education of Aruba are organizing a workshop for students planning to study in the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E workshop aki lo enfoca riba “studiekeuze” y “huisvesting”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This workshop will focus on “Program choice” and “housing”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E workshop lo tuma luga diabierna 29 di november proximo, di 4.00 pa 6.00 di atardi na Biblioteca Nacional na Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The workshop takes place on November 29, 2019, from 4.00 pm to 6.00 pm at the National Library in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa por participa na e workshop mester inscribi di antemano pa motibo cu cupo ta limita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration is required for the workshop since seating is limited

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por inscribi door di manda un email na j.vanderlinde@arubahuis.nl cu specificacion di nomber, edad y vooropleiding
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please register by sending an e-mail to  j.vanderlinde@arubahuis.nl including your name, age and current education level

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alumnonan actual di Colegio San Nicolas y Colegio EPI por inscribi pa e workshop cu lo tuma luga na nan scol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Students currently attending Colegio San Nicolas and Colegio EPI can register for the workshops held at their schools

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inscripcion pa esaki ta bay via decanaat
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These students can register with their dean

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 23 di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum Prices November 23, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 23 di november 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per November 23, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO, BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel: 521-2400 ext.251
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel: 521-2400 extension 251

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lista di prijsnan maximo pa productonan basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: List maximum prices basic goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Otorgamento di kavel pa nos Carnaval
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Carnival lot permits

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Directie Infrastructuur en Planning DIP. e departamento cu ta encarga cu otorgamento di kavel pa nos carnaval ta informa tocante su calendario pa Carnaval 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Infrastructure and Planning (DIP), responsible for the granting of lots during the carnival season, is announcing its carnival 2020 schedule

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dos buzon ta pa kavel pa parada grandi na Oranjestad, un buzon pa kavel pa bende cuminda y bebida pa Carnaval na San Nicolas, un buzon pa bende cuminda y bebida pa Carnaval na Noord y un buzon pa bende cuminda y bebida pa Carnaval na Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Two of the Raffle drums are designated for the grand carnival parade in Oranjestad, one raffle drum designated for Food & Beverage permits for the San Nicolas parade, one raffle drum for Food and Beverage for the Noord Parade and one raffle drum for the parade in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diabierna 6 di december 2019 notario lo seya e 5 buzonnan pa 9’or di mainta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Friday 6 December 2019, the notary will seal the 5 raffle drums at 9:00 am

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe for di diamars 7 di januari 2020 te cu dialuna 13 di januari 2020 por cumpra y deposita peticion pa kavel pa Carnaval 2020 na oficina di DIP di 8.00 a.m. pa 12.00 p.m. y di 1.00 p.m. pa 3.30 p.m
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lot petitions for carnival 2020 can be purchased and submitted at the DIP between 7 January 2020 and 13 January 2020 from 8.00 a.m. to 12.00 p.m. and from 1.00 p.m. to 3.30 p.m

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diamars 14 di januari 2020 den presencia di notario lo saca e nombernan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Tuesday 14 January 2020, the lucky names will be drawn in the presence of the notary

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no cumpli cu un of mas di e condicionnan stipula den e permiso, lo cancela e permiso y lo otorga e kavel na e siguiente persona riba lista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Failing to comply with any of these conditions will result in the withdrawal of the permit and this will be granted to the next participant on the drawn list

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e persona lo no bin na remarca mas pa haya permiso pa un kavel pa Carnaval den futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The person, whose permit is withdrawn, will no longer be able to participate in future carnival lot drawings

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Peticion pa kavel pa trailer, stellage of auto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Requests for Trailer, scaffolds or car lot

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cada peticion ta costa Af. 4,- na stampia, segun e Zegelverordening (AB 1998 no. GT 1), art. 34
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Each petition costs AWG. 4,- for a stamp, according to the stamp decree “Zegelverordening” (AB 1998 no. GT 1), art. 34

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un persona por bin na remarce pa permiso pa un kavel so
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Only one carnival lot will be granted to each individual

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Igual ta conta si acaso un adres sali mas cu un biaha, e prome nomber registra na e adres ey ta conta pa un kavel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Should the same person’s name be drawn more than once, the DIP will only grant the person one lot

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijs pa kavel (permiso) ta: Afl. 25,- pa retributie, Afl. 4,- stampia y Afl. 135,- pa precario, segun e Retributie en Legesbesluit Directie Infrastructuur en Planning (AB 2004 no. 7), art. 1
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lot permit fee: AWG. 25,-, stamp AWG. 4,- and precario AWG. 135,-, according to the “Retributie en Legesbesluit Directie Infrastructuur en Planning (AB 2004 no. 7), art. 1

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E persona cu bin scoge su kavel mester bin cu un identificacion valido, sea cedula, rijbewijs of paspoort
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A valid identification (driver’s license ID card or passport) should be presented upon selecting of lot

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde dialuna dia 3 di februari 2020 ta permiti pa pone trailer, stellage of auto (entre 7.00 a.m. y 7.00 p.m.) cu excepcion di L.G. Smith Boulevard caminda DOW lo instala tent
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Trailers, scaffold and cars can be placed starting 3 February 2020 between 7.00 a.m. and 7.00 p.m.) with the exception of the L.G. Smith Boulevard where the DOW will install their gazebos

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome cu dialuna dia 09 di maart 2020 tur trailer, stellage of auto mester ta kita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All trailers, cars or scaffold structures should be removed by March 09, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta cera diabierna awor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Tax office closed on November 29, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta participa cu diabierna awor, dia 29 di november 2019, su oficinanan lo ta cera henter dia en conexion cu reflexion interno pa cu Dia di Belasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento di Impuesto (Tax Authorities) announces that its office will be closed to the public on 29 November 2019 for internal reflection on Tax Day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta nifica cu diabierna awor lo no tin servicio na publico tanto na oficina principal na Camacuri como na MFA Noord, MFA Paradera, MFA Santa Cruz, MFA Savaneta y Oficina di gobierno San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This applies to all offices of the Tax Office, namely its headquarters in Camacuri and branches in MFA Nood, MFA Paradera, MFA Santa Cruz, MFA Savaneta and the auxiliary government office in San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta pidi su clientenan pa tuma nota di e participacion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento di Impuesto (Tax Authorities) requests its customers to take this into account

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Encuesta di DAO tocante nos yiunan di tera cu a termina nan estudio den exterior y a regresa Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DAO launches a survey on how returning Aruban graduates assess their journey back to Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor (DAO) ta pidi bo cooperacion pa participa den e encuesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Labor and Research (DAO) is requesting your cooperation to participate in a survey

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decision pa keda den exterior of regresa Aruba no ta un decision facil
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The decision of choosing to stay abroad or to move back is not easy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asina mes, hopi studiante ta opta pa keda den exterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Still, several students chose to stay abroad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo por yuda identifica e posibel factornan cu lo por motiva e futuro graduadonan Arubiano di afo pa regresa Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This may identify possible factors to motivate future Aruban graduates from abroad to move back

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e lo identifica ki area e graduadonan Arubiano kier wak mehoracion aden
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally, it will provide clarity on which area Aruban graduates wish to see improvement in

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E encuesta aki ta dirigi na e graduadonan Arubiano cu a gradua den exterior den e ultimo 15 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This survey is aimed at Aruban graduates who have graduated in the past 15 years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta posibel pa yena e encuesta si bo persona a gradua entre 2004 y 2019 den exterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you obtained your degree between 2004 and 2019 abroad, then you are eligible to fill the survey

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante pa remarca cu e encuesta lo keda anonimo y lo uza e datonan di resultado solamente pa e metanan di investigacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This survey will be completely anonymous and the results will be used for research purposes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E encuesta lo ta disponibel desde awe te cu 13 december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Participation is allowed starting from now until December 13. 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por yena e encuesta for di e siguiente link
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please click on the link below to fill in the survey

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DAO ta solicita tur esnan cu ta cumpli cu e criteria, pa participa na e encuesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DAO encourages all who comply with the criteria to participate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Danki di antemano pa bo cooperacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We thank you in advance for your cooperation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por yama 5237720 y pidi pa un empleado di Bureau Arbeidsmarktonderzoek of por manda nos un e-mail na julie.kelly@aruba.gov.aw of na returngraduates@gmail.com
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information or if you have any question, you could call the following phone number 5237720 and ask for an employee of the Unit labor market research (Bureau Arbeidsmarktonderzoek) or sent an email to julie.kelly@aruba.gov.aw or returngraduates@gmail.com

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 23 di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison November 23, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 23 di november 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 19 y 20 di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras November 23, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on November 19 and 20, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Resultado preliminar di investigacion di IMF riba gasto di personal di Gobierno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Preliminary study by the IMF on government personnel costs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante un conferencia di prensa Minister Ruiz-Maduro a informa cu durante di e ultimo dos siman e expertonan di Fondo Monetario Internacional (IMF) a haci un investigacion riba e gastonan di personal di Gobierno di Pais Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Minister of Economic Affairs, Finance and Culture Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro informed that during two weeks the experts of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) did an investigation on the personnel costs of the Aruban government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gastonan di personal y di interes ta e dos gasto mas grandi riba presupuesto di Pais Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Public wage and interest costs are the two biggest components of government expenses on the budget

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Motibo di e investigacion aki ta cu gobierno mester tin un bon bista riba e gastonan di personal pa na momento cu tin cu tuma cierto decision
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The reason for this investigation is for the government to get a good picture of the wage costs when making decisions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gastonan di personal no por sigui crece y mester contempla pa baha nan pa por yega na un finansa publico manehabel y sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Wage costs cannot continue to increase and the government has to contemplate lowering them to reach a manageable and sustainable public finance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e investigacion IMF a haci un comparacion di e gastonan personal di e sector publico cu sector priva y tambe a haci un comparacion cu e paisnan mesun grandi cu Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In its investigation, the IMF made a comparison between the personnel cost in the public and private sector and made a comparison between Aruba and the countries of similar size

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E resultadonan ta indica cu locual Gobierno ta paga na salario den sector publico ta substancialmente mas halto cu locual ta paga den sector priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The result indicates the government personnel costs (public sector) are substantially higher than in the private sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gastonan di personal di Gobierno cu ta encera e empleado publico y tambe esnan ‘gelijkgestelden’ cu Gobierno ta subsidia nan salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Wage costs in the public sector include the government employees and persons treated as such (gelijkgestelden), whose salaries are subsidized by the government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si compara e dos grupo aki, esnan cu ta traha den Gobierno ta gana 40% mas tanto cu esnan den sector priva y e ‘gelijkgestelden’ ta gana 20% mas tanto cu esnan den sector priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If we compare these two groups, the one that works for the government earns 40% more than the one that works in the private sector, whereas the “gelijkgestelden” earn 20% more than the workers in the private sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e componente di edad, den e aparato publico e edad ta subiendo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As regards the age component, the age of the public sector employees is increasing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta indica tambe cu na cierto momento tin un cantidad grandi di empleado publico cu lo bay cu pensioen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This means that eventually, a great number of government employees will reach retirement age

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo trece su reto cune ya cu a subi e edad di pensioen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This entails a challenge since the pension age was increased

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si compara e gastonan di personal den e aparato publico na Aruba cu otro paisnan den Caribe, Latino America y sobra pais , e salario di e trahado publico ta mas halto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If one compares the wage cost of the public sector of Aruba with the other Caribbean, Latin American and other countries, the wage of the government employee is higher

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: En comparacion cu otro paisnan, Gobierno di Aruba tin tambe mas tanto persona ta traha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Compared with other countries, the government of Aruba also has more employees in its service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gasto di ‘overtime’ tambe ta un di e gastonan cu ta subi e gastonan di personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Overtime costs are also one of the components that increase personnel costs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E componente di overtime den gastonan di personal ta 5%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The overtime component comprises 5% of total personnel costs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa yega na esaki e expertonan di IMF a uza e cifranan di aña 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To reach this percentage, the IMF experts use the figures from 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E presupuesto den e Departamento di Husticia ta esun cu tin mas ‘overtime’, 17% di e presupuesto aki ta bay pa paga ‘overtime’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The budget of the Department of Justice has higher overtime costs since overtime pay entails 17% of its budget

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aki lo mester haci un investigacion mas profundo pa analisa e motibo di ‘overtime’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Further investigation is required to analyze the reason for overtime

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Transporte ta informa e siguiente relaciona cu Departamento Transporte Publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Conditions for operating license according to the National Ordinance Passenger Transport

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Relaciona cu e incidente cu a tuma luga dia 20 di november 2019, tocante e ruta cu chauffeur di diferente autobus tin cu core segun nan (permiso di explotacion) exploitatievergunning, Minister di Transporte, Comunicacion y Sector primario ta duna e siguiente remarkenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In response to the incident that occurred on November 20, 2019, about the route that buses should drive according to the operating license, the Minister of Transport, Communications and Primary Sector makes the following comments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Transporte Publico ta resorta bou di e ministerio cu ta encarga cu transporte di persona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Transport falls under the Ministry responsible for passenger transport

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Transporte Publico ta encarga pa ehecuta e Ley di Transporte di Persona pa loke ta trata otorgacion di un exploitatievergunning (permiso di explotacion), pa duna conseho na e minister en cuestion y pa e registracion y administracion di esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Departamento Transporte Publico must implement the objectives of the National Ordinance Passenger Transport for issuing an operating permit, advise the minister in question in this regard and arrange for its registration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes e departamento ta encarga pa hiba supervision pa cumplimento di e ley aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The department is also responsible for monitoring compliance with the aforementioned national ordinance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conforme articulo 34b prome inciso (lid 1) di e ley (Transporte di persona) “Landsverordening personenvervoer” (LvPv) (AB 1995 no. GT 23) tin empleadonan publico nombra via decreto gubernamental encarga pa supervisa y controla cu ta cumpli cu e normanan stipula den e ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to Article 34b (1) of the National Ordinance on Passenger Transport (LvPv) (AB 1995 no. GT 23), the officials designated by national decree are responsible for monitoring compliance with the provisions laid down by or according to this national ordinance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dicho decretonan ta publica den Landscourant di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Such a national decree is published in the National Gazette of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas inciso 2 sub c ta autorisa e ambtenaarnan menciona den e prome inciso pa para cualkier vehiculo cu ta haci transporte di persona como nan profesion, solamente den caso cu esaki ta necesario pa nan por ehecuta nan funcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides, paragraph 2 (c) states that the officials referred to in the first paragraph are, exclusively to the extent that this is reasonably necessary for the performance of their duties, competent to stop any person transporting persons

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Articulo 24 di e decreto gubernamental “Landsbesluit Algemene bepalingen toezichtuitoefening (AB 1998 no. 70) ta defini cu empleadonan publico uniforma di Cuerpo Policial of otro ambtenaar uniforma por medio di un decreto gubernamental tin e autoridad pa para of pa forsa un vehiculo pa para
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Article 24 of the National Decree on General Provisions for Supervision (AB 1998 No. 70) stipulates that the power to force the vehicle to stop or to stop the vehicle will only include the power to stop the vehicle if the power is assigned to uniformed officials of the Aruba Police Force or other uniformed officials appointed by national decree

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e caso aki e inspectornan uniforma trahando na Departamento Transporte Publico (DTP)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In this case, the uniformed supervisors working at the Departamento Transporte Publico (DTP)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seguidamente lo revoca pa un periodo defini, e derecho di explotacion di e vergunninghouder, si no duna oido na e advertencia anteriormente ricibi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Secondly, the operating license will be withdrawn for a specific period if the license holder does not respond to the warning

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Finalmente si e vergunninghouder persisti den no cumpli cu e stipulacionnan den e vergunning y sigui kibra e reglanan door di actua contra dicho stipulacionnan, hasta despues di ricibi e prome advertencia por escrito y e revocacion pa tempo defini, lo bay over na revoca e derecho di explotacion definitivamente y no lo bin na remarke pa haya un derecho di explotacion mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If, after the warning and the temporary withdrawal of the operating license, the license holder still acts contrary to or does not comply with the provisions of the license, the operating license will be definitively withdrawn

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna 9 di december 2019 ta e ultimo dia pa entrega declaracion di inkomstenbelasting 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deadline for the filing of income tax filing date 2018 is December 9, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta informa cu dialuna, dia 9 di december 2019, ta e ultimo dia pa entrega e declaracion di inkomstenbelasting 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office informs that December 9, 2019, is the latest date for submitting the income tax return 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo no tin mas prolongacion di termino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After this date extension is no longer possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta haci un apelacion na su clientenan pa tene bon cuenta cu e fecha final di 9 di december próximo y no warda te na ultimo pa entrega e declaracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office appeals to its customers to take into account the deadline of December 9, 2019, and not wait until the last moment to submit the tax return form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas pa medio di e declaracion, e cliente ta haya e oportunidad pa haci uzo di su derecho di deduci su gastonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The income statement allows the customer to exercise his right to deduct certain expenses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ley di prohibicion di articulonan di plastic di un solo uzo como tambe Styrofoam y Oxybenzone
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single use plastic, the use of Styrofoam and Oxybenzone prohibited

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba diamars 19 di november 2019 e ley di prohibicion di articulonan di plastic di un solo uzo como tambe Styrofoam y Oxybenzone a pasa unanimamente den Parlamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On November 19, 2019, the Parliament of Aruba unanimously approved the law prohibiting the use of single use plastic, as well as the use of Styrofoam and Oxybenzone

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ley aki ta conforme e metanan di Nacionan Uni encuanto Dearoyo Sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This law is accordant with the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conforme un Landsbesluit cu lo mester finalisa prome cu 2020, lo prohibi e productonan di mas basico cu ta perhudica den den cantidad grandi, nos medio ambiente, manera cups, forki di plastic, tayonan, styrofoam box, straw di plastic y mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This as stated in the National Decree that it should be effective near the end of 2020, prohibiting the basic products that impacts our environment and health considerably like plastic cups, utensils, plastic plates, Styrofoam boxes, plastic straws and many other products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oxybenzone como un ingrediente presente den sunblock tin gran efecto negativo riba nos bida marino, specialmente nos coralnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Oxybenzone as component in sunblock, is hazardous to the marine life specifically the corals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester aplaudi iniciativanan local manera Aruba Aloe y Aruba Life Organics cu ta companianan local cu ta produci productonan alternativa manera e sunblock cu ta organico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government applauds local incentives by Aruba Aloe and Aruba Life Organics producing alternative products like organic sunblock

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proximamente lo traha hunto cu comercio pa mira e alternativanan cu por crea pa e productonan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Following the law, the Government will work together with companies to find alternatives for the creation of these ecofriendly products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunando tur persona e tempo necesario pa haci nan adaptacion y forma di opera pa por cumpli cu ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A transition period is in place in order to provide everybody with proper time for the conversion to alternative products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo publica e lista di productonan cu primordialmente lo prohibi den medionan di comunicacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The list with the prohibited products will be published soon

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna 9 di december ta e ultimo dia pa entrega e declaracion definitivo di winstbelasting 2018 y haci e pago corespondiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deadline for filing and paying profit tax 2018 is December 9, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna, dia 9 di december 2019, ta e ultimo dia cu por entrega e declaracion definitivo di winstbelasting 2018 y haci e pago corespondiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office announces that Monday, December 9, 2019 is the deadline for filing the tax return and paying the income tax due 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cobransa adicional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additional tax

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Clientenan cu no cumpli cu entregamento di e declaracion definitivo, lo haya un cobransa adicional esta un ‘naheffingsaanslag’ inclui boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you do not submit and pay the tax return form or the provisional tax return form, you can receive a supplementary tax assessment with a fine

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mescos ta conta si acaso e cliente a paga un suma menos cu locual el a declara na winstbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is also the case if a customer pays an amount that is less than what is stated on the tax return form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E boet pa no cumpli cu entregamento di e declaracion ta maximo AWG. 2.500,00
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The default penalty for non-submission of the tax return form is a maximum of Awg. 2,500,00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no haci e pago di winstbelasting of no haci e pago na corectamente, e boet ta maximo AWG. 10.000,00
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If no profit tax is paid or an incorrect declaration is filed, the fine can increase to Awg. 10,000.00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta haci un apelacion na su clientenan di winstbelasting y/of nan consehero pa tene bon cuenta cu e fecha final di 9 di december 2019 y no warda te na ultimo pa entrega e declaracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office urges its customers and / or advisors or to take into account the latest date of December 9, 2019 and not to wait until the last moment to submit the tax return form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Invitacion na pueblo en general y particularmente nos hobennan pa bishita nos Museo Arkeologico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Archeology Museum of Aruba is inviting everyone to visit their renovated museum

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Cultura, Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro y Museo Arkeologico Nacional di Aruba (MANA) ta invita pueblo en general y turistanan pa pasa bishita e museo cu a haci su reapertura recientemente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Culture, Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro together with the National Archeology Museum (MANA) are extending an invitation to the community and tourists to visit the recently re-opened museum

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: MANA ta contribui grandemente na conscientisacion di nos cultura y tin un contribuccion balioso na educacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: MANA is an important contributor to the education of our culture and history

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E exposicion permanente tin mas cu 10.000 artefacto di historia di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new permanent exposition counts more than 10.000 historical artifacts of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E hobennan ta cera conoci cu e coleccion grandi di varios artefacto cu tabata ser uza den pasado, e manera di biba y e parti spiritual di nos antepasadonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Visitors can explore the great collection, a variety of findings belonging to our past, but also about the spiritual and daily lives of our ancestors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actualmente MANA ta hospeda e exposicion internacional temporario ‘Lasonan Caribeño’ hendenan conecta antes y awor, cu ta habri te october 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Currently, the MANA is hosting a temporary international exposition ‘Lasonan Caribeño’ connecting people in the past and present that will be available until October 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: MANA su personal ta traha cu hopi dedicacion pa conscientisa e balor y importancia di e herencia arqueologico di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The personnel at MANA have worked with dedication to better educate visitors about the value and importance of the archeologic heritage of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: MANA ta organisa entre otro tour y programanan educacional pa nos hobennan tocante nos herencia cultural arqueologico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The MANA organizes tours and educational programs for students about the cultural archeological heritage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: MANA ta conserva nos herencia cultural y ta siña nos di unda nos ta bini y ken nos ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: MANA preserves our cultural heritage educates about where we came from and who we are

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrada ta gratis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Admission is completely free

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Enseñansa  ta anuncia cu su oficina principal lo ta cera diabierna 22 di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Education closed to the public on November 22, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba ta informa cu su oficina principal ubica na Frankrijkstraat lo ta cera diabierna 22 di november 2019 en conexion cu mantencion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Education announces that its headquarters in Frankrijkstraat will be closed on Friday, November 22, 2019 due to maintenance work

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 16 di december 2019 ta cuminsa acepta pago di impuesto di vehiculo di motor 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payment for motor vehicle tax 2020 on December 16, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 16 di december 2019 proximo, Departamento di Impuesto ta cuminsa acepta pago di impuesto di vehiculo di motor di aña 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office announces that customers can pay their motor vehicle tax for the year 2020 starting Monday December 16, 2019

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You can pay your motor vehicle tax (A, TX, DT, B, O, MFA or V plates) in two equal installments, per half year, or in one installment

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you own a personalized license plate or a motorcycle, you must pay the motor vehicle tax in one installment

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The rate for 2020 remains unchanged

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes, ta bon pa tene na cuenta cu no ta posibel pa paga e impuesto di aña 2020 si no a paga e impuesto y boet di e aña aki y e aña nan anterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Keep in mind that it is not possible to pay motor vehicle tax for 2020 if you have not paid your arrears this year or previous years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por sigui tur informacion di Departamento di Impuesto riba e pagina di Facebook
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information follow the Facebook page of the Departamento di Impuesto

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hotel 5 strea Secrets Baby Beach Resorts na San Nicolas ta bira realidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 5-star hotel Secrets Baby Beach Resorts in Aruba becomes a reality

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diahuebs atardi 14 di November 2019 a tuma luga na Baby Beach Aruba na San Nicolas ponemento simbolico di e prome piedra di e hotel 5 strea Secrets Baby Beach Resorts
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Thursday, November 14, 2019, the groundbreaking ceremony of the Secret Baby Beach Resort in San Nicolas took place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Secrets Baby Beach Aruba, un hotel di 600 camber ta planea pa keda cla na final di 2021, segun e compania a duna di conoce
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 600 rooms Secrets Baby Beach Aruba is scheduled to open in the fourth quarter of 2021, according to a statement from the company

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E lo ta e prome hotel di Apple Leisure Group’s na Aruba situa na Baby Beach, San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It will be Apple Leisure Group’s first-ever resort in Aruba located on Baby Beach, in proximity to San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Secrets Baby Beach Aruba lo inclui tur e elementonan di e hotel all inclusive, cu ta inclui cena sin mester di reservacion, room service 24 ora pa dia y entretenimento nocturno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The adults-only, all-inclusive Secrets Baby Beach Aruba will include all of the all-inclusive brand’s signatures, from reservation-free gourmet a la carte dining to 24-hour room service to nighttime entertainment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta encera un desaroyo hopi importante pa San Nicolas, e capital cultural di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is a particularly significant development for San Nicolas, which is considered Aruba’s cultural capital

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister di Aruba, mr. Evelyn Wever Croes a gradici den nomber di henter e comunidad di Aruba Martinon Group and AM resorts y henter San Nicolas y vencidario pa kere y sostene e proyecto aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister of Aruba, Evelyn Wever Croes, on behalf of the Aruban community, expressed her gratitude to the Aruba Martinon Group and AM resorts, San Nicolas and its surroundings for their support for this project

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 20 di november 2019 Oficina di Scolnan Publico ta cera tur diaranson
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting November 20, 2019 Department of Public Schools will close on Wednesdays

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Schools (DPS) announces that its office will be closed on Wednesdays starting November 20, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta en conexion cu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is in connection with

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the updating of data

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: digitalisacion administrativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the digitization of the administration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: asunto interno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: internal affairs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: mudanza denter di poco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: an upcoming move

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPS lo ta habri tur otro dia na su orario normal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPS will be open on all other days as usual

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso di emergencia por e-mail DPS na info@dps.aw
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In case of emergency you can reach the DPS by e-mail via info@dps.aw

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante dialuna 18 di november 2019 tin cambio den e condicionnan di pago pa e clientenan di DIMAS
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Changes in payment conditions for DIMAS clients starting Monday, November 18, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta anuncia cu entrante dialuna awor, dia 18 di november 2019, lo tin cambio den e condicionnan di pago pa e clientenan di DIMAS cu mester haci pago di por ehempel gasto administrativo (retributies), gasto pa permiso (leges) y/of suma di deposito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office announces that starting Monday, November 18, 2019, there will be changes in the payment conditions for DIMAS clients who have to pay for example administrative costs (retributies), permit fee (leges) and/or deposit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes ta importante pa tuma nota di e sitionan unda por haci pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is also important to take notice of the locations where payments can be made

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siguiente condicionnan di pago ta aplicabel pa e clientenan di DIMAS
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following conditions are applicable for DIMAS clients

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 18 di november e servicio di caha ubica na oficina di DIMAS no lo ta den operacion mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting November 18, 2019, cash register service at the DIMAS office will cease its operation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta haci un apelacion na tur cliente di DIMAS pa tuma bon nota di e cambionan menciona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax office urges all DIMAS clients to take notice of these changes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta start e campaña pa yena papel di belasting 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Office will assist in the filing of income tax forms 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta informa su clientenan cu dialuna 18 di november 2019 campaña pa yena e formulario di declaracion di inkomstenbelasting 2018 ta start
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax office informs its clients that the campaign to get assistance with the filing of their income tax forms for 2018, will start on Monday, November 18, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E clientenan cu tin dificultad pa yena e formulario por acudi libremente na un di e sitionan unda e personal di Departamento di Impuesto lo ta cla pa brinda ayudo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients who have problems with the filing of their income tax forms can get assistance from the Tax office assistants at various locations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: no tin mester di haci un cita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is not necessary to make an appointment for this purpose

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kendenan por participa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Who can participate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur persona soltero cu tin un entrada bruto di no mas cu Afl. 75.000,-
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: unmarried persons whose gross income does not exceed 75.000,00 florins

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur persona casa cu hunto tin entrada bruto di no mas cu Afl. 150.000,-
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: married couples with a combined gross income not exceeding 150.000,00 florins per year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No por brinda ayudo na esnan cu tin un empresa propio of cu ta traha riba nan mes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This assistance is not intended for clients with their own business or who are self-employed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Trece documento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Documents needed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta pidi su clientenan pa trece e formulario di declaracion di aña 2018 hunto cu tur comprobante necesario relaciona cu entrada y gasto, tanto na Aruba como den exterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax office requests its clients to bring the income tax form for 2018 together with the needed documents regarding income and expenses, in Aruba and abroad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes ta importante pa duna e datonan personal di e pareha casa y e yiunan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is also important to take with you personal information on the husband as well as the wife and children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues cu caba di yena e declaracion e cliente por entrega esaki mesora y lo ricibi un comprobante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After completing the income tax form, it can be delivered immediately and you will get a receipt

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ultimo dia pa entrega e declaracion di inkomstenbelasting 2018 ta 9 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The deadline for submitting the tax return is December 9, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di e fecha aki no lo duna mas prolongacion di termino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After this date an extension is no longer possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Internacional di Derecho di Mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: International day of Children's Rights

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 20 di November, ta un dia importante, riba cual mundo ta conmemora e adopcion di e Declaracion Universal di e Derechonan di Mucha na aña 1959
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: November 20 marks an important day as the world commemorates the adaptation of the Universal Declaration of Children’s rights in 1959

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e calendario di actividad por haya mas informacion tocante e eventonan cu lo tuma luga durante siman pa conmemora e dia importante aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the activities calendar you will find more information over the activities to be held during the children’s week to honor this special day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Tratado aki ta stipula un cantidad di derecho, cu ta inclui aspectonan di salud, enseñansa, recreacion, como tambe e bida familiar, proteccion contra violencia y discriminacion y cada mucha nan derecho pa nan opinion wordo scucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This treaty gives the children some fundamental rights; including the right to healthcare, education, recreation, a home, protection against violence and discrimination and the right to be heard

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na aña 2001 Aruba tambe a firma e Tratado aki, haciendo asina e compromiso pa proteha di un forma mas completo posibel e desaroyo di e mucha den su personalidad, talento, capacidad emocional, mental y fisico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In 2001 this treaty was also signed by the Aruba government, committing to the right for each child to develop their personality, talent, emotional capacity, and mental and physical development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin varios desaroyonan positivo cu a tuma luga caba, pero ainda tin espacio pa mehoracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lots have been done already but there still is a long way to go

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Presupuesto 2020 cu surplus di 29 miyon, 0.5%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Budget 2020 with surplus of 29 million, 0.5%

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a informa riba 11 di november 2019 cu a finalisa e presupuesto 2020, cu e surplus palabra cu Hulanda di 0.5% of 29 miyon florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government of Aruba announced on November 11, 2019 that the budget for 2020 has finally been finalized, with the surplus of 0.5% or 29 million florins as agreed with the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe a logra e norma pa loke ta trata personal di gobierno di Afl. 475 miyon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Also the personnel standard of Afl. 476 million has been reached

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Finansas, Asunto Economico y Cultura a splica den linea general con e presupuesto ta hinca den otro y a duna di conoce cu Aruba ainda no a sali for di e crisis, pero cu ta riba bon caminda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture explained the general outline of the budget, and stated that Aruba is not yet out of the crisis, but is well on its way to achieving it

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e Minister a indica cu no a fiha e presupuesto segun planeamento, pero si segun e fecha stipula di 15 december 2019 duna pa ley.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: When asked, she indicated that although the budget is not fully in line with planning, the government is acting within the legally set deadline of December 15, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun Laft, pa no mas tarda cu 15 december 2019, mester por tin un bista riba e presupuesto y den todo caso lo logra esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the Laft, at least on December 15 there should be a view of a budget and that will certainly work out

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A logra baha deficit di pasado di te cu 300 miyon te cu e prome surplus den hopi aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Large deficits in the past, up to 300 million florins, have now been reduced to a first surplus in years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta aspira di por entrega e presupuesto mas pronto cu ta posibel na parlamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The aim is to submit the budget to Parliament as soon as possible
