Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recordatorio campaña di vacunacion contra Influenza
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reminder Influenza shot for persons 60+ years of age

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta informa campaña di vacunacion contra Influenza a cuminsa y ta haci un yamada na e grupo di risico pa pasa busca nan vacuna completamente gratis na un di e localidadnan cu mas ta combiniente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health wishes to inform people over 60 about their vaccination campaigns and calls on all people over 60 to receive a flu shot free of charge at nearby locations in their neighborhood

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera Departamento di Salud Publico a anuncia anteriormente e vacuna di Influenza pa temporada 2019/2020 ta disponibel na seccion di Malesanan Infeccioso situa na Avicena straat# 1 Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As previously announced, the flu vaccination for the 2019-2020 season is available at the section of infectious diseases located at the Avicena Street #1 in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na e localidadnan aki lo vacuna personanan na risico cu presenta cu nan recept di doctor di cas y nan carnet di AZV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At risk persons should bring their AZV card and a doctor’s prescription

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adultonan mayor di 60 aña mester presenta solamente cu nan carnet di AZV valido
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: persons 60+ years of age should only bring their valid AZV card

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recordatorio pa inscribi e ranchonan na costa y riba rif
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reminder registration fishermen's cabins

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues cu a anuncia e maneho nobo di e regulacion di casitanan crioyo, miho conoci como rancho na costa y riba rif rond di Aruba, mas o menos 90 persona a registra nan rancho na Departamento di Infrastructura y Planning (DIP)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the announcement of the new policy for the regulation of fishermen's cabins along the coast and on the reef islands around Aruba, about 90 people have registered their fishermen's cabins with the Infrastructure and Planning Directorate (DIP)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DIP kier recorda tur persona cu ainda no a registra nan rancho, pa haci esaki ainda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DIP reminds the owners who have not yet registered their fishing hut to do so

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Control y vigilancia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To control and monitor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta necesario pa regula loke ta pasando cu e casitanan aki pa cual ningun hende ta para responsabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to know what is happening with these shacks to make users accountable for their actions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hopi biaha tin hopi sushi rond di nan, ilegalidad y acto inmoral ta tuma luga den nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On many occasions, these shacks and surroundings are left filthy, are being used for illegal activities and immoral acts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e proceso cu ta cuminsa cu ne, esnan cu ta acepta cu e casita ta di nan lo haya un permiso pa esaki y lo mester para responsabel pe tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the policy changes, those claiming to own these shacks need to acknowledge this in writing and will obtain the permits for this, but will be held accountable

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa evita cu e cantidad ta sigui aumenta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To avoid the increase of shacks being build

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e maneho nobo, no ta permiti pa construi mas di e casitanan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the new policy, it is no longer allowed to build any new shack

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tampoco ta permiti pa amplia e casitanan existente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Expansion of existing shacks is not allowed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta duna 2 luna pa esun responsabel registra na DIP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is providing owners with 2 months to register their shacks at the DIP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta permiti solamente pa persona registra (no negoshi)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration is only valid for registered residents and not for businesses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cuadro di e ROPV cu ta den tratamento, e aspecto di regulacion di tereno ta hopi importante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In connection with ROPV that is currently being processed, the regulation of land is very important

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta reconoce cu e casitanan aki tin balor tradicional cultural, p’esey e maneho lo percura pa esnan cu tey sigui existi, pero teniendo na cuenta e aspecto sostenibel tambe cual Gobierno ta para pe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is aware of the traditional cultural value of these shacks, and that is the reason it’s allowing the existing shacks, but keeping in mind that the Government also stands for sustainability

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Orario di servicio di Abattoir pa temporada di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: December opening hours Abattoir

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Veterinario di Departamento di Salud Publico kier recorda tur persona cu tin plania di sacrifica un cabrito, carne of porco pa consumo humano, cu mester haci esaki na Abattoir segun nos leynan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health’s veterinarian wants to remind all who are planning the slaughter of goats, sheep or pigs in December for human consumption, that this has to be done at the slaughterhouse as stated by law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Matamento di bestia na cas ta ilegal y por tin su riesgo pa salud di hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At home slaughtering of goats, sheep or pigs is illegal and also poses a risk for humans

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: ultimo dia pa mata bestia lo ta diamars 17 di December 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Last slaughtering date is December 17, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Mundial di Diabetes 14 november
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: World Diabetes day November 14

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Plataforma Promocion di Salud cu ta conta cu participacion di DVG, SVb, WGK, IBiSA, IMSan, HOH y AZV a trece na comunidad di Aruba informacion pa loke ta Dia Mundial di Diabetes cu ta conmemora durante henter luna di November
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Platform for Health Promotion, consisting of DVG, SVB, WGK, IBISA, IMSan, HOH and AZV, highlighted the reason for a World Diabetes day; promoting awareness through November

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na 1991 Federacion Internacional di Diabetes conhuntamente cu WHO a crea Dia Mundial di Diabetes cu e meta pa hisa conscientisacion den comunidad di e menasa pa salud cu e malesa di diabetes ta trece cu ne
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: World Diabetes Day was created in 1991 by the International Diabetes Federation and the WHO in response to growing concerns about the escalating health threat posed by diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema di e dia Mundial di e aña aki ta Famia y Diabetes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The theme for World Diabetes Day 2019 is Family and Diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Descubri diabetes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Discover diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Preveni diabetes tipo 2
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prevent type 2 diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Maneha diabetes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Manage diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba e website di International Diabetes Federation por haya mas informacion riba e 3 aspectonan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More information on these 3 aspects can be found on the International Diabetes Federation’s website

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Aruba un total di 8.642 persona a haya tratamento pa e malesa di diabetes den aña 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In 2018 a total of 8.642 patients have been treated for diabetes in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plataforma Promotion di Salud ta urgi famianan ta siña mas tocante e señalnan di alerta cu Diabetes ta duna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Platform for Health Promotion urges families to learn more about the warning signs of Diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Door di no trata of maneha diabetes e malesa por conduci na consecuencia serio di salud pa bida largo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Left untreated or unmanaged, diabetes can lead to life-changing complications

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cieguedad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Blindness

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: amputacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Amputation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: problema di riñon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Kidney failure

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: ataca di curason
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Heart attack

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: atake celebral
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: stroke

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por tuma nota di tur e actividadnan aki riba e Facebook page di IBISA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IBISA will be announcing these activities on their Facebook page

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe lo bay tin un link ”sa bo riesgo.com” unda comunidad por subi y test nan mes y sa nan riesgo pa desaroya diabetes tipo 2
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will also be a link available to “know your risks”, an online quiz to know your risks of developing type 2 Diabetes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reapertura di Museo Archeologico Nacional di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reopening Archeology Museum Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientementa a gobernador di Aruba y Minister di Finansa, Asunto Economico y Cultura a efectua apertura di Museo Archeologico Nacional di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Governor of Aruba and Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs, and Culture reopened the recently renovated Archeology Museum Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Cultura Sra. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro a repasa e historia di desaroyo arkeologico na Aruba y a anuncia cu ta trahando riba un fundacion autonomo pa MANA y cu pronto Aruba tin un Maneho di Museo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The history of the Museum was recollected by Minister Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro who looked back at the archeological development in Aruba and announced she is working on an autonomous foundation for the MANA, and soon Aruba will have museum management

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E nomber Daçato ta un combinacion di e palabranan Caiquetio ‘Dato’ pa e dader y ‘Maçato’ pa un bebida alcoholico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Daçato is a combination of the Caiquetio name “Dato” for dates and ‘Maçato’, an alcoholic beverage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Aruba tin hopi tradicion y un di nan ta pa ‘basha betro pa e spirito’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba is known for many traditions, one being the “pouring off a drink for the spirits”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e acto di reapertura a honra e spirito di nos antepasadonan na momento cu nos Gobernador hunto cu Minister a basha e ‘‘Daçato’ cu tabata den un calbas pa e spiritonan di nos antepasadonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the reopening ceremony, the spirits of our ancestors were honored when the Governor and Minister poured the Daçato that was in the calabash shell of our ancestors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asina a haci e apertura simbolicamente di e exposicion permanente di Museo Arkeologico Nacional di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This concluded what is the new permanent exposition of the National Archeology Museum

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues arkeologo Sr. Raymundo Dijkhoff a duna un guia den e sala di exposicion permanente na Gobernador di Aruba Sr. Alfonso Boekhoudt, Minister Presidente di Aruba Sra Evelina Wever-Croes, Minister di Cultura Sra. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro hunto cu otro Minister y miembro di Parlamento cu tabata presente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first exposition tour was given by archaeologist Raymundo Dijkhoff, who guided Governor Boekhoudt, Prime Minister Wever-Croes and Minister Ruiz-Maduro among other Ministers and Members of Parliament

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta yama un danki special na Tourism Product Enhancement Fund (TPEF) pa nan contribucion pa por a haci MANA operacional atrobe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is very grateful for the contribution of the Tourism Product Enhancement Fund (TPEF) in making MANA operational again

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dienst Warenkeuring en Hygiene lo ta cera pa publico dialuna mainta 11 di November 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Goods Inspection and Hygiene closed half day on November 11, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Public ta informa cu Dienst Warenkeuring en Hygiene ta cera dialuna mainta 11 di november 2019 debi na trabounan di mantencion riba nan sistema computarisa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department for Public Health hereby announces that the Department of Goods Inspection and Hygiene which falls under its responsibility will be closed to the public on Monday November 11, 2019, due to maintenance work on its computer network

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan ta reanuda nan servicio publico dialuna dia 11 di November 2019 parti atardi di 1:00 pm
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They will resume their activities on November 11, 2019 from 1:00 p.m

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Vacuna di influenza pa temporada 2019/2020 ta disponibel na servicio di Malesanan Infeccioso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New Influenza vaccination for 2019/2020 available

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bou di grupo di riesgo ta referi na e personanan cu ta na risico pa desaroya complicacion grave manera bronkitis y pulmonia pa motibo di griep
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The higher risk group consists of anyone susceptible to flu-related complications like bronchitis and or pneumonia

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E personanan aki ta hende grandi riba 60 aña, mucha bou di 2 aña, personanan cu ta sufri di malesanan cronico of malesa di nan sistema respiratorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This includes children under the age of 2, adults 60 years or above, and people in between who have certain chronic medical conditions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe persona obeso, na estado of cu tin un sistema inmunologico abou door di malesa, manera cancer y HIV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The flu shot is also recommended for obese, pregnant or anyone with a low immune system due to cancer or HIV

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Influenza ta un infeccion viral cu ta afecta principalmente nos nanishi, garganta y pulmon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Influenza is a viral infection that attacks your respiratory system — your nose, throat, and lungs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Keintura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fever

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: dolor di musculo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: aching muscles

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: dolor di cabes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Headache

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: calafriu y sodamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: chills and sweats

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: tos seco y cu ta persisti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: dry, persistent cough

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: dolor di garganta y rinitis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: sore throat or rhinitis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esnan cu ta cay bou e grupo di riesgo por pasa busca nan vacuna completamente gratis cu nan carnet di AZV y un recept di nan docter di cas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The at-risk patients can receive the vaccination by bringing their AZV card in combination with their doctor’s prescription

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adulto riba 60 aña por haya e vacuna completamente gratis presentando solamente cu nan carnet AZV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 60+ adults will receive their vaccination for free by showing their AZV card

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: esnan cu no ta cay bou e grupo di risico pero kier e vacuna por haya esaki na un balor di Afl 20,-
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Any person not in the at-risk group can receive their flu shot paying Afl. 20,-

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Orario pa vacuna ta di dialuna pa diabierna for di 7:45 – 11:45 y 13:15 – 15:30
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Vaccination is possible from Monday to Friday from 7:45 – 11:45 and 13:15 – 15:30

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta recorda cu e miho manera pa preveni influenza ta door di tene cuenta cu e siguiente medidanan preventivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health is reminding everybody that the best way to control the spread of the influenza infection is to prevent by

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Vacuna contra influenza
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: getting the flu vaccination

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: laba man frecuentemente cu habon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: frequently wash hands with soap

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu servicio di Malesanan Infeccioso di Departamento di Salud Publico na 5224200
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please contact the section of Infectious Diseases of the Department of Public Health at 5224200

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba ta baha e interes di Arubalening na 0%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba student loan interest 0% starting January 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Enseñansa, Desaroyo Duradero y Ciencia, dr. Rudy Lampe a informa di e decision di gobierno pa baha e interes di e Arubalening na 0%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Education, Sustainable Development  and Science, dr. Rudy Lampe has announced that the interest rate for Aruba student loan has been reduced to 0%

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ley aki lo ta aplicabel pa esnan cu ya caba tin un acuerdo firma cu Aruba y pa esnan cu ta bay pidi un prestamo den futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This 0% rate is applicable to new students who soon will apply for the Aruba student loan as well as students who already have an Aruba student loan agreement

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba lo ofrece e fiansa aki na un interes di 0% haciendo esaki mas facil pa nos studiantenan por paga bek una bes nan caba di studia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This should make the Aruba student loan more attractive and help students pay off their loan easily when terminating their education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta spera cu e decision aki por conduci na trece mas profesionalnan Arubano pa bin contribui na e economia di pais Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government’s decision should help attract more local professionals to help build a solid economy for Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Watty Vos Boulevard ta habri diamars 5 di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Watty Vos Boulevard opens on November 5, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Obra Publico y Cuerpo Policial di Aruba ta informa cu Watty Vos Boulevard ta habri diamars 5 di november 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Works and the Police Department are informing the community that the Watty Vos Blvd will officially open on November 5, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Watty Vos Boulevard ta consisti di
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Watty Vos Boulevard consists of

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 25 km di caminda nobo y renoba cu 13 rotonde nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 25 km new and renovated roads and 13 roundabouts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 25 km di area asigna pa peaton y ciclista por cana y core bicicleta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 25 km of pedestrians and bicycle lanes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 7 km di caminda nobo di dobbel via, 7 rotonde y dos viaducto for di rotonde di Sabana Blanco pa Punta Brabo, cu ta construi segun standard internacional y cu a haya nan certificacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 7 km double lane roads, 7 new roundabouts, 2 overpass roads from the roundabout between Sabana Blanco and Punta Brabo, build according to international building standards and certified

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Watty Vos Boulevard tin 13 rotonde cu ta inclui; enkel baan rotonde, twee baan rotonde, turbo rotonde y paperclip rotonde
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Watty Vos Boulevard includes 13 roundabouts, namely single-lane roundabouts, double lane roundabouts, turbo roundabouts and a paperclip roundabout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un y tur por yega nan destinacion sigur y cu e trafico por sigui circula facil riba Watty Vos Boulevard y e camindanan conecta, DOW y KPA ta urgi pa tene bon cuenta cu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To guarantee a smooth and safe traffic flow on the Watty Vos Blvd and connecting roads the DOW and KPA urge drivers to pay attention to the following

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Trafico riba e caminda su velocidad ta di 80 kmph
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum speed is 80 kph

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora di yega rotonde mester baha velocidad di 80 kmph pa 60 kmph te cu 40 kmph, manera e borchinan di velocidad ta indica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reduce speed to 80 kph - 60 kph and 40 kph, upon approaching the roundabouts as indicated by the traffic signs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Paga tino na e borchinan di trafico di duna preferencia, zebrapad y fietspad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pay attention to the priority signs, pedestrian crossing, and bicycle lane

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Anticipa unda bo ta yegando p’asina bo sortia den e baanchi corecto cu ta hibabo den direccion desea
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Anticipate where you want to go and change lanes in time to your desired destination

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Contrario di crusadanan, unda automobilistanan tin cu duna preferencia na trafico na man drechi, na rotonde trafico tin cu paga tino y duna preferencia na trafico biniendo di banda robes prome cu subi e rotonde
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Unlike regular intersections where priority is given to traffic coming from the right, at the roundabouts traffic coming from the left has priority

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Unabes cu ta ariba e rotonde, 40 kmph ta e velocidad maximo cu ta permiti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 40 kmph is the maximum allowed speed on the roundabouts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DOW y KPA ta urgi esnan cu ta uzando Watty Vos Boulevard pa mantene nan mes na e leynan di trafico pa tur hende por yega nan destinacion sigur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DOW and KPA urge drivers of Watty Vos Boulevard to abide the traffic laws at all times so everybody can reach their destination safely

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa luna di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Consumer Price Index for the month of September 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina Central di Estadistica a publica e Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa luna di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau of Statistics published its Consumer Price Index for the month of September 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den nan relato adhunto por haya informacion detaya tocante Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached press release you will find more detailed information over the Consumer Price Index for September 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Opcion pa studiante di Aruba studia na Fisk University y Meharry Medical College na Merca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Local students can apply for Fisk University and Meharry Medical College in the USA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Receintemente, e respresentantenan di Fisk University y di Meharry Medical College a haci un bishita di cortesia cerca Minister di Enseñansa dr. Armando Rudy Lampe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently a delegation from Fisk University and Meharry Medical College met with the Minister of Education dr. Armando Rudy Lampe

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E representantenan a elabora riba tur loke e universidadnan aki tin di ofrece na estudiantenan di Aruba cu lo desea di bay studia na Merca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During their visit they presented the opportunities these institutions offer to local students that want to pursue an education in the USA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fisk University ta un ‘undergraduate liberal arts university’ y Meharry Medical College ta un ‘graduate college’ y tur dos ta ubica na Nashville, Tennessee
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fisk University is an ‘undergraduate liberal arts university’ and Meharry Medical College is a ‘graduate college’ both located in Nashville, Tennessee

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meharry Medical College adicionalmente ta interesa pa traha conhuntamente cu Xavier University pa por introduci un facultad di odontologia aki na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Meharry Medical College is interested in a partnership with Xavier University with the objective to open a odontology faculty in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gastonan pa por atende e Universidad aki ta alrededor di $32.000 cual ta un suma basta halto pero ta existi e posibilidad cu e studiantenan di Aruba por bin na remarca pa ‘merit-scholarships’ cual suma ta varia pero por alcansa e suma di mas halto cu ta $15.000
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Tuition for either one of these Universities is about $32.000, a rather expensive price tag, however local students can qualify for the ‘merit-scholarships’ a scholarship that can reach up to $15.000

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e studiante logra haya e beca aki e gastonan pa atende e Universidad aki lo baha considerablemente haciendo e aanvulling di e Arubalening pa paga e suma completo posibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Should the student be approved for this scholarship, the tuition fees will be considerably lower, making the supplemental Aruba loan enough to cover the remaining balance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E unico criteria ta cu e studiante lo mester mantene un GPA minimo pa por mantene e beca aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The only criteria for local students to qualify is to have a steady minimum GPA in order to keep the scholarship

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Otro posibilidad cu e studiantenan tin pa por cubri e gastonan aki ta pa aplica pa ‘work-study permit’ na unda nan tin e posibilidad di traha y studia y asina gana un suma pa alivia e gasto halto pa atende e Universidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another option for students to be able to pay the entire tuition is by applying for the work-study permit allowing students to work and study at the same time, so the students are able to pay the tuition fees of the universities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Polis cu cambio den peticion pa permiso pa evento social , deportivo y educativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Police department announces new requirements for permit requests for social, sports and education events

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cuerpo Policial ta informa tocante cambio den petición pa permiso pa evento social
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New regulations have been recently announced by the police department regarding requests for event permits

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera ta conoci, tur persona of organisadonan di eventonan social, deportivo of educativo, cu ta mara na un permiso, mester tene cuenta cu mester haci e peticion na tempo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As a standard procedure, every person or organization that wants to organize a social, sports or education event that requires a permit, need to request this in advance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tene na cuenta si un persona of organisacion haci un peticion pa un evento y resulta cu e tin un permiso bieu cu no a ser busca ni paga, lo tin cu paga pa esun bieu prome cu haya esun nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to note that those who have an old permit that has not been picked up or paid for, should be paid in full before getting the new permit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo no procesa peticion cu a entrega menos cu 12 dia di trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Permits requested after the 12 business day time frame will not be processed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Polis ta pidi tur hende concerni pa tene bon cuenta di e cambio menciona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Police Department urges everyone to keep this change in mind

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cuerpo Policial ta subraya cu mester obedece tur ordo di Polis relaciona cu orden publico y Polis ta autorisa pa para e evento na momento cu orden publico ta rekeri esaki of na momento cu constata cu a viola cualkier di e condicionnan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Police Department emphasize that all police orders should be followed related to public order and that the police are authorized to stop ongoing events should the terms are violated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un mucha por crece sano, e mester sinta menos y hunga mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Live healthily! Play more, sit less!

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta continua cu su campaña di conscientisacion tocante e importancia di hungamento pa e desaroyo sano di un mucha, segun e instruccionnan nobo publica door di ‘World Health Organization’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health is pushing forward with their awareness campaign as recommended by the World Health Organization on the importance for children to play more for their healthy development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un mucha por crece y desaroya sano ta necesario e mucha cu tin menos di 5 aña pasa menos tempo posibel inactivo y mas tempo ta hunga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the healthy growth and development, children under the age of 5 years should spend more time actively playing and fewer hours of inactivity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta hopi importante pa un mucha drumi bon 8 ora of mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Children should have a minimum of 8 hours of sleeping time

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mucha di 3 pa 4 aña mester
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Children from 3 to 4 years should

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pasa minimo 180 minuut pa dia haciendo un variedad di actividadnan fisico, di cual minimo 60 minuut mester ta un actividad cu ta rekeri tiki pa hopi movecion y cu ta haci esaki durante henter e dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Spend at least 180 minutes of multiple physical activities including 60 minutes of moderate activity during which can be done throughout the day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas actividad ta miho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More activity is always better

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evita di laga un mucha keda sinta mas cu 1 ora mes un caminda (den un stroller, highchair, carseat y Screen-time)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sitting for a prolonged time of more than 1 hour (stroller, highchair, car seat and screen time) is not recommended

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta sumamente importante pa mucha di 3 pa 4 aña drumi bon pa 10 pa 13 ora, incluyendo siesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is although important for 3 to 4 years old children to sleep about 10 to 13 hours, including naps

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: “Loke realmente nos mester haci ta trece bek hungamento pa e muchanan”, dr. Juana Willumsen coordinador di e seccion di obesidad infantil y actividad fisico di WHO, ta bisa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: “What we really need to do is bring back play for children”. says Dr. Juana Willumsen, section coordinator for infant obesity and physical activity at the WHO

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Door di aplica e recomendacionnan aki di WHO, durante e prome 5 añanan di bida di un mucha lo contribui na e desaroyo motorico, cognitivo y salud di e muchanan pa bida largo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Applying these WHO recommendations during the children's first 5 years will contribute to the adequate development of their motor skills, cognitive development, and overall health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Finansa cera diaranson dia 30 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Finance closed on Wednesday, October 30, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Depatamento di Finansa ta informa pueblo cu nan lo ta cera mañan dia 30 di october pa publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Finance hereby announces that its office will be closed to the public due to staff meetings on Wednesday, October 30, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Masterclass omgevingsrecht
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Masterclass environmental law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba e dianan 21, 22 y 23 di october 2019 Academie voor Wetgeving bou encargo di Raad van Advies a organisa e Masterclass “Omgevingsrecht”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On October 21, 22 and 23 the Academy for Legislation organized the Masterclass Environmental Law commissioned by the Advisory Council

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e Masterclass a trata varios punto di legislacion medioambiental, cual ta aplicabel actualmente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In this Masterclass, various aspects of environmental law were discussed, which legislation is currently applicable

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No solamente a trata e legislacion actual di Aruba riba e tereno aki, pero tambe e legislacion cu ta na vigor na Hulanda y e islanan BES
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: taking into account not only the Aruban legislation but also the legislation in force in the Netherlands and the BES islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como docente durante e Masterclass a fungi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The professors who gave this Masterclass were

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Señor prof. mr. dr. Herman Bröring, profesor bestuursrecht na Rijksuniversiteit di Groningen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prof. Herman Bröring, Professor of Administrative Law at the University of Groningen

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Señor prof. mr. dr. Michiel Heldeweg, profesor Law, Governance y Technology na Universidad di Twente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prof. Dr. Michiel Heldeweg, Professor of Law, Governance and Technology at the University of Twente

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Señor ir. Gisbert Boekhoudt, director di Departamento di Natuur & Milieu, cu ta resorta bou di ministerio di Ruimtelijke Ontwikkeling, Infrastructuur y Milieu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Gisbert Boekhoudt, Director of the Departments Nature and Environment, which falls under the Ministry of Spatial Development, Infrastructure and Environment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Raad van Advies ta spera cu e Masterclass por a duna un aporte na amplia e conocemento riba e tereno di medio ambiente y pa mehora e coordinacion entre e instancianan concerni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With this Masterclass, the Council hopes to have been able to contribute to increasing knowledge in the field of environmental law and to improve coordination between the various entities involved

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 26 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison October 26, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 26 di october 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 22 y 23 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras October 26, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on October 22 and 23, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Rijbewijs ta cera pa publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Driving licenses and exams closed to the public

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: KPA ta informa diabierna 25 october 2019 departamento di rijbewijs lo ta cera pa publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: KPA announces that the Driving Licenses and Driving Licenses Office will be closed to the public on 25 October, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Formacion Social (SVT) ta continua februari 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Social Formation Program (SVT) continues in February 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Minister di Asunto Social y Labor, Sr. Glenbert Croes a reuni cu LT Kolonel Sr. van Beekhuizen riba entre otro e continuacion di Formacion Social specialmente pa nos hobennan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Minister of Social Affairs and Labor, Mr. Glenbert Croes, met with LT Colonel Mr. van Beekhuizen regarding the prolongation of the Social Formation Project, especially for the youth

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proximo trayecto ta continua februari 2020 y por cuminsa inscribi di awor caba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The next course starts next year February 2020, and registration is now open

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inicialmente SVT tabata concentra solamente riba hobennan cu no a termina un scol secundario y cu ta desea un di dos oportunidad den bida
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The SVT was originally intended for young boys who did not complete secondary education yet want a second opportunity in life

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den transcurso di tempo e mandatario a constata cu tin basta hoben cu por ehempel tin diploma di MAVO pero cu asina mes no por haya trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister became aware of the fact that many young boys do have a MAVO diploma, but are still struggling to find a job

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora cu esaki ta asina leu lo haci e anuncio oficial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once this is complete, it will be announced officially

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IVA ta pidi pashentnan pa hiba nan remedi Ranitidine y Zantac cu dokter a prescribi bek na nan botica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IVA requests patients who have prescribed Ranitidine and Zantac to return it to their pharmacist

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inspectie Volksgezondheid Aruba a haya notificacion cu a saca for di mercado e siguiente remedi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Public Health Inspectorate has received a notification to recall the following medicines from the market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E remedinan aki ta di e siguiente fabricanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These drugs are produced by the following pharmaceutical companies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E motibo cu e saca Ranitidine for di mercado ta cu e ta contamina cu N-Nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The reason for this recall is that Ranitidine may contain traces of N-Nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sinembargo e risico pa haya cancer door di uza Ranitidine cu ta contamina cu NDMA ainda no ta comproba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However the risk of getting cancer through the use of Ranitidine infected with NDMA has not yet been established

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Inspectora di Remedi, drs. Roselynn Angela (Boticario) ta urgi tur pashent cu a haya Ranitidine cu un receta di dokter pa stop di bebe e remedi inmediatamente y pa hiba e remedi bek pa nan botica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Inspector of Medicine, Roslyn Angela (pharmacist) urges all patients who received Ranitidine on prescription to immediately stop taking this medicine and return it to their pharmacist

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e Inspectora ta pidi tur pashent cu tin pregunta of un preocupacion pa tuma contacto cu su botica of su dokter cu a prescribi e remedi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Inspector also requests all patients to contact their pharmacist or doctor if they have questions or are concerned

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inspectie Volksgezondheid Aruba lo informa pueblo pa cualkier cambio na su debido momento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Public Health Inspection Aruba will keep you informed of the latest developments in this case

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por haya e lista completo di e remedinan cu a saca for di mercado aki bou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below is a list of the medicines that have been recalled from the market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IMMERSE ARUBA INNOVATION WEEK
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IMMERSE ARUBA INNOVATION WEEK

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e siman di 28 di october pa 1 di november 2019 lo tuma luga e prome ‘IMMERSE ARUBA INNOVATION WEEK’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the week of October 28 and November 1, 2019, the first edition of the ‘IMMERSE ARUBA INNOVATION WEEK will take place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Innovacion ta importante pa crecemento economico y prosperidad di un pais
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Innovation is important for the development and economic growth of a country

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tecnologia y idea nobo ta mehora producto, servicio y procesonan nobo cu ta beneficia un sociedad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Technology and new ideas will improve and help create new products while service and new processes will benefit the community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Importante ta pa comunidad participa den e desaroyo innovativo di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important for the entire community is involved in the innovation development of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki, gobierno ta dedica e siman di 28 di october pa 1 di november 2019 como e Siman di Innovacion: ‘Immerse Aruba Innovation Week’, unda lo presenta e proyectonan innovativo cu ta tumando luga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For this year’s edition, the Government proclaimed the entire week from October 28 to November 1, 2019, as the week for innovation: “Immerse Aruba Innovation Week” where they will present developing innovation projects to the public

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta resultado di colaboracion entre diferente organisacion cu a coordina nan diferente evento pa crea un programa nacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is the result of the vast collaboration between many organizations that coordinated their own events to create the national plan

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fundacion FUTURA lo coordina y publica e diferente evento cu lo tuma luga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: FUTURA foundation has a coordinating role and will be publishing the scheduled events

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sector priva, NGO’s, sector publico, studiante, empresarionan y inversionista na Aruba lo tene discurso y tayer riba e topiconan relaciona cu innovacion, creatividad y entrepreneurship
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The private sector, NGOs, public sector, students, entrepreneurs and investors in Aruba will give lectures and workshops on innovation, creativity, and entrepreneurship

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes ta invita henter comunidad pa participa na Siman di Innovacion y forma parti di e discusion tocante sostenibilidad door di bishita e diferente evento cu lo tuma luga durante e siman aki rond di nos isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes invites the entire community to attend the Innovation Week and to be part of the discussion about sustainability that will be taking place at multiple locations around the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan por scoge un topico di innovacion, creatividad y sostenebilidad pa participa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They can choose topics like innovation, creativity, and sustainability to participate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por entrega informacion di e evento na FUTURA via nan website of Facebook page p’asina por añadi e evento na e calenderio di evento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You can submit additional information or activities on the event so they can add it to the event calendar or send it to FUTURA through their website or Facebook page

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proyecto "Supernova" di Fundacion Futura pa muchanan muhe entre 12 pa 15 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: “SUPERNOVA” project by FUTURA foundation for children between ages 12 and 15

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 29 di october, durante ‘Immerse Innovation Week’ lo tuma luga e prome evento di "Supernova", pa mucha muhe di 12 pa 15 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first “Supernova” is an event scheduled to take place during the “Immerse Innovation Week” that is being held on October, 29, 2019, for children age 12 to 15

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E topico lo ta STEM cu ta encera: Ciencia, Tecnologia, Ingenieria y Matematica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The main theme is STEM: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Supernova ta un studio experimental pa mucha muhe, un evento estilo “pop-up” rond di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Supernova is an experimental study for girls, a “pop-up” kind of event around Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mucha muhe di tur edad por bini hunto pa intercambia idea, colabora, inspira otro y siña habilidad nobo na diferente localidad rond di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Girls of all ages can come together and exchange ideas, collaborate, inspire others and learn new abilities at multiple locations around Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proyecto aki ta stimula igualdad di genero cu ta meta number 5 di e metanan di desaroyo sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This project stimulates gender equality, the 5th goal of Sustainable Development Goals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante Supernova, e mucha muhe participando lo cera conoci cu e muhernan local cu a studia y gradua den e ramo di STEM y haya sa mas di nan experiencia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During Supernova, female participants will meet with local female STEM graduates who will share their experience

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin e oportunidad pa haya sa mas tocante e materianan di STEM den un forma creativo durante e tayer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They will have the opportunity to learn more about the subjects of STEM using a creative approach during this workshop

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proyecto aki ta start durante Siman di Innovacion y lo sigui durante 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SUPERNOVA starts during the innovation week and will continue in 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Futuro evento di SUPERNOVA lo explora otro topiconan pa yuda desaroya mucha muhe pa ta pionero innovativo y yuda carga Aruba den futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Future SUPERNOVA projects will explore other subjects to help develop girls to become innovation pioneers and contribute to impulse Aruba into the future

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister di Aruba ta pidi mayornan cu tin yiunan muhe entre edad di 12 pa 15 aña, pa encurasha nan yiunan pa participa na e evento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister of Aruba is inviting parents of girls between the ages 12 and 15 to encourage their daughter to participate in this event

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta anfitrion pa e di dos “German-Caribbean Energy Conference”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba to host 2nd German-Caribbean Energy Conference

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E di dos Conferencia Annual riba energia ta un colaboracion entre Gobierno Aleman y Gobierno di Aruba y lo tuma lugar na Aruba riba diamars 5 di november, 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The second annual German-Caribbean Energy conference, a collaboration between the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy and the Government of Aruba will be held on November 5th, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alemania ta un di e economianan mas grandi di mundo y un lider den transicion di energia general pa energia renobabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Germany is one of the largest economies in the world and front runner in the overall energy transition

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E apertura di e conferencia lo tuma lugar door di Prome Minister Sra. Evelyn Wever-Croes. E programa ta sigui cu presentacion di e prestigioso Instituto Aleman di Investigacion “Fraunhofer”, cu lo trata e tema relaciona cu e solucionnan den cuadro di Regional Energy Production and Consumption on Islands and Off-grid Regions
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister Evelyn Wever Croes will open the conference, followed by a keynote of the prestigious German Research Institute “Fraunhofer”, presenting solutions for regional energy production and consumption on islands and off-grid regions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E momento culminante di e conferencia lo ta e parti di e panel di discusion, cu ta consisti di experto riba tema di energia, cu lo elabora riba un vision riba transicion di energia na nos islanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The highlight of the conference is an exciting panel discussion, featuring energy experts who will talk about future visions on the energy transition of their islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di esaki e empresarionan Aleman lo presenta nan producto innovativo y tecnologia riba Sustainable Energy Generation, Energy Efficiency, Consulting and Project Financing
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Also, a delegation of German entrepreneurs is going to present innovative products and technologies in terms of sustainable energy generation, energy efficiency, consulting and project financing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bo por expone bo arte na Biblioteca Nacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You can exhibit your art at the National Library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional ta ofrece diferente sala caminda por pone exposicion of duna presentacion of organisa actividad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library offers various rooms where you can hold an exhibition or organize activities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu mucho gusto Biblioteca ta facilita exposicion di arte, obra di man, coleccionnan special of informacion di temanan interesante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Library provides spaces for artists and creatives to hold their exhibitions of art, handicrafts, special collections or to give lectures on interesting topics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin un cura espacioso cu un stage pa teatro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The library also has a spacious yard with a stage for theater shows

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca ta ofrece bo e oportunidad pa expone bo obranan na nan localidad na G. Madurostraat, Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Library offers you the opportunity to exhibit your art at their location at G. Madurostraat, Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tamaño di e espacio pa exposicion ta 16,6 m X 9,6 m
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The size of the exhibition room is 16.6m x 9.6 m

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si bo ta desea di organisa un exposicion cerca nos, anto por reserva e sala
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you want to organize an event or hold an art exhibit, you have to make a reservation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: En conexion cu e planning y hopi peticion, por fabor reserva na tempo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please reserve the room in well advance, considering the high demand and necessary planning

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a firma e MoU cu Citgo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: MoU with Citgo signed in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 14 di october, 2019, sr. Renny Arends, encarga cu Refineria di Aruba (RdA), y Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a firma e MoU cu Citgo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On October 14, 2019, Mr. Renny Arends, who is in charge of Refineria di Aruba (RdA) and Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes signed the MoU with Citgo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 9 di october 2019, Gobierno di Aruba a informa cu a logra yega na un acuerdo cu e refineria pa Aruba por haya e yabi di e refineria y e terminal for di Citgo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On october 9, 2019, the Government of Aruba announced that it reached an agreement with Citgo to obtain the keys of the refinery and it’s terminal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta pa permiti Gobierno di Aruba busca otronan cu ta interesa den opera e terminal, e waf y e refineria tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will grant Aruba the opportunity to seek other interests for the operation of the refinery, dock, and terminal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu firmamento di e MoU, Gobierno di Aruba por cuminsa negocia cu otro partidonan interesa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With a signed MoU, the Government of Aruba can start negotiations with interested parties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ya caba tin un lista di mas di 25 compania cu a expresa nan interes den ultimo tempo, sinembargo Gobierno no por a negocia cu nan, pa haya sa si nan ta partnernan serio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are currently more than 25 companies that expressed interest yet the Government could not negotiate with any of them to see how serious they are about this

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno lo bay busca activamente pa mas inversionista, entre otro door di tene un road show na Houston, caminda tin inversionistanan serio, pa lanta nan interes pa inverti na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: he Government will actively seek investors, among others by organizing a road in Houston, targeting serious companies to trigger their interest to invest in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta buscando un partner serio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is seeking serious partners

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: tin e fondo pa inverti mesora den e refinería
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: that have the funds to immediately invest in the refinery

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: cu ta haci’e un refineria ‘state of the art'
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: that will transform the refinery into a state of the art refinery

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: cu ta cumpli cu standardnan medioambiental
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: that abide the environmental laws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: cu ta paga su fair share na caha di gobierno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: that are willing to pay their fair share to the Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: cu ta trata su empleadonan bon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: that treat their employees well

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e firmamento di e MoU, Gobierno ta haya control di e waf y di e tankinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the signing of the MoU, the Government will regain control of the terminal and tank farm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Apesar cu e tankinan nan falta hopi mantencion, nan tin un balor hopi halto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Despite the lack of maintenance of the tanks, they are of great value

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Empleadonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sinembargo, Gobierno a pone como condicion mas importante pa Citgo cu nan mester paga tur loke nan debe na trahadonan, contratistanan y otronan cu nan debe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Nevertheless, the Government of Aruba stipulated that Citgo should pay all its debts with the employees, contractors and other vendors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Premier Evelyn Wever-Croes a indica cu e empleadonan ta importante pa gobierno y nan interesnan mester bin na prome luga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Premier Evelyn Wever-Croes indicated that her biggest concern was that of the employees and that their interests should come first

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Ruiz-Maduro ta atende e fall meeting anual di IMF
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Ruiz-Maduro will attend annual meetings of the WBG and the IMF

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e siman di 14 pa 20 di october, Minister di Finansas, Asunto Economico y Cultura Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro lo ta na New York y Washington, DC pa reuni cu algun inversionista y pa atende e Fall Meetings di Fondo Monetario Internacional (IMF) y Banco Mundial (World Bank Group)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the week of October 14 20, 2019, the minister of Finance, Economic Affairs, and Culture Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro will be in New York and Washington, DC, to attend the Fall meetings of the World Bank Group (WBG) and the International Monetary Fund (IMF)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reunion aki ta un reunion anual di IMF/WGB den cual bankero, e ministernan di finansa y desaroyo, parlamentarion, ehecutivo di sector priva, representante di organisacionnan di sociedad civil y academico ta bini hunto pa debati riba e topiconan di interes, manera economia mundial, eliminacion di pobreza, desaroyo economico y efectividad di ayudo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Annual Meetings of WBG/IMF bring together central bankers, ministers of finance and development, parliamentarians, private sector executives, representatives from civil society organizations and academics to discuss issues of global concern, including the world economic outlook, poverty eradication, economic development, and aid effectiveness

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e mandatario lo asisti na algun seminario tocante economia global, desaroyo internacional y sistema financiero mundial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister will also attend seminars focused on the global economy, international development, and the world's financial system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Digitalisacion di Gobierno ta significa mihor servicio na comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What Government Digitalization means for Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Ministerio di Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medio Ambiente a bira e ministerio piloto unda tur departamento ta conecta y comunica cu otro a traves di e plataforma digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Minister of Spatial Developments, Infrastructure and Environment became the pilot ministry connecting all its departments on the digital platform

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun e minister encarga, Otmar Oduber digitalisacion no ta un proceso facil si tene na cuenta e custumber di uzo di papel pa hopi aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to Minister Otmar Oduber, digitalization is not an easy process considering the conventional use of paper within the government for many years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambio pa e era digital den e aparato gubernamental ta trece cambio pa e personanan cu ta participa den e procesonan di trabou interno aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The internal transformation to digitalization comes with challenges for those used to the work with the traditional paper system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa entrante prome di december 2019 por inclui tambe e procesonan externo, loke ta nifica cu pueblo lo no mester entrega peticion den e formato ‘hard copy’mas na departamentonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The goal is for external processing to be digitalized as well by December 1, 2019, which means hard copies are no longer required when submit a document to the government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E enfoke awor ta riba e procesonan di trabou interno cu ta inclui e departamentonan, fundacionnan, instancianan Sui Generis y e NVnan cu ta resorta bou di Ministerio di Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medio Ambiente (MINROIM)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The focus now is on the internal processing between departments, organizations, Sui Generis entities and NV’s resorting under the Ministry for Spatial Developments, Infrastructure and Environment (MINROIM)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un adelanto y aumento considerabel den eficiencia, productividad y sincronisacion entre departamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This traduces into more efficiency, higher productivity, and synchronization between departments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un otro factor importante ta cu na tur momento e director y minister por ‘track’ y sa unda e documento ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another benefit of the digitalization is the ability for the Minister and department’s directors to track documents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: unabes cu e cinco dianan aki pasa, lo aparece un bandera oraño cu ta indica cu tin cinco dia mas pa traha riba e documento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In case the five day period expires, an orange flag will appear indicating the document should be handled in the next five days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba lo celebra #Erasmusdays 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba celebrates #Erasmusdays 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Relacionnan di Reino y Union Europeo den colaboracion cu Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba, lo organisa pa promer biaha #Erasmusdays na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Kingdom Relations and European Union in collaboration with the Department of Education in Aruba, will organize for the very first time #Erasmusdays in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde aña 2017, bou iniciativa di e agencia nacional di Francia encarga cu desaroyo y ehecucion di e programa di subsidio di Union Europeo Erasmus+, Europa y mundo ta celebra anualmente e logronan di e proyectonan subsidia cu e fondo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since 2017, Europe and the world have been annually celebrating the achievements of the projects funded by France’s National Agency for the development and implementation of the European Union Erasmus+ program

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki e celebracion di #Erasmusdays ta tuma lugar oficialmente riba 10,11,12 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year the celebration of the #Erasmusdays will be on October 10,11 and12, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Considerando e exito grandi cu subsidio aki a nifica pa Aruba, como Pais-Teritorio ultramar di Union Europeo, ta organisa den cuadro di #Erasmusdays 2019, un evento informativo pa tur e cabesantenan y directivanan di scol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Based on the great success of Aruba as an overseas territory of the European Union with this funding, an informative event will be organized in connection with the #Erasmusdays 2019, for all school principals and school management

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A dicidi di tene e evento aki riba 15 di october 2019, ya cu e tres fechanan menciona anteriormente ta cay denter di e periodo di vacacion di scol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event will be held on October 15, 2019, as the above-mentioned dates fall in the school vacation period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento lo tuma lugar den e auditorium di Colegio EPI cu e meta principal di informa nos scolnan riba e oportunidadnan existente pa nan instituto, docente y alumno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event takes place in the auditorium of the Colegio EPI and is intended to provide information to the schools of the existing opportunities for their institution, teachers, and students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ariba diamars 15 di october 2019, lo tuma lugar presentacion di e dos departamentonan menciona y tambe di algun stakeholders principal, manera Universidad di Aruba, CEDE Aruba y EPI
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A presentation is held on October 15, 2019, by the above- mentioned departments including some important stakeholders, like the University of Aruba, CEDE Aruba and EPI

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E instancianan aki lo splica an experiencia, exito y reto cu por tin den desaroyo di un proyecto y e procedura pa peticion di subsidio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They will share their experience, success, and challenges that come with the development of projects and the procedure for receiving subsidies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento aki ta registra oficialmente riba e pagina web di celebracion di #Erasmusdays www.erasmusdays.eu di Comision Europeo y ta spera di por crea visibilidad rond mundo door di comparti Aruba su exito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event is officially registered on the website of the #Erasmusdays celebrations, www.erasmusdays.eu of the European Commission in the hope of sharing Aruba’s success with the world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Erasmus+ ta e programa di subsidio di Union Europeo disponibel pa entre otro: institutonan academico, scolnan, organisacion di boluntario, organisacion pa hobennan, como tambe deporte
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Erasmus+ is a subsidy program of the European Union available but not limited to academic institutions, schools, voluntary organizations youth organizations, and sports organizations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bou capa di un proyecto specifico ta crea mobilidad di individuonan entre e paisnan participante, of por financia desaroyo di cooperacionnan strategico entre e institutonan y organisacionnan pa por ehempel innovacion y reforma di nan maneho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Specific projects create individual mobility between participating countries but can also finance strategic development cooperation projects between institutions and organizations for among others innovation and management reform

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin oportunidad pa subsidio pa e desaroyo di maneho specifico di gobierno den sector laboral pa nos hobennan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is also the possibility to subsidize specific management development of the Government in the labor sector for young people

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E actual ciclo financiero di Union Europeo 2014-2021 tin mas o menos €14.7 miyon disponibel y esaki lo bay redobla te cu €30 miyon pa e ciclo financiero di 2021-2027
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current financial cycle of the European Union for 2014-2021 has more or less €14.7 million available and this will be doubled to €30 million for the financial cycle of 2021-2027

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Charla tocante performance art y live performance di Natusha Croes na Biblioteca Nacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lecture about performance Art and live performance at the BNA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diamars dia 15 di october lo tin un evento publico na biblioteca nacional unda historiador di arte Ana Maria Hernandez lo duna un introduccion di Performance Art
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On the 15th of October 2019, a public event will be held at the Library of Aruba where art historian Ana Maria Hernandez will introduce Performance Art

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e evento aki, artista local Natusha Croes lo duna un actuacion special en bibo y un charla tocante Performance Art
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During this event, local artist Natusha Croes, will perform live and have a presentation about performance art

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den historia arte visual semper a crece y evoluciona door di artistanan cu a pusha limite y a busca manera nobo di expresion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to history, visual art has progressed thanks to artists who pushed their limits and searched for new forms of expression

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un di e desaroyonan mas importante den arte visual contemporaneo ta Performance Art
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the biggest evolution in contemporary visual art is Performance Art

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den Performance Art, e artista ta uza su curpa manera instrumento di expresion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In Performance Art, the artist uses its own body as an expression tool

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plataforma Aruba a invita artista visual local Natusha Croes pa comparti un obra cu e comunidad di Aruba y papia mas tocante e rol cu Performance Art ta hunga den su expresion artistico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Plataforma Aruba has invited visual artist Natusha Croes to perform for the Aruban community and to talk about the important role that Performance Art plays in her artistic expression

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento aki ta un iniciativa di Plataforma Aruba y ta forma parti di e proyecto Arte Contemporaneo den Biblioteca cu ta realisa cu e sosten di UNOCA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event is an incentive of Plataforma Aruba and is part of the Contemporary Art project of the Library and sponsored by UNOCA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plataforma Aruba ta un fundacion non-profit cu ta desaroya actividad y proyecto pa comunidad Arubano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Plataforma Aruba is a non-profit organization that creates activities and projects for the Aruba community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proyectonan ta combina arte visual contemporaneo y enseñansa y ta un colaboracion entre e sector cultural local y internacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The projects combine visual contemporary art and education and are a cooperation between the local and international sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu Fundacion Plataforma Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please contact Fundacion Plataforma Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 12 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison October 12, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 12 di october 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 8 y 9 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras October 12, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on October 8 and 9, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DEA cu Dia Nacional di Estudio di Scol Arubano Multilingual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DEA presents the National Education day of the Aruba Multilingual School

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 14 di october Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba (DEA) den cooperacion estrecho cu Centro pa Desaroyo Profesional Continuo (CDPC) di Instituto Pedagogico Arubano (IPA) ta organisa un Dia Nacional di Estudio di Scol Arubano Multilingual (SAM) pa Enseñansa Preparatorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On the 14 of October, the Department of Education in Aruba (DEA) in alliance with the Center for Continuous Professional Development (CDPC) of the Pedagogic Institute Aruba (IPA) are organizing a National Education day of the Aruba Multilingual School (SAM) for the preparatory education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cabesantenan y maestronan di e scolnan preparatorio lo participa na e encuentro aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The principals and educators of the preparatory education will be attending this presentation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e encuentro ta pa compronde e esencia di SAM en general y di e metanan nucleo di idioma y comunicacion en particular mihor, carga esaki y forma un mihor bista di kico esaki ta nifica pa e actividadnan den Enseñansa Preparatorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective of this encounter is to understand the essence of the SAM in general and the core objectives of language and communication, absorb these and form a better judgment to what this will mean for the preparatory education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e sesionnan cortico aki lo trata diferente aspecto pedagogico didactico y material didactico practico cu e maestronan por aplica di biaha den klas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During these short sessions, the different pedagogic didactics and practical didactic material that can be used in classes will be discussed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta un scol multilengual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is a multilingual school

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un scol multilingual ta un scol cu ta uza y cu ta ofrece mas cu un idioma den scol y den klas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A multilingual school is a school that uses and offers more than one language in classes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e scol multilingual e mucha ta siña Papiamento, Hulandes, Ingles y Spaño, desde kleuter caba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the multilingual school, the students will learn Papiamento, Dutch, English and Spanish starting in kindergarten

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A base di desaroyo y dominio di e idioma materno e mucha ta yega na uza e cuater idiomanan aki pa nan siñamento tambe di e otro materianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Based on the development and dominance of the maternal language, the student will use these languages in the learning process of other school subjects

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Orador invita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Guest speaker

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta un candidato pa doctorado na Universidad di Puerto Rico y e tin un grado di Maestria di Universidad di Harvard y Universidad di Brandeis na Merca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He is a doctorate candidate at the University of Puerto Rico and has a Master's Degree from Harvard University and Brandeis University in the USA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Visa ta forma parti integral di un serie di medida pa controla e fluho migratorio regular di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Travel Visa for Venezuelans; an integral part of a series of policies to manage the migration flow

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e conferencia di prensa, Prome Minister mr. Evelyn Wever-Croes a informa cu no tin mucho cambio den situación di Venezuela, pero e ta sigui ta hopi delicado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During a recent press conference, Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes stated that the situation in Venezuela has not changed much yet remains delicate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister y e Crisis Team apunta pa Gobierno di Aruba a reuni na comienso di siman pa conseha Prome Minister riba e situacion di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister of Aruba and the crisis team appointed by the Aruba Government met earlier this week and updated the Prime Minister of the current situation in Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a informa cu frontera ta keda cera te cu december segun e fecha stipula na comienso di luna pasa, mientras cu Gobierno ta evalua e pasonan cu lo mester tuma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister stated that the Aruba-Venezuela borders will remain closed until December while the government decides which actions to undertake

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di varios luna di consulta intensivo entre e Minister di Relacion Exterior di Reino y e Minister-President di Aruba y di Corsou, a yega na e decision cu lo introduci un visa temporal pa tur bishitante portador di un paspoort Venezolano
