Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After months of deliberation and consultation with the Minister of Foreign Relations of the Kingdom and the Prime Ministers of Aruba and Curacao, the decision was made to introduce a temporary Visa for visitors for Venezuelan passport holders

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E medida aki ta uno cu ta competencia di e Ministro di Relacion Exterior di Reino, ya cu maneho di visa ta un asunto cu ta concerni Reino Hulandes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The introduction of this measure is the Minister of Foreign Relations’ competence, as Visa policies are matters of the Kingdom of the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur esaki a conduci cu ya caba varios pais, entre otro Peru, Panama, Ecuador, Guyana, Trinidad & Tobago y Chile a dicidi di introduci un visa pa tur portador di un paspoort Venezolano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many countries have already introduced a Visa for Venezuelan migrants, like Peru, Panama, Ecuador, Guyana, Trinidad & Tobago and Chile

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Introduccion di e visa aki ta forma parti integral di un serie di medidanan cu ta tuma pa controla e fluho migratorio regular den direccion di nos islanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The introduction of the Visa is an integral element of a series of measures that are in place to tackle the migratory flow towards the islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tempo cu e medida aki lo keda na vigor ta depende di e desaroyonan na Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The duration of this policy depends on the situation in Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na momento cu e condicionnan aki mustra cambionan faborabel, lo por elimina e medida
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As soon as the situation improves, the policy will be halted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Introduccion di e visa lo tuma 6 luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The introduction of the Visa will take about 6 months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proceso di su introduccion ta exigi tempo, pa motibo cu lo mester aloca e medio y personal adicional necesario na e Embahada di Reino na Caracas pa por procesa e peticionnan pa visa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It will take time since resources and additional personnel is required at the Dutch embassy in Caracas to process the visa requests

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: un ESTA-A, pa autorisacion di e biahe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: ESTA-A, a travel authorization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e Advanced Passenger Information system pa controla e informacion adelanta di tur biahero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Advanced Passenger Information system, a travel authorization to verify the information of the travelers in advance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pre-boarding checks, cual ta un procedura pa controla tur biahero previo na borda e avion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pre Boarding checks, a procedure to control all traveler before boarding

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante menciona cu e medida di visa lo conoce algun excepcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to clarify that the Visa policy will include exceptions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E situacion di Sint Maarten ta un poco diferente, debi cu e isla ta uno dividi den un parti Frances y e otro Hulandes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The policy for Saint Maarten is different as the island is divided between the French and Dutch territories

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e introduccion di e visa ta efectivo, lo negocia cu e autoridadnan Frances pa por efectua e control necesario di e medida di visa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the effective introduction of the Visa for Saint Maarten, the Minister has to negotiate with the French part to have an effective border control without the Visa

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a enfatisa cu e peticion pa e visa mester haci na Embahada di Reino na Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister also stated that the Visa request should be made at the Embassy of the Netherlands in Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba mes no tin ningun papel pa hunga den esaki pa motibo cu e maneho di visa ta un asunto di Reino Hulandes y ta cay bou di Ministro di Relacion Exterior di Reino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba plays no role whatsoever in this procedure as this is the Minister of Foreign Relations competence since Visa policies are matters of the Kingdom of the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Presentacion di buki titula Mi memorianan: Aruba di antaño segun Chinto Erasmus
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Presentation of the book Aruba in the past according to Chinto Erasmus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu hopi placer Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta manda adhunto e invitacion di Editorial Charuba y colaboradornan na e publicacion Mi memorianan "Aruba di antaño segun Chinto Erasmus"
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is with pleasure that the National Library of Aruba is extending the invitation on behalf of the Charuba Editorial and its collaborators for the publication of the recollections in the book “Aruba in the past according to Chinto Erasmus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta trata di un autobiografía di Sr. Chinto Erasmus en feis memoria den siglo 20
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is an autobiography by the late Mr. Chinto Erasmus of the 20th century

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Chinto tabata un persona hopi conoci den bario di Tanki Leendert
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Erasmus was a very well-known citizen of the community of Tanki Leendert

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E presentacion ta tuma luga diabierna 11 di october pa 7:30 pm den edificio central di Biblioteca Nacional na George Madurostraat 13, Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The book presentation will take place on Friday, October 11, 2019 at the Library located at the Georgemadurostraat 13 in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bo presencia ta altamente aprecia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Your attendance will be highly appreciated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrega premionan na ganadonan di concurso di pintamento ‘Stima bo cacho’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: “Love your dog” drawing contestants awarded

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 4 di october 2019, a tuma luga entregamento di premio na e ganadonan di e concurso di pintamento ‘Stima bo Cacho’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The winners of the “Love your dog” drawing contest received their prizes on October 4, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki tabata un concurso di pintamento hopi exitoso na unda a entrega un total di 409 pintura di 29 scol a participa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It was a very successful drawing contest with a total of 409 drawings from 29 schools

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos muchanan a mustra no solamente nan talento sino tambe nan sentimento bunita pa nan mascota atrabes di pintura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The children did not only show their talents but also shared their love for their pets through drawing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Apesar cu tawata dificil pa saca e mihonan, Petit Comité, e comision encarga cu e Plan Nacional cu ta atende cu e problematica di cacho riba caya, y organisado di e concurso di pintamento, a saca 12 ganado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Although it was a difficult task of selecting the best work, the Petit Comité, the instance in charge with the National Plan of the street dogs problematic judged all participants’ work and selected 12 winners

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a ricibi e ganadonan y nan mayor hunto cu Minister Glenbert Croes, Minister Andin Bikker y Minister Rudy Lampe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes, Minister Glenbert Croes, Minister Andin Bikker and Minister Rudy Lampe received the winners and their parents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a encurasha e Petit Comité pa sigui cu proyectonan bunita asina pa nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister encourages the Petit Comité to keep organizing awareness programs for the children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Absentismo bou di empleado publico tambe ta subi gasto di personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Absenteeism in the public sector causes an increase in personnel costs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Banco di Seguro Social (SVb) a duna un presentacion tocante absentismo bou di trahadonan publico na Minister di Finansa, Asunto Economico y Cultura Sra. mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Social Security Bank (SVb) recently held a presentation to the Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture Mrs. mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro about absenteeism within the public sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta den cuadro di e meta di Gobierno pa baha gasto di personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This presentation is related to the efforts of the Government in reducing its personnel costs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e trabou por ta efectivo ta necesario pa tin un bista cla riba cua ta e factornan cu ta contribui na e gastonan di personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For an effective outcome, it is necessary to know the factors that are contributing to the increasing costs of personnel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di overtime, un factor cu ta hisa, ta absentismo bou di e trahador publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition to overtime, that increases the costs, absenteeism within the public sector is also a key factor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den nan presentación, SVb a haci comparacion di varios indicador di absentismo den sector publico y sector priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A comparison was made by the SVb about the various indicators contributing to absenteeism in the private sector compared to the public sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e lista adhunto por wak e comparacion di absentismo entre e trahado publico y e trahado den sector priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following table indicates the absenteeism data of both the public and the private sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e presentacion tambe e ehecutivonan di SVb a presenta e posibel solucion pa baha e absentismo den sector publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A possible solution for the high absenteeism has also been presented by the executives of the SVb

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dentro di poco SVb lo haci e presentacion aki na Conseho di Minister
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Soon the SVb will present these findings to the council of Ministers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di october ta reactiva e Ley pa Retiro Boluntario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: LVUT reactivated effective October 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Recurso Humano (DRH) ta informa cu Gobierno a reactiva e Ley pa Retiro Boluntario entrante 1 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento Recurso Humano (DRH) informs that the government decided to reactivate the National Ordinance for Voluntary Retirement as per October 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entre 1 di october 2019 te cu 30 di november 2019, e personal di Gobierno tin e oportunidad pa entrega un peticion pa retiro boluntario bou di e condicionnan manera stipula den e LVUT
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the period from October 1, 2019, up to and including November 30, 2019, government employees can apply to be eligible for honorable dismissal while simultaneously granting the special entitlements laid down in the LVUT

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por yama DRH na 522-9999, por manda un e-mail na vut2019@drh.gov.aw of por pasa personalmente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information, you can contact the DRH on tel.no. 522-9999, via e-mail at vut2019@drh.gov.aw or visit us personally

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Censo Piloto ta start
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pilot Census has started

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina Central di Estadistica (CBS) ta organisando un Censo Piloto cu lo cuminsa e siman aki di 3 te cu 13 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau for Statistics (CBS) is organizing a pilot census that will run from October 3 to 13, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki en conexion cu preparacionnan pa cu e Conteo General di Poblacion y Vivienda (Censo 2020) cu lo tuma lugar entre 1 di october te cu 10 di oktober 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This in connection with the preparations for the general populations and household (Census 2020) that will be held from October 1 to October 10, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e Censo Piloto lo test e aspectonan di digitalisacion di Censo 2020, por ehempel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the pilot census all aspects of the digitalization for the census 2020 will be tested, namely

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e cuestionario digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Digital questionnaire

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e proceduranan digital cu lo uza durante e periodo di conteo pa garantisa e calidad di e datonan colecta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The digital procedures that will be used during the census count, to guarantee the optimal quality of collected data

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e procesonan digital pa analisa e datonan obteni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The procedures needed for data analytics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e metodonan digital cu lo uza pa procesa e datonan y publica e informacion colecta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The applications used for the processing of obtained data and its publication

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mescos cu pa Censo 2020, durante e Censo Piloto lo parti Aruba den 5 area
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Pilot census is held in 5 areas in Aruba, just like it is planned for the 2020 Census

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo acerca un total di 750 punto di adres den cada area
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A total of 750 households will be visited in each area

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un encuestador por indentifica su mes cu un badge cu e logo di Censo 2020 y e logo di CBS
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They are recognized by their Census 2020 badge and the CBS logo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E hogarnan cu lo acerca lo entrevista nan pa medio di un cuestionario digital riba un tablet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The addresses visited will be questioned digitally using a tablet

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E topiconan cu ta inclui den e cuestionario ta relata na e vivienda, e hogar y e personanan den e hogar
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The questionnaire is about homes, household, and its habitants

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: CBS kier a enfatisa cu e privacidad di cada persona ta garantisa pa ley (Statistiekverordening) durante e Censo Piloto como tambe e Censo 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: CBS guarantees the privacy of the interviewees by law (Statistiekverordening) both during the pilot census as during the census 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta importante pa corda e comunidad di Aruba cu hogarnan escogi pa e Censo Piloto lo conta nan tambe na Censo 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to state that all addresses visited during the pilot census, will also be visited during the census 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si tin cualkier pregunta por haci esaki libremente na telefoon 524-7433 of via nos e-mail adresnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For questions or information please call telephone 524-7433 or send an e-mail to

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Curso cortico Skirbi creativo na Biblioteca Nacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Short creative writing course offered by the National Library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta ofrece un curso cortico di skirbimento ‘Creative nonfiction’ na october
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library of Aruba is offering a short course in creative non-fiction writing in October

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E curso tin duracion di 6 siman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The duration of the course is 6 weeks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Instruccion ta na Papiamento y Ingles y ta bou guia profesional di Writing coach Deedee Baarh
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Instruction language will be in Papiamento and English by coach Deedee Baarh

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E curso ta cuminsa diaranson dia 30 di october 2019 y ta sigui dianan 6, 13, 20 y 27 di november y dia 4 di december, tur sesion ta di 5or pa 7or
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The course will start on Wednesday, October 30, 2019, followed by November 6, 13, 20 and 27 and December 4 from 5 pm to 7 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: registracion por via info@bibliotecanacional.aw prome cu diahuebs dia 17 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration is by email; info@bibliotecanacional.aw and should be completed before October 7, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Creative nonfiction ta basa riba e experencianan y memorianan unico di e autor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Creative non-fiction writing is based on the personal experience and unique memories of the author

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta pa conta un storia berdadero uzando obhetonan creativo y tecniconan di skirbi di fiction y poema
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It serves the purpose to tell real stories using creative objects and techniques in the writing of fiction and poetry

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta un mescla perfecto entre e echonan real y e personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is the perfect mixture of real and personal facts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No-ficcion Creativo por tuma diferente forma manera; Travel writing, personal essay, lyrical essay, memoir, autobiografianan, journalnan of blog post pa menciona algun
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Creative non-fiction can be diversely shaped; travel writing, personal essay, lyrical essay, memoir, autobiography, journals or blog posting to mention just a few

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta interesante pa tur esnan cu ta gusta skirbi di nan propio experencia y ta desea di post, blog of publica di otro forma pero e por keda priva tambe den un journal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This can be fascinating for those who enjoy writing their personal experiences and who want to either post, blog or publish in any form or just keep their writing in a private journal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Deedee a completa su Bachelor's degree na University of Central Florida y su Master's na City College of New York den Creative Writing y tin experencia amplio den diferente area di creative writing, proofreading y editing
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deedee has a Bachelor’s degree from the University of Central Florida and a Master’s degree in Creative Writing from the City College of New York and has plenty of experience in the multiple fields of creative writing, proofreading, and editing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Internacional pa nos Grandinan riba 1 di October
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: October 1 is International Day of Older Persons

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 14 December 1990, Asamblea General Nacionnan Uni a proclama según resolution 45/106, 1 di Oktober como dia Internacional pa nos Grandinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On 14 December 1990, the United Nations General Assembly (by resolution 45/106) designated 1 October the International Day of Older Persons

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos grandinan semper a hunga un rol hopi importante, como lider di nos sociedad y conservador di nos tradicion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The elderly community has always played a vital role in our society as community leaders and preservers of our traditions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester menciona cu nan ta un grupo vulnerabel, hopi di nan ta cay den pobresa y ta biba cu limitacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They are though a vulnerable group of which many fall into poverty and live day by day with limitations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke cu e cuido di salud ta mehorando, e poblacion di nos hende grandi ta sigui crece y nan necesidad tambe ta aumenta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Despite improvements within the healthcare system, the aging group is growing every year and so are their needs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia internacional di Hende Grandi ta un oportunidad pa balora y reconoce e contribucion importante cu nos grandinan a aporta na nos comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The International Day of Older Persons is to create awareness about the value and to recognize the important contributions of this group in our community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta importante pa crea conscientisacion di e oportunidad y reto di e poblacion cu ta bira bieu den e mundo di awendia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It also serves as an opportunity to create awareness of the opportunities and challenges of the aging community in today’s world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seccion Cuido di Nos Grandinan kier a conscientisa y empodera nos grandinan den tur dimension di desaroyo, door di encurasha nan participacion activo den nos sociedad, economia y bida politico,esaki ta un manera pa sigura inclusion y reduci desigualdad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Elderly Care sector wants to create awareness and empower the aging group in all aspects of development, including the promotion of active participation in our society, economy, and politics to have an inclusive role and to help reduce inequality

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema di 2019 ta “E Trayecto pa Igualdad di Edad”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 2019 Theme is "The Journey to Age Equality"

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema di 2019 ta segun e Meta di Desaroyo Sostenibel #10 cu ta enfoca riba e caminda di maneha cu e existencia y preveni desigualdad den edad halto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 2019 theme is aligned with Sustainable Development Goal #10 and focuses on pathways of coping with existing and preventing future old age inequalities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema su objetivo ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 2019 theme aims to

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Crea conscientisacion na e urgencia di maneha e existencia y preveni den futuro desigualdad di nos grandinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Bring awareness to the urgency of coping with existing and preventing future old age inequalities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Explora e cambionan social y structural cu bista riba e manehonan di e transcurso di bida
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Explore societal and structural changes regarding life course policies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Refleciona ariba e miho practicanan, educa pa progreso riba e trayecto pa termina desigualdad den edad di nos grandinan y cambia e imagen y percepcion negativo cu tin relaciona envehecemento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reflect on best practices, lessons, and progress on the journey to ending older age inequalities and changing negative narratives and stereotypes involving old age

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 1 di october 2019 por tuma nota di e Plan Preparatorio di Desaroyo Teritorial cu Reglamentacion 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From October 1, 2019, the Spatial Development Plan with Regulations 2019 will be available for inspection

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por medio di Decreto Nacional No. 1 di 17 di juli 2019, presenta pa di Minister di Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medioambiente, a ratifica e plan nobo pa Desaroyo Teritorial pa Aruba (ROP 2019)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: By National Decree No. 1 of July 17, 2019, the new Spatial Development Plan for Aruba (ROP 2019) was adopted on the recommendation of the Minister of Spatial Development, Infrastructure, and Environment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ultimo lunanan, riba encargo di Minister di Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medio ambiente a sigui traha riba redaccion di un concepto pa e prome plan pa Desaroyo Teritorial cu Reglamentacion pa Aruba (ROPV 2019)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Over the past few months, the Minister of Spatial Development, Infrastructure, and the Environment continued to work on drawing up a concept for the first Spatial Development Plan with Regulations for Aruba (ROPV 2019)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di es forma aki, na un manera sencillo, un y tur por tuma nota di e plan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In this way, everyone can easily learn about the plan

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reunionnan durante e di 74 Reunion General di Nacionnan Uni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Meetings during the 74th Session of the UN General

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e siman di 23 pa 27 di september, a tuma luga na New York e di 74 sesion di e Asamblea General di Nacionnan Uni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 74th Session of the United Nations General took place in New York during the week of September 23 to 27, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e siman cu a pasa, Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a atende varios reunion riba e tema di e metanan di Desaroyo Sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister of Aruba, Mrs. Evelyn Wever-Croes attended multiple meetings regarding the Sustainable Development Goals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata di e 17 metanan cu Nacionnan Uni a stipula pa crea un miho mundo pa 2030
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These are the 17 goals stipulated by the United Nations to help create a better world by 2030

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba tambe ta compremeti pa cumpli cu nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba has compromised with these goals as well

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Metanan manera Combati Pobresa y Hamber, Bon Educacion, Awa di calidad pa tur hende, Posicion di Hende Muhe y Oportunidad pa Hende Muhe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Goals like fighting poverty and famine, proper education, clean water and sanitation, and gender equality

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema di corupcion y bon gobernacion tambe tawata temanan importante di discusion den e reunionnan incluyendo digitalisacion y e-Government
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Topics like corruption and good Governance were also discussed during the meetings including topics like digitalization and e-Governance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di varios reunionnan di Nacionnan Uni, Prome Minister a reuni cu World Economic Forum (WEF) y cu e organisacion OECD na unda tambe a toca e temanan menciona y a haci palabracion hopi interesante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition the Prime Minister held meetings with the World Economic Forum (WEF) and the OECD organization again addressing the issues and reaching important agreements

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister, probechando cu tambe tawata presente varios lider di diferente pais den region na e Asemblea General di Nacionnan Uni, a tuma e oportunidad pa reuni cu varios di nan pa trata e tema di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister used the opportunity to meet with regional leaders during the United Nations General Assembly to discuss the ongoing situation in Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a reuni cu e Embahado di Reino na Washington na unda Prome Minister a ricibi un ‘update’ amplio riba e ultimo desaroyonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister met with the Ambassador of the Dutch Kingdom based in Washington where she received updates on the latest developments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un reunion hopi importante cu a trata tambe den cuadro di Reino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This was another import meeting related to the Kingdom of the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Finalmente, un otro reunion di Reino atende ta un reunion entre Su Mahestad Willem Alexander y Reina Maxima hunto cu e Prome Ministernan di e 4 pais di Reino Hulandes na unda a trata e relacion di Reino en general y e cooperacion entre e paisnan den Reino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Finally, she attended another Kingdom related meeting where she met His Excellency the Dutch King Willem Alexander and Queen Maxima, in a setting with the Kingdom’s 4 Prime Ministers and discussed the relations within the Kingdom in general and the cooperation between the countries

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Curso Empresario Prepara II di IDEA atrobe un exito rotundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA’s Prepared Businessman II training another success

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 25 di september 2019, IDEA, conhuntamente cu minister di Finanzas, Asuntonan Economico y Cultura Sra. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro a haci entrega di diploma di curso “Empresario Prepara II”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On September 25, 2019, IDEA and the Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs, and Culture, awarded the certificates to the participants of the course "Prepared Businessman II"

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un total di 19 cursista a logra obtene e certificado di curso Empresario Prepara II
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A total of 19 participants received their certificate for the Prepared Businessman II

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa logra e certificado di cursonan, cursistanan mester a traha examen di cada teoria di e modulonan obteni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To receive the certificate, attendees had to successfully pass the exam of the obtained theoretic modules

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IDEA ta felicita tur esnan cu a completa e curso Empresario Prepara II cu exito y IDEA ta desea boso hopi exito den futuro cu boso negoshi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA extends a warm congratulation to all who completed the course of Prepared Businessman II and wishes them all the best for their business’ future

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IDEA ta gradici tur docente pa nan esfuerso den e curso aki kende ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA is very grateful to the teachers for their input, namely

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di october proximo mester inclui BBO/BAVP y BAZV den prijs
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: BBO/BAVP and BAZV Taxes should be incorporated in prices as per October 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta duna e siguiente informacion na tur comerciante relaciona cu BBO/BAVP y BAZV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Department informs all businesses about the changes for the BBO/BAVP and BAZV turnover tax law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera ta conoci, entrante 1 di januari 2019 tin dos cambio importante den e ley di BBO/BAVP y BAZV, esta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Per October 1, 2019, there will be two changes regarding the BBO/BAVP and BAZV tax law, namely

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta prohibi pa laga e consumidor paga un otro prijs na caha cu no ta menciona riba e producto of servicio den e tienda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is unlawful to charge consumers a different price at the cashier than is stipulated on the product or service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta prohibi pa menciona e BBO/BAVP y BAZV riba e recibo of factura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is unlawful to have the BBO/BAVP and BAZV on the receipts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa duna e comerciantenan mas espacio pa por a adapta nan prijsnan di acuerdo cu e cambio di ley menciona, cu aprobacion di Minister di Finansa, Asunto Economico y Cultura, a brinda e espacio necesario door di duna e comerciantenan 9 luna di tempo extra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To provide commerce with enough time to adapt their pricing according to the new law, the Government of Aruba, with approval of the Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs, and Culture, provided a 9 month transition period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur comerciante ta ofrece un solo prijs pa su articulo/servicio y no mag cobra cliente un otro suma na caha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All businesses should have one price per service/product and are not allowed to charge a different amount at the cashier

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pues si un articulo ta costa Afl. 50,00 esaki ta e suma cu e consumidor mester paga na caha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If an item is priced at Afl. 50,00 in the store, the client must be charged Afl. 50,00 at the cashier and nothing more

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e stipulacion den ley cu a keda introduci entrante 1 di januari 2019 ta keda valido
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The law introduced in January 2019, is valid

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta permiti pa menciona e porcentahe di 6% y e suma corecto di BBO/BAVP y BAZV riba e recibo of factura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is permitted to mention the 6% tax and the correct amount of BBO/BAVP and BAZV on the receipt

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester tene cuenta cu no por menciona un otro porcentahe of un otro suma di impuesto cu no ta cuadra cu e tarifa legal cu ta un tarifa combina di 6%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Any other percentage or tax amount that does not reflect the legal tax of the combined 6%, is not allowed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pues comerciante ta haya permiso pa menciona e impuesto riba recibo of factura, pero esaki no ta obligatorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Commerce is authorized to mention the taxes on the receipts or bills but is not obligated to do so

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante pa menciona cu BBO/BAVP y BAZV ta impuesto cu ta calcula riba e volumen di benta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to state that the BBO/BAVP and BAZV taxes are revenue taxes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E volumen di benta ta e suma total cu e comerciante ta ricibi den su caha pa e articulo of servicio cu el a bende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Revenue is the total amount a business receives for the sales of product or service provided

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E suma di BBO/BAVP y BAZV cu e ta cobra su cliente ta parti di su volumen di benta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The amount of BBO/BAVP and BAZV they charge to their clients are also included in the revenue

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di october 2019 e comerciantenan tin cu mantene un solo prijs y ta permiti pa menciona e impuesto riba recibo of factura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Per October 1, 2019, commerce should only charge store marked prices and they are permitted to mention these taxes on their receipts or bills

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Appeltjes van Oranje 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Appeltjes van Oranje 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema di Appeltjes van Oranje 2020 ta Hunto bo ta amigo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The theme of the Appeltjes van Oranje 2020 is buddies together

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E premionan ta den cuadro di proyecto di amistad den cua hende ta yuda otro bay dilanti y ta duna otro apoyo pa un tempo largo, tambe den tempo dificil
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The prices are entirely devoted to projects in which buddies help each other to move forward and stay together for the longer term, even when it becomes difficult

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oranje Fonds ta balora e miho proyectonan cu un premio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Oranje Fonds wants to value the best projects with a prize

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Espacio pa huur den MFA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Office spaces for rent at the MFAs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bo ta buscando un oficina pa huur? Bureau Multifunctionele Accommodatie (BMA) tin disponibel pa huur 8 espacio pa oficina den su bunita edificionan multifuncional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Looking for offices for rent? The Multifunctional Accommodation Office (BMA) offers 8 office spaces for rent in its beautiful multifunctional buildings

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por tira un bista riba e un lista di espacio pa oficina cu nan ta brinda pa huur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below is an overview of the available office spaces

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por yama Bureau Multifunctionele Accomodatie (BMA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information, contact the Multifunctional Accommodation Office (BMA)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recordatorio inscripcion pa landsexamen 2020 Mavo/Havo/Vwoexamen 2020 Mavo/Havo/Vwo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reminder enrollment for the 2020 MAVO / HAVO / VWO national exam

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa inscribi por haci uzo di e formularionan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below you will find the registration forms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome cu baha e formulario pa inscribi, por fabor lesa e “Informatiebrochure Landsexamen 2020”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Before you complete the registration form, please read the Information brochure National exam 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrega e formulario hunto cu copia di tur documento necesario (p.e. certificado , diploma y e listanan di cifra obteni cu firma oficial) y copia di un extracto di registro di Censo di Aruba na balie di Examenbureau, Belgiëstraat 2
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Completely and clearly completed registration forms and copies of the required documents (e.g. certificates, diplomas and officially signed certificates and lists of grades) together with a copy of an extract from the Civil Registry Office of Aruba must be submitted at the Examenbureau in Belgiëstraat 2, Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta notifica candidatonan cu ta cumpli cu tur regla di inscripcion y a pasa e “screening” pa pasa entrega un copia di e recibo di pago di por lo menos 1 materia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the Examination Office screening round and if you meet all the rules for registration for the 2020 national exam, you will receive a message to come and hand in the receipt for at least 1 course

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no entrega tur documento necesario of si e inscripcion drenta despues di dia 30 di september 2019, no ta procesa e inscripcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you fail to submit the required documents or if you register after September 30, 2019, the registration will not be processed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fiesta di Cunucu na Cas Tan Tin na Pos Abou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fiesta di Cunucu at the Cas Tan Tin in Pos Abou

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Cultura ta invita henter e comunidad di Aruba pa hunto bin disfruta e Fiesta di Cunucu 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Culture invites the community ta enjoy the Fiesta di Cunucu 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento cultural ta tuma luga diadomingo awo dia 29 di september di 10’or di mainta pa 3’or di atardi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event will take place on Sunday, September 29, 2019, from 10 am to 3 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di e bunita celebracion ta lo ta un oportunidad tambe pa comunidad conoce Cas Tan Tin cu ta situa na Pos Abou 19
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides the beautiful celebration, there is also the opportunity to visit the cunucu house Cas Tan Tin located at Pos Abou 19

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A construi Cas Tan Tin na principo di siglo 20 y agreg’e recientemente na e coleccion di monumentonan di Stichting Monumentenfonds Aruba y ta e prome cas di cunucu proteha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Cas Tan Tin was built at the start of the 20th century a was recently added to the list of protected monuments of the Monuments Fund Aruba and is the first protected Cunucu house

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cas di Tan Tin ta un di e poco casnan tradicional di Aruba cu ainda ta den hopi bon condicion, tanto paden como pafo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The house of Tan Tin is one of the few traditional houses of Aruba that are still in a good condition, inside as well as outside

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cas aki ta un di e poco casnan tambe na Aruba cu ainda tin mueble y artefacto den dje, cu ta mas di 50 aña bieu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The house is also one of the few houses in Aruba that still have furniture and artifacts that are more than 50 years old

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un biaha mas tin un tremendo programa cultural bon varia pa entretene e publico presente cu musica y baile tipico di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once again the public may enjoy a nice cultural program with traditional Aruban dance and music

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Authors for Children's Book Week 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diferente autor di buki y ilustrador ta bishita scol pa stimula mucha pa lesa

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scol, libreria y otro instancia ta parti di e festival
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Education, bookshops and other organizations are taking part

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SPD launched its Fact team

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On September 20, 2019, the Social Psychiatric Service (SPD) officially launched the Fact team project

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Now the public can call the central helpdesk 24 hours per day 7 days a week to report cases of persons that suffer from mental health disorders of addiction problems

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina di FACT team ta situa na e exedificio di di hulpbestuurkantoor Santa Cruz
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The office of the Fact team is located at the ex-government auxiliary building in Santa Cruz

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E number di contacto pa caso di crisis of emergencia ta 5856990 y di e tiplijn ta 5224343
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The telephone number for crisis or emergency cases is 5856990 and the tip line is 5224343

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fact team ta un equipo cu ta sali riba caya y brinda e cuido na tur persona cu ta sufri di problema menta y/of adiccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fact team is a team that makes housecalls to persons who suffer from mental health issues and/ or addiction

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e situacion ta grave, lo interna e persona den Respaldo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the situation is critical the person will be admitted to Respaldo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e persona ta sufri di ambos e Fact-team lo scoge e problema mas serio pa trata cune
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the person suffers from both illnesses the Fact team will choose the most serious one to deal with it

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA presents “Silver entrepreneurship” workshop part II

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This workshop will provide tips to those about to retire and have questions like

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Am i keeping myself busy with a business or with a hobby

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Qredits Aruba will talk about “Microcredit, an opportunity for you to be entrepreneur”

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Labor and Investigation (DOA) will present “Get up to date with the Employment Law obligations as an employer”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No tarda pasobra e cupo ta limita, nos ta wardabo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Hurry and register, as seats are limited

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Presentacion di buki “Beschaving, Bekering en Bevoogding” Honderd jaar onderwijs op Curaçao, Aruba en Bonaire (1816-1916”) na Biblioteca Nacional Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Book presentation “Beschaving, Bekering en Bevoogding’ Honderd jaar onderwijs op Curaçao, Aruba en Bonaire (1816-1916”) at Biblioteca Nacional Aruba
