Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library invites you to a lecture by author Ronald van Donk

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Temanan central di e buki ta Civilisacion, Conversion y Paternalismo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Main topics covered in this book are Civilisation, Conversion and Paternalism

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Drs. Ronald Donk a nace na 1945 na Aruba, su prome añanan escolar el a bay scol na San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Drs. Ronald Donk was born in 1945 in Aruba, attended his first school years in San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues e famia a bay biba na Hulanda, unda el a sigui su studio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After a while they migrated to the Netherlands where he continued his education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: El a traha 40 aña den enseñansa den diferente nivel di enseñansa secundario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He has since worked for 40 years in many levels of secondary education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 1975 te cu 1978 e tabata docente na Colegio Arubano, Antilliaanse Lerarenopleiding y Academia Pegagogico Arubano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From 1975 until 1978 he was a teacher at Colegio Arubano, Antilliaanse Lerarenopleiding and Academia Pedagogico Arubano

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e ultimo 15 añanan e autor a publica diferente articulo relaciona cu historia di Corsou manera comercio di esclavo, esclavitud pero tambe temanan relaciona cu enseñansa na islanan Sotavento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the last 15 years, the author has published many articles related to the history of Curacao like the slave industry, slavery but also about education in the islands of Sotavento

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: El a duna tayer y lectura na diferente pais, entre otro Inglatera, Rusia y Sur-Africa, Surnam, Corsou y Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He has lectured in many countries including England, Rusia, South Africa, Surinam, Curacao, and Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta autor di diferente katern riba e topico di Sclavitud, e negoshi y e emancipacion despues di abolicion di sclavitud den teritorio Caribense
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The author has many booklets about slavery, the business and emancipation after the termination of slavery in the Caribbean

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente el a publica algun articulo den “ Archiefvriend” y den “Antilliaans Dagblad”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He recently published a few articles in “Archiefvriend” and in the “Antilliaans Dagblad”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta invita un y tur cu ta interesa den e topico aki, un parti esencial den nos historia, pa presencia e lectura di drs. Ronald Donk, diamars 24 di september di 7:30 pa 9:30 di anochi den e cura di Arubiana na Bachstraat 5 na Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Biblioteca Nacional Aruba is inviting everyone interested in this topic, an essential part of our history, to attend the presentation of drs. Ronald Donk, Tuesday, September 24, 2019, from 7:30 pm to 9:30 pm in the yard of Arubiana at Bachstraat 5 in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 21 di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum Prices September 21, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 21 di september 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per September 21, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO, BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Censo 2020 ta den pleno preparacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Censo 2020 in full preparation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 17 di september funcionarionan di Oficina Central di Estadistica (CBS) a duna un presentacion tocante Censo 2020 na Conseho di Minister
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On September 17, 2019, the Central Bureau for Statistics (CBS) gave a presentation on Census 2019 to the Council of Ministers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta di e censo ta pa nos por haya informacion di cuanto nos ta, ken nos ta y con nos ta biba na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective of the Censo is to get an accurate image of who we are, how many we are and how we live in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Full digital y lo midi sostenibilidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fully digital and sustainability will be measured

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa promer biaha e Censo lo ta completamente digital danki na Setar NV cu a yuda cu e tablets necesario pa haci e encuesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the very first time, a census in Aruba will be done fully digital, thanks to the equipment (tablets) received by SETAR N.V

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo monitor y procesa tur informacion den tempo real
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The gathered information will be monitored and processed in real-time

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Censo 2020 lo tene cuenta tambe cu tur meta di sostenibilidad di Nacionnan Uni cu ta trata persona y su hogar
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Censo 2020 will take into account the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals regarding each person and their home

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata aki di meta nr. 1 te cu 11, menos nr. 2
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These include the goals nr 1 to 11, excluding goal nr 2

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di e manera aki por haya un bista tambe con duradero Aruba ta desaroyando su mes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will provide a clear view how durable Aruba is developing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa Censo 2020 por ta exitoso e participacion di pueblo ta importante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the Censo 2020 to succeed, the entire community should participate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Servicio Meteorologico di Aruba cu alerta pa calor excesivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Extreme heat advisory for Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Servicio Meteorologico di Aruba a emiti riba 17 di september 2019 un alerta pa calor excesivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Meteorological Department of Aruba has issued an extreme heat advisory on September 17 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo aumenta e peligro pa e hendenan cu no por haya un lugar adecua pa refresca nan curpa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This increases the risk for people who cannot find places to cool down properly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos ta den e temporada di mas calor di aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We are in the hottest season of the year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Limita actividad pafo di cas pa e oranan trempan di mainta of ora solo baha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please limit outdoor activity to the early hours of the day or after sunset

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si bo tin un airco cu ta funciona, uz’e of a lo menos habri bentana pa laga aire pasa y circula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is advisable to use air conditioning, fans or to open windows to let the breeze circulate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Calor por ocasiona deshidratacion, zonontsteking, presion halto, dolor di cabes, cansancio, biramento di cabes y stoma, sacamento, cram di musculo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Extreme heat can cause dehydration, sunstroke, high blood pressure, headache, tiredness, nausea, vomiting, muscle cramps

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: bebe hopi awa por lo menos 2 liter
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: drink at least 2 liters of water

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: bisti bril di solo, pechi of sombre
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: wear sunglasses, caps or hats

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: evita bebida cayente y bebidanan cu ta contene cafeina of hopi sucu durante e oranan mas calor (11:00am- 2:00pm)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: avoid hot caffeine-containing beverages or high sugar-containing drinks between the hottest hours of the day (11:00 am - 2:00 pm)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oportunidad pa registra proyecto pa Appeltjes van Oranje
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Opportinity to registrate your buddy project for the Appeltjes van Oranje

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na mei 2020 lo bolbe entrega e Appeltjes van Oranje door di Oranje Fonds
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In May 2020, the Appeltjes van Oranje from the Oranje Fonds will be awarded again.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta otorga Appeltjes van Oranje tur aña na tres projecto social cu na un manera exitoso ta conecta diferente grupo di persona y cu ta percura cu e persona ta bolbe participa den comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ‘Appeltjes van Oranje’ are presented annually to three social projects that successfully connect different groups of people and allow them to reconnect with society

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na mei ta otorga e Appeltjes van Oranje door di Reina Maxima na Paleis Noordeinde na Den Haag
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In May, Queen Máxima will present the ‘Appeltjes van Oranje’ at Paleis Noordeinde in Den Haag

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tres miho proyecto tin chens di gana e premio prestigioso aki, cu ta consisti di un reconocimento, un estatua di brons traha door di Prinses Beatrix y un suma di placa di €15.000
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The three best social projects have a chance to win this prestigious prize, which consists of recognition, a bronze statue made by Princess Beatrix and a cash prize of € 15,000

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Appeltjes van Oranje 2020 ta den marco di iniciativa cu ta trece amigo pa un periodo mas largo cerca otro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ‘Appeltjes van Oranje 2020’ are all about initiatives that create long-standing relationships between buddies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan ta siña di otro, sali hunto y berdaderamente ta tuma paso pa por “biba hunto” na un miho forma den nos comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Buddies learn from each other, spend time together and really make an effort to better ‘live together’ in our society

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion bishita e website
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information visit also the webpage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DIP lo tin 3 anochi di informacion pa pueblo tocante introduccion di ROPV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DIP is announcing 3 information nights regarding the introduction of the ROPV

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Infrastructura y Planificacion (DIP) lo tene 3 anochi informativo pa informa pueblo tocante introduccion di ROPV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Infrastructure and Planning (DIP) will hold three information nights where the public will receive information about the soon to be introduced ROPV

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prome paso di ROP ya a pasa cual a keda introduci recientemente, pa cual awor aki ta bay pa e siguiente paso cual ta e ROPV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first phase of the ROP has been recently introduced, so the second phase, the ROPV is next

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: ROPV ta un etapa nobo pa Aruba, considerando cu lo ta e prome biaha cu ta bay introduci esaki, cual ta forma parti di desaroyo duradero di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: ROPV is a new stage for Aruba, since it is for the very first time such ordinance, as part of a durable development, will be introduced in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin diferente area defini riba e mapa di ROP di Aruba, tur cu un color cu ta indica na ki tipo di area e ta, sea ta pa vivienda, naturalesa, desaroyo economico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many areas have been defined on the ROP map of Aruba, color-coded based on the type of area, areas designated as urban areas, nature or areas for economic development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester presenta e ROPV nota den cual ta indica tambe cua ta e reglanan cu mester tene cuenta cu nan den cada area, locual por y locual no por
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A ROPV note should be presented, including the requirements for each area, what is permitted and what not

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un mucha por crece sano, e mester sinta menos y hunga mas (Parti 1)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Kids should play more, sit less (part 1)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta trece informacion tocante riba desaroyo saludabel di nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health wants to inform about the benefits for a healthy development of children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo ta un serie di 3 parti, unda ta educa comunidad riba importancia di movecion cerca nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This information will be provided in 3 parts, educating the community on the importance of physical activity by children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mucha bou 5 aña mester pasa menos tempo sinta mirando un pantaya of faha den un stoel of stroller
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Children younger than the age of 5 should spend less time staring at screens or strapped in strollers and chairs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un mucha por crece sano ta necesario pa e drumi bon 8 ora of mas y pasa suficiente tempo hungando activamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For proper development, children should sleep at least 8 hours a day and spending as many hours possible actively playing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki segun e instruccionnan nobo publica door di WHO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This according to the new studies published by the WHO

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un comision di profesional di WHO a desaroya recientemente instruccion nobo riba actividad fisico y comportacion activo pa mucha bou di 5 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A professional commission of the WHO has recently developed new instructions for physical activity and active behavior for children under the age of 5

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki despues cu nan a evalua
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This after evaluating

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e efectonan di drumimento mal y e tempo cu mucha chikito ta pasa no activo sea sinta mirando pantaya of faha den un stoel of stroller
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The effects of poor sleep and non-active time while watching any kinds of screens or while being strapped in a stroller or chair

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: revisa evidencia rond di e beneficionnan cu aumento di actividad tin cerca mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Evidence of increased benefits by increasing physical activity among children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Baby menos di 12 luna mester ta fisicamente activo varios biaha pa dia den diferente forma, particularmente door di wega interactivo riba suela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Toddlers under 12 months should be more active many times a day in different ways, like interactive games laying down

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa esunnan cu ainda no por move bon, ta sugeri un minimo di 30 minuut pa dia den un posicion boca abou, ora e ta lanta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Kids that do not move enough yet, should have a minimum of 30 minutes of physical activity while on their tummy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta recomenda pa no faha baby pa mas cu 1 ora den stroller, highchair, car seat of bouncer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is recommended not to have children strapped longer than 1 hour in a stroller, highchair, car seat or bouncer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Screen-time’ den forma di tv, tablet of cualkier artefacto electronico no ta recomendabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: ‘Screen-time’ in the form of tv, tablet or any electronic device is not recommended

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora cu ta momento pa relaha ta conseha pa lesa un buki, conta storia y canta cu e baby
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Relaxing time should be filled with book reading, storytelling, and singing for the baby

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entre 0 pa 3 luna un baby tin pa drumi entre 14 pa 17 ora pa dia y un baby entre 4 pa 11 luna mester drumi entre 12 pa 16 ora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Between 0 to 3 months, babies should sleep 14 to 17 hours a day, while toddlers between 4 months to 11 months of age should get 12 to 16 hours of sleep daily

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E interaccion entre actividad fisico, tempo pa relaha y drumimento adecua y su impacto riba e salud fisico, mental y bienestar ta reconoci pa e Comision pa pone un "fin na obesidad infantil”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The interaction between physical activity, relaxing time and adequate sleep and its impact on the physical and mental health and wellbeing has been recognized by the commission “to end infant obesity”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Door di aplica e recomendacionnan duna, durante e prome 5 aña di bida di un mucha lo contribui na e desaroyo motorico, cognitivo y na salud di e mucha pa bida largo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: By implementing these recommendations during the first 5 years of a child, it will contribute to a motoric and cognitive development and a long term childs health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL ta muda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL is moving

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Progreso Laboral (DPL) ta informa cu entrante 23 te cu 30 di september 2019 nan lo ta cera pa publico pa motibo di mudamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Departamento di Progreso Laboral (DPL) informs that it will be closed to the public in connection with a move from September 23 to 30, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 october 2019, DPL lo habri su portanan bek pa publico na su oficina na Engelandstraat 33, mesun edificio unda Enseñansa pa Empleo ta ubica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On October 1, 2019, the DPL will reopen its doors to the public at its location at Engelandstraat 33, the same building where the Enseñansa pa Empleo is located

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E numbernan di telefon y e-mail adres lo keda mescos
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The telephone number and e-mail remain unchanged

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gerencia di DPL di antemano ta yama danki na pueblo di Aruba pa su comprension
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The management of DPL apologizes for the inconvenience and thanks the people for the understanding

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Otmar Oduber ta retira
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Otmar Oduber retires

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Oduber a anuncia su retiro como minister riba diamars 17 di september 2019 durante un conferencia di prensa den compañía di tur minister di Gabinete Wever-Croes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Otmar Oduber will retire as minister, he made this announcement during a press conference on Tuesday September 17 2019,  accompanied by all the ministers of the Cabinet Wever-Croes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Retiro di minister Oduber ta drenta na vigor te 12 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The resignation of Minister Oduber comes into effect on December 12, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E motibonan cu Minister Oduber a duna ta personal, familiar y di salud
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Oduber cited personal, familiar and health reasons for his decision to step down

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E actual parlamentario di partido POR, Marisol Lopez Tromp lo reemplasa Minister  Oduber como minister, y Dellanira Maduro ta bira e reemplasante di Lopez Tromp den Parlamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current member of Parliament for the POR party, Marisol Lopez-Tromp will replace Minister Oduber as the minister, and Dellanire Maduro will take the place of Lopez-Tromp in Parliament

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia di Informacion "Amigonan di Archivo" riba 27 di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Information day for “Friends of the Archive” on September 27, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 27 di September lo tin un Dia di Informacion organisa pa Fundacion "Amigonan di Archivo" riba e tema di digitalisacion y e retonan cu esaki ta trece cu ne
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On September 27, 2019, “Friends of the Archive” Foundation will have an information day on which they will discuss Digitalization and its challenges

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: diferente orador di Hulanda y Aruba lo enfoca riba e impacto cu digitalisacion tin riba e formacion di documentacion digital, particularmente pa loke ta trata nos herencia cultural y historia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Speakers from the Netherlands and Aruba will focus on the impacts that digitalization on the formation of digital documents, specifically for the cultural heritage and history

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oradornan y nan presentacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Speakers and topics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E orador principal ta Sr. Drs. Marens L. Engelhard cu ta Algemene Rijksarchivaris & Algemeen Directeur Nationaal Archief Nederland
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Main speaker is Mr. Drs. Marens L. Engelhard; General Government Archivist & General Director National Archive of the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome cu e funcion aki e tabata director di Stadsarchief Amsterdam den e funcion di gemeentearchivaris
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Before holding this position he was the director of the City Archive in Amsterdam as a municipal archivist

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante su presentacion Sr. Engelhard lo duna su vision riba e formacion di informacion digital y e consecuencia cu esaki tin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Engelhard will present his vision of the digital formation and its consequences

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki relaciona cu su publicacion titula “Op weg naar 2020 en verder”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This in relations with his book “Op weg naar 2020 en verder”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Orador Sr. Paul Geerders cu ta un consultant na P.G. Consultancy y tambe docente na GO-Opleidingen Nederland lo enfoca riba e tereno di sostenibilidad di informacion cual e lo trece dilanti den su presentacion titula: “Informacion, essential base for sustainable development”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Speaker Mr. Paul Geerders; Consultant at P.G. Consultancy and instructor at GO-Education Netherlands will talk about information sustainability in a presentation called: “Informacion, essential base for sustainable development”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E lo duna entre otro den su presentacion un bista di e retonan pa loke ta trata e herencia cultural den e era digital y e preservacion di esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: His presentation will be about the challenges related to the cultural heritage in the digital era and its preservation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E orador principal di Aruba ta Sr. Drs. Raymond R. Hernandez cu ta e director di Archivo Nacional Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba’s main speaker is Mr. Drs. Raymond R. Hernandez; Director of Archivo Nacional Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den su presentacion titula “Vol verwachting klopt ons hart” e lo splica den e perspectiva di archivo en situacion di Aruba y trece dilanti e inquietud pa loke ta e digitalisacion, particularmente pa e conservacion y durabilidad di e informacion digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: His presentation “Vol verwachting klopt ons hart” will be from the perspective of archive in Aruba and will discuss the anxiety towards digitalization, specifically for the conservation and durability of digital information

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Con lo warda den futuro documento produci awendia?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: How will today’s documents will be preserved in the future?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Shensly Tromp, IT Director di Aruba Airport Authority, lo presenta con a implementa un sistema digital den nan organisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Shensly Tromp, IT Director at the Aruba Airport Authority, will explain how they integrated the digital system within their organization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Tromp ta parti di e Management Team y ta responsabel pa e digitalisacion y innovacion na aeropuerto di di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Tromp is part of the Management Team and responsible for the digitalization and innovation at the airport in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Tromp lo duna un presentacion di e sistema digital di “Happy Flow” cu ta unico na Aruba y cu ta uza “facial recognition” pa facilita e proceso di biahamento na aeropuerto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Tromp will explain the digital system called “Happy Flow”, unique in Aruba with “facial recognition” to facilitate easy passenger flow

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E presentacion ta na Hulandes y na Ingles
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The presentation will be in English and Dutch

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Dia di Informacion ta tuma lugar dia 27 di September 2019 na Renaissance Convention Center di 8.00 a.m. pa 4.00 p.m
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The information date is 27 September 2019 at the Renaissance Convention Center from 8.00 a.m. to 4.00 p.m

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento aki ta haci posibel danki na e sosten di nos partners: Archivo Nacional Aruba, UNOCA Aruba, GO Fonds Nederland, Prins Bernhard Cultuurfonds Caribbean, ITP-Caribbean y Arubabank
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event is organized with the collaboration of Archivo Nacional Aruba, UNOCA Aruba, GO Fonds Nederland, Prins Bernhard Cultuurfonds Caribbean, ITP-Caribbean y Arubabank

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Congreso di Famia ‘Construyendo un Fundeshi Solido!’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Family congress “Building a solid foundation!”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: CONGRESO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: CONGRES

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E congreso di Famia lo tuma luga diadomingo 22 di september 2019 for di 4’or pm te cu 8’or pm na RIU Palace Antillas (ex Westin) y entrada ta completamente gratis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The family congress will be held on Sunday 22 September 2019 from 4:00 pm until 8:00 pm at the Riu Palace Antillas (Ex Westin) and admission is completely free

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta tras di e congreso aki ta pa duna tur esunnan interesa informacion riba varios topico relaciona cu famia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective of this congress is to provide valuable family-related information to attendees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: PROGRAMA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: PROGRAM

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Palabra di bonbini di un representante di Gobierno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Welcome by Government official

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: presentacion di Ramon Todd Dandaré cu e topico “famia di antes y awo”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Ramon Todd Dandaré will talk about “family from the past and present”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: charla di Enid de Kort, terapista di famia y pareha na DAS, tocante e “11 tipo di famia y nan retonan”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Enid de Kort, family and couples therapist at the DAS will speak about “11 types of families and their challenges”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Enid de Kort lo enfoca riba e “famia mixto” y “relacion entre pareha”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Enid de Kort will focus on “mixed family” and “couple’s relationship”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: charla di Helen Guda di “Develop To Grow” kende lo haci un presentacion tocante “lantamento di mucha den e tempo di awe”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Helen Guda will talk about “Develop To Grow” and will do a presentation on “raising children in the present”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bianca Brown kende ta un profesional riba e tereno di adiccion cu experiencia na Hulanda y na Aruba lo papia tocante “malesa den famia” cu enfoke riba “adiccion den famia”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Bianca Brown, professional in the field of addiction with vast experience in The Netherlands and Aruba will talk about “illnesses in the family” and will focus on “addiction in the family”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Francis Groeneveldt di “Lead2success” lo haci un presentacion tocante “finansas den famia”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Francis Groeneveldt of “Lead2success” will discuss “family finances”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 14 di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison September 14, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado na Aruba y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 14 di september 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 10 y 11 di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras September 14, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on September 11 and September 12, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM ta duna informacion riba e mata protehi Cuco di indjan (Agave arubensis)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is “Cuco di indjan” (Agave Arubensis)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Naturalesa (DNM) ta duna informacion tocante e mata "Cuco di indjan" cu ta aparece como nr. 1 riba lista di decreto nacional Proteccion di Flora y Fauna di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Nature and Environment (DNM), informs on the plant “Cuco di indjan”, which ranks as number one on the National Decree Protection of the Aruban native Flora and Fauna

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Agave arubensis, a hay’e na un sitio so
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Agave Arubensis is only available in one location

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e ta crece unicamente na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This plant only grows in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E sortonan di agave endemico su existencia ta menasa door di construccion di cas y bendemendo di mata pa landscaping
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The existence of this type of endemic Agave, is threatened by the continuous construction of homes and commercial sales of plants for landscaping

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta un mata endemico cu ta crece den forma di un rozet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is an endemic plant that grows in the shape of a rosette

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decreto nacional (AB 2017 no. 48) a drenta na vigor na 2017 y ta brinda proteccion na un cantidad di 69 bestia y 55 mata
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The national decree (AB 2017 no. 48) has been enforced in 2017 and provides the necessary protection for 69 specific animals and 55 plants

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decreto nacional Articulo 1 ta ilustra e especienan den detaye cu e nomber scientifico y e nomber local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Article 1 of the decree illustrates the species in detail with scientific names and in some cases local names

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den articulo 1 ta aparece esnan cu ta bou di menasa di extincion mundialmente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Article 1 also includes species that are threatened with worldwide extinction

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Articulo 5 y 6 di e Natuurbeschermingsverordening ta indica mata y bestiariba e lista aki cu ta prohibi pa exporta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Article 5 and 6 of the Nature Protection Ordinance specifies the plants and animals that are prohibited to export

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta prohibi pa kap, corta of haci daño na e matanan protehi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is prohibited to trim, cut or damage protected trees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas den articulo 19 ta fiha castigo (strafbepalingen) di entre castigo di prison di maximo 2 aña, como tambe boet cu por yega te cu suma di 100.000,00 florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally, article 19 specifies the sanctions (sanction provision) from jail sentences of a maximum of 2 years as well as fines of up to 100.000,00 florin

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fuente di e informacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sources

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Delegacion di Dienst Terugkeer en Vertrek (DT&T) a tene workshop/ sesion di inspiracion pa introduci y elabora mas riba e topico Hostmanship
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Workshop and inspiration session “Hostmanship”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E training ta den cuadro di e fondonan cu gobierno di Hulanda pone disponibel pa resfuerso di e fronteranan di Aruba relaciona cu e crisis na Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This training is in connection with the recently obtained funds from the Netherlands for the enforcement of the Aruba borders due to the Venezuelan crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E delegacion a bishita Minister di Husticia, Siguridad y Integracion mr. Andin Bikker y tambe a bishita departamentonan cu ta bay di su ministerio, manera IASA, Guarda nos Costa, DIMAS,KIA y Cuerpo Policial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The delegation visited the Minister of Justice, Security and Integration mr. Andin Bikker, but also paid a visit to the departments like IASA, Guarda nos Costa, DIMAS, KIA, and the Police Department

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E training lo ekipa e hendenan cu conocemento y tacticanan con pa trata cliente sea cu ta un cliente interno of externo,den e proceso di interaccion, comunicacion y/of brinda servicio durante di proceso(nan) pa cual e organisacion ta responsabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This training will help the staff with knowledge and tactics on how to deal with the public, no matter local or foreign citizens, how to interact, communicate and/or provide service during the process of providing service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo duna y prepara e trainer local selecta cu material di les, unda nan na nan turno lo mester por traspasa e tacticanan, conocemento na demas coleganan, pa asina  alcansa un nivel mas halto di servicio cu cortesia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Local selected trainers will be provided with learning material, so they can teach their coworkers all of the needed tactics and knowledge in both communications and service skills, so they can render a higher quality of service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba a haya 12 cupo pa 12 trainer local ser prepara pa por facilita e curso di Hostmanship
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba has received 12 positions for 12 local trainers to be prepared to teach the Hostmanship course

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Apertura Aña Parlamentario 2019-2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Opening of new parliamentary year of Aruba 2019 -2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Apertura di Aña Parlamentario ta tuma luga riba e di dos diamars di september di cada aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On every second Tuesday of September, the opening of the parliamentary year takes place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como hefe di gobierno di Aruba, Gobernador Sr. A. Boekhoudt a habri aña parlamentario nobo cu un discurso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As the head of the government of Aruba, the Governor Mr. A. Boekhoudt opened the session year with a speech

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante apertura di Aña Parlamentario di Aruba, Gobernador den nomber di gobierno di Aruba a anuncia e plannan di maneho di gobierno pa e aña siguiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Opening of Parliament marks the formal start of the parliamentary year and the Governor’s speech sets out the government’s agenda for the upcoming year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por download e discurso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You may download the speech

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta bolbe prolonga e cierre di frontera cu tres luna mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba extends border closure with three more months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a tuma e decision pa prolonga cierre di e frontera cu Venezuela pa tres luna mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba has decided to keep its border with Venezuela closed for another three months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 10 di mei 2019, Prome Minister Evelyn ever-Croes a firma e decreto pa cera e frontera entre Aruba y Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On May 10, 2019, Prime Minister Wever-Croes signed a decree and announced the closure of the Aruba and Venezuela border

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 10 di juni 2019 a prolonga e cierre di frontera cu tres luna mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On June 10 2019, the border closure was extended for three more months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta prolonga e cierre di frontera entrante 10 di september cu tres luna mas, pues te cu 10 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The border closure will be extended from September 10, 2019, onward with three months, namely till December 10, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hulanda ta yuda Aruba cu 10.9 miyon florin pa crisis Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Netherlands helps Aruba with 10,9 million florins to cope with Venezuelan crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na luna di mei pasa, Hulanda a indica cu e ta dispuesto pa yuda Aruba y Corsou cu 23.8 miyon Euro cu ta alrededor di 55 miyon florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In May, the Netherlands announced it would help Aruba and Curacao with 23,8 million Euros, which is approximately 55 million florins

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E 10.9 miyon florin aki ta bay pa fortifica Aruba, den haci Aruba mas sigur p’asina atende cu e crisis miho posibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 10,9 million florins will go into the fortification of Aruba, in making Aruba secure so the crisis can be dealt with accordingly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Control riba lama y tera lo bira mas estricto p’asina evita importacion ilegal di sustancia, arma como tambe persona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Border protection will become more strict both on the island as in the surrounding waters, to make sure no illegal substances, weapons, and persons enter the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Traficacion di hende ta un problema serio cu ta tumando luga den nos region
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Human trafficking has become a serious issue in the region

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki den e tempo aki ta hopi importante y necesario mirando e fluho di ilegalidad a aumenta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is highly necessary since the amount of illegal immigrants has increased enormously

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo uza parti di e fondo aki tambe pa enseñansa temporal, pa mucha cu ta bin for di Venezuela cu no por drenta nos scolnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A portion of the funds will also go towards the temporary education for the children of Venezuelan nationalities that cannot integrate into the current education system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta bon pa remarca si, cu e placa aki lo no ta disponibel pa crea vivienda of cubri otro gasto di persona cu ta bin haci peticion di asilo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to state that the funds cannot be used to create housing or cover expenses related to asylum seekers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM ta pidi cooperacion di comunidad pa conhuntamente monitor y proteha shoco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM wants the community to monitor and protect the native burrowing owl

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 6 di september 2019, ta cumpli 1 aña cu Directie Natuur en Milieu a haci un yamada na publico pa yuda cu registracion di nos shoco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 6th of September 2019, marks the fact that 1 year ago the Directorate for Nature and Environment solicited the cooperation of the public for the registration of our native owls

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cooperacion publico tabata positivo di cual a logra haya 60 registracion y asina DNM por a localisa mayoria neishi pa nan haya mas proteccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The public responded well and helped register about 60 owls, providing the DNM more accurate information on their locations to help protect them

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: a tag mayoria di e neishinan y asina a bira posibel pa monitor sporadicamente e neishinan cu a localisa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Most of the nests have been tagged and are being sporadically monitored

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den transcurso di aña por bisa cu a constata pareha cu yiu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the past year, nests have been found containing new hatchlings

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM na varios ocasion mester a duna conseho na habitante cercano, cu tawata dispuesto pa yuda cu nan tereno, door di pone seronan di santo pa e shoco tin mas opcion unda e por traha hol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM has on numerous occasions advised the neighboring residents, that were willing to help on their land, to put piles of sand for the owls to have nesting options

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM ta compronde cu hopi hende ta prefera rosa tereno ora di traha cas pero mester tene cuenta cu e shoco y nan neishi cu ta proteha pa ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM is aware that most people want to bulldoze and clean their terrain for the construction of their new house but urges them to consider the owls and the nests as stated in the law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM y otro instancia a pone aviso na algun localidad p’asina hende ta consciente di nan acto den e area y pa eherce cautela, pues tene cuenta cu por tin neishi den e areanan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM together with local instances have put up signs at some locations to warn visitors of the presence of owls and or nests and to handle with care in the marked areas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe den area di construccion prome cu coy santo, cana rond di e serito di santo pa wak si tin hol di Shoco traha eyden
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They also urge everybody in the construction areas to check any pile of sand for signs of Owl nests before just shoveling sand

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM ta para firme tras di e proteccion di shoco y por haci esey solamente cu sosten di e comunidad henter
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM has a strong stance for the protection of the owls but can only do so if the community helps

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Escritor Evelien van Dort a presenta su buki nobo Ga je mee op reis?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Writer Evelien van Dort presented her newest book “Ga je mee op reis?”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Autor di buki pa mucha, Evelien van Dort, a regala biblioteca hubenil 2 buki den cuadro di e tema di e Festival di Buki pa Mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Children’s book writer, Evelien van Dort, presented the youth library 2 copies of her latest book, as part of the Children’s Book Festival celebration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki biblioteca ta invita tur mucha pa ‘Ban lesa, biaha y gosa’ pa medio di buki y informacion di medio di transporte manera avion, bus, bicicleta, barco, cabay y burico, auto y mucho mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year the Library is inviting all children to “Lets read, travel and enjoy” by reading books and search for information about the means of transport like an airplane, bus, bicycle, ship, horse and donkey, cars and many more

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Evelien van Dort su ultimo publicacion ta ‘Ga je mee op reis?’ y esaki a keda traduci tambe na Ingles ‘Let’s go on a journey!’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Evelin van Dort’s latest book is “Ga je mee op reis?”, and this has been translated into English as “Let’s go on a journey!”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dies storia di mucha cu ta biaha rond mundo y ta pasa den aventura, cada mucha ta pasa den experencia nobo y diferente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Ten short stories of children on adventures around the world, each of them in a different and new experience

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E storianan sigur lo inspira mucha pa gosa di cualkier biahe of aventura y tambe pa lesa mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These stories will certainly inspire children to enjoy traveling or any adventure but also to read more

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Evelien van Dort a cuminsa skirbi tempo cu e mes tabata mucha y no a stop nunca, ainda e tin hopi idea pa realisa den futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Evelien van Dort started writing when she was a child and never stopped and still has more ideas to create in the future

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta participa hopi biaha den Kinderboekenweek na Hulanda y a participa hopi biaha na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: She is an often seen face at the Children Book Week in Holland and has visited Aruba often

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gusta interaccion cu mucha y conta storia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: She enjoys the interaction with children and telling stories

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di esey e ta gusta canta y toca guitara y biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides writing, she also enjoys singing and playing guitar and travelling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pesey e ta gusta e tema di e Festival di Buki pa Mucha asina hopi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: That is why she fell in love with the theme of this year’s Book Festival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Otro temanan cu e ta gusta ta ‘amistad’, ‘naturalesa’ y ‘bestia’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Other themes she likes is friendship, nature, and animals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Introduccion regla y condicion nobo pa otorgamento di tereno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additional rules and conditions land allocation policy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa evita bendemento, haci negoshi cu y traspaso economico di tereno duna den erfpacht (sin construccion), Ministerio di Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medio Ambiente a introduci regla y condicion adicional den e maneho di otorgamento di tereno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To prevent and prohibit the sale, trading and economic transfer of land issued on a long lease (without building), the Ministry of Spatial Development, Infrastructure and the Environment introduced additional rules and conditions in the implementation of the land allocation policy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reglanan y condicionnan ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The rules and conditions are as follows

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di september 2019, no por traspasa e accionnan di un persona huridico den propiedad economico, como tampoco ta permiti pa endueda aandelen den un compañía cu tin tereno publico cu ta erfpacht sin permiso prome di e Minister y Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medio Ambiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As of 1 September 2019, it is not permitted party without the prior permission of the Minister of Spatial Development, Infrastructure and the Environment to transfer the shares of a legal person being the leaseholder in economic ownership or to pledge them to a third party

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Training pa personal di CBS a cuminsa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: CENSO 2020 Pilot training has started

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina Central di Estadistica (CBS ) ta anuncia cu training di personal di CBS a cuminsa pa e Censo Piloto cu lo tuma lugar di 3 pa 13 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau of Statistics, (CBS) is announcing that the training for the CBS personnel has started for the CENSO Pilot project which will take place from October 3 to October,13, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E personal di CBS lo haya diferente training durante e luna di september durante cual lo trata diferente aspecto di e Censo Piloto, por ehempel: definicion, proceduranan y e cuestionario digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The CBS personnel will undergo a variety of training during the month of September covering all of the aspects of the Censo Pilot like, definition, procedures and the digital questionnaire

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: CBS lo ta encarga pa guia e trabounan cu lo haci durante di e Censo Piloto pa e coleccion di dato sosode na un manera optimal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The CBS is in charge of steering the Censo pilot so that the collection of data can be optimal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e Censo Piloto lo tin un telcentrum cu lo ta situa na oficina di CBS mes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Censo Pilot has one counting center situated at the CBS

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Censo Piloto lo conta cu e participacion di 75 tellers cu lo ta encarga cu e trabou di entrevista den e areanan selecciona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Censo Pilot will be done by 75 data collectors, who will be the ones doing the interviews in their designated areas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E areanan aki lo ta parti over henter e isla p’asina e datonan colecta ta un bon representacion di e isla completo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These areas are spread around the island in order to collect data that represents the entire island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta organisa otro edicion di su Festival di Buki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Book Festival 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scol, libreria y otro instancia tambe ta parti di e festival
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Schools, bookstores and other institutions are all part of the festival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e lema ‘Ban lesa, biaha y gosa’ biblioteca ta invita mucha pa biaha den buki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Library, with their slogan; “Lets read, travel and enjoy”, is inviting children on a book journey

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E destinacion no ta asina importante sino e medio di transporte
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It’s not about the destination of this journey, it is primarily about the means of getting there

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lesando un buki por descubri espacio cu un raket, experiencia aventura riba un barco di crucero, conoce un pais pa medio di un roadtrip, core den tractor y nabega lama riba un catamaran
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reading a book can bring you to space in a rocket or set you on adventures on a cruise ship, explore countries on road trips, drive a tractor and navigate the oceans on a catamaran

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un biahe ta enrikece bo bida y lesando un buki por biaha bay tur parti di mundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Traveling enriches your life and reading books can help you discover the world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tin actividad na scolnan participante y na biblioteca na Playa y San Nicolas den prome siman di november
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Activities will be held at participating schools and the library in Oranjestad and San Nicolas in the first week of November

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E librerianan participante tambe ta organisa actividadnan den e siman di festival di buki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Participating bookstores will also organize activities in the week of the book festival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Concurso di pintamento cu tema “STIMA BO CACHO”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Drawing contest “Love your dog”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A lansa e concurso aki den e fase inicial di preparacion di e plan di e plan nacional pa atende cu e problematica di cacho riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This contest is part of the launching of a national campaign to address the street dogs problematic

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e concurso aki ta pa conscientisa e muchanan y e mayornan pa duna nan mascota e respet, cuido y atencion cu e merece
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective of this contest is to create awareness among children and parents and to teach them to respect, provide care and give attention to their pets

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba e formulario tin mas información
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In this form they can also find the necessary information

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ultimo dia pa entrega e pintura ta diaranson 25 di september, 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deadline to submit the drawing is September 25, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 4 di oktober 2019 cu ta dia di San Francisco y dia di bestia lo duna e premio pa cada categoria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prices for each category will be awarded on October 4, 2019, which is the Saint Francis of Assisi and World Animal Day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 2019 ta aña di famia y un mascota tambe ta forma parti di famia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 2019 is the year of the family and pets are also part of the family

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stim’e
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Love them

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scolnan na Aruba lo participa na Sustainable Education Symposium (SES)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sustainable Education Symposium

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Minister di Desaroyo Sostenibel dr. R. Lampe a elabora riba Sustainable Education Symposium (SES) cu lo inicia 4 di september, 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the minister of Sustainable Development, dr. R. Lampe, gave a briefing of the Sustainable Education Symposium (SES) which will start on September 4, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E simposio aki a cuminsa 8 aña pasa como Green Symposium, pero mirando e importancia di e palabra sostenibel, a tuma e decision di cambia e nomber pa Sustainable Education Symposium na unda e scolnan lo participa y enfoca riba e tema di sostenibilidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Symposium started 8 years ago and was named the Green Symposium, but due to the importance of sustainability, a decision was made to change the name to Sustainable Education Symposium, addressing schools and focusing on sustainability

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki e tema lo ta “Community Garden” Hofi di Bario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year focus will be on the “Community Garden” Hofi di Bario

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e tema aki ta pa e barionan na Aruba cuminsa haci uzo di e espacionan publico cu no ta uza pa plantacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The goal of this project is to get the community together and use public unused land to establish small gardens

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proyecto aki lo beneficia e bario ya cu lo tin un area berde, cu ta produci fruta y cu e bario mes lo ta encarga cune
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This should benefit the neighborhood since it will create green areas that can produce fruits that can be harvested by the neighbors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SES ta un bon manera pa conscientisa nos hobennan di e importancia di agricultura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SES is a good tool to create awareness among the youth of the importance of agriculture

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo bay tin diferente orador y producto sostenibel local na benta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will be many speakers and also sustainable produce for sale

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Help with income tax return 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di acuerdo cu ley, e ultimo dia pa entrega e formulario di declaración di inkomstenbelasting ta 2 di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the law, the deadline for submitting the tax return form is September 2, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inscripcion pa landsexamen 2020 Mavo/Havo/Vwo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Enrollment for the 2020 MAVO / HAVO / VWO national exam

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inscripcion pa landsexamen 2020 ta tuma lugar den e periodo di 2 di september pa 30 di september 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The registration period for the 2020 national exam runs from September 2 to September 30, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa inscribi por haci uzo di e formularionan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below you will find the registration forms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome cu baha e formulario pa inscribi, por fabor lesa e Informatiebrochure Landsexamen 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Before you complete the registration form, please read the Information brochure National exam 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrega e formulario hunto cu copia di tur documento necesario (p.e. certificado, diploma y e listanan di cifra obteni cu firma oficial) y copia di un extracto di registro di Censo di Aruba na balie di Examenbureau, Belgiëstraat 2
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Completely and clearly completed registration forms and copies of the required documents (e.g. certificates, diplomas and officially signed certificates and lists of grades) together with a copy of an extract from the Civil Registry Office of Aruba must be submitted at the desk of the Examenbureau in Belgiëstraat 2, Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe mester entrega un copia di e prome pagina di e formulario di inscripcion yena
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You must also include a copy of the first page of the completed form when submitting the registration form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta notifica candidatonan cu ta cumpli cu tur regla di inscripcion y a pasa e “screening” pa pasa entrega un copia di e recibo di pago di por lo menos 1 materia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the Examination Office screening round and if you meet all the rules for registration for the 2020 national exam, you will receive a message to come and hand in the receipt for at least one course

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no entrega tur documento necesario of si e inscripcion drenta despues di dia 30 di september 2019, no ta procesa e inscripcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you fail to submit the required documents or if you register after September 30, 2019, your registration will not be processed

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Maneho nobo pa companianan uitzend entrante 1 di augustus 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New policies for Temporary Employment Agencies as of August 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta encera cu desde e fecha aki tur persona of compania cu kier haci un peticion pa un permiso di uitzend, of kier prolonga un permiso existente, por haci’e na oficina di DAO na Paardenbaaistraat 11
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This new policy requires all individuals or companies interested in applying for or extending an existing permit of a Temporary Manpower Agency, to apply for/renew that permit at the DAO located on Paardenbaaistraat 11

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di e formulario standard mester entrega tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Together with the completed application form, the following should be submitted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un extracto di e registro di Camara di Comercio cu e meta pa opera un Agencia di Empleo Temporal of pone trahadornan temporal na disposicion di tercer companianan, no mas bieu cu 3 luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An extract from the Commercial Register of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry in which the main objective of the company, providing temporary manpower, not older than 3 months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un copia di e permiso di establecimento (si ta aplicabel)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A copy of the business permit (if applicable)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un copia di e permiso pa por opera como bestuurder (si ta aplicabel)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A copy of the license management (if applicable)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un copia di e permiso di estadia di e director of doño di e agencia di empleo temporal (si ta aplicabel)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A copy of the residence - and work permit of the director/owner of the agency (if applicable)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un Curiculo Vitae cu ta menciona tur e estudio y cursonan relevante hunto cu diploma y certificadonan corespondiente, pa por determina si e persona por maneha e agencia di empleo temporal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A Curriculum Vitae stating relevant qualifications to assess whether the person in question also has the necessary knowledge to manage an employment agency

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un declaracion di impuesto riba e comportacion fiscal di e agencia di empleo temporal, no mas bieu cu tres luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A statement from the Tax department for the fiscal standing of the agency, however, not older than three months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un copia di e acuerdo di servicio entre e agencia di empleo temporal y e tercer compania, mencionando e obligacion di e uitzendburo pa pone trahadornan na disposicion di tercer companianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A copy of the contractual agreement which will be used by the agency and the third party which states the conditions under which workers will be made available to the third party

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un copia di e condicionnan general cu e agencia di empleo temporal ta uza pa pone su trahadornan temporal na disposicion di tercer companianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A copy of the general conditions to which the agency adheres when making workers available to work for third parties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un copia di un identificacion valido di e director of doño di e agencia di empleo temporal (paspoort, rijbewijs of cedula)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A copy of a valid ID of the director or owner of the agency (passport, driver’s license or identification card)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si kier uza un apoderado mester di un carta di apoderacion di e director of doño di e agencia di empleo temporal y un copia di un identificacion valido di e apoderado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If using a proxy, a letter of authorization from the director or owner of the manpower agency and a copy of a valid identification of the representative

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prueba di recibo aki no ta un prueba di aprobacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This approval slip is in no way indicative of an approval

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Unabes cu ricibi e prueba di pago e termino legal di 12 siman ta cuminsa core
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once proof of payment is presented, the wait period of 12 weeks to be legally approved commences

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den liñanan grandi por bisa cu si compara e maneho nobo cu esun bieu, a bira mas estricto cu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In general terms, when comparing the new policies to the old policies, the new policies are stricter than the old policies regarding

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e evaluacion di e peticion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The evaluation of the application

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e condicionnan cu ta pone ariba e permiso di uitzend
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The conditions are now stated on the agency’s license

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evaluacion di e peticion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Evaluation of the application

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta check si e peticionario tin un bon record di conducta na DAO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The applicant’s reputation record in relation to the DAO will be verified

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta check e background profesional di e peticionario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The professional background of the applicant will be examined

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa loke ta e experiencia di trabou, mester tin por lo menos 3 aña di experiencia den e ramo di uitzend
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The applicant must have a working experience of at least 3 years in the manpower industry

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Akinan a bira mas concreto, pasobra ta specifica ki conocimiento ta nos ta spera di e peticionario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new policy specifies the professional knowledge that is expected of the applicant

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E condicionnan mara na e permiso di uitzend
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The conditions attached to the Temporary Manpower Agency license are

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No por pone trahadornan cu un permiso di estadia y trabou na disposicion di un tercer compania, pa haci trabou temporal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Persons with a work permit may not be recruited to provide temporary manpower services to third parties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tene na cuenta cu trahadornan stranhero cu no ta cay bou di e regimen di permiso di e LTUV (p.e. firma liber) si por bay na disposicion di un tercer compania
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Foreign nationals who are not under the LTUV, (eg. ‘firma liber’), can be recruited to provide temporary manpower services to third parties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Agencia di Empleo Temporal ta cumpli cu tur e leynan laboral
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Temporary Manpower Agency complies with all labor laws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di evalua e peticion, DAO ta traha un conseho y mand’e pa Minister
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the evaluation of the application, the DAO then provides the minister in charge of labor with a recommendation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e Minister dicidi pa duna e permiso, e peticionario tin cu paga e restante di 2250 florin, pa e por haya su permiso di uitzend
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the minister decides to approve the operation of a temporary manpower agency, then the applicant must pay the remainder Awg. 2,250.00 to receive the permit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Finalmente, como extra servicio DAO lo organisa un sesion informativo obligatorio pa e peticionario cu a haya un permiso di uitzend
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Finally, as an extra service, the DAO will organize mandatory information sessions for applicants that are recipients of a permit to operate a manpower agency

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e sesion aki lo duna informacion riba e ley di uitzend, e derecho y obligacionnan di partidonan envolvi den e relacion triangular y e supervision riba cumplimento cu e Ley di uitzend
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During these sessions all agencies will receive ample information concerning the laws governing the temporary manpower agencies, the rights and obligations in regards to all parties involved, and the monitoring of the adherence to the laws governing the temporary manpower agencies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Solicitud pa expresion di interes pa un sistema di siguimento di detenidonan pa e Instituto Coreccional di Aruba (KIA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Request for Expression of Interest for an Inmate tracking system for the Correctional Facility of Aruba (KIA)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Debido na e naturalesa specifico di e trabounan / servicionan di seguridad rekeri den e area di seguridad nacional y tarea di aplicacion di ley di Gobierno, e factor di urgencia, e naturalesa complica y e avancenan tecnologico den e area di trabounan / servicionan di seguridad, Ministerio di Husticia, Seguridad y Integracion di Aruba (MJSIA) ta solicita pa medio di esaki expresionnan di interes extenso di partidonan experiencia y califica, cu lo por suministra rapidamente un sistema di siguimento di detenidonan pa e Instituto Coreccional di Aruba, pa medio di leasing
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Due to the specific nature of the required security works/services in the scope of national security and law enforcement tasks entrusted to the Government; the urgency factor, the intricate nature of and rapid technological advancements in the field of such security works/services, the Ministry of Justice, Security and Integration of Aruba (MJSIA) is hereby requesting a comprehensive expressions of interest from experienced and qualified parties, that can swiftly provide an Inmate tracking system for the Correctional Facility of Aruba, through leasing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E documento adhunto ta contene mas informacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More information can be found in the attached document

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta Busca un Part-time Consulting Engineer pa e proyecto SISSTEM na Universidad di Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta di e proyecto SISSTEM ta pa institui un facultad nobo di STEM na Universidad di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The goal of the SISTEM project is to establish a new college, STEM, at the University of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E renobacion y remodelacion di e Maria Convent tin un duracion di 3 aña y lo haci’e den coordinacion cu e Project Manager di UNDP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This remodeling and renovation is carried out in coordination with the Project Manager of the UNDP and has a duration of 3 years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Consulting Engineer lo tin e responsabilidad pa segura e eficiencia y efectividad di e implementacion diario di tur aspecto technico y ingenieria di e proyecto bou di e supervision y guia di e Project Manager
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Consulting Engineer will be responsible for ensuring the effectiveness efficiëncie and daily execution of all technical aspects of the project that will be under the supervision and guidance of the Project Manager

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 1 di augustus, 2019, a yega Hulanda e di dos grupo di studiante

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Plenipotencario di Aruba Guilfred, Besaril, e Minister Plenipotencario suplente Eddy Paris funcionarionan di Arubahuis, e studiementor y e miembronan di e Plaatselijke Opvangcommissie a ricibi na Schiphol, e grupo di studiante Arubiano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Plenipotentiary Minister of Aruba, Guillfred Besaril, the Deputy Plenipotentiary Minister Eddy Paris, officials of the Aruba House“Arubahuis”, the student mentor and member of the local welcome committee, welcomed the students who will follow their studies in the Netherlands

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Expansion

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: commercial ground lease

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actualmente tin mas o menos 2000 hende cu desde 1999 a entrega peticion pa expansion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since 1999 there are about 2000 citizens that submitted their application for expansion of their plot of land

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mayoria di e peticion pa expansion, ta pa un tereno no grandi, p.e. un camber extra of un garashi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Most are for a small size of land, for the building of, e.g, a new room or garage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DIP a manda carta pa e grupo di personanan aki, unda a informa nan cu nan por pasa entre 5 di augustus y 16 di augustus 2019 na DIP, pa reinscribi nan peticion cu nan kier e expansion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This group of citizens received a letter from the DIP, inviting them to re-submit their expansion request, if this is still needed, from Augustus 5 to August 16, 2019, at the DIP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Unabes cu nan confirma cu ainda nan ta interesa den e expansion y nan paga pa esaki, DIP lo por manda nan midi na Kadaster pa despues di 3 luna nan por haya e expansion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once they confirm their application and pay the fees, they will be directed to the Kadaster for the measuring of the land and in 3 months they should receive their expansion

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un otro producto di DIP cu e departamento lo tuma accion pa actualisa e lista ta encera erfpacht cu a caduca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another product that will be updated by the DIP is the list of expired ground lease terms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin personanan cu desde aña 1986 cu ta pidi ‘verlenging’ di nan erfpacht cu a caduca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Some people have requested a renewal of their expired ground lease since 1986

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta haya 12 miyon florin pa atende cu e crisis di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba requests 12 million florins o help combat the crisis with Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na mei ultimo Hulanda a indica cu nan ta dispuesto pa yuda Aruba y Corsou pa atende cu e crisis di Venezuela cu 23.8 miyon Euro cu ta alrededor di 55 miyon florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In May this year, the Netherlands announced that 23.8 million euros, or 55 million florins, will be made available to help with the crisis with Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a indica cu Aruba lo ricibi alrededor di 12 miyon florin pa yuda den e crisis di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime minister Wever-Croes has announced that Aruba has applied for 12 million florins in the context of this project as help to combat the crisis with Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E placa aki ta bay pa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This money will be used in particular to

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Haci e control riba lama y tera bira mas estricto p’asina evita importacion ilegal di sustancianan, arma como tambe di persona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: to apply monitoring at sea and on land more strictly so that illegal goods, weapons, and people do not enter

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e placa aki lo amplia e capacidad di detencion na unda esnan ilegal por keda mientras nan ta warda e fecha prome cu manda nan bek pa nan pais
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The available money will also be used to increase the detention capacity of illegal immigrants, to improve their reception until the time they can return to their country

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo uza parti di e fondo aki tambe pa enseñansa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A portion of the available funds will also benefit education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tartamudo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019:
Tartamudo”
Autor y poeta José Luis (Joe) Fortin a bishita directora di Biblioteca Nacional Aruba, sra. Astrid Britten, e siman aki pa entrega 2 ehemplar di su ultimo publicación “‘Tartamudo’”	Author and poet José Luis (Joe) Fortin, recently visited Mrs. Astrid Britten, director of the National Library and brought 2 books of his latest publication called “Tartamudo”
Tartamudo’ ta un obra literario nobo di autor drs. Joe Fortin y cu esaki Joe tin 3 publicacion literario riba su nomber	Tartamudo’ is one of the latest literary works of author drs. Joe Fortin, totaling 3 publications on his name
