Tartamudo’ ta contene 12 storia cortico cu ta mescla diferente nivel di realidad	‘Tartamudo’ consists of 12 short stories which blend different levels of reality
E storianan ta hiba e lector den un laberinto di duda sin salida y tin e intencion di confundi y despista	The stories will send the reader through a maze of doubts without an exit and are intended to confuse and mislead the reader
Pronto biblioteca ta busca mas ehemplar pa por circula esaki bou di su miembronan	Soon the Library will acquire more books and will add these to the collection of public books for their members
E buki ta obtenibel na libreria caba	The book is already available at the library
Otro bukinan cu Joe a publica ta un compilacion di storia cortico titula ‘City store’ (2013) y un coleccion di poema titula ‘Canto di lama’(2016), tur dos den coleccion di Biblioteca Nacional Aruba	Other books publicized by Joe Fortin are “City store” (2013) and “Canto di lama” (2016), City store is a compilation of short stories, while Canto di lama is a collection of poems and both are available at the library
Den bes en cuando Joe Fortin ta publica online of den corant local	Den bes en cuando Joe Fortin ta publica online of den corant local
el a contribui na e buki ‘Crece den libertad’, un publicacion di Simia Literario	He has also contributed with the book “Crece den Libertad”, a publication of Simia Literario
Tartamundo’ ta un coleccion di diesdos storia cu ta conta con e personahenan ta perde control riba nan bida cotidiano y ta bruha e diferente realidad cu nan fantasia y deseo	‘Tartamundo’ is the collection of 12 stories that tell the stories of how the characters lose control of their daily lives and mix reality with fantasy and desire
Ta existi duda entre loke ta pasa di berdad y loke ta djis un creacion di nan mente	There is confusion whether the events are real or just a creation of their imagination
Mientras cu nan ta desea di por pertenece, cada bes nan ta distancia nan mes, y ta convirti den sernan solitario cu pasionnan straño y excesivo	While there is a desire of belonging, each time they distance themselves and become solitary creatures with weird and excessive passions
Importacion di oro di Venezuela ta prohibi	Import of Gold from Venezuela is prohibited
En bista di desaroyonan den region, Gobierno di Aruba a dicidi pa prohibi tur tipo di importacion, exportacion y transito di oro di procedencia directo of indirecto di Venezuela	Due to the regional situation, the Government of Aruba has decided to prohibit the import, export, and transit of any gold directly and indirectly from Venezuela
E tema di importacion, exportacion y transito di oro di Venezuela ta topico di discusion mundial y a causa daño na imagen di Aruba	This import, export, and transit of Venezuelan gold is a global discussion and has already caused damage to the image of Aruba
Gobierno ta scoge pa drecha e imagen di Aruba internacionalmente	Therefore, the government decided to improve Aruba international image
Cu esaki gobierno di Aruba ta pone un punto final tras di e discusion cu si e importacion/exportacion di oro ta un negoshi legitimo of no	With this decision, the Government of Aruba is putting an end to the ongoing discussion whether the import/export of gold a legitimate business is or not
E no ta legitimo y ta keda prohibi	It is NOT legit and thus prohibited
Pa mas informacion tocante e prohibicion aki por consulta e Gaceta oficial Afkondigingsblad" AB 2019 no.43
column3: For more information please consult the Official Gazette “Afkondigingsblad” AB 2019 no.43

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina di Estadistica CBS ta preparando pa e Programa Piloto di Censo 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau for Statistics CBS is in full preparations for the pilot program for the Censo 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente CBS a duna un presentacion interesante en conexion cu e preparacion di e Programa Piloto di Censo 2020 ‘Pasobra Aruba ta conta cu bo'
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The CBS recently held a presentation in connection with the preparations for the pilot program of the Censo 2020: “Pasobra Aruba ta conta cu bo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Programa Piloto lo cuminsa diahuebs dia 3 di october y lo termina diadomingo dia 13 di october 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The pilot program will start on Thursday, October 3 and end on Sunday, October 13, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e Programa Piloto aki e encuestadornan lo bishita algun hogar selecciona pa CBS pa completa a formulario di Censo 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In this pilot project, the interviewers will visit a few, by the CBS pre-selected houses, so they can complete the Census 2020 Forms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta di e Programa Piloto aki ta pa test e procedura di e informacion cu lo colecta, ya cu e Censo 2020 lo ta completamente digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this pilot program is to test the procedures that will be used to process all information since the Censo 2020 will be digital

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: varios instancia y hende individual por haci uzo di e informacion colecta den Censo 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Individuals and entities can also use the collected data of the Censo 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo implementa corporate governance code pronto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Corporate governance code soon to be implemented

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cuadro di vision tocante integridad, gobierno lo dividi su plannan relaciona cu esaki den 3 parti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In connection with the integrity vision, the government has split its plans into 3 sections

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina di Integridad; E oficina aki lo conscientisa riba loke por y kico no por segun reglanan di integridad tanto den sector publico como den sector priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Office for Integrity; This office will create awareness of the do’s and don’ts according to the rules of integrity within the public and private sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe e bureau aki lo ta encarga pa ricibi e ‘meldingen’, reportahenan di cosnan cu ta bay bon pa loke ta integridad of kiebronan di integridad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This office also serves as the receiver of reports, both about issues according to the integrity rules as well as those against these same rules

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kamber di Integridad; E oficina aki lo ta encarga pa scrutina desicionnan grandi di Gobierno den entro otro destahonan publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Chamber of Integrity; This chamber will serve as inspecting authority for all major decisions that need to be made by the Government like in public tenders

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Codigo di gobierno corporativo; Esaki ta reglanan di integridad cu ta aplicabel riba tanto sector publico como sector priva, refiriendo aki na companianan estatal di Gobierno y sector priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Corporate Governance Code; These are the rules of integrity that are applicable for both public and private sector, as regards the public companies and private sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banco Central ta esun cu e prepara e ley aki pa gobierno y recientemente a haci un presentacion na conseho di Minister
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bank is currently preparing the law for the Government and has recently presented a draft to the Council of Ministers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e presentacion Banco Central a splica e aspectonan di e ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All aspects of the law were presented by the Central Bank

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banco Central a indica tambe cu mester bin cu un comision pa monitoria consistiendo di Secretario di Algemene Rekenkamer, Director di Centrale Accountantsdienst Aruba y di diferente persona di peso den nos comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They have also advised a monitoring entity consisting of the Secretary of the General Audit Room, Director of the Central Accounting Service and many top executives of our community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E comision aki lo mester duna Gobierno conseho sea e ta pidi of no pidi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This monitoring entity should provide requested and unrequested advice to the Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin hopi trabou ainda cu mester haci prome cu tur hende ta riba mesun linea
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is still a lot that needs to be done to have everybody on the same page

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo cuminsa pa haci un inventarisacion pa analisa con grandi e gap ta entre e situacion actual y e situacion cu e ley aki ta describi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An assessment will be done to see how far the current situation is compared to the desired situation in the new Law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues lo traha un plan pa cada gap den compania y institutonan di Gobierno pa hunto introduci y implementa e ley aki na aña 2021
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once the facts are known, a plan will be made to close the gaps within the state companies and state institutions, and together implement the new law in 2021

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Internacional di Mangel - Fofoti (Conocarpus erectus) tambe ta un mata di mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: International Day of the Mangrove - Fofoti (Conocarpus erectus) is also a mangrove

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 26 di juli ta Dia Internacional di Mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: July 26 is the International Day of the Mangrove

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un di e matanan di Fofoti mas popular na Aruba ta esun na Eagle Beach
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the landmark Fofoti trees in Aruba is the one located on the Eagle Beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den biento e Fofoti ta haya un forma masha particular y cu lama su tras, ta forma un paisahe masha bonita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The particular shape of this Fofoti mangle is primarily due to the constant trade winds and provides a stunning landscape on the ocean’s front

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fofoti ta crece na hopi parti na Aruba, entre otro na e costanan, manera Malmok, Eagle Beach, Linear Park y Baby Beach
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Fofoti mangle is found on most locations around the island however, they are seen mostly in the Malmok area, Eagle Beach, Linear Park, and Baby Beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe por haya e Fofoti den mayoria di e rooinan, manera Rooi Prikichi, Rooi Canashito y Rooi na Sero Cristal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They are also found near most creeks like Rooi Prikichi, Rooi Canashito and at the Rooi at Sero Cristal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Fofoti ta un palo cu semper ta keda berde y ta crece, contrario na e otro mangelnan, mas paden riba tera firme pero si den bisindario di awa salo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Fofoti is a mangle that is green year-round and is always growing and unlike other mangles species, they grow inland on firm land, yet near saltwater

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Su nomber na Ingles ta “Buttonwood” esaki ta relaciona cu e forma di e fruta di e Fofoti, su fruta ta bruin y rondo mescos cu un boton
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Its English name is “Buttonwood” named after the shape of its fruit, a brown and round button-like shape

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tawata traha te di e troncon di e Fofoti pa uza contra irritacion di wowo of cuero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The trunk was also used for its medicinal properties, like tea made of the trunk for eyesores and skin irritations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un otro sorto ta e Silver Buttonwood cu a introduci na Aruba for di Florida y ta uza esaki pa decora hardin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another type is the Silver Buttonwood, introduced to Aruba from Florida and primarily used as a landscape plant

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fofoti ta menasa door di perdida di su habitat den tur su area di Caribe, principalmente debi na desaroyo di nos costa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The existence of the Fofoti is threatened by the loss of its habitat in the Caribbean is mainly due to coastal development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta estima cu desde 1980 tin un reduccion di 17% di e area di mangel den Caribe di e especie aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is estimated that 17% of its habitat has been reduced in the Caribbean since 1980

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun e Metanan di Desaroyo Sostenibel, en particular SDG 15, mundialmente nos tin e meta pa proteha nos naturalesa riba tera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the Sustainable Development Goals-SDG’s, in particular, SDG15 is to protect nature worldwide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Internacional di Mangel (Mangroves)- Mangel Tam (Rhizophora mangle)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem - Mangel Tam or Red Mangroves (Rhizophora mangle)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 26 di juli ta celebra Dia Internacional pa Conservacion di Sistema Ecologico di Mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem is celebrated on July 26

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cuadro di e dia importante aki, Departamento di Naturalesa y Medio Ambiente kier subraya e importancia di un di nos sorto di mangelcu ta e mangel Tam
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Nature and Environment wants in connection with this day to highlight the importance of one of our mangroves species, the Mangel Tam

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mangel Tam ta haya su nomber local pasobra un siglo pasa tawata uza liña di catuna y agave gevlecht cu otro pa pisca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The “Tam” mangle’s local name originated a century ago when cotton threads were braided with agave to be used as fishing line

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan tawata tam e liña di pisca cu e simia di e Mangel pa percura pa liña no putri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The lines were smeared with the mangrove’s seed to avoid rot

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E salo ta concentra den e simia cu ta conserva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The level of salt within the seed is concentrated and preserves the seeds

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reis ta duna e mata sosten den awa y lodo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They provide support to the plant in both water and mud

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aki ta unda hopi pisca chikito, cocolishi y otro organismo marino ta sconde y come
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It provides shelter and nourishment to many small fish, shells and other marine organisms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reis por produci awa dushi for di lama door di su habilidad pa filtra e awa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The roots also function as a filter, producing freshwater by excreting the salt from the water

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reis tambe ta forma un tera firme y ta proteha nos costa contra erosion y horcan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They protect the soil and coastline from erosion and damages from hurricanes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E simia di e Mangel Tam tin un punta skerp, ora e simia cay na suela, e ta cay den e lodo of ta keda drif te unda e toca suela y eynan e ta cla pa crece
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The seeds of the Tam Mangle have a sharp point and upon falling off the mangroves it penetrates the soil or drifts until it reaches the soil and grows

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Mangel Tam ta presente entre otro na Spaans Lagoen, Mangel Halto y na Santo Largo na Savaneta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tam Mangle is spotted in Spaans Lagoen, Mangel Halto and Santo Largo in Savaneta

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Internacional di Mangel (Mangroves)- Zwartmangel of Mangel Preto (Avicennia germinans)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem - Black mangroves (Avicennia germinans)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 26 di juli ta celebra Dia Internacional pa Conservacion di Sistema Ecologico di Mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem is celebrated on July 26

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Zwartmangel of Mangel Preto ta haya su nomber posiblemente door cu for di su troncon e ta saca un colorante preto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The name of the Black mangroves refers to the color of the trunk and heartwood

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por haya e Mangel Preto entre otro na Spaans Lagoen, Mangel Halto y Santo Largo na Savaneta den un habitat cu hopi salo y ta un di e poco especie di mangel cu tin un tolerancia halto pa cambio di temperatura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is found primarily at the Spaans Lagoen, Mangel Halto and Santo Largo in Savaneta in a very salty habitat and is very tolerant to drastic temperature fluctuations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Apesar cu su habitat ta uno di hopi lodo, yen di material organico, y falta di oxigeno, e mangel aki a adapta su mes na e ambiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Despite the tough growing conditions in salty organic filled soil and oxygen-deprived mud, this plant has adapted to withstand all the elements

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Zwartmangel ta un mangel sabi, e ta chupa e awa salo for di tera, pas’e door di su troncon pa yega na e blachinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The black mangroves have a smart way of filtering the saltwater, which is absorbed by the roots, transported to the leaves where the salt is excreted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E concentracion di salo por crea buraco, pasobra e ta come e blachi su paden
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The accumulation of salt on the leaves will eventually create holes in the leaves

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Zwartmangel ta plama holo ora solo baha y ora solo subi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The black mangroves discharge a smell at sunrise and sunset

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: su blachi nan ta mustra shinishi; e ta un otro berde compara cu e otro sorto di mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The leaves have a different green color, compared to other mangroves, a more greyish tone

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin diferente uzo pa e zwartmangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are several uses for the black mangroves

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta un fuente di honing pa bij/abeha den e area di nos costa, e tin flor na adundancia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is a source for honey production as it is a habitat for many bees in the coastal areas with an abundancy in flowers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Su troncon tin propiedad medicinal y tambe ta uza e salo procedente di e blachinan den nos cushina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The trunks have medicinal properties and the excreted salt on the leaves can be used for cooking

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia International di Mangel (Mangrove) - .Mangel Shimaron (Laguncularia racemosa)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem - Shimaron Mangle (Laguncularia Racemosa)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 26 di juli ta celebra Dia Internacional pa Conservacion di Sistema Ecologico di Mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The International Day for the Conservation of the Mangrove Ecosystem is celebrated on July 26

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cuadro di e dia importante aki, Departamento di Naturalesa y Medio Ambiente kier subraya e importancia nos sorto di mangelnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Nature and Environment wants in connection with this day to highlight the importance of one of our mangroves species

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e meta aki den mente, e conservacion di nos Mangelnan ta un compromiso importante pa Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With this goal in mind, it is important for Aruba to protect the mangrove population

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E mata aki no ta crece mas di 6 meter di haltura y ta saca un flor color blanco di mas o menos 5 mm
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This mangrove does not grow any taller than 6 meters and produces small white flowers of about 5 mm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta saca un fruta cu no pa come color berde plat di 1 pa 2 cm largo y 1 cm hancho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The inedible fruit is flat, has a green color and is about 1-2 cm long and 1 cm wide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E fruta ta crece manera un hala chikito y e simia ta color cora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The fruit has a wing-shaped form with a small red seed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mangel Shimaron ta e sorto menos comun cu e otro sortonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Shimaron Mangle is the least common of all sorts of mangroves

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por reconoce e Mangel Shimaron na e briyo cora cu e tin ora e ta jong, su blachi ta oval y berde cla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Shimaron mangle is recognizable for its reddish shine as a young plant with light green oval-shaped leaves

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Mangel Shimaron ta absorba e awa di lama door di su reisnan y ta saca exceso di salo via di conopinan cu ta riba e takinan net bou di e blachinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Shimaron mangle absorbs the seawater with its roots and exceeds the salt through the buds underneath the leaves

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Su flornan ta yen di nectar y ta un bon mata di honing
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The flowers are nectar enriched and a good source of honey

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Aruba Mangel Shimaron ta crece den areanan manera Baby Beach, Spaans Lagoen, Mangel Halto y Santo Largo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In Aruba the Shimaron mangle is found at the Baby beach, Spaans Lagoen, Mangel Halto, and Santo Largo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cantidad di e Mangelnan Shimaron ta birando menos
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Shimaron mangle population is declining

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E informacion treci padilanti pa DNM ta pa informa y conscientisa pueblo ariba nos flora y fauna local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The provided information by the DNM is to enlighten and make people aware of the importance of the local flora and fauna

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta di importancia tambe pa menciona cu tur cuater sorto di mangel ta protegi tambe pa nos ley local, articulo 4, inciso 1 y 2, tambe articulo 26 inciso 1 di e Natuurbeschermingsverordening (AB1995 no2)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is also important to point out that the four mentioned mangles are all protected by law in article 4, paragraph 1 and 2 in addition to article 26 paragraph of the Nature protection Ordinance (AB1995no2)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 27 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum Prices July 27, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 27 di juli 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per July 27, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO, BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pal’i Sia Cora kita di tereno na Sabana Basora tawata protegi pa ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pal’i Sia Cora cut in Sabana Basora was protected by law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente a drenta un yamada na DNM, di un miembro activo di un organisacion ambiental, pa entrega un keho oficial relaciona cu rosamento di un tereno na Sabana Basora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the DNM received a call from an active environmentalist, reporting the bulldozing of a piece of land situated in Sabana Basora

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Awor cu a kita uno, kibrando ley, lo mester warda pa wak kico por ta e solucion pa esaki of kico lo por ta e consecuencia di e acto castigabel aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In other words, now that one has been illegally removed, there is only one remaining that is known to the DNM, a solution needs to be found, and the consequences should be defined this illegal act

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: no solamente kier trece dilanti cu e flora ta protehi, pero tambe cu pa otorgamento di tereno di mas cu 750m2 tin un proceso legal y cu DNM tin un rol na inicio cu ta di inventarisa y duna conseho ariba e proceso di otorgamento di tereno y condicionnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Not only is our nature protected, but in the event a land is requested that is bigger than 750m2, there is a legal process in place and the DNM has a vital role of registering and providing advice in the process of giving the land and provide the conditions of owning the land

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM tin un website www.midinosmatanan.com cu ta e plataforma pa comunidad yuda pa informa unda e matanan ta ubica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM has a website www.midinosmatanan.com that can be used to register all the new found trees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: i bo persona ta reconoce e mata aki, manera den e potret, sea bo tin e den cura of sa di un cunucu unda tin un, por saca su potret y pon’e riba e plataforma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you see a similar plant as the one on the photo, either in your backyard, or any known location, please take a photo and register this on the platform

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur informacion ta keda confidencial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All information will remain confidential

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 13 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison July 13, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 13 di juli 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 9 y 10 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras July 13, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on July 9 and 10, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Unesco ta reconoce diplomanan y gradonan academico den nos region
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: UNESCO recognizes regional diplomas and academic grades

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Enseñansa Sr Rudy Lampe a anuncia su participacion na reunion di UNESCO na Argentina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Education, Mr. Rudy Lampe, has recently attended a UNESCO meeting in Argentina

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e reunion aki a ser aproba un convenio nobo pa loke ta trata reconocimento di diplomanan y gradonan academico di nos region di Latino America y Caribe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During this meeting in Argentina, an agreement was reached that would acknowledge the diplomas and academic grades within the Latin American and Caribbean region

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ultimo convencion cu a yega di tuma luga riba e topico di educacion superior pa Latino America y Caribe tawata na aña 1974
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The last held meeting to discuss topics like superior education for Latin America and the Caribbean was back in 1974

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Reino mester ratifica, firma y aproba e convenio final ainda ya cu nan ta esnan cu ta responsabel pa firma tur asunto internacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This agreement still has to be ratified by the Kingdom’s Government since they are responsible for International affairs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Una bes e convenio aki drenta na vigor e lo conta tambe pa Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once this agreement becomes valid, it will be applied to Aruba as well

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E encuentro aki na Argentina tawata uno historico pa loke ta trata e iniciativa cu Aruba a tuma pa den e convenio final cu ta haci mencion explicito di e miembronan asocia di UNESCO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The meeting in Argentina historic considering Aruba’s initiative to explicitly mention the UNESCO associated countries in the final agreement

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Te aworaki ta solamente haci referencia na e miembro estado cu ta Reino Hulandes defacto Hulanda y no ta menciona e miembronan asocia di cual Aruba, Corsou y St Maarten ta forma parti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Currently, they only refer to the member state, namely the Kingdom of the Netherlands or The Netherlands, and do not include the associated members like Aruba, Curacao, and St. Maarten

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plan nacional pa trata e problematica di kill cage y cacho riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National plan to address the problem of the Kill cage and stray dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta un hecho cu na Aruba tin hopi cacho riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is a fact that there are many dogs on the streets of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero hecho ta cu nos tin demasiado doño iresponsabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another fact is that there are also many irresponsible dog owners

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ley di cacho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: dog Laws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cacho riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: street dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cacho riba caya gedal door di auto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: injured dogs hit by cars

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plan tin 3 parti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The plan consists of 3 phases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Accionnan inmediato
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Immediate action

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Accionnan corto plaso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: short term action

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Accionnan largo plaso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Long term action

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un prome paso ta, comberti e ‘kill cage’ den un ‘dog act shelter’ cu ta di acuerdo cu e hondenverordening/dog act/ley di cacho na vigor ya 5 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first step that must be taken is to convert the kill cage into a dog act shelter as stated in the dog ordinance/dog act/dog law which is 5 years in place already

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e Regulacion Ministerial di 17 september 2013 (AB 2013 No. 67) por haya mas informacion tocante ehecucion di articulo 2, inciso 2 di e Hondenverordening pa loke ta trata cuido y bienestar di cacho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ministerial regulation of September 17, 2013 (AB 2013 No. 67) also contains more information about the implementation of Article 2, second paragraph, of the Dog Ordinance regarding the dog's care and well being

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Con esaki mester funciona den practica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The way this should work in the field is

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta bay traha riba un database cu ta fungi como e manera di reuni e doño di cacho cu su mascota, ora haya esaki riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A database should be created to assist with finding the owners in the event a dog is found on the streets

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Via e mesun database ta avisa NGO’s di un candidato pa adopcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The same database is used to inform the NGO’s when dogs become available for adoption

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cachonan cu nan doño no bin busca nan of reclama nan denter di maximo diez dia di trabou, lo pone nan drumi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the owner does not pick up or claim his/her dog within  maximum 10 working days, the dog will be euthanized

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo haci uzo di ‘dog catchers’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Dog catchers will be installed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo introduci un censo pa cacho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A formal registration census for dogs should be created

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Polis lo haya un caminda adecua pa warda e cachonan cu ta slenter riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The police department will have a proper place to shelter stray dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E doño e ora ey lo haya un boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Owners will then be fined

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aplicacion pa Prueba di Naturalisacion (e di dos ronda)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Request naturalization test 2019 (Second round)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seccion Examenbureau di Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba ta informa cu e di dos ronda di inscripcion pa e Prueba di Naturalisacion ta habri desde  29 di juli te cu 16 di augustus 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Examination Office of the Department of Education informs that the second round of registration for the Naturalization Test is from July 29 to August 16, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hunto cu e formulario di aplicacion mester entrega copia di algun documento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The applicant must submit copies of some documents with the application form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E persona cu ta aplica mes mester percura pa saca e copianan, incluso di e formulario di aplicacion, y entrega tur hunto pa e inscripcion por tuma luga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The applicant must make the copies, including that the registration form, and submit all documents to get registered

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe mester trece e documentonan original pa por verifica e copianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They also must bring the original documents to verify the copies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prueba di Naturalisacion desde 1 di januari 2011 ta consisti di 1 componente di conocemento di nos comunidad y structura estatal, 4 componente di idioma Papiamento y 4 componente di idioma Hulandes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From 1 January 2011, the Naturalization Test consists of 1 component that tests knowledge of the state structure and society, 4 components that test the degree of knowledge of the Papiamento language and 4 components that test the level of knowledge of the Dutch language

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba pa medio di su Examenbureau ta encarga specificamente cu e prueba y no tin ningun participacion den henter e proceso di naturalisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Education through its Examination Office is in charge of the test and has no participation in the other naturalization procedure

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa informacion relaciona cu e Prueba di Naturalisacion por tuma contacto cu Examenbureau, mientras cu pa naturalisacion mester tuma contacto cu Gabinete di Gobernador di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For information about the Naturalization Test, you can contact the Examination Office, while for the naturalization procedure you can contact the Cabinet of the Governor of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plan Preparatorio di Desaroyo Teritorial Aruba 2019 ta ratifica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Spatial Development Plan Aruba 2019 has been established

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por medio di Decreto Nacional no. 1 di 17 di juli 2019 e Plan pa Desaroyo Teritorial di Aruba 2019 (ROP 2019) a keda ratifica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Spatial Development Plan Aruba 2019 (ROP 2019) was established by National Decree No. 1 of 17 July 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 15 di januari 2019 a publica un concepto pa un Plan pa Desaroyo Teritorial di Aruba nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On January 15, 2019, a concept for a new Spatial Development Plan for Aruba was made available for inspection

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Te cu 15 di maart 2019 a brinda oportunidad pa entrega punto di bista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Until March 15, 2019, an opportunity is offered to submit views

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E concepto a wordo ahusta y contestacion riba tur punto di bista cu a wordo entrega a keda incorpora den e Nota riba Punto di Bista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The concept has been adjusted and the responses to the submitted views have been bundled in the Note of views

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por tuma nota di forma digital di e ROP 2019, e mapa, e Decreto Nacional no. 1 di 17 di juli 2019, e splicacion riba ROP 2019, e Nota riba Punto di Bista y un mapa di structura ecologico principal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ROP 2019, the Plan Map, National Decree No. 1 of 17 July 2019, the explanation ROP 2019, the Policy Document on Views, and a map of the main ecological structure can be consulted digitally

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por tuma nota di ROP 2019 na oficina di Departmento di Infrastructura y Planificacion (DIP) tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ROP 2019 is also available for inspection at the Infrastructure and Planning Department (DIP)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Maneho nobo pa aña escolar 2019-2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New management for the upcoming school year 2019-2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den conferencia di prensa diahuebs 18 di juli, Minister di Enseñansa a splica riba e maneho nobo cu a introduci pa aña escolar 2019-2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In a recent press briefing, the Minister of Education talked about the new management policy for the upcoming school year 2019-2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e aña venidero a bin cu un “Nationale Toets” cual ta un examen nacional cu tur mucha den 6de klas mester a pasa, y basa riba e resultado di e examen aki y e conseho di scol ta determina unda e alumno aki lo bay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A “National test” will be introduced for the upcoming school year; all 6th graders that pass the national exam, and will receive a recommendation based on the results and advice provided by the school to what school each student should attend following the 6th grade

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e conseho di scol ta bisa HAVO y e resultado di examen ta bisa MAVO, e alumno aki lo bay HAVO pa motibo cu e score di mas halto ta conta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In a scenario where the school advice is HAVO while the National Exam result suggests MAVO, the student can still attend the HAVO, since the highest evaluation is valid

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun Minister Lampe, ta pa e motibo aki tambe a surgi un crecemento den e fluho total di alumnonan cu a logra pa bay HAVO cu a resulta den e decision pa cuminsa cu un “dependance” di colegio San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to Minister Lampe the increased amount of students, flowing into the HAVO is thanks to the National Exam, and this increase led to the opening of a branch of the Colegio in San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: si acaso un alumno ta bay scol catolico of protestant y no por haya luga na Colegio Arubano, cu nan por inscribi libremente online (via nan website https://csnaruba.edupage.org/) pa Colegio San Nicolas pa asina nan por cuminsa cu nan estudio na augustus 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Students attending catholic or protestant schools that were not admitted to Colegio Oranjestad can register online at https://csnaruba.edupage.org/ for Colegio San Nicolas so they can start the new school year in Augustus 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa aclarea confusion di hopi mayornan, Colegio San Nicolas ta un scol publico, Colegio Arubano ta un scol Catolico y SMOA tin un directiva catolico y pa e motibo aki Colegio San Nicolas ta habri pa tur alumno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To be clear, Colegio San Nicolas is a public school, Colegio Arubano is Catholic school being administered by the SMOA with Catholic management, this is the reason Colegio San Nicolas is accessible to all students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si den caso un mucha ta inscribi na SKOA y ta poni pa bay HAVO y Colegio Arubano no tin luga, nan tin tur derecho pa inscribi na Colegio San Nicolas pa haya un luga pa cuminsa e aña escolar nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the student applies for Colegio Arubano at the SKOA and has the credentials for Colegio, but the admittance reaches its maximum, the student has the right to apply for Colegio San Nicolas and must be admitted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta hopi importante pa notifica tur alumno cu e “dependance” di Colegio San Nicolas cu Gobierno ta preparando ta na Centro di Bario Dakota
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Important is the fact that the branch of Colegio San Nicolas that is being prepared by the Government is located at the Centro di Bario Dakota

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo institui Ouderenraad (Conseho pa grandinan) pronto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National Council on aging soon a reality

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e programa di Gobernacion tin un maneho pa introduci un ‘Ouderenraad’, un conseho di hendenan mayor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government program includes the creation of a National Council on Aging, a council by seniors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E topico aki ta uno hopi interesante mirando cu e ta traha den beneficio di nos grandinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is a very important entity since it will be beneficial for seniors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ouderenraad  un instituto cu Gobierno di Aruba kier crea p’asina constantemente por ricibi consehonan tocante diferente aspecto cu ta afecta nos hendenan di edad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Senior council, a council created by the government, will constantly be advising the government about all the concerns that may affect the elderly group

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe por ta geriatrianan cu ta cuida salud di nos grandinan of esnan cu ta cuida nos grandinan sea na cas of na instancianan pa nos grandinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They can also be caregivers in geriatric institutions as well as nurses in nursing homes or at home

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin e aspecto financiero cu ta afecta nos grandinan pa motibo cu ora nan bay cu pension nan entrada ta bay atras pero nan gastonan ta keda mescos
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another aspect is the financial situation of the seniors, as they’ll undergo a decrease in income when they retire, while their daily expenses remain the same

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Prima di AZV y tarifa di belasting a ser baha caba pa pensionadonan por ta mas alivia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, the AZV and tax tariffs have been reduced to provide some relief to the retired seniors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Infrastructura ta otro punto di enfoke pa motibo cu mester sigura cu tur e edificionan di departamento di Gobierno, banconan y caya grandi etc. ta accesibel pa nos hendenan di edad y nos hendenan cu tin un deficiencia fisico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Infrastructure is another focal point of the government as they need to assure that all Government buildings, banks, main streets, etc. should be accessible to seniors of all ages and those disabled

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E concepto lo ta uno casi identico na esun di Sociaal Economische Raad (SER)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The concept is similar to that of the Social Economic Council (SER)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SER manera ta conoci ta un grupo di persona apunta pa sector priva y sector publico cu via un secretariado ta duna conseho na Gobierno riba nivel economico y social
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The SER is a group of experts appointed by both the private and public sector that provides economic and social advise to the government through their secretariat

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e tema di aumento di salario minimo semper mester bay via SER
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The increase in the minimum wage should always be advised by the SER

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mirando e exito di SER, Gobierno kier bin cu Ouderenraad p’asina nos grandinan tambe por haña e atencion necesario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Given the success of the SER, the government wants to establish the National Council on Aging, so they can be included in the decision regarding all seniors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Vergrijzing’ no ta un problema sino mas bien un desaroyo den bida hopi bunita ora cu ciudadanonan yega na un edad halto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aging is not considered a problem, rather it is a nice development in life when citizens reach old ages

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno kier duna mas participacion na tur esnan cu a yega na un edad bunita y cu por y kier contribui na bienestar di Aruba”, Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a enfatisa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government wants to include seniors in the decision making so they can also contribute to the wellness of Aruba.”, Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes emphasized

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Exprodesk den colaboracion cu Disc Makers ta organisa e seminar “Global Music Distribution: How to reach more fans and profit from your music
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Exprodesk in collaboration with Disc Makers is organizing a seminar called “Global Music Distribution; How to reach more fans and profit from your music

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E seminario lo tuma lugar diabierna, dia 9 di augustus, 2019, for di 9.30 di mainta te cu 12.00 di merdia na Departamento di Asuntonan Economico, Comercio, y Industria, cu ta situa na L.G Smith Boulevard #160, den edificio di Sun Plaza, riba segundo piso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This seminar will take place on Friday, August 9, 2019, from 9:30 am till 12:00 pm at the DEZHI’s office, located on the second floor of the Sun Plaza Mall

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Exprodesk como parti di su proyecto di Industia Creativo ta organisa e seminario aki pa tur musico cu ta desea di siña mas tocante e diferente plataforma di distribucion di musica digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This seminar will be organized as part of the Creative Industry project of the Exprodesk targeting all musicians who are intrigued to learn more about the different digital music distribution platforms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Tony van Veen lo papia riba su experiencia amplio riba e area di distribucion di musica digital y lo splica interesadonan exactamente loke nan tin mester (y mester haci) pa asina nan musica yega facilmente na tur e plataformanan grandi di streaming
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Van Veen will share his experience in digital music distribution and will provide all attendees with valuable information on what to do and what they need to make their music reach all the major streaming platforms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. van Veen lo papia tambe tocante con pa haci ganashi cu musica, publicacion y ingreso via YouTube, y otro formanan con pa aumenta ingreso di nos artistanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. van Veen will also talk about profitability in the music industry, publication and profits using Youtube and other platforms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tony van Veen a crece na Aruba y ta biba actualmente na Merca for di unda e ta fungi como e CEO di e compañia lider den e industria di fabricacion di musica, Disc Makers
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Tony van Veen grew up in Aruba and is currently residing in the USA where he holds the position of CEO of the leading company in music creation, Disc Makers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tin mas di 30 aña di experiencia den liderasgo den diferente aspecto di e industria di musica y di medionan di comunicacion, incluyendo musica digital, fabricacion y operacion, derecho di autor, imprenta y distribucion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He has over 30 years of experience in multiple leadership positions throughout a variety of aspects within the music and media industry including digital music, fabrication, and operations, author rights, prints, and distribution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E la administra tambe CD Baby, Disc Makers, BookBaby, AdRev y Merchly
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He is the administrator for CD BabyCD Baby, Disc Makers, BookBaby, AdRev, and Merchly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Su companianan a traha cu miles di musico, cineasta y autor pa yuda nan pone nan canticanan, videonan y contenido escrito riba mercado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: His companies work with thousands of musicians, moviemakers and authors, providing them the assistance in pushing their music, movies and written contents on the market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Peticion di expresion di interes pa un proyecto piloto di sistema di monitoreo electronico por medio di leasing
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Request for Expression of Interest for a pilot project of Electronic Monitoring System through leasing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa por aplica e leynan penal, coreccional y di inmigracion, Ministerio di Husticia, Seguridad y Integracion di Aruba (MHSIA) ta aspira di inicia urgentemente un proyecto piloto pa monitoreo electronico cu ta aplicabel pa suhetonan cu sancionnan penal c.q. administrativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the enforcement of penal, correctional and immigration laws, the Ministry of Justice, Security and Integration of Aruba (MJSIA) is urgently seeking to start a pilot project for electronic monitoring of applicable penal c.q. administrative subjects

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas informacion por haya den e documento adhunto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please read the following document

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 46 studiante di UA ta obtene certificacion di Academic Foundation Year
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 46 students at the UA obtain Academic Foundation Year certification

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 8 di juli 46 studiante di Universidad di Aruba a ricibi nan certificado despues di a completa e Academic Foundation Year exitosamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On July 8, 46 students at the University of Aruba received the certificates for the successful completion of the Academic Foundation Year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu esaki nan a completa nan prome aña den educacion avansa, un aña den cual na a desaroya nan mes academicamente, ariba tereno di idioma, escogencia di nan estudio y tereno personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With this, they completed their first year in higher education, a year in which they worked on academic skills, language skills, study choice, and personal development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki 65 studiante a cuminsa cu e programa, di cual 54 a keda den e programa te na final
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year 65 students started the program, 54 of which finished the year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e ceremonia, bou guia di program-administrator Kevin Richardson, studiantenan Stephany Lewis y Amanda Croes a comparti con e programa a influencia nan desaroyo personal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the ceremony led by program administrator Kevin Richardson, students Stephany Lewis and Amanda Croes testified about the impact of the program on their personal development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan a enfatisa e desaroyo cu nan a experiencia como studiantenan di e programa, no solamente ariba tereno di conocemento y habilidad, pero tambe un desaroyo di nan confiansa y determinacion pa cu e escogencianan cu nan ta haciendo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They emphasized the growth and development that they experienced as students of the program, not only in terms of content and knowledge but also in their personal development in self-confidence and certainty about the choices they make

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan ta haya e oportunidad pa tuma diferente vaknan di otro facultadnan na universidad y tambe nan a haya estimulo pa haci un periodo di stage y tuma cursonan online
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To this end, they are given the opportunity to participate in courses at the various faculties of the university and are also encouraged to follow internships and online education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di e studiantenan cu a completa e Academic Foundation Year cu exito, mita di nan ta keda na UA pa sigui nan estudio na Aruba, e otro mita ta opta pa sigui studia na Europa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Of the students who successfully completed the Academic Foundation Year, half remain for further studies at the UA in Aruba, the other half goes to Europe

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un par di studiante cu ya a obtene un cualificacion profesional a opta pa subi e mercado laboral
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: some students who already had a professional qualification chose to go to work

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Universidad di Aruba ta orguyoso di e resultado di e studiantenan y ta anticipa e comienso di e di cuater cohort di e Academic Foundation Year na augustus 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The University of Aruba is proud of the results of the students and looks forward to the start of the fourth cohort of the Academic Foundation Year in August 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Soft launch di e website di gobierno renoba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Soft launch revamped government website

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba  diamars, 16 di juli 2019 ta tuma luga e soft launch di e website renoba di gobierno di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Tuesday, July 16, 2019, the soft launch of the revamped website of the government of Aruba will take place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nabegacion riba e website ta mas facil, loke ta optimalisa e experiencia di e usuario y tambe a evita mas tanto cu ta posibel uzo di lenguahe burocratico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The navigation is more user-friendly, allowing an optimal user’s experience and government jargon is avoided as much as possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ainda ta trahando riba e ultimo detayenan riba e webite, pa cual nos kier pidi comprension
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Work is still being done on the latest details on the website; we ask your understanding for this

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata di un cantidad hopi grandi di informacion cu tin cu pone den e structura nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is because a large amount of information has been transferred to the new structure

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta pa duna duna un servicio mihor y mas completo posible
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Just to be able to provide you with the best and most complete service possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke e no ta probabel, por surgi algo inespera durante cu e website renoba ta den aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Although it is unlikely, you may find something unexpected after the refurbished website is live and functional

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e website Land Aruba ta pa duna informacion tocante di  producto y servicio di Gobierno di Aruba na e ciudadano di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of the government website of Aruba is to provide information regarding the products and services of the Government of Aruba to the Aruban citizen

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E website renoba ta keda dividi den tema; e sistema di nabegacion ta a base di tema cu e ciudadano tin experiencia cu ne
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The website maintains its thematic layout: the navigational structure is in fact based on themes that citizens can relate to

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas di informacion (segun temanan), e ciudadano ta interesa di haya informacion concreto tocante producto y servicio riba e website
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: n addition to general information (presented thematically), citizens are mainly interested in the concrete product information on the website

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E deseo y pregunta di e usuario ta e punto di salida
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The wishes and demands of the user are the starting point

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e informacion no ta disponibel, por haci pregunta of pidi informacion adicional via un formulario di feedback
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the information is not available, then one can ask questions via an online feedback form and/ or ask for more information

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E website ta ofrece un resumen cla di e producto y servicionan cu gobierno ta ofrece, p’asina e usuario por haya e informacion cu e ta busca lihe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The website offers a clear overview of the products and services that the government provides so that the site visitor quickly finds what he/she is looking for

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin cu remarca cu ainda e loket digital no ta completo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It should be noted that the digital counter is not complete as yet

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta ta pa yena e loket mas pronto cu ta posibel cu producto y servicio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective is for the digital counter, to be as complete as soon as practicable

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E parti Ingles ta yena parcialmente cu mas tanto informacion tocante Haci negoshi y traha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The English site is not yet fully completed and contains mostly information on Doing Business and Work

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta ta pa yena e website na Ingles cu informacion tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The goal is to provide the English website also fully with information

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu gran dedicacion y entusiasmo trahadonan di Departamento di Informatica y Automatisacion,   Servicio Informativo di Gobierno y SIM Caribbean a traha pa e website renoba bira un realidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The staff of the Department of Information and Automation, the Government Information Services and SIM Caribbean worked with dedication and enthusiasm on the realization of the refurbished website

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Exprodesk den colaboracion cu NEX Consulting ta organisa e tayer “From Zero to Hero”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From Zero to Hero”; a workshop by Exprodesk and NEX Consulting

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asuntonan Economico, Comercio y Industria (DEZHI) y su unidad Exprodesk ta organisa den conhunto cu NEX Consulting e tayer “From Zero to Hero, The exporter mindset: how to profit from your talents”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce and Industry (DEZHI), and its Exprodesk unit in collaboration with NEX Consulting are organizing a workshop called “From Zero to Hero, the exporter mindset; how to profit from your talents”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tayer lo tuma lugar diahuebs, dia 18 di juli, 2019, for di 9or di mainta te cu 1or di merdia na DEZHI, cu ta situa na edificio di Sun Plaza, riba segundo piso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This workshop will be held on the 18th of July 2019 from 9:00 am to 1:00 pm at the office of the DEZHI, located on the second floor of the Sun Plaza Mall

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta di e tayer aki ta pa promove exportacion y brinda personanan den e Industria Creativo y den e Sector di Servicio, e oportunidad y conocemento necesario pa saca probecho di nan talento y creatividad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective of this workshop is to help promote export and provide much-needed opportunities and knowledge to those in the creative and service industry, so they can expose their talent and creativity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes e tayer aki, lo stimula y brinda guia na nos empresarionan interesa den exporta nan producto of servicionan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This workshop will also serve as a stimulus and guide for those wanting to export their products or services

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Industria Creativo y e Sector di servicio ta sectornan cu potencial pa sigui desaroya pa asina exporta creacionnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The creative industry and service sector are potential sectors that are worthy of further development in order to help export the local creations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Exprodesk como un ‘Export Promotion Desk’ tin como obhetivo pa contribui na un desaroyo economico sostenibel atrabes di e capacitacion di nos empresarionan cu interes pa exporta door di duna informacion, guia, consulta, training y facilita diferente tayernan cu topiconan actual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The mission of the ‘Export Promotion Desk’ also known as the Exprodesk, is to help contribute with sustainable economic development by educating the entrepreneurs interested in exporting their goods by providing the needed information, guidance, consultation, training and by organizing workshops on the latest topics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Publicacion ‘The Archeology of Aruba: The Pictographs and Petroglyphs’ ta di gran aporte pa nos herencia cultural
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Publication “The Archeology of Aruba; The Pictographs and Petroglyphs is of great value to our cultural heritage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E buki aki ta un compilacion di resultado di investigacion cu e arkeologonan sr. Aad Versteeg y sr. Harold Kelly a haci di e pinturanan riba baranca di e pueblo indigena cu tabata biba antes na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This book is a compilation of the results of the investigation made by archeologist Mr. Aad Versteeg and while Mr. Harold Kelly,  replicated the drawings on the rocks of the indigenous inhabitants in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: The Archeology of Aruba: The Pictographs and Petroglyphs’ ta un proyecto di gran balor pa Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Archeology of Aruba: The Pictographs and Petroglyphs’ is of great value to Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Deseo di e Minister di Finansa, Asuntonan Economico y Cultura, ta cu e trabounan di investigacion aki por aporta pa un dia Aruba por figura riba e World Heritage List di UNESCO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Finance, Economic affairs and Culture, hopes that these results will help position Aruba on the World Heritage list of UNESCO

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa asina por mustra mundo di e patrimonio cultural unico cu nos a hereda di nos pueblo indigena
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: so we can show the world our unique cultural heritage inherited from our indigenous ancestors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero prome cu nos yega asina leu, nos mester cuminsa educa y conscientisa nos pueblo cu ta hunto nos tin cu proteha y conserva loke ta nos herencia cultural
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Before all, we need to educate our community and create awareness that we as a country have to protect and preserve our cultural heritage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E publicacion aki ta duna nos informacion pa asina nos futuro generacion por siña aprecia y disfruta di nos historia y nos pinturanan di Aruba riba baranca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This publication serves as a good instrument to teach the next generations to appreciate and enjoy the history and rock drawings of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: The Archeology of Aruba: The Pictographs and Petroglyps’ ta un adkisicion di gran balor pa nos Museo Arkeologico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Archeology of Aruba: The Pictographs and Petroglyps is a great asset to the Archeological Museum

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Frontera cu Venezuela ta sigui cera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba will not open its borders with Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Premier Evelyn Wever-Croes durante e conferencia di prensa di dialuna a anuncia cu Aruba no ta habri frontera cu Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During her weekly press conference on Monday, the Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes said Aruba would not open its borders with Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera ya conoci, na februari ultimo Venezuela a cera frontera cu Aruba, Boneiro y Corsou, y dia 10 di mei ultimo Venezuela a anuncia cu lo habri e frontera cu Aruba so
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As known, last February Venezuela closed its borders with Aruba, Bonaire and Curacao, whereas on May 10, Venezuela announced that it will open its border, however only with Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na e momento ey Gobierno di Aruba a cera e frontera cu Venezuela, mirando e fluho migratorio creciente, y mirando cu no a habri frontera cu Corsou y Boneiro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At that moment, Aruba closed its border with Venezuela, taking into account the increasing migrants influx and the fact that Venezuela did not open its border with Curacao and Bonaire

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Premier a elabora riba e siguiente puntonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister addressed the following issues

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba ta consciente cu no por tene e frontera cera pa semper, y p'esey ta haciendo preparativonan pa si yega asina leu un dia Aruba por introduci e ESTA di Aruba, den cual un persona cu kier bin Aruba for di Venezuela, mester aplica pa un ESTA online, similar na e ESTA cu nos ta aplica pa bay Merca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba is aware that it cannot close the border indefinitely, for a reason it is making the necessary preparations to introduce an ESTA system in Aruba, when prior to visiting Aruba from Venezuela, the traveler must apply for an ESTA online, this is a similar system to the ESTA where Aruba citizens must apply to go to the US.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di e forma aki por controla miho ken y cuanto hende ta drenta Aruba for di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This way one can get a better control on who and on the number of people entering Aruba via Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ley ta wordo prepara awo y tambe e sistema automatisa pa por maneha e ESTA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The legislation and the automation system that will manage ESTA is being prepared now

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta spera cu e proceso di preparacion por keda cla den e siguiente dos lunanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government foresees that the preparation process will take two months

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tanten e ESTA no ta ‘in place’ lo no habri frontera cu Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As long as the ESTA is not in place, the borders will remain closed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno a ricibi un peticion di Aruba Airlines pa por haci cierto biahenan di transito di Venezuela pa Merca via Aruba, como un excepcion riba e ciere di frontera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government received a request from Aruba Airlines to operate transit flights from Venezuela to the US via Aruba, as an exemption on the border closing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta hopi preocupa cu e situacion aki, y ta buscando forma pa evita cu Aruba Airlines mester cera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This situation deeply concerns the government and it is looking for ways to avoid the cease of operation of Aruba Airlines

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un peticion similar a wordo haci tambe pa e compania cu ta opera e airport chikito pa avioneta priva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The company that operates the general aviation terminal for small aircraft also made a similar request

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No ta asina facil pa djis duna un excepcion, y p'esey Gobierno ta tratando e tema aki cu e prioridad y cautela necesario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Exceptions to the border closure cannot simply be given and therefore he Government is handling this topic with priority and necessary caution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 6 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prijsnan Maximo 6 di juli 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 6 di juli 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per July 6, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO,  BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 6 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison July 6, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado na Aruba y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 6 di juli 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 2 y 3 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras July 6, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on July 2 and 3, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tene Aruba Maker Expo riba 7 di juli, 2019 na Biblioteca na Playa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba Maker Expo will take place at the library on July 7, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba dia 7 di juli 2019 for di 11or am te cu 8or pm lo tin e evento ‘Aruba Maker Expo’ na Biblioteca Nacional na Playa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Sunday, July 7, 2019, from 11.00am until 8.00 pm, the Aruba Maker Expo will be held at the National Library in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un evento pa celebra fin di aña escolar 2018-2019 y Mo-B - Mobile Tech Lab -su participacion y exitonan den e aña escolar aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The event celebrates the end of the school year 2018-2019 and the success of Mo-B - Mobile Tech Lab during this school year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: tambe celebra e cultura di innovacion y experimentacion na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition, it celebrates the innovation and experimentation culture in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e aña escolar Mo-B Lab, e bus di innovacion di Gobierno di Aruba, cu apoyo di OCTA y Union Europeo, a bishita 16 scol; introduciendo mas cu 6000 studiante rond di Aruba na diferente tecnologia y alabes promoviendo innovacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the school year Mo-Lab, the innovation bus of the government of Aruba, with the support of OCTA and the European Union visited 16 schools, introducing more than 6000 students to different technologies while at the same time promoting innovation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa clausura y celebra e aña escolar, Mo-B lo ta presente na e ‘Maker Expo’, unda cu bishitantenan lo por explora e Lab aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To end and celebrate the school year Mo-B will also be present at the Maker Expo, where visitors will have the opportunity to explore this lab

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ‘Maker Expo’ ta conta cu participacion di mas cu 40 participante, cu diferente exposicionnan, workshops, y varios otro actividad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ‘Maker Expo’ has more than 40 participants with various exhibitions, workshops, and activities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E expo ta inclui participantenan di
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Participants at the expo include

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tin diferente workshops pa entre otro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will be different workshops among others

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Siña traha flie
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: How to make a kite

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Coding’ cu Hour of Code
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: coding’ with Hour of Code

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: introduccion na ‘electro’ cu Brenchie's Lab
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: introduction to ‘electro’ with Brenchie's Lab

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con pa traha bo mesun producto cu zero waste
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: how to make zero waste products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con pa colecciona cuminda for di mondi cu Taki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: how to forage for food in the forest with Taki

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E  lo ta un evento sigur cu hopi cos pa wak y haci, pa personanan di tur edad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is an event with lots of interesting things for persons of all ages to see and do

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Futura ta invita pueblo henter pa ta parti di e ‘Maker Expo’ cu ta tuma luga na riba 7 di juli entre 11or di mainta y 8or di anochi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Futura invites everyone to be part of the Maker Expo, which takes place on July 7 between 11 o’clock in the morning and 8 o’clock in the evening

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bin celebra cu nos hunto cu mas di 40 'makers' y diferente proyectonan di arte, sciencia y tecnologia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Come celebrate with more than 40 makers various projects of art, science, and technology

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes tabata presente na toma di mando di President nobo di Panama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes was present at the installation of the new president of Panama

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba dialuna 1 di juli, 2019, e president nobo di Panama dr. Nito Cortizo a keda instala
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Monday, July 1, 2019, the new president of Panama Dr. Nito Cortizo was installed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a representa Aruba y Reino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes represented Aruba and the Kingdom

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: President Cortizo ta di e partido PRD, un social democrata, cu tin como punto central combatimento di pobresa y desigualidad social
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: President Cortizo comes from the PRD party, a social democrat, with a focus on combating poverty and social inequality

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas Prome Minister Wever-Croes  a hiba combersacion cu e Minister nobo di Asunto Exterior Sr. Alejandro Ferrer como tambe cu e vice presidente di Panama Sr. José Gabriel Carrizo
