Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Wever-Croes also met with the new Panamanian Minister of Foreign Affairs. Alejandro Ferrer and also held talks with the vice-president of Panama, Mr. José Gabriel Carrizo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin un laso estrecho entre Aruba, Corsou, Reino y Panama, pero por traha riba mas area
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is a close relationship between Aruba, Curacao and the Kingdom and Panama, but there is still room for cooperation on more fronts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hulanda tin un par di proyecto ambicioso andando na Panama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Netherlands has a number of ambitious projects going on in Panama

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa loke ta trata Aruba por haci hopi mas tocante turismo, specialmente turismo crucero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: And as far as Aruba is concerned, much more can be done jointly with regard to tourism, in particular, cruise tourism

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Panama, Aruba y Corsou ta situa na e parti sur di e ruta Caribense, y actualmente tin plan pa introduci otro linea di crucero riba e ruta aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Panama, Aruba, and Curacao are on the southern Caribbean route, and there are currently plans to use a second cruise line on this route

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: President Cortizo a gradici Prome Minister Wever-Croes pa su presencia y pa e cooperacion entre e paisnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: President Cortizo thanked Premier Wever-Croes for her presence and for the cooperation between the countries

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Wever-Croes tabata riba e podium hunto cu Rey Felipe di Spaña, President di Colombia, Republica Dominicana, Peru, Honduras, Guatemala, Bolivia, Republica Arabe Saharaui y e premier di  Marokko
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes was on stage together with the King of Spain Felipe VI, the presidents of Colombia, Dominican Republic, Peru, Honduras, Guatemala, Bolivia, Arab Republic of Saharaui and the Prime Minister of Morocco

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas tabata presente delegadonan di 90 país
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition, delegations from more than 90 other countries were present

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E crisis na Venezuela, como tambe e oportunidadnan economico tabata topico di combersacion ente Prome Minister di Aruba y e Presidente Duque di Colombia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Venezuela crisis was the subject of discussion between the Prime Minister of Aruba and President Duque of Colombia, as well as economic opportunities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister di Aruba a duna un splicacion amplio di e maneho economico nobo di Gabinete Wever-Croes y Presidente Duque a invita Prome Minister pa atende un mision comercial na Colombia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Wever-Croes gave an explanation of the new economic policy of Cabinet Wever-Croes and President Duque invited the Prime Minister to go to Colombia on a trade mission

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister tambe a combersa cu e Rey di Spaña tocante e crisis na Venezuela y con paisnan Europeo por yuda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister also discussed the crisis in Venezuela with the King of Spain and how the European countries can help

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a enfatisa atrobe cu e crisis no ta solamente un crisis Venezolano, como tampoco un crisis regional, pero un crisis mundial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Premier emphasized again that the crisis is not just a Venezuelan crisis, nor a regional crisis anymore, but a global crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL ta buscando hende pa traha urgente pa un proyecto den e sector di construccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL is urgently looking for employees to work in the construction sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Abo ta apto y dispuesto pa traha como painter, tegelzetter, drywall finisher of tapijtlegger? Pasa registra na DPL prome cu dia 5 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do you have skills to work as a painter, tiler, drywall finisher or carpet installer? Come and register at the DPL before July 5, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Progreso Laboral (DPL) den cuadro di su meta y enfoke principal pa yuda esnan local haya un trabao ta informa cu ta buscando hende pa traha urgentemente den e sector di construccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento di Progreso Laboral (DPL) in the context of its goal and focus to help local job seekers to find a job, informs that it is currently looking for people to work urgently in the construction sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bo persona ta apto y dispuesto pa traha un periodo den un di e vacatura nan menciona? Bo tin experencia caba haciendo e trabao nan aki? Pasa libremente na DPL Seroe Blanco p’asina yena un formulario di registracion cu ta disponibel na balie of por pasa tambe na oficina di Gobierno den edificio Edison Briesen na San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Are you skilled and willing to work for a period in one of the mentioned vacancies? Do have experience in this kind of jobs? If the answer is yes, then you can register at DPL Seroe Blanco to fill out the registration forms available at the counter or you can register at the government’s office in the Edison Briesen building in San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ultimo dia pa registra pa e vacatura nan aki lo ta dia 5 di juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Last day to register for these vacancies is July 5, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL lo percura pa haci un pre-screening pa asina sondea e mihor candidato nan, esnan cu ta cumpli cu e rekisitonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL will do a screening to choose the best candidates that comply with all the requirements

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL ta recomenda tur esnan cu tin experencia y kier traha den sector aki pa pasa registra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL recommends experienced workers that want to work in this sector to register

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si acaso no a selecta bo pa e proyecto aki, bo nomber lo keda registra na DPL y asina cu drenta otro vacatura nan di construccion y bo persona ta cumpli cu e rekesito nan stipula DPL por yama bo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In case they do not select for this project, they will keep your name on file at DPL and as soon as another vacancy becomes available in the construction sector and if you comply with the requirements DPL will call you

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL ta haci uzo di e asina yama “matching” caminda cu ora vacatura nan drenta ta bay sondea den e sistema di registracion (databank) pa posibel candidato nan cu ta apto y dispuesto pa yena e vacatura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL uses the matching system when as soon as a vacancy becomes available they will look into the registration system (databank) for possible candidates that are qualified and willing to fill that vacancy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki ta importante pabo ta registra na DPL ora cu ta buscando un trabao
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For this reason, it is important for you to register at the DPL when looking for a job

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL ta anticipa cu den futuro cercano lo bay tin mester di mas hendenan pa traha den e sector di construccion mirando tur e desaroyonan cu tin andando pa locual ta trata construccion di edificio y infrastructura nan nobo na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL anticipates that in the near future they will need more workers for the construction sector if one takes into account the development regarding the construction of building and infrastructure on Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome minister a participa na presentacion di wega di SDG
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister participated in the presentation of the SDG Games

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Team FUTURA, a bishita varios scol na Aruba pa presenta ‘SDG Board Game’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently, the FUTURA Team visited different schools in Aruba to present the ‘SDG Board Game’

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E wega di mesa SDG cu ta siña muchanan tocante e 17 Metanan di Desaroyo Sostenibel cu Nacionnan Uni a stipula pa 2030 pa crea un miho mundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This game teaches children about the 17 Sustainable Development Goals the United Nations stipulated for 2030 to create a better world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a participa na e presentacion duna na alumnonan di klas 6 di St. Aloysius School
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes participated in the presentation to the students of class 6 of Aloysius primary school

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: FUTURA ta encarga cu ehecuta e plan di innovacion di Gobierno pa desaroya un futuro di Aruba ancra den innovacion cu e ser humano central
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: FUTURA is in charge of the implementation of the innovation plan of the government to develop the future of Aruba based on innovation with the human being as the main focus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde su existencia, FUTURA a lansa diferente proyecto y iniciativa riba e area di innovacion na diferente scol y luganan pa duna muchanan mas conocemento den e area di innovacion incluyendo e Metanan di Desaroyo Sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since its existence, FUTURA launched different projects and initiatives in the area of innovation at different schools y places, the aim is to give children more knowledge on the area of innovation including the Sustainable Development Goals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta final: inclusion, caminda ta laga ningun hende atras
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The main goal is inclusion, where no one is left behind

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa sigura exito di e SDGs , nos mester inclui nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To secure the success of the SDGs, we must include our children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cuminsa na scolnan pa introduci SDGs na nos generacion cu lo dirigi nos mundo den futuro cu innovacion y nan ta esnan cu pa 2030 mester ta miho para tambe den conocimento di e SDG's
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is essential to start the introduction of SDGs at schools to our generation who are the leaders of the future, this is done through innovation to students and to the others who should have a better understanding of the SDGs by 2030

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tanto muchanan como e docentenan di e scolnan a gusta epresentacion di e wega di SDG door di FUTURA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The students, as well as the teachers, liked the presentation of the SDG board game by FUTURA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kehonan riba vehiculonan di motor ATV/UTV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Complaints regarding ATV/UTV

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ultimamente tin hopi keho, specialmente riba plataformanan di social media pa loke ta coremento di “all-terrain Vehicles (ATV)” y “utility task vehicle (UTV)” riba nos isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lately there are many complaints, especially on social media platforms, regarding the use of all-terrain Vehicles (ATV) and utility task vehicle (UTV) on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E keho principal ta e destruccion na nos naturalesa y medio ambiente y ta encera; corre na unda ta prohíbi manera riba e duinen y den lama cerca di beach
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The main complaint is the destruction of our nature and environment caused by these vehicles driving in prohibited areas, like sand dunes and in the sea near the shoreline

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di esaki ta lantamento di stof y tera cu ta causa polucion di aire asina afectando e personanan cu ta biba den e vecindario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition, some ATV/UTV off-road drivers create dust clouds and debris, thus causing air pollution and a hindrance to the persons living near these activities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno tin atencion pa e kehonan di comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These complaints of the community have the government’s attention

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde fin di april / cuminsamento di mei, Gobierno a pidi conseho di Comision Flora y Fauna pa yega na un solucion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government asked advice from the flora and Fauna Commission at the end of April/ start of May for a solution to this issue

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E comision aki a keda institui a base di leynan pa proteccion di nos naturalesa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This commission was instituted based on laws for the protection of our nature

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientmente dia 10 di juni 2019, Gobierno a ricibi e conseho di e comision pa cual inmediatamente a dirigie na diferente departamentonan manera DNM pa nan tambe por duna ‘feedback’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently on June 10, 2019,  the Government received the advice from the commission and immediately forwarded it to different departments like the DNM to give their needed feedback

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta elimina killcage y ta crea dog act shelter
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Kill cage will be eliminated substituted with a dog shelter

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Plan Nacional pa atende cu cachonan di caya porfin a bira realidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The national plan to address the problem of stray dogs finally came to fruition

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues a introduci ley di cacho 5 aña pasa, awor tin un maneho concreto pa atende cu cachonan di caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the introduction of the dog ordinance 5 years ago, now there is a concrete policy to deal with stray dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta elimina Killcage y ta crea Dog Act Shelter
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The kill cage will be eliminated and a dog act shelter will be created

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e maneho aki ta bin tambe campañanan di sterilisacion pero principalmente di conscientisacion pa doñonan di cacho sa nan responsabilidad como cuidadonan di cacho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This policy will also be accompanied with sterilization campaigns, but primarily with awareness campaigns for dog owners to know their responsibility as caretakers of their dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome cu dicidi pa tuma un cacho of un puppy of cualkier animal domestico, mester realisa cu tin hopi responsabilidad cu`ne: cuminda adecuado, cuido veterinario, gasto pa no contribui cu mas cacho riba caya (steriliza of capa)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Before you decide to get a dog or puppy or any house pets, you must realize that it carries a lot of responsibility, among other: Adequate food, vet care, costs regarding population control of strays (sterilize or neuter)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E forma con ta mata bestia na e kill cage ta totalmente inaceptabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The way animals are killed in the kill cage is very unacceptable

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: por tin varios persona kendenan lo bisa cu tin hopi otro tema cu mester haya prioridad den nos pais awor aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Some people will say that there are other topics that require priority right now on our island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta berdad, pero nos no por sigui tolera e forma cruel cu e kill cage ta opera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is true; however, we can no longer tolerate the cruel way the kill cage operates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a cita e dicho di e gran Mahatma Ghandi kende a yega di bisa: “E grandesa di un nacion por wordo husga na e forma cu e animalnan den e nacion ta wordo trata
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes cited the quote of the great Mahatma Gandhi, who once said, “The greatness of a nation can be judged by the way its animals are treated”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a gradici Irene Croes y Dellanire Maduro kendenan a traha duro pa asina e Plan Nacional keda cla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister expresses her thanks to Irene Croes and Dellanire Maduro who worked hard for the plan to be completed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe Prome Minister a gradici Ministernan Dangui Oduber, Andin Bikker y Otmar Oduber pa e cooperacion den esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister also thanks the Ministers Dangui Oduber, Andin Bikker and Otmar Oduber for their cooperation in the foregoing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 29 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison June 29, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 29 di juni 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 25 y 26 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras June 29, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on June 25 and 26, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stof di Sahara y su efecto riba bo salud
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sahara dust and its effects on your health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E fenomeno di naturalesa aki no ta nada nobo, eta sosode na mas cu un ocasion pa aña na momento cu e stof di Sahara ta transporta atrabes di aire pa nos region
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is natural phenomenon is nothing new, since it already did happen on more than one occasion per year when dry dust plume from the Sahara funnels its way toward our region

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu yegada di e stof aki, nos por experencia aumento den kehonan relaciona cu malesanan respiratorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the arrival of this dust, one can experience an increase in respiratory diseases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki debi cu e aire ta consisti di hopi mas stof cu normal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is because the air consists of more dust than usual

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esnan cu ta sufri di malesanan respiratorio manera broncitis, alergia of sinus por presencia aumento den nan sintomanan manera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Persons who suffer from respiratory diseases like bronchitis, allergies or sinus will experience an increase in symptoms like

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: dificultad pa hala rosea
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Difficulties to breathe

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: presion den pecho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Chest pressure

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: hopi tosamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lots of coughing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: grawatamento di cuero y wowo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Itchy skin and eyes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stof di Sahara ta ocasiona tambe cu tempo ta bira mas calor pa cual motibo ta recomenda pa bebe mas likido durante dia pa tene e curpa hidrata
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Sahara dust can also cause an increase in temperature; therefore, it is advisable to drink more water during the day to keep your body hydrated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta conseha tur persona cu ta sufri di un of otro malesa respiratorio pa percura pa tin nan medicamentonan na nan alcanse na tur momento y tuma esaki nan manera dokter ta prescribi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health advises all persons that suffer from a respiratory disease to have their medications at hand at all times and to take them as prescribed by your physicians

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evita di haci actividad fisico den aire liber y si tuma nota cu e sintomanan ta empeora, tuma contacto cu bo dokter di cas pa un consulta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Avoid physical activities outside and if you notice that your symptoms are getting worse, contact your physician

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 1 di augustus 2019 - Ultimo oportunidad pa entrega ‘verzamelloonstaat’ y ‘verzamelstaat opgaaf derden’ di aña 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: August 1, 2019- Deadline for submitting a collective wage sheet and collective statement for third parties 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan cu ainda tin cu entrega e lista colectivo di salario y e lista colectivo di pago na tercera persona di aña 2018 tin e oportunidad pa haci esaki te cu 1 di augustus 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: customers who have not yet submitted the collective wage statement and summary statement third parties 2018 will be extended have until August 1 2019 to do so

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asina por duna e contribuyentenan aki espacio pa por cumpli cu e obligacion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This gives customers more time to meet this obligation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E boet pa incumplimento ta maximo Afl. 10.000 y esaki no ta necesario si cumpli cu e entregamento na tempo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The maximum fine for non-compliance with this obligation is Awg. 10,000.00 and is not necessary if you hand in these lists in time

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Ruiz-Maduro a reuni cu sr. Pascal Thierry Clivaz di Universal Postal Union
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Ruiz-Maduro met with Pascal Thierry Clivaz of Universal Postal Union

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente Minister Ruiz-Maduro a reuni cu sr. Pascal Thierry Clivaz director suplente di Universal Postal Union (UPU)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Ruiz-Maduro recently met with the interim director of the Universal Postal Union (UPU), Mr Pascal Thierry Clivaz

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: UPU ta e agencia intergubernamental specialisa di Nacionnan Uni cu ta percura pa coordina e maneho postal di e Paisnan miembro y tambe pa e sistema di post cu ta uza na henter mundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The UPU is a specialized intergovernmental agency of the United Nations that coordinates postal management for member countries and the postal system used worldwide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tabata un bishita ameno y hopi informativo den cual Sr.Clivaz a splica riba e beneficionnan cu UPU ta ofrece na su miembronan, e retonan cu ta vislumbra y e oportunidadnan cu esaki ta trece cune
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The meeting was very productive, in which Mr. Clivaz explained the benefits that are provided by the UPU to their members, the challenges and opportunities all of this creates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Thierry Clivaz a splica cu UPU no solamente ta percura pa e sistema postal por traha eficientemente, pero tambe ta concentra riba inclucion financiero brindando acceso financiero na esnan cu dificilmente por tin acceso na servicio financiero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Thierry Clivaz also explained that the UPU does not only provides an efficient postal system but also focusses on the financial inclusion providing financial access to all who struggle to get access to financial services

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hunto cu esaki UPU ta ofrece un sistema automatisa di pago cu por uza ora ta trata di e-commerce
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In combination with this, UPU also wants to include an automated payment system that can be used with E-Commerce

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di e manera aki UPU kier facilita e cuidadano of e companianan chikito y mediano cu no tin acceso na sistema di pago online, manera por ehempel PayPal, cu un sistema di pago universal pa por haci uzo di e-commerce
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will help citizens and small / medium businesses  that do not have access to the online payment system like PayPal, with a universal payment system to be used for E-Commerce

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa Aruba unda cu 90 % di companianan ta chikito of mediano, un alternativa di pago asina sigur lo ta deseabel pa asina por tene gasto di transaccion abou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For a small island as Aruba, where 90% of businesses are considered small or medium businesses, this will be a payment alternative that may help reduce transaction fees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un di e motibonan di UPU su bishita den nos region tin di haber tambe cu e noticia cu Merca lo kier retira su miembrecia for di e UPU cu ta data di aña 1874
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the reasons for this Caribbean tour by the UPU is the fact that the United States wants to withdraw its membership from the UPU that goes back to 1874

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: esaki por tin consecuencia serio pa e continuidad di e servicio postal regional ya cu por ehempel Miami ta un hub importante pa post pa nos region
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will have far-reaching implications for the shipping community,since Miami is one of the important hubs for the region

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a reuni cu Ombudsman di Corsou, Sr. Keursly Concincion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister met with Ombudsman of Curacao Mr. Sr. Keursly Concincion

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante su recientemente visita na Corsou, Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a reuni cu Ombudsman na Corsou Sr. Keursly Concincion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During her recent visit to Curacao, Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes met with the Ombudsman of Curacao Mr. Keursly Concincion

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e reunion tabata ta pa conoce miho e retonan cu e oficina di Ombudsman ta enfrenta na Corsou, pa Aruba asina ta miho prepara, mirando cu pronto Aruba tambe lo introduci e instituto Ombudsman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The aim of the meeting was for the Prime minister to get a better understanding of the challenges the Office of Ombudsman faces in Curacao, this is in order for Aruba to be better prepared, since the Ombudsman institution will be introduced in Aruba soon

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ya caba e procedura ta andando pa Ombudsman pronto bira un realidad na nos pais tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The procedures for an Ombudsman are already in progress and will soon become a reality in our country

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno a apunta señora Sahayra Kelly como ‘kwartiermaker’ di Ombudsman kende ya caba a cuminsa planifica e oficina aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government appointed Sahara Kelly as quartermaster “kwartiermaker” of the Ombudsman and she already started planning this office

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta e unico pais den Reino cu no tin un Ombudsman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba is the only country in the Kingdom  that does not have an Ombudsman

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un Ombudsman ta un defensor di pueblo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An Ombudsman is a defender of the people

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Caminda cu un ciudadano ta sinti cu un departamento di Gobierno no trat’e na un forma adecuado, e por acudi na un Ombudsman kende lo studia e caso y duna conseho na Gobierno con pa actua
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An Ombudsman investigates complaints of citizens about unfair treatment by the public sector and advises the government on how to proceed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e ciudadano ta sinti cu no a cumpli cu su derechonan, of ta trapa riba su derecho den e proceso di pidi permiso, tereno, restitucion di Impuesto, ta algun caso valido cu un ciudadano por acudi na un Ombudsman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Valid reasons people go to an Ombudsman are amongst others when they feel that their rights are not adhered to or are violated in the process of requesting a permit, plot of land or tax restitution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister ta un promotor tras di e ley aki pa bin cu e oficina di Ombudsman na nos isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister is an advocate of the law to introduce an Ombudsman office on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pronto e ley di Ombudsman ta bay Parlamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Soon the Ombudsman ordinance will go to Parliament

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ya caba tin fondonan den presupuesto pa e gastonan di e Oficina di Ombudsman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the current budget there are already funds allocated for the realization of the Ombudsman’s office

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues cu e ley pasa, lo habri solicitudnan di Ombudsman, Kinder-Ombudsman y demas funcionnan cu e oficina ta rekeri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the law is passed, vacancies will become available for the position of Ombudsman, Child-Ombudsman and other needed functions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo yena e posicionnan aki primeramente door di hendenan cu ya ta trahando den Gobierno caba mirando cu tin un ‘personeelstop’ na vigor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employees already in the government’s service will fill this position since there is currently a personnel stop in place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina di Ombudsman ta bay ta un instituto totalmente independiente di Gobierno pa garantisa miho servicio pa atende cu e derechonan di e ciudadanonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Office of the Ombudsman will be an institution very independent from the government in order to guarantee better service in accordance with the citizens’ rights

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Exposicion di muchanan special na biblioteca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Exposition of paintings by special needs children at the Library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siman di 24 pa 28 juni 2019, Centro di Educacion Special, Desaroyo y Stimulacion Special (CEDES) ta presenta su exposicion anual na biblioteca nacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the week of June 24 to 28, 2019, the Center for Special Education, Development and Stimulus (CEDES) presents its yearly exposition at the National Library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un exposicion di pintura habri henter siman pa tur esnan interesa pa wak e resultado di e lesnan creativo di alumnonan special
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The paintings exhibition is open the whole week to everyone interested to see the result of the creative lessons given to the special students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Participante di e exposicion di pintura y cuadra ‘Our beautiful planet’ ta un  grupo di muchanan cu Autismo y Down Syndrome entre 4 pa 19 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The participants of the exposition of drawings and paintings titled “Our beautiful planet” are children with Autism and Down Syndrome between 4 to 19 years”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: CEDES,  e mayornan y e grupo di mucha ta invita tur hende pa bishita e exposicion pa admira e obranan di arte
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: CETES, the parents and children invite everyone to the exposition to admire their works of art

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bishita di scol Dunun Man na Bestuurskantoor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Dunun Man special pays visit to Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes y Minister Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro a ricibi e muchanan contento y yen di entusiasmo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister of Aruba, Mrs. Evelyn Wever-Croes and Minister Ruiz-Maduro received the joyous and enthusiastic children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un preocupacion grandi di e mayornan ta cu e muchanan special cu ta cabando e temporada di scol na Scol Dunun Man no tin luga pa sigui siña despues
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of these concerns was the fact that once the special students finish the last year at Dunun Man, there is no further special education for them

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno  tin un comision cu ta inventarisando con miho por asisti nos muchanan special
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government installed a special commission to make an assessment on how to provide better care for the children with special needs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un stap importante ta pa inclui e muchanan aki na scolnan adecua y ekipa pa cuida muchanan special
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An important step is to include these children in proper and well equipped schools

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe mester bin un bon plan pa despues di scol e muchanan aki tin un luga bon pa keda mientras nan mayornan ta traha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After school care is also important where parents can leave their children during work hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora nan drenta e edad hoben, mester percura tambe pa despues cu nan caba scol, por inclui nan den un scol di ofishi of tambe den cierto caso pa nan drenta scolnan regular y di e manera aki, tambe por asegura un futuro trabou pa nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once they reach a certain age, they should be allowed in a vocational school or in some cases even regular education, this to provide a higher opportunity for participation in the labor market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa Gobierno inclusion ta un prioridad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Inclusion is a priority for this Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un paso hopi importante den e direccion pa brinda un miho calidad di bida na esnan mas vulnerable den nos comunidad”, Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes a enfatisa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This an important step in the right direction to offer a better quality of life for the more vulnerable within our community”, according to Prime Minister Wever-Croes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proteha bo mes y bo famia na momento di bay di biahe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Protect yourself and your family when traveling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dentro di poco nos ta drenta temporada di vakantie grandi y hopi hende lo bay di biahe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Shortly we will enter into the vacation season and many people will travel abroad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na momento di bay den exterior ta importante pa busca informacion riba e factornan di riesgo cu por afecta bo salud na e pais cu bo ta bay bishita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: When traveling it is important to seek information on the risk factors that can affect your health in the country

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cada pais tin su riesgonan cu ta varia entre malesanan transmiti pa sangura, malesanan gastrointestinal of malesanan respiratorio infeccioso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Every country has its risks that varies form mosquito transmitted, gastrointestinal or respiratory diseases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: P’esey ta importante pa ta informa trempan pa por tuma medidanan di prevencion necesario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Therefore, it is important to get the necessary information early to take the necessary precautionary measures

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E malesa ta conoci pa no ta uno contagioso, dus cu no ta pasa di hende pa hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The disease is not contagious, since it is not transmitted from one person to another

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Merca y Europa tambe ta raportando aumento den casonan di sarampi cu ta un malesa viral cu ta sumamente contagioso y peligroso pa mucha y hende muhe na estado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The United States and Europe also are reporting an increase in measles cases, a viral disease that is very contagious and dangerous for children and pregnant women

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa motibo cu e por ocasiona pulmonia, infeccion di celebro y daño na e baby cu ainda ta  desaroyando den bariga di su mama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The reason is that it can cause pneumonia, brain infections and damage to the fetus still developing in the womb

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bou di malesa viral tambe ta cay influenza cu por ta peligroso pa mucha, hende grandi riba 60 aña y hendenan cu ta sufri di un malesa cronico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Influenza is also a viral disease that can be dangerous to children, person 60 years or older and persons with chronic diseases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por preveni hopi di e malesanan aki manera measles, keintura geel, malaria, influenza y mas for di Aruba caba cu un vacuna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One can prevent many of these diseases like measles, yellow fever, malaria and influenza by getting a vaccine in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur e vacunanan aki ta disponibel na seccion di Malesanan Infeccioso di Departamento di Salud Publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All these vaccines are available at the Section of Contagious Diseases in Aruba of the Department of Public Health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester tene na cuenta si cu mester aplica e vacunanan por lo menos dos siman prome cu biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, one has to take into account that the vaccines must be applied at least two weeks before travelling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin vacuna cu ta consisti di mas cu un dosis p’esey ta recomenda pa busca informacion trempan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Some vaccines consist of one dosage, therefore it is recommended to get the necessary information early

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Medidanan di precaucion basico cu bo por aplica na cualkier pais cu nan bay  bishita, ta encera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Precautionary measures you can take when traveling abroad are

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Laba man frecuentemente cu awa y habon of un producto cu ta contene alcohol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Wash your hand frequently with soap and water of an alcohol containing product

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evita contacto cu hende cu sintomanan di griep y proteha otronan ora di tosa of nister door di haci esaki den e parti dilanti di e elleboog of tapa boca y nanishi cu un nepkins
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: avoid contact with persons with flu like symptoms and protect other by coughing or sneezing in the front part of your elbow of cover your mouth and nose with a napkin

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sea critico na unda bo ta come, no come asina mas riba caya y no come cuminda ni berdura curu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: be cautious where you eat, do not eat on the street and do not eat raw food or vegetables

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Semper bebe awa di boter
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: always drink bottled water

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evita mordi of rasca di cualkier animal domestico of salvahe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: avoid bites or scratches from any domestic or wild animal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proteha bo mes contra sangura na tur momento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: protect yourself against mosquitos at all times

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu seccion di Malesanan Infeccioso di Departamento di Salud Publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information, please contact the Section of Contagious Diseases of the Department of Public Health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome aña di Mo-B Tech Lab tawata un exito total
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: First year of Mo-B Tech Lab a great success

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister di Aruba, a duna un relato amplio di tur loke a haci cu e Mo-B Lab den e aña escolar 2018-2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister of Aruba shared in detail everything that was achieved with the Mo-B Lab during the 2018-2019 school year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E intencion di Mo-B tech Lab ta pa crea un metodo nobo pa siña muchanan cera conoci cu ciencia y tecnologia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The intention of the Mo-B Tech is to create a new method to get students interested in science and technology

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mo-B Lab tawata antes un bus di Bibliobus, a transform’e den un bus innovativo y educativo cu ta haci’e sumamente interesante cu ta hala atencion di nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mo-B Tech Lab is the former Bibliobus that was transformed into a science and technology lab on wheels, a very innovative and educational bus that intrigues the young students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: MO-B Tech Lab a bira realidad door di  Futura den colaboracion cu Metabolic Foundation, fondonan di OCTA (Union Europeo) cu a contribui cu 75%,  Biblioteca Nacional di Aruba como tambe cu e aporte di e Ministerio di Educacion, Ciencia y Sostenibilidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The creation of the MO-B Tech Lab is made a reality thanks to the collaboration of Futura with the Metabolic Foundation, OCTA Funds (European Union) who provided a substantial contribution of 75%, The National Library of Aruba as well as the contribution of the Ministry of Education, Science and Sustainability

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mo-B Tech Lab a bay na diferente centro di Traimerdia, un total di 6,000 persona incluyendo muchanan, profesornan, mayornan, y administradornan a participa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Mo-Tech Lab reached 6000 individuals including students, teachers, parents and administrators, and visited the after school care centers of Traimerdia

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na prome instante e proyecto piloto aki mester a tuma luga na Traimerdianan so
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This project was initially only intended for the Traimerdia centers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Studiantenan local tin e oportunidad awo pa crea un prototipo, desaroya, explora, siña y experimenta cu ciencia y tecnologia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Local students now have the opportunity to create prototypes, learn, develop and experiment with science and technology.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proposito tambe ta pa motiva nos futuro generacion di profesornan pa explora diferente manera di siña les
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It also serves as a motivation for future teachers to explore different methods of teaching

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mo-B lab lo participa den varios actividad y kamp pa mucha den e vakantie benidero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the upcoming vacation, the Mo-B Lab will visit a variety of vacation camps and activities around the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E obhetivo di e programa aki durante vakantie ta pa entre otro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objectives of the visits are among other things

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sigui traha riba e fundeshi pa e diversificacion di Aruba su economia door di pone muchanan bira mas interesa den ciencia, tecnologia, ingeniería y matematica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Continue to serve as the base for diversification of the Aruba economy by getting more students involved with science, technology, engineering and mathematics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prepara studiantenan pa e habilidadnan di e siglo 21 cu por influencia e sistema di educacion si tin interes di e studiante y profesornan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prepare students with 21st century abilities that can influence the education system with enough interest of teachers and students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como parti di e Mo-B Lab, tambe tin un trailer cu a transform’e den un ‘Mobile Makerspace’ completamente sostenibel cu ta situa na Biblioteca Nacional na Oranjestad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As extension to the Mo-B Lab they added a “Mobile Makerspace”, a fully sustainable workplace situated at the National Library in Oranjestad

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E trailer ta yena cu ekipo cu lo incentiva exploracion y trece ideanan na bida
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This workplace is fully loaded with equipment to help encourage exploration and bringing ideas to life

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pronto tambe lo tin un ‘Mobile Makerspace’ na San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Soon there will also be a Mobile Marketplace in San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Resultado y procedura Nationale Doorstroomtoets
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Results and procedures of the National Flow-through tests

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 6 y 7 di mei ultimo a tuma luga na tur scol basico di Aruba e ‘Nationale Doorstroomtoets’ pa tur mucha den klas 6
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On last May 6 and 7, 2019 the National Flow-through test has been given to all 6 grade schools in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alumunonan cu ta sali di scol basico y ta continua nan carera escolar na un scol avansa ta ricibi un asina yama ‘schooladvies’ cu ta indica si e carera escolar mester sigui na EPB, SPO, MAVO of HAVO/VWO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Students that are leaving primary school and continue their education at a higher school will receive the so called “School advice” as indication to either continue at the EPB, SPO, MAVO or HAVO/VWO

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta duna e conseho di scol aki a base di nan rapportnan y desaroyo durante nan carera escolar na scol basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This advice is based on the results and developments of each student during their years in primary school

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den pasado candidato nan pa HAVO/VWO so tawata haci e asina yama ’ toelatingstoets’ pa por drenta Colegio Arubano of Colegio San Nicolas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In previous years only Havo/VWO candidates would undergo an admission test to be able to enter Colegio Arubano or Colegio San Nicolas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 3 di juni ultimo tur scol basico na Aruba a ricibi e resultado di e Nationale Doorstroomtoets
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On June 3 all primary schools in Aruba received the results of the national Flow-through tests

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E promedio pa taal y rekenen pa tur scol hunto ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The average Language and Arithmetic score for all schools

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di tur scol afgerond
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Average of all schools

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 20% di e alumnonan a score nivel HAVO/VWO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 20% of students scored for level HAVO/VWO

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 40% di e alumnonan a score nivel MAVO
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 40% of students scored for level MAVO

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 40% di e alumnonan a score nivel EPB
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 40% of students scored for level EPB

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e conseho di scol ta conta banda di e score riba e toets
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The school advice is an addition besides the score of the test

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso cu tin diferencia, ta e nivel cu ta mas halto ta esun cu ta determina cua nivel e alumno por bay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In case of a difference, the highest level will be used to determine which education level the student needs to attend

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cuadro di mehoracion di e calidad di enseñansa na Aruba, lo analisa e resultado di e toets aki mas profundamente door di Departamento di Enseñansa y Dienst Inspectie van het Onderwijs
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In order to improve the quality of our education, the tests results will be analyzed by the Department of Education and the Department of Inspection of Education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cada directiva di scol y cada scol a haya e resultado pa asina nan tambe por analisa esaki pa mehora e calidad di enseñansa cu nan ta brinda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All the school boards and each school will also receive the results to analyze so they can improve the quality at their schools

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta un Nationale Doorstroomtoets?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is a National Flow-Through test?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E doorstroomtoets aki ta midi e habilidadnan di un alumno den area di ‘taal ’y ‘rekenen’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It measures the abilities of a student in the fields of Language and Arithmetic

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki tin como meta pa indica e nivel di enseñansa secundario cu ta pas mas miho cu e alumno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This with the objective to determine the best fitting secondary education for the student

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E toets aki ta nacional pasobra tur alumno den klas 6 di scol basico ta haci e mesun toets na mesun momento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is a National test, done by every student in 6th grade of primary school at the same time

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 22 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison June 22, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 22 di juni 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 18 y 19 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras June 22, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on June 18 and 19, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 22 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum Prices June 22, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 22 di juni 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per June 22, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO,  BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fiesta di San Huan dia 24 di juni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: St. John celebration on June 24

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 24 di juni lo tin otro celebracion di fiesta di San Huan/Dera Gay cu un gran cantidad di actividadnan rond Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On June 24, the festival of St. John/Dera Gay is celebrated with numerous folkloric activities around Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tradicionalmente e fiesta tabata tin di haber cu fiesta di cosecha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The cultural origin of this festival refers to the harvest festival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 23 di juni e cunukeronan ta cende tur sobra di cosecha na candela,di e forma aki nan kier prepara tera pa e temporada nobo di cosecha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On June 23, farmers will burn remnants of corn sticks to begin then with a new planting and harvesting period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 24 di juni ta dia di fiesta cu musica, baile, comemento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The 24th is celebrated with music, dance, food

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diferente organisacion cultural, social y deportivo, ta tene eventonan pa publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Various cultural, social and sports organizations organize events for the public

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante añanan a mantene e fiesta como expresion cultural, pero e cendemento di candela no tin relacion mas cu cosecha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Over the years, the festival is kept as cultural expression, but the lighting of fires has little to do with the harvest

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di su banda Bombero di Aruba ta completamente prepara pa combati candela, pero toch ta suplica tur hende pa evita cendemento di candela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Although the firefighters of Aruba are ready to fight the fire in several places on the island, they urge the public to avoid lighting fires

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cendemento di candela ta prohibi, peligroso y ta un molester pa otronan y e persona por haya un boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is forbidden, dangerous, creates nuisance and one runs the risk of getting fined

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adhunto por haya e calendario di actividad Dera Gay 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Attached you may find the calendar of activities for St. John celebration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reunion entre Prome Ministernan di Aruba, Corsou y Sint Maarten
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Ministers Summit in Curacao

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba e agenda tabata tin varios punto, entre otro migracion, crisis na Venezuela, cooperacion y sosten di Hulanda pa atende cu e crisis, simposio di Social Economisch Raad (SER), Visa pa Venezuela, proyecto di World Bank “Doing business report”, preparacion di asamblea general di Nacionnan Uni, proyectonan di Union Europeo, integridad, digitalisacion den gobierno y e-Government
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Topics on the agenda were the migration crisis, ongoing crisis in Venezuela, the support and cooperation provided by The Netherlands in addressing the crisis, the symposium of the Social Economic Council (SER), Visa for Venezuelans, World Bank project “Doing Business report”, preparations for the General Assembly of the United Nations, European Union projects, integrity, digitalization within the government and e-Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe a haya un presentacion di Sociaal Economische Raad cu a duna un relato di e simposio cu e SER nan di Aruba, Corsou y Sint Maarten a organisa na mei ultimo riba e tema di migracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Social Economic Council also presented a summary of their symposium held with the SER of Aruba, Curacao and St. Maarten, organized last May with the main topic; migration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan a presenta recomendacionnan hopi importante pa Aruba cu ta atendiendo cu un crisis migratorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They presented valuable recommendations on how we are handling the migratory crisis in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Premier Rhuggenaath a elabora extensamente riba tur locual a delibera durante e reunion y a gradici coleganan Premier Wever-Croes y Premier Romeo Marlin pa e cooperacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Rhuggenaath informed the press elaborately about the discussed topics and thanked both Prime Ministers of Aruba and St. Maarten for their cooperation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Premier Wever-Croes a gradici Premier Rhuggenaath pa a organisa e reunion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Wever-Croes thanked Prime Minister Rhuggenaath for hosting the meeting

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta solidario cu Corsou den e situacion dificil financiero cu nan ta aden
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba has a solidarity stance with Curacao for their difficult financial situation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Silver Entrepreneurship, Workshop for the retired or soon to be retired” tawata bon atendi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Workshop Silver Entrepreneurship well attended

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Dave Martinus, Certified Business Coach di ActionCOACH, a presenta ‘Kico ta encera entrepreneurship’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Dave Martinus, Certified Business Coach at ActionCOACH, presented ‘What is entrepreneurship?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Su enfoke tabata cu si bo kier ta un comerciante profitabel bo tin cu corda pa traha ‘ariba’ bo negoshi y no solamente ‘den’ bo negoshi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: His message is; if you want your business to be profitable, you must work on your business, not only in your business

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un formula cu Sr. Martinus a presenta tabata: DREAMS x GOALS x LEARN x PLAN x ACTIONS = RESULT
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One formula that Mr. Martinus presented was DREAMS x GOALS x LEARN x PLAN x ACTIONS = RESULT

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Dave a presenta hopi tópico  interesante y a demostra di ta un tremendo coach
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He covered many important topics and proved to be a tremendous coach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Siguientemente Srta. Mileidy Gonzales, Stagiare di Universidad di Aruba, a presenta accionnan cu un compania por tuma pa contribui na e metanan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Next to do her presentation was Mrs. Mileidy Gonzales, intern of the University of Aruba who described actions a company can take to contribute to these goals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E la termina e parti aki cu un ehercicio y dos grupo a haya e oportunidad pa presenta nan ‘Business Action’ na e grupo completo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: She finished her presentation with an exercise where two groups got the opportunity to present their business action to the whole group

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Notaris Johnson; a presenta e temanan: bedrijfsvormen (eenmanszaak/ NV/ VBA), bedrijfsopvolgingen (diferencia den companianan) ora cu bo lo kier cuminsa un negoshi ,testamenten/ nalatenschap (kico por laga atras y pa ken)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Notary Johnson discussed the different business entities (sole proprietor/Corp./LLC/), business succession (difference in businesses) when you want to start a business, testaments/inheritance (what can be left and to whom)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Louella Croes-Ras, Policy & Business Advisor di IDEA, a elabora riba tur nan servicio y training/ curso cu IDEA ta ofrece desde 2012
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Louella Croes-Ras, Policy and Business Advisor of IDEA elaborated on all their services and training/courses offered at IDEA since 2012

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A recomenda tur presenta pa like e Facebook page “Idea-Aruba”, pa asina keda informa di IDEA su actividadnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: She recommended all present to follow IDEA Facebook page to stay informed of all the courses offered by IDEA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E presentacion di training coach Sr. Benny Richardson tabata tremendo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The presentation of training coach, Mr. Benny Richardson was tremendous

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur esaki ta un bon motibo pa bay den Real Estate na e edad aki, door di e flexibilidad den horario di trabao, e ta yuda e persona keda fisicamente y mentalmente activo, ta un entrada extra y lo siñ’abo uza technologia moderno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Therefore, it is a good idea for them to go into the Real Estate business, because of the flexible hours, it also helps the pensioner to stay mentally and physically active, to earn extra income and to use technology

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Faustin tambe a elabora riba e 3 cualidadnan pa desaroya pa tin exito den Real Estate (1. Un actitud mental positivo, 2. Traha cu metanan scirbi, 3. Sea Auto-motiva
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to Mr. Faustin, there are three qualities to be successful in Real Estate, namely 1. A positive mindset, 2. Work with written goals and 3. Be self-motivated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SVB a enfoca cu tur empleado mester ta inscribi y tambe paga premie ya for di su prome dia di trabao
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SVb emphasized that all employees must register and pay premiums since their first day of work

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E premie di cada empleado ta calcula abase di ki tipo di trabao e persona ta eherce
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The premium is based on the type of work the employee carries out

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E conseho di SVB ta pa no tuma riesgo, inscribi bo mes como negoshi, paga bo premie y evita boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The advice of SVb is not to take risks and to register your business to avoid paying fines

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Tamarah Arends-Croes, Business Electronic Sales Specialist na RBC Royal Bank, a elabora riba varios servicio cu RBC Royal Bank sa ofrece manera: procedura pa habri un account, productonan mane Business Account, Online Banking, Debit Card, Night Deposit, servicionan manera ‘card acceptance, fast payment 1-3 seconds, portable devices and E-Commerce’, innovacion manera ‘wired and wireless point-of-sale (POS)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Tamarah Arends-Croes, Business Electronic Sales Specialist at RBC Bank, talked about the procedures to open an business account and the many innovative products and services provided by the RBC Bank, namely Business Account, Online Banking, Debit Card, Night Deposit, card acceptance, fast payment 1-3 seconds, portable devices and E-Commerce and wired and wireless point-of-sale (POS)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Ulrich Hermans y Francois Croes, Innovation Advisors di Futura, a presenta dos topico: ‘Future of Work’ y ‘Design Thinking’ special pa pensionadonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Innovation Advisors Ulrich Mr. Hermans y Francois Croes, of Futura, discussed two topics:  ‘Future of Work’ and ‘Design Thinking’ especially for retirees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa medio di un ehercicio a laga e futuro negociantenan analisa problemanan cu lo por haya den nan trayectoria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Via an exercise, they let the participants analyze problems they may encounter in their endeavors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Ludwig Rasmijn y Sr. Randy Maduro di Santa Rosa, a elabora tocante posibilidadnan pa bira un Agripreneur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Ludwig Rasmijn and Mr. Randy Maduro of Santa Rosa talked about the possibility of becoming an Agripreneur

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Temanan cu a bin dilanti durante nan presentacion tabata tocante aquaponics, productonan local, hofi chikto, matanan chikito, con pa baha gastonan, con bo por haci di bo hobby un negoshi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Topics presented were aquaponics, local produce, small gardens small plants, cost control and how to convert hobby into a business

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Cindy Clark, Managing Director di Accura Tax Consultancy, a elabora riba impuestonan relevante pa un entrepreneur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Cindy Clark, Managing Director at Accura Tax Consultancy, talked about the relevant taxes for entrepreneurs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Srta. Merienys Frances di SETAR N.V., a elabora riba e importancia di ‘Digital Marketing’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Merienys Frances of SETAR N.V. covered the topic of the importance of ‘Digital Marketing’

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A duna tips efectivo con pa promove bo negoshi via social media manera Facebook, Instagram y Google Search tambe  riba Direct Email
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: She gave effective tips about online promotion of your business on social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram and Google search but also Direct mail

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tabata tin tambe intercambio di experiencia di
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The panel that shared their experiences consisted of

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Lionel Rumnit, kende ta specialisa como Job Coach na ‘Trampolin pa Trabao’, a conta, con e ta train e personanan cu desabilidad pa den futuro por dentra den mercado laboral den nos sociedad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Lionel Rumnit, specialized as Job Coach at ‘Trampolin pa Trabao’, talked about the training he has given to those with disabilities in order to prepare them for the labor market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Rosa Alberto, propietario di Ginger Aruba Rosken, kende a cuminsa su negoshi ora e la drenta su edad di pensioen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Rosa Alberto, owner of Ginger Aruba Rosken, who started her business after she retired

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Loui Richardson propietario di Invest Secure; a conta con pa continua cu bo negoshi ora bo drenta cu edad di pension
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Loui Richardson owner of Invest Secure talked about how to continue with your business once you retire

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Merrill Robles (un pensionado), a conta con e a yuda comunidad pa medio di su negoshi y pafor di su negoshi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Merrill Robles (retired), on how he helps the community with the help of a company or outside a company

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 34 persona a participa den e tayer aki y a ricibi e ultimo dia di e tayer un ‘certificado di participacion’, cu  minister Sra. Mr. Xiomara Ruiz- Maduro a entrega
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 34 persons participated in the workshop and received a certificate of attendance from the Minister Mrs. mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro during the last day of the workshop

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IDEA ta sumamente contento cu e contenido y acogida di e tayer y tambe di e bon comentarionan ricibi di su participantenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA is very happy with the content and response of the workshop and with the feedback from the participants

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un tayer sigur hopi interactivo y un tremendo presentacion di parti di tur e oradornan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The workshop was very interactive and the speakers did a tremendous job

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe IDEA  kier remarka cu nan tayernan ta gratis y ta dedica na un y tur cu kier cuminsa un negoshi  y kier educa nan mes riba diferente topico comercial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DEA also wants to point out that these workshops are free of charge and are dedicated to everyone who wants to start a new business and to educate themselves on various business topics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IDEA kier a duna un danki special na tur participante y na tur presentador cu a comparti nan experticio cu tur esnan presente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA wants to give special thanks to all participants and speakers that shared their knowledge with all present

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Encuesta Nos Plan, Nos Futuro juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Survey Nos Plan, Nos Futuro, June 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico, Comercio y Industria (DAECI) a cuminsa desaroya un Plan Strategico Nacional (PSN) pa e periodo 2019-2022, yama Nos Plan, Nos Futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce and Industry of Aruba (DEACI) began the process to develop a National Strategic Plan (NSP) for the period 2019-2022, named Our Plan, Our Future

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pesey DAECI a desaroya un encuesta pa investiga kico e ciudadano Arubano ta considera como programa/areanan di prioridad pa por crea un Aruba sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Therefore, the DEACI designed a survey to investigate what the Aruban citizen considers priority programs/areas to create a more sustainable Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un paso crucial pa por sincronisa retonan local cu oportunidadnan nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is a crucial step in order to align local challenges with emerging opportunities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki DAECI ta invita bo pa participa na e encuesta aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For this reason, DEACI invites you to participate in this survey

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Encurasha bo amigonan y familia pa tambe participa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: encourage your friends and family to participate as well

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E encuesta aki ta consisti di 7 pregunta y ta dura mas o menos 3 minuut pa completa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This survey consists of 7 questions and takes approximately 3 minutes to complete

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur participante ta keda anomimo y confidencial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All participants will remain anonymous and confidential

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Colegio EPI ta gradici e compania y instancianan cu ta coopera cu pasantia di nan studiantenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Colegio EPI thanks companies and organizations for their cooperation with internships for their students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente a tuma lugar e ‘Industry Appreciation Event’ di Colegio EPI
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the Industry Appreciation Event took place at the Colegio EPI

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E evento aki ta di gran importancia pa Colegio EPI, na unda BPV stage bureau di Colegio EPI ta duna elogio y muestra di gratitud na diferente compania y instancia cu ta coopera cu pasantia di e studiantenan di Colegio EPI
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This event is of great importance to the EPI where the BPV Internship Office of the Colegio EPI compliments and expresses their gratitude to different companies and organization that cooperates with internships of students from Colegio EPI

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E intencion tras di e evento anual aki ta pa brinda e companianan un rato placentero como muestra di gratitud pa e gran cooperacion cu e studiantenan y docentenan ta ricibi durante henter e aña escolar
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The motive behind this event is to offer the companies a pleasant time as token of the school’s gratitude and appreciation for the great cooperation the students and teachers receive during the entire school year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta probecha di e evento aki p’asina intercambia ideanan nobo y ricibi feedback di e companianan pa mantene of te hasta hisa e calidad di pasantia di Colegio EPI
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides this event also serves as a great opportunity to exchange new ideas and to receive feedback from these companies to maintain or even elevate the quality of the internship program at the Colegio EPI

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester remarca cu mayoria di e instancianan cu tabata presente ta trahando cu por lo menos un of dos unidad di Colegio EPI
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is noteworthy that all present are working with at least one or two units of Colegio EPI

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E companianan presente tabata
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The companies present at this event were

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Importante pa menciona ta cu comunicacion y compromiso ta keda esencial den e relacion y colaboracion entre Colegio EPI y e companianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to remark that communication and compromise is essential in the relationship and collaboration between Colegio EPI and the companies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: BPV (stage) bureau di Colegio EPI ta gradici tur compania cu tabata presente durante e evento aki y tambe tur compania cu semper ta copera cu Colegio EPI y su studiantenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: BPV (Internship) Office of Colegio EPI thanks all companies present at this event and all companies that always cooperate with Colegio EPI and its students

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cangreu Blauw ta bay crusa na Pos Chikito, nos mester protehanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Blue Land Crabs are crossing the road in Pos Chikito and need to be protected

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Directie Natuur en Milieu (DNM) conhuntamente cu otro instancianan ta preparando pa e crusamento di e cangreu blauw na Pos Chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Directorate for Nature and Environment (DNM) is working in collaboration with other departments to assist the crossing Blue Land Crabs in Pos Chikito

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E borchinan ta color geel cu letter  preto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These signs are yellow with black text

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo kita e borchinan den temporada cu e cangreunan no ta activo ta crusa pa bay lama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The signs will be removed as soon as the breeding season and road crossing is over

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cangreu blauw ta pertenece na e clase di Crustaceonan den e orden di Decapoda y e genero Cardisoma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The blue land crab is a categorized as a crustacean in the Decapoda order, as Cardisoma

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E nomber scientifico ta Cardisoma Guanhumi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Its scientific name is Cardisoma Guanhumi

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta un cangreu di tera di mayoria biaha color blauw
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is a land crab and has a blueish tone

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan colornan por diferencia un poco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The colors can differ a bit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora nan ta jong, nan ta color maron, den fase di transicion nan ta bira color biña of oranje, y esunnan hembra den temporada di pone webo ta bira geel of te hasta blanco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: While still young, their color is still brownish, and changes to purple or orange in their transition time while the female can turn yellow or white during the breeding season

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por mira nan den e areanan unda tin hopi mata di mangel y cu e suelo ta humedo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Blue land crab is often seen near areas with plenty of mangroves and humid soils

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cangreunan por mustra di tin menos actividad den temporada di secura y nan holnan ta mas tapa y asina cu tin mas yobida nan ta bira mas activo y ta sali
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These crabs are less active during the dry season, and have their holes covered and re appear as soon as the rainy season starts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan ta coba buraconan te unda nan ta haya suficiente humedad pa nan desaroyo normal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They dig their holes until they reach plenty of humidity for their normal development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cangreunan ta come mata cu a decomoposita den lodo of cu a bira moli, insectonan lastrero, scorpion di mondi, resto di parha y otro bestia morto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They eat decomposed and softer plants they find in mud, crawling insects, scorpions, bird remains and any other dead animal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E temporada di pone webo ta di juni pa juli tur aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The breeding season runs from June until July every year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora luna ta yen, cangreunan blauw ta bay lama pa laba nan cabutiti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The blue land crabs make their way to the ocean during full moon to wash their eggs off

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cangreu tin un balor ecologico halto pa e matanan di mangel cu tin na nos costanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These crabs have a high ecological value for the mangroves on the coastline

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E conservacion di e cangreunan blauw ta crucial pa e preservacion di e mondi cera di matanan di mangel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the conservation of these crabs is crucial for the preservation of the surrounding bushes near the mangroves
