Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Claramente e cangreunan blauw ta na peliger na diferente momento di nan desaroyo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The blue land crab undergoes various dangerous phases in their lives as they grow

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un di e menasanan mas grandi ta hende y den e caso aki trafico tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Humans and road traffic cause one of these hazards

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester menciona cu door di desaroyo y trahamento di caminda sin tene cuenta cu crusamento di cangreunan, por limita nan di yega lama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Over development and road constructions without taking into account  that the crabs needs to cross, limits the  crabs to reach the  ocean

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E pikimento di palonan driftwood na lama tambe ta stroba crecemento di e cantidad di cangreu, na unda mayoria ta sconde den nan fase jubenil
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The thoughtless picking off driftwood near the beaches also puts the lives of the juvenile crabs at risk, as these are hideouts for the young crabs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta causa Polucion di aire? Juni 5 tawata Dia Internacional di Medio Ambiente y e tema tawata : ‘Polucion di aire y e accion cu ta bay tuma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What causes air pollution? June 5 is the International Environment Day, This year’s topic: Air Pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Polucion di aire por ta un problema dificil pa compronde y compleho pa splica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Air Pollution is a complex issue to understand and to explain

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero nos tur por yuda reduci parti di e problema di polucion di aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We can however help with the reduction of the pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM como organisacion cu ta formula maneho pa diferente tema cu ta trata naturalesa y medio ambiente ta esun yama pa trece mas conscientisacion relaciona cu e tema di polucion di aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM as the entity in charge with the management of policies for the protection of our nature and environment is responsible for the creation of awareness in the community in order to help stop air pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: tin 5 tipo di polucion di aire cu ta existi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are 5 types of Air Pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Causa di polucion di aire ta: agricultura, den cas, industria, transportacion y sushedad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The culprit of air pollution agriculture, residential, industrial, transport and waste

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Polucion di aire den casnan ta uzo di fuel en general, candela pa cushina (BBQ), verwarmer (no aplicabel pa Aruba), y luz di coriente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: General fuel usage, BBQ fire, heaters (not relevant to Aruba) and the use of electricity cause residential air pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta genera polucion di aire door di compania cu ta uza carbon, uzo di diesel generator pa suministra coriente na un negoshi/compania
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Electrical plants are big contributors to air pollution since they use carbon and diesel generators to produce electricity for residents and businesses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin un crecemento den uzo di energia alternativo y of uzo di energia renobabel cu ta yuda controla y baha polucion di aire, na mes momento brinda e opcion pa produccion di energia limpi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is a growing trend with the use of alternative energy and renewable energy that helps with the reduction of air pollution while providing clean energy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Transportacion tambe ta causa hopi polucion den aire door di emision di carbon dioxide
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Transport is also a culprit for air pollution, with the emission of high levels of carbon dioxide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin un conexion estrecho entre carbon dioxide y morto prematuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Studies revealed a connection between carbon dioxide and premature death

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Emision di diesel por conduci na dementia pa esnan cu ta biba cerca di caminda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Diesel emissions on the roads have been proved to cause dementia for those living near highways

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Agricultura tambe ta contribui na polucion di aire, esaki ta inclui cria di bestia na gran escala cu ta produci methaan y ammonia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Agriculture is also known to cause air pollution with commercial livestock farms producing high levels of methane and ammonia

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe kimamento di sushi di agricultura ta contribui na polucion di aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Incineration of agricultural by-products also help polluting the air

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pues un evento local manera kimamento di sushi riba dia di San Juan tambe ta causa polucion di aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Local celebrations like San Juan Day also contributes to air pollution when people incinerate all kinds of stuff

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin emision di methaan cu ta conduci na formacion di un capa di ozono na nivel di suelo, cu ta causa asma of otro malesa respiratorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Methane emissions contribute to the formation of ground-level ozone, which causes asthma and other respiratory illnesses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Methaan tambe ta un gas cu ta contribui na ‘global warming’ pero na un forma mas potente cu carbon dioxide
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Methane is also a more potent global warming gas than carbon dioxide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hecho ta cu 24% di e gasnan tipo ‘greenhouse’ emiti mundialmente ta bini di agricultura y otro uzo di suelo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Around 24 % of all greenhouse gases emitted worldwide come agriculture, forestry and other land-use

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kimamento di sushedad/desperdicio di dump (landfill) tambe ta laga hopi particula dañino manera methane, dioxins, furans y black carbon den aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Open waste burning and organic waste in landfills release harmful dioxins, furans, methane, and  black carbon into the atmosphere

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: na nivel global, ainda ta kima 40% di sushedad den aire liber manera riba un dump
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Globally, an estimated 40 percent of waste is openly burned

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Separa desperdicio organico y converti esaki den compost of energia biologico (bio-energy), di e manera ey ta hisa e calidad di suelo pa uno mihor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Separating organic waste and turning, it into compost or bioenergy improves soil fertility and provides an alternative energy source

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reduci e cantidad di cuminda cu ta bay benta afo of cu ta bay perdi tambe ta yuda combati polucion di aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reducing the amount of food consumed and wasted will also help reduce air pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No ta tur polucion di aire ta bini door di actividad humano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Not all air pollution comes from human activity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aki na Aruba, tambe por papia di polucion di aire a consecuencia di e stof cu e UTV-nan ta lanta den e areanan unda nan ta core sin control
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In Aruba we also encounter air pollution caused by the dust created by the UTV’s being driven recklessly all over the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E particulanan di stof  no ta solamente causa molester pero tambe ta daña vegetacion, ta trece problema pa salud, bienestar di bestia y hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The dust does not only cause irritation, but also harms vegetation, causes health issues and affects the wellbeing of animals and humans

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM kier pidi un y tu pa tuma paso firme pa contribui na caba y reduci polucion di aire
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM encourages all to take the necessary steps into helping reduce air pollution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki inclui planta mata, haci un area limpi, core hunto uzando menos auto individualmente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This includes planting more plants, cleanups and carpooling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM a bin cu un reto y a tag otro departamento pa tuma e challenge y tuma accion tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM started a challenge and invited other departments to accept the challenge and to take action

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conseho di Minister a aproba e institucion Begrotingskamer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Council of Ministers approved the fiscal council

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente, Conseho di Minister a aproba e institucion Begrotingskamer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recently the council of Minister approved the establishment of fiscal council

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Begrotingskamer lo ta e organo Arubiano cu lo ta encarga cu e supervision financiero di Aruba unabes CAFT bay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Fiscal council will be an Aruban institution in charge with the financial supervision of Aruba once CAFT terminates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo apunta miembronan den e Begrotingskamer solamente pa Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Members of the new fiscal council will be appointed only by Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hulanda lo no por apunta niun miembro nobo den e Begrotingskamer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Netherlands will have no influence with the selection of the new members

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu esaki Aruba lo haya su autonomia financiero bek
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will give Aruba its financial autonomy back

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 15 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison June 15, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 15 juni 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 11 y 12 di juni 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E 23.8 miyon euro cu Hulanda a pone disponibel ta bay pa fortifica Aruba pa atende cu e crisis di Venezuela lo miho posibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 23.8 million Euros available to help Aruba manage the impact of the Venezuelan crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hulanda recientemente a informa cu lo pone 23.8 miyon Euro disponibel e aña aki pa atende cu e impacto di e crisis di Venezuela riba nos pais
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Netherlands recently made a sum of 23.8 million Euros available for the assistance and management to ease the impact of the Venezuelan crisis on Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E lista ta inclui entre otro mas radar, mas proteccion y vigilancia di nos costanan, mas boto pa controla nos costanan miho, mas asistencia na e procesonan di peticionnan di asilo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The list includes more radars, more protection and coast surveillance, more boats to help with coastal surveillance and more assistance with the asylum seeking process

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entre otro, nos mester mas boto pa Kustwacht, mas hende pa traha y cubri mas ora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We need more boats for the Coastguard, more agents to cover more hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta pensando tambe riba e efecto cu e impacto tin riba enseñansa, salubridad (vacuna), husticia (extende capacidad di detencion)”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is also considering the impact the migration has on our education system, healthcare (vaccines), justice (extend detention capacity)”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e placa aki lo no ta disponibel pa crea vivienda y otro cosnan similar pa e personanan cu ta bin haci peticion di asilo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The available funds cannot be used towards creating housing or any other similar projects for the migrants

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E placa aki ta bay pa fortifica Aruba como pais den haci Aruba mas sigur p’asina atende cu e crisis miho posibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The available funds are specifically destined for the fortification of Aruba as island, to make Aruba safer to be able to cope with the crisis in the best possible way

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno ta den deliberacion cu Hulanda pa caba di yena e lista cu diferente rekisito pidi door di Hulanda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government is in constant deliberation with the Netherlands to complete the list with the requirements set by the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta tumando hopi tempo pero e departamento encarga cu esaki ta haciendo tur esfuerso, trahando hasta den fin di siman p’asina entrega e prome lista na Hulanda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This can take some time but the department in charge is doing its utmost best, working even during weekends to try to complete the list and have this send to the Netherlands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pronto un delegacion di Organisacion di Estadonan Americano "OEA" lo ta di bishita na Aruba pa un presentacion di e impacto di e crisis di Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Soon a delegation of the Organization for American States “OAS” will be in Aruba for a presentation on the impact of the Venezuelan crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: OEA lo tin un sesion plenaria fin di luna na Colombia caminda cu nan lo presenta e impacto di e crisis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The OAS will have a plenary session in Colombia where the impact of the crisis will be presented

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E situacion di Venezuela ta keda uno dificil
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The situation in Venezuela remains difficult

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E impacto riba nos pais ta grandi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The impact on our island is immense

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Celebracion Dia di Independencia di Filipina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Celebration Independence Day Philippines

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 12 di juni e comunidad Filipino na Aruba a celebra nan di 121 Dia di Independencia di Filipina of manera conoci pa e Filipinonan como ‘Araw ng Kasarinlan’ of ‘Araw ng Kalayaan’ loke nifica literalmente ‘Dia di Libertad’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On June 12, the Filipino community in Aruba celebrated its 121st Independence Day or popularly known by Filipinos as "Araw ng Kasarinlan" or "Araw ng Kalayaan" which literally translated means "Day of Freedom"

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Consul-Generaal na Den Haag Lolita Capo di Filipina y Consul General Honorario di Filipina na Aruba Ami Henriquez-Mendez a ricibi y yama bonbini na Gobernador di Aruba Alfonso Boekhoudt, Prome Minister di Aruba Evelyn Wever-Croes y Presidente di Parlamento Ady Thijsen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Governor of Aruba Alfonso Boekhoudt, the Minister President of Aruba Evelyn Wever-Croes and President of the Parliament Ady Thijsen were welcomed by the Consul General of the Philippines  in The Hague Lolita Capo and Honorary Consul the Philippines in Aruba Ami Henriquez-Mendez

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministernan di Gabinete Wever-Croes, Consulnan di diferente pais y demas invitadonan tambe tabata presente na e acto protocolario y manifestacion cultural Filipina cu a tuma luga na Wilhelminapark
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Members of the Wever-Croes Cabinet, Consuls from different countries and other invitees were also present in the Wilhelminapark, where the protocol ceremony and Filipino cultural manifestation took place

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pakico ta celebra dianan internacional?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Why do we mark International days?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Naturalesa y Medio Ambiente ta splica pakico ta celebra dianan internacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Directorate of Nature and Environment is explaining the reason to celebrate international days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mayoria dianan cu ta celebra como dia internacional ta pa yuda conscientisa y educa pueblo en general riba topiconan di preocupacion of temanan cu mester di atencion mundial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Most international or global days are celebrated to create awareness and educate the community about topics of concern that needs global attention

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM tambe ta un organisacion cu ta promove dianan di celebracion global
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM is also an organization that promotes the globally celebrated days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM como miembro di United Nations Environmental Program (UNEP) a scoge e dianan di celebracion, cu Nacionan Uni a propone como momento di enfoke mundial, pa conhuntamente cu UNEP enfoca riba e temanan cu ta relevante na e dia di celebracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DNM as a member of the United Nations Environmental Program (UNEP) has chosen the days proposed by the United Nations as global focus days in order to concentrate together with the UNEP on the topics relevant to the celebrated days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas di conscientisa pueblo riba e topiconan di naturalesa y medio ambiente, DNM como miembro di UNEP ta sigui consehonan di UN di con pa trata cu un problema serio rond di e dianan di celebracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides raising awareness on the issues regarding nature and environment, the DNM as UNEP member also follows the advices given by the UN, on how to attend with serious issues highlighted with an International day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki  e tema rond di Dia Internacional di Biodiversidad ta, “Biodiversidad, nos cuminda y nos salud
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year’s theme for the International Day for Biological Diversity is “Biodiversity, Our Food, and Our Health”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta enfoka riba  conocemento y conscientisacion di con hopi nos bida ta depende di biodiversidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The focus is on the knowledge and awareness of our dependency on biodiversity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin biaha temanan observa por ta asina importante cu nan por bira e tema di siman, di aña of di e decada
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In some occasions, some themes are so important that they become the theme of the week, the year and even decade

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E websitenan aki tin informacion valioso di sondeonan, tambe tin materialnan di diseño cla caba pa comparti riba paginanan di medianan social
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These sites include researched information as well as user ready images available for share on social media platforms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Experto nan di diferente ramo ta bin hunto pa trece mas atencion riba e tema
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Experts from all fields come together to create awareness on the themes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: United Nations ta e instancia cu ta atende cu dificultadnan global cu mester di colaboracion di un y tur pa yega na solucion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: United Nations is the authority that deals with most global issues that need collaboration from all to reach solutions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: P’esey tambe UN a propone e 17 Sustainable Development Goals cu ta un patronchi pa realisa un futuro mihor y mas sostenibel pa tur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: That is why the UN has proposed the 17 Sustainable Development Goals, which is the template for the realization of a better and more sustainable future

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E metanan ta interconecta p’asina niun hende keda atrasa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The goals are connected so no one is left behind

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM tambe ta propaganda y vocifera e importancia di e 17 SDG’s y ta trahando tambe conhuntamente cu otro departamentonan pa yega na e propositonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM also promotes and voices the importance of the 17 SDG’s and is working in collaboration with other departments to reach their purpose

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Preparacion pa Censo 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Getting ready for Census 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina di Estadistica (CBS) kier informa pueblo tocante preparacionnan pa e Conteo General di Poblacion y Vivienda cu ta planea pa tuma luga di 1 pa 10 october 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS) recently announced that preparations are ongoing for the national population and residential count programmed to take place from October 1, 2020 until October 10, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante Censo 2020, un team di aproximadamente 1200 tellers cu lo ta encarga cu e tarea di colecta informacion riba topiconan manera vivienda, salud, educacion y labor, lo bishita tur hogar na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Census will consist of about 1200 surveyors with the task to collect data about housing, health, education and labor and will visit all households in Aruba

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Public entities, private institutions, schools and any individual can make good use of the collected data to establish policy, planning, as well as to stay updated on the developments within the community of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta hopi importante pa esnan cu fungi como teller ta personanan confiabel y capacita
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is very important for those wanting to participate as surveyors to be trustful and capable individuals

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister Lampe ta presenta proyecto vision economia circular 2050 (VEC)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minister Lampe presented the Circular Economy Vision 2050 (VEC)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e di 49 Conferencia International di ACURIL, Minister di Enseñansa , Ciencia y Desaroyo Sostenibel, Minister Rudy Lampe a presenta pa di prome biaha e proyecto Vision Economia Circular 2050
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the 49th International Conference of Acuril, the Minister of Education, Science and Sustainable Development, Minister dr. Rudy Lampe presented a Circular Economy Vision 2050 for the first time

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur proceso tin su debido tempo pa por  introduci y implementa nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Most projects have their own challenges with their introduction before their implementation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister a admiti cu e ta sembrando e simia, pero e no lo wak e mata, principalmente den sector di Educacion esaki ta mas cu logico mirando cu cambio drastico no sa pasa diripente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister admitted that he has planted the first seeds, despite knowing that he will not see the plant grow, especially within the education sector, since drastic changes do not happen quickly enough

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desaroyo no semper ta bay man den man cu crecemento economico tampoco, pasobra nos ta destrui e unico planeta cu nos tin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Development does not always go hand in hand with economic growth either, since it will cause the destruction of the only planet we have

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero desaroyo sostenibel a base di un Economia Circular ta basa riba uzo y re-uzo di nos recursonan ambiental pero riba un manera cu no ta causa daño riba nos planeta y nos existencia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, sustainable development built on the circular economy is based on the use and re-use of the environmental resources that do not harm the planet nor our existence

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Economia Circular ta gosa di hopi sosten internationalmente y ta mir’e como e proximo revolucion industrial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is international support for Circular Economy and is viewed as the next industrial revolution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta un sistema economico completamente diferente di esun actual, cu ta uno di "tuma, traha y tira afo"
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is a complete different economic system compared to the current one of “take it, build it and dispose it"

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E mision ta pa e ser humano por biba riba mundo sin tin impacto desastroso riba medio ambiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objective is for humans to be able to live on earth without having a negative impact on the environment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Basa riba estudio di e escolar Arubano Kevin de Cuba, cu ta un di e lidernan internacional riba e tema di economia circular, e vision ta pa enfoca riba un economia circular sostenibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Based on the school research by Aruba native Kevin de Cuba, an international leader in the field of Circular Economy, the vision is to focus on a sustainable circular economy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: nos por uza y re-uza materialnan cu no ta sostenibel tambe, y esey no ta berdaderamente sostenibel pasobra asina nos ta gasta nos recursonan y medio ambiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We can use and re-use non-sustainable materials; this however is not sustainable since it will drain the resources and environment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: mester scoge pa materialnan mas sostenibel den tur nos procesonan di produccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: more sustainable materials should be used in all phases of production

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Economia Circular ta basa riba e continuacion di e ser humano y su abilidad pa biba den harmonia cu naturalesa y salvaguardia medio ambiente pa futuro generacionnan”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Circular Economy is based on the continuance of the human being and its abilities to live in harmony with nature while safeguarding the environment for future generations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrega Condecoracion real na cuatro condecorado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Presentation of Royal Honors to four people

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba diahuebs mainta 6 di juni Gobernador di Aruba, Su Excelencia Alfonso Boekhoudt a entrega condecoracion real na Señora D.L. Antonette (Ridder in de Orde van Oranje-Nassau), Señor G.M. Peterson (Ridder in de Orde van Oranje-Nassau), Señor R.I. Kan (Lid in de Orde van Oranje-Nassau) y Señor L.F. Schmidt (Lid in de Orde van Oranje-Nassau)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Thursday morning June 6, the Governor of Aruba, His Excellency Alfonso Boekhoudt, awarded a Royal honor to Mrs. D.L. Antonette (Knight in the Order of Orange-Nassau), Mr. G.M. Peterson (Knight in the Order of Orange-Nassau), Mr. R.I. Kan (Member in the Order of Oranje-Nassau) and Mr. L.F. Schmidt (Member in the Order of Oranje-Nassau)

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Because the aforementioned decorated people could not be present, they have now received their Royal decoration from the hands of the Governor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The unit of the Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce and Industry, IDEA (Desaroyo pa Empresa Arubano), is organizing an interesting workshop for all who have the desire to continue to use their knowledge and life experience in their own business

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tema di e workshop ta:“For the retired or soon to be retired” y lo present’e na Papiamento

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SETAR, lo elabora tocante e importancia di ‘Digital Marketing
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SETAR, will elaborate on the importance of ‘Digital Marketing’

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo duna tips efectivo con pa promove bo negoshi via social media manera Facebook, Instagram, Google Search pero tambe Direct Email
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Effective tips will be given about online promotion of your business on social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram and Google search but also Direct mail

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tin intercambio di experiencia di
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Experience will be shared by a panel consisting of

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Lionel Rumnit, kende ta specialisa como Job Coach na ‘Trampolin pa Trabao’, y lo conta, con e ta train e personanan cu disabilidad pa den futuro por dentra den mercado laboral den nos sociedad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Lionel Rumnit, specialized as Job Coach at ‘Trampolin pa Trabao’, and will talk about the training he has given to those with disabilities in order to prepare them for the labor market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Rosa Alberto, propietario di Ginger Aruba Rosken, kende a cuminsa su negoshi ora e la drenta su edad di pensioen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Rosa Alberto, owner of Ginger Aruba Rosken, who started her business after she retired

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Loui Richardson propietario di Invest Secure; con pa continua cu bo negoshi ora bo yega bo edad di pension
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Loui Richardson owner of Invest Secure; how to continue with your business once you retire

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sr. Merrill Robles (un pensionado), con e ta yuda comunidad pa medio di un negoshi y pafor di un negoshi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Merrill Robles (retired), how he helps the community with the help of a company or outside a company

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tayernan aki lo ta completamente gratis y tuma lugar dianan 10 pa 14 juni venidero, entre 8:15 a.m. pa 12:30 p.m na Sun Plaza, di dos piso, sala # 25
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These workshops are completely free and will be given from the 10th of June 2019 until June 14th 2019 from 8:15 a.m. till 12:30 pm at the second floor of the Sun Plaza Mall suite #25

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL su meta ta pa trece buscado y dunado di trabou mas cerca di otro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL’s main task is to bring employers and employees closer together

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Progreso Laboral (DPL) ta continua cu su servicionan riba tereno laboral p’asina yega na mas y miho oportunidadnan laboral pa nos hendenan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Labor Progress (DPL) is continuously providing assistance on the labor sector helping with more and better job opportunities for our locals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde cu DPL a habri su portanan na augustus 2011 a cuminsa traha fuertemente riba e proceduranan relaciona cu esnan cu ta busca un trabou y esnan cu ta ofrece trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since the start of DPL in August of 2011, they worked hard to set the procedures in place for those seeking employment or employers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un di e metanan principal cu ta keda vigente pa DPL ta di por trece e buscado di trabou mas cerca di e dunado di trabou, trahando na un forma eficiente na bienestar di nos mercado laboral y nos hendenan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the main goals of the DPL is to bring job seekers closer to job creators, by working proactive and efficient for the benefit of the labor market and locals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den transcurso di tempo DPL a gana mas experiencia y tambe a adapta e proceduranan aki na bienestar di cliente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Over the past years, the DPL has gained more experience and has adapted the procedures benefitting the clients

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A introduci un procedura mas estricto pa loke ta trata entrevistanan laboral caminda cu dunadonan di trabou no por simplemente laga un buscado di trabou pasa yena un formulario di aplicacion cu e promesa di lo yama pa un entrevista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It introduced stricter procedures that changed the application procedures where job seekers are no longer only submitting a written application while waiting for the call back from the employer for a possible interview

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa evita esaki, a introduci un formulario tripel caminda cu ambos partido mester yena y firma despues di e prome entrevista laboral
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To avoid such procedures, a triple form has been introduced and needs to be completed by both parties and signed after the first job interview

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na mes momento ta haya un reaccion mas rapido di e dunado di trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This also makes the employer react quicker

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur cliente cu acerca DPL ta ricibi un bon informe verbalmente y por escrito (firma un acuerdo) riba e proceduranan di solicitud
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Everyone that approaches the DPL receives valid information both verbally as in writing (agreement signed) about the application procedures

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na mes momento e cliente ta haya tur tip necesario p’asina por ta bon presenta y prepara pa su solicitud
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At the same time, the job seekers are provided with essential tips to help them be presentable and well prepared for the job interview

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL ta comprometi na haci tur locual ta na su alcance pa esun cu ta buscando trabou haya su prome entrevista laboral y/of haya e trabou di biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DPL is committed to do whatever they can to assist those seeking for a job, get their first job interview and/or a job immediately

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decision final si ta semper ta keda den man di e dunado di trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The final decision is obviously in the hands of the employer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na momento cu un persona no haya e trabou semper e lo por regresa DPL p’asina sondea e posibilidadnan laboral na un otro caminda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: if the job seeker is not accepted for the job, they can always go back to the DPL for assistance for the next job opportunity

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DPL mes no ta duna trabou pero ta prepara bo, haci tur e prome pasonan di haya un entrevista laboral y despues manda bo solicita cu un cita na e dunado di trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DPL itself does not provide jobs but helps job seekers with the proper steps towards getting a job interview and also prepare you for the interview with the employer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proceso di busca y haya un trabou ta uno dificil
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Finding a job is never easy and in some cases can be very difficult

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta depende di bo persistencia, abilidadnan social pa comunica y bende bo mes como e miho candidato, bo imagen personal  y bo experiencia laboral
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It depends on the individual’s persistency, social skills, communication skills, impression, selling yourself as being the best candidate and job experience

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur esaki ta primordial den yuda e candidato haya un trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All of the above-mentioned are essential in finding the right job

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta brinda tur e servicionan aki gratis
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The assistance provided is completely free of charge

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Rapport IMF Article 4 Mission na Aruba ta positivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Report IMF Article 4 Mission Aruba positive

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 5 di juni 2019 IMF a publica e raport di e  evaluacion di IMF pa loke ta trata Aruba su situacion financiero y economico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On June 5, 2019 the IMF published its report regarding the financial and economic situation on Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cada dos aña IMF ta haci un evaluacion di nos situacion financiero y economico, un asina yama Article 4 Mission
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Every two years a financial and economic evaluation is done by the IMF, the so called Article 4 Mission

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IMF tabata pa dos siman na Aruba y a hiba conversacion cu tur sector: publico, priva, NGO’s, Gobierno y oposicion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IMF delegates were on Aruba for two weeks and met with all sectors; public, private, NGO’s, Government and opposition members

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa 2019, IMF ta premira un crecemento economico di 0.7% real, cu ta ekivalente na 2.4% nominal, siendo cu den presupuesto gobierno a tene cuenta cu crecemento di 1% so nominal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For 2019 the IMF anticipates a real economic growth of 0.7%, equivalent to 2.4% nominal growth, while the Government has only a 1% nominal growth included in their budget

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IMF a constata cu inflacion aña pasa a yega 3.6%, cual tabata debi na prijs di crudo cu a subi, y na e crisistax cu a wordo introduci aña pasa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the IMF, inflation over the last year reached 3.6% due to the increase in fuel prices and the crisis tax introduced last year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mes momento IMF ta proyecta cu inflacion lo baha e aña aki na 1.7%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The IMF also projects a reduced inflation of 1.7% for this year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E riesgo mas grandi ta e situacion na Venezuela, maske nan ta conclui cu Aruba a maneha pa absorbe e crisis door di tuma pasonan serio pa laga e situacion na Venezuela no afecta nos por ehempel pa importa fruta y berdura di otro pais
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The biggest threat is the current situation in Venezuela, although Aruba has managed to absorb the crisis partially to avoid being affected by Venezuela by importing produce from other countries

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reunion Prome Minister di Aruba cu Comision di Reino di Eerste en de Tweede Kamer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Consultation Prime Minister of Aruba with Kingdom Commission and the Senate and Lower House of Parliament

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E crisis na Venezuela tin un impacto enorme riba nos isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The crisis in Venezuela has a huge impact on our island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu capacidad y recurso limita nos ta purba di enfrenta e impacto di e crisis aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the limited capacity and resources, we try to cope with the impact of this crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: De e reunionan Premier a duna un update riba e situacion financiero di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the meetings, the Premier gave an update on the financial situation of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba no a sali for di problema, pero tin un plan y a haci palabracion nobo cu Hulanda y e plan ta pa cumpli cune
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba is not out of trouble yet, but we have a plan and we have new agreements with the Netherlands, and we intend to stick to it

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Impacto di crisis na Venezuela ta substancial riba nos finansas publico y kisas por afecta nos plan, door di cua lo mester adhusta esaki, pero lo tuma un decision despues di evalua e cifranan di e prome mitad aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The impact of the Venezuela crisis on our public finances is huge and may well throw a spanner in the works, so the plans have to be adjusted, but a decision will be taken after the evaluation of the figures for the first half year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister tambe a informa tocante e trayecto di integridad cu pa Gabinete Wever-Croes ta un di e puntonan crucial pa preveni escandalo di corupcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The prime minister has also provided an overview of the integrity process that is one of the most important spearheads for the Wever-Croes Cabinet to prevent corruption scandals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gabinete Wever-Croes a institui un trayecto di integridad ambicioso, esta Oficina di Intergridad, Camber di Integridad, Corporate Governance Code  y ratificacion di e tratado di anti-corupcion di UN
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Wever-Croes cabinet has set up an ambitious integrity program, which includes the Integrity Office, Integrity Chamber, Corporate Governance Code and ratification of the UN anti-corruption convention

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ya ta prepara su mes pa substitui e supervision financiero imponi door di Hulanda cu su propio organo di supervision ( Begrotingskamer)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba is already preparing to replace the financial supervision imposed by the Netherlands  with its own supervisory body (Budget Chamber)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki Prome Minister a reuni na Den Haag tambe cu Algemene Rekenkamer cu a redacta un raport basta critico tocante e supervision financiero door di CFT na e islanan BES
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Premier therefore also met in The Hague with the Court of Audit, which prepared a critical report on the financial supervision of CFT in the BES islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin mas comprension pa posicion di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is more understanding for the position of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banco Central di Aruba ta anuncia emision oficial di e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bank of Aruba announces the official emission of the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di un campaña extenso di promocion pa e publico cera conoci cu e caracteristicanan di siguridad di e serie nobo, Banco Central di Aruba (BCA) a emiti oficialmente e serie nobo aki dia 3 di juni 2019, presentando e prome set di biyetenan na Sra. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro, Minister di Finansas, Asunto Economico y Cultura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After an extensive promotion campaign to make the general public familiar with the security features prior to the emission hereof, the Centrale Bank van Aruba (CBA) officially emitted the 2019 series florin banknotes on June 3, 2019 by presenting the first set of banknotes to Mrs. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro, Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs, and Culture

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 4 di juni 2019, e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin ta obtenibel pa publico na tur banco comercial pa por haci pago cu nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 4, 2019, the public can obtain the new 2019 series florin banknotes at the commercial banks and can use them for making payments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cronologia di e emision di e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin ta manera ta sigui
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The timeline for the emission of the new 2019 series florin banknotes is as follows

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 3 di juni 2019 - Emision oficial di e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: June 3, 2019 - Official emission of the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 4 di juni te cu 11 di augustus 2019 - Co-circulacion di e serie di 2003 y e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin (10 siman)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: June 4 - August 11, 2019 - Co-circulation of the 2003 series and the new 2019 series florin banknotes (10 weeks)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 12 di augustus 2019 - E serie 2003 di biyetenan di florin ta sali for di circulacion y no por uza nan mas pa haci pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: August 12, 2019 - The 2003 series florin banknotes are taken out of circulation and are no longer legal tender

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 4 di juni te cu 4 di december 2019 - Por haci e cambio di e serie di 2003 pa e serie nobo di 2019 di biyetenan di florin solamente na e banconan comercial (6 luna)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: June 4 – December 4, 2019 - Exchange of the 2003 series for the new 2019 series florin banknotes can only take place at the commercial banks (6 months)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 5 di december 2019 te cu 12 di augustus 2049 - Por haci e cambio di e serie di 2003 pa e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin solamente na BCA (30 aña)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: December 5, 2019 – August 12, 2049 - Exchange of the 2003 series for the new 2019 series florin banknotes can only take place at the CBA (30 years)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e lunanan venidero, BCA lo sigui cu campañanan extensivo di informacion via e diferente medionan di informacion, entre otro corant, radio, television, BCA su Facebook y Instagram y tambe website, pa asina por provee e publico cu e informacion importante di e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: n the coming months, the CBA will continue to conduct extensive information campaigns through various media channels, such as newspapers, radios, TV, and CBA’s Facebook, Instagram and website in order to provide the public at large with important information about the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas, BCA lo tene sesionnan di informacion pa gruponan specifico, y lo pone material di informacion obtenibel na tur MFA, biblioteca nacional, scolnan, oficinanan di post, y banconan comercial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Furthermore, the CBA will hold information sessions for targeted groups and will provide information materials at the MFA’s, the national library, schools, post offices, and commercial banks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa loke ta trata e sesionnan di informacion, BCA lo publica e fecha, ora y lugar den tur corant, como tambe riba su Facebook y Instagram
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With regard to information sessions, the CBA will publish the dates, time, and venues in newspapers, as well as on its Facebook and Instagram

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meldpunt nacional contra abuso di menor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National hotline against child abuse

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na luna di mei ultimo Conseho di Minister a apunta Bureau SosteneMi como e meldpunt nacional pa tur caso di abuso y negligencia di menor na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Last May the council of minister of Aruba appointed the Bureau Sostenemi as national reporting point to report abuse and neglect of minors in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proteccion y siguridad di nos muchanan y esnan vulnerabel den nos comunidad tin e prioridad di mas halto pa Ministerio di Asuntonan Social y Labor como tambe pa tur partner trahando hunto den e tereno social
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The protection and safety of the children and those vulnerable in our community has the highest priority of the minister of Social Affairs and Labor as well as of all the partners working in the social affairs field

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde inicio di Sociaal Crisis plan ta dirigi tur esfuerso pa traha den union y cooperacion pa asina yega na maneho specifico riba e tema di proteccion di tur mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From the beginning of the Social Crisis Plan all efforts have been made to work in a team and cooperation in order to reach a specific policy for the protection of children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta nifica cu desde 1 di juni 2019 tur instancia ta obliga pa registra casonan di abuso y negligencia na Bureau Sostenemi segun articulo 243 di e Codigo Civil nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: That means that starting June 1st 2019 all entities are obligated to report child abuse and neglect at the Bureau Sostenemi as stated in article 243 of the new Civil Code

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un otro tarea principal di e meldpunt nacional ta pa duna conseho na profesional y ciudadano cu tin preocupacion tocante abuso di un menor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Another task of the National reporting point is to provide guidance to professionals and citizens who are concerned about child abuse

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda di esaki, den un cantidad di casonan, e punto di registracion ta investiga casonan pa clarifica si un forma di abuso ta tumando lugar y lo coordina e pasonan cu lo mester tuma siguientemente den bon comunicacion cu otro instancianan concerni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally the Bureau Sostenemi will, in certain cases, investigate cases to make sure if a form of abuse is taking place and will coordinate the steps to be taken in collaboration with other entities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Articulo 243 ta regula e definicion di un meldcode contra abuso di menor tambe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Article 243 regulates the definition of the child abuse reporting code

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E articulo ta defini e meldcode como un plan di accion con pa actua ora un instancia ta haya señal di abuso of negligencia di menor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The article also stipulates the action plan on how to handle a case once abuse or neglect is reported

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur departamento y instancia concerni lo traha un plan di accion specifico kico mester haci den casonan asina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All related departments and entities will create a specific action plan to address individual cases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa medio di Sociaal Crisis plan ta trahando intensivamente cu tur stakeholder riba e tema aki cu ayudo di UNICEF y Augeo Foundation riba loke ta e preparacion y implementacion di e meldcode
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Social Crisis plan is working with stakeholders with the assistance of the UNICEF and Augeo Foundation on the preparations and execution of the reporting code

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante pa sa kico ta abuso di un menor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to know what child abuse is

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Abuso di menor ta ora cu un mayor, cuidador, famia of amistad sea pa accion of pa no actua, causa lesion, morto, daño emocional of riesgo di daño serio na un menor di edad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Child abuse is when a guardian, parent or family member causes harm, emotional damage, death or exposes the minor to risks of harm, by either wrongful handling or the lack of proper care

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin hopi forma di maltrato di menor cu ta inclui negligencia, abuso fisico, abuso sexual, abuso emocional of explotacion di un menor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are many forms of child abuse; neglect, physical abuse, sexual abuse, emotional abuse or child exploitation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si ta sospecha cu un menor ta wordo abusa of ta desea di raporta un caso di abuso, yama e meldpunt Bureau SosteneMi na telefon 588-1010
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you suspect a minor being abused or wish to report abuse please call the Bureau Sostenemi at 588-1010

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur yamada ta gratis y por keda anonimo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All call are free and callers remain anonymous

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno hunto cu tur partners den Sociaal Crisis plan ta trahando pa logra e meta principal di trece proteccion y siguridad pa tur mucha na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government together with the partners in the Social Crisis Plan are working towards an Aruba with maximum child protection and safety

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Responsabilidad di nos tur como un comunidad ta pa protehe nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The responsibility of the community is to protect all children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister President Evelyn Wever-Croes ta bek di biahe di trabou di 10 dia na Europa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Premier Evelyn Wever-Croes returns from 10-day trip in Europe

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes tabata pa un periodo di un siman y mey na Europa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister of Aruba Evelyn Wever-Croes was in Europe for a week and a half

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tabata un biahe fructifero unda a haci palabracion di trabou concreto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It was a fruitful journey where concrete work agreements were made

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biahe di Prome Minister a cuminsa na Estonia unda cu e la atende e e-Governance Conference
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The journey of the Prime Minister began in Estonia where she attended the e-Governance Conference

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tabata un di e oradornan den e panel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: She was one of the speakers in the panel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba a cera un convenio cu e e-Governance Academy di Estonia pa asisti cu e roadmap pa yega na e-Government
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba has reached an agreement with the e-Governance Academy of Estonia for assistance in a roadmap to e-Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Integridad y innovacion ta e punto central di Gobierno nobo di Aruba, Gabinete Wever-Croes y e-Government ta trece e transparencia necesario den e forma di actua di gobierno loke ta necesario pa duna apoyo na e trayecto di integridad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new government of Aruba, Cabinet Wever-Croes has integrity and innovation as its driving force, and e-Government brings the necessary transparency in government actions that is needed to support the integrity process

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas e-Government lo contribui pa  yega na un toma di decision mas liher loke ta necesario a promove nos economia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition, e-Government will contribute to faster decision-making needed to promote the economy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Estonia Prome Minister tambe a reuni cu e Presidente Kersti Kaljulaid
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In Estonia, the Prime Minister also met with President Kersti Kaljulaid

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister ta wak atras riba combersacionnan fructifero y ta anhela un bon cooperacion cu Estonia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Premier looks back on fruitful discussions and looks forward to a fruitful collaboration with Estonia

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues Prome Minister tabata na Den Haag pa entre otro reuni cu Premier Rutte, Secretario di Estado Knops, Eerste Kamer y Tweede Kamer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister then went to The Hague to meet with Prime Minister Rutte, State Secretary Knops, the Upper House and Lower House

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa enfatisa cu e crisis na Venzuela tin impacto grandi riba e islanan di Aruba y Corsou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The goal is to emphasize that the Venezuela crisis has a major impact on the islands of Aruba and Curacao

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E crisis no ta solamente di Venezuela, ni di e region, pero ta un crisis mundial y unda comunidad mundial tin cu yuda pa cargo e peso y e gastonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The crisis is no longer a crisis of Venezuela alone, nor of the region alone, it is a global crisis and the global community must help bear the pressure and burdens

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome MInister ta masha contento cu e hecho cu gobierno Hulandes a reserva 23.8 million euro pa e crisis aki, esta cu experticio y material
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Premier is very pleased with the fact that the Dutch government is reserving 23.8 million euros for this crisis, in particular in terms of expertise and equipment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Impacto di e crisis na Venezuela riba finansas publico ta substancial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The impact of the Venezuela crisis on public finances is large

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo haci un evaluacion despues cu e cifranan di e prome mitad di aña ta conoci
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An evaluation will be made after the figures for the first half year are known

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Mnister a finalisa su biahe cu un audiencia priva riba invitacion cu Papa Franscisco na Roma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To conclude the journey, the prime minister was invited to a private audience with Pope Francis in Rome

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e audiencia Prome Minister a informa tocante Aruba y riba e crisis na Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the audience, the prime minister told about Aruba, and about the Venezuela crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Papa sa di e situacion y a duna un bendicion special na Aruba, Boneiro, Corsou y Venezuela riba peticion di Prome MInister
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Pope knows the situation and has given a special blessing to Aruba, Bonaire, Curacao and Venezuela at the Prime Minister's request

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 25 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison May 25, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 25 mei 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 21 y 22 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras May 25, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on May 21 and 22, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cobransa di grondbelasting 2019 a sali
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Land tax assessment 2019 on the way

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa dia 31 di mei 2019 tur cliente mester a ricibi nan cobransa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As of May 31, 2019, all customers should have received the assessment at home

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si esaki no a sosode, mester acudi mas pronto posibel na oficina principal di Departamento di Impuesto y pidi un duplicado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If this is not the case, they must collect a duplicate at the Head Office of the Tax Office

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aki ta sigui un skema di e terminonan di pago manera stipula pa ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following is a schedule of payment terms as laid down by law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Termino di pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payment term

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prome y e di dos terminonan di pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: First and second payment period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di tres termino di pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Third payment period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di cuater  y ultimo termino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fourth and final payment period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fecha final pa haci pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deadline payments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Suma di pago rekeri segun ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payable amount according to the law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 50% di e suma di cobransa pa cubri e prome y di dos kwartaal (jan – maart y april – juni)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 50% of the tax assessment for the first and second quarter (January - March and April - June)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 25% di e suma di cobransa pa cubri e di tres kwartaal (juli – sept)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 25% of the tax assessment for the third quarter (July - September)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 25% di e suma di cobransa pa cubri e ultimo kwartaal (oktober – december)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 25% of the tax assessment for the final quarter (October - December)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa dia 3 di januari 2020 e cobransa mester ta completamente paga
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As of January 3 2020, the land tax assessment must be fully paid

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion tocante e cobransa por acudi na Departamento di Impuesto y pidi un cita cu un funcionario di grondbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information, please contact the Tax Office and make an appointment with an official of the Land tax department

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un taxatierapport (no mas bieu cu 3 aña) of e mapa cu a entrega na DOW
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Taxation report (no older than 3 years) or construction drawing submitted to DOW

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Polisa di seguro di candela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fire insurance policy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Acta di notario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Notarial deed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cas na Pos Abou 19 destina como monumento proteha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: House at Pos Abou 19 is now an officially protected monument

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun e ordenansa di Monumento, AB 1991 no GT 46, articulo 4, Minister di Cultura, sra. mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro, a indica por medio di un decreto e cas na Pos Abou 19 como un monumento protegi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the ordinance of Monuments, AB 1991 no GT 46, article 4, the Minister of Culture, Mrs. Ruiz-Maduro added by decree the house at Pos Abou 19 to the list of protected monuments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A tuma varios siman pa investiga, prepara y documenta pa por describi e edificio monumental
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many weeks of preparation, investigation and documentation were necessary to describe the monumental building

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asina a describi exactamente cada fachada y a pone enfasis riba cada elemento monumental, material, etc
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Each angle of the building has been described in detail and a lot of attention has been given to each of the monumental elements, material etc

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes a studia portretnan bieu, p’asina por tuma nota di e elementonan pa den futuro trece nan bek
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Old photos have also been carefully studied so the elements can be brought back in future designs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A nota e elementonan cu no tin balor y tambe esnan cu ta necesario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Invaluable elements have been noticed as also the important ones

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Estilo di arkitectura di e cas na Pos Abou 19 ta di un cas di cunucu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The architecture of the building at Pos About 19 is of a Cunucu house

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cas ta construi na 1930 door di Mario Rosario Tromp (1 oktober1899 - 1984)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Mario Rosario Tromp (October 1, 1899 - 1984) built the house in 1930

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e cas tabata tin un dak di panchi cu su parti abou paden tabata cera cu pleister di kalki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The original building had a tile roof with a gypsum-plastered ceiling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mario Tromp tabata casa cu Johanna Stebana Tromp (2 augustus 1900 - 1963)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mario Tromp was married to Johanna Stebana Tromp (August 2, 1900 - 1963)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E pareha a haya tres yiu homber y seis yiu muhe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The couple had three sons and six daughters

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E yiu muhe mas hoben ta sra. Faustina Tromp (24 december 1936) cu tabata e ultimo propietario di cas,  prome cu a traspas’e  pa Fundacion di Monumento di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The youngest is Faustina Tromp (24 December 1936) who was the last owner of the house before it was transferred to the Monuments Foundation Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E edificio monumental aki ta cay den categoria A y ta e categoria mas halto cu tin pa edificionnan monumental
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This monumental property is categorized in the highest category for monumental buildings as category A

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pos Abou 19 lo bira e di 37 edificio registra riba e lista di monumento protegi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pos Abou 19 is the 37 building registered on the list of protected monuments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister president a reuni cu presidente di Estonia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime minister of Aruba met the President of Estonia

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante su bishita na Estonia, Prome Minister a reuni riba 21 di mei, 2019 cu presidente di Estonia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During her stay in Estonia, the prime minister of Aruba met the President of Estonia on May 21, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: President Kaljulaid y Prome Minister Wever-Croes ta comparti mesun pensamento cu innovacion y e-Governance ta e direccion cu paisnan mester bay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: President Kaljulaid and the prime Minister of Aruba, Evelyn Wever-Croes share the same point of view that innovation and e-governance is the direction that countries must follow

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: President Kaljulaid a informa Prome Minister di e trayectoria impresionante di e e-Governance na Estonia y e aceptacion y dedicacion di e pueblo pa innovacion crece di tal forma cu awe, Estonia ta lider mundial den digitalisacion y e-Governance
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: President Kaljulaid informed Prime minister of the impressive e-governance process in Estonia and the acceptance and dedication of its people that have led to Estonia becoming one of world’s most developed digital societies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante su bishita na Estonia, Promer minister a participa como orador na ‘e-Governance Conference’ na Tallin, unda ela comparti su vision y plannan pa innovacion y e-governance
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During her stay in Estonia the Prime minister also participated as key note speaker at the e-Governance Conference’ in Tallin, where she shared her vision and plan for innovation and e-governance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes diamars atardi, Prome Minister a duna un presentacion y a forma parti di den un debate di panel na unda cu el a enfoca riba beneficionan di cooperacion entre paisnan chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition, the prime minister also gave a presentation and participated in a debate when she accentuated the benefits on cooperation between small countries

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conseho relata na kehonan di Compania y Garashi di Auto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Advice related to complaints about Car sales companies and garages

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DHC kier trece consehonan pa minimalisa e posibilidad cu algo lo bay robes ora ta trata di compra, drechamento of garantia di auto y con e consumido por percura pa e ta fuerte para si algo bay robes toch
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DHC wants to help minimize complaints specially regarding the purchase of vehicles, repairs or warranty related issues by providing essential tips to give the costumer the upper hand in the event something goes wrong

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Palabracion y acuerdonan por escrito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Oral and written agreements

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Palabra por escrito kico specificamente lo drecha y cua ta e piesanan specifico cu ta nesecario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Make written agreements with specific details on what exactly needs to be repaired and what specific parts are needed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: ora ta trata di cambio di piesa, semper exigi pa entrega e piesa bieu bek despues cu termina e trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With parts replacement always demand the old parts to be returned when the repair is completed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stipula un fecha por escrito cu e trabou lo mester ta completa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Include the completion date of the repair in the written agreement

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta conseha pa no haci acuerdonan verbal paso ta mas dificil pa prueba despues cu tabata tin un acuerdo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is not recommended to do any verbal agreements since this can be difficult to prove in the event of disputes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Periodo di entrega keho
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Complaint period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Semper ta consehabel pa entrega keho asina cu constata algo robes y entrega e keho por escrito preferibel via post, compania di entrega of e-mail
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Always submit written complaints as soon a problem is noted and send this by postage mail, delivery company or by email

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den tur caso, ta importante pa e consumido sa, cu no por haci un apelacion riba e hecho cu locual a entrega no ta conforme e acuerdo, si e no avisa e bendedo of mecanico di e incumplimento mas liher posibel of denter di un periodo rasonabel despues di a descubri esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In such cases, it is important for the consumer to know that they cannot make an appeal on the agreement if what they received was not according what was agreed upon, if they have not notified the seller or garage accordingly and in a reasonable time after noticing their noncompliance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso cu e bendedo of mecanico a declara explicitamente cu e piesa of servicio lo tin di cierto propiedadnan y ta resulta cu esaki no ta asina, of den caso cu e bendedo of mecanico tawata sa of por tawata sa di cierto factornan cu ta relaciona cu e incumplimento pero a keda sin informa e consumido di esaki, e aviso di incumplimento door di e consumido mester sosode mas liher posibel despues cu a descubri e incumplimento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event the seller or garage provides certain specifications and properties of the service and or parts, which ultimately proved not be the case, or the seller or garage deliberately withheld valuable information of the service or product and resulted in the non-compliance, the costumer report the non-compliance immediately

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si bo laga bo auto pa mas cu 2 aña na un garage di auto sin avisa pa medio di carta y si nan bisa bo pa busc’e y bo no cumpli, nan por bay over na cobra bo persona pa warda e auto p’abo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In case your car is left at the garage for over 2 years without a written notification, they ask you to remove the car from their property, and you do not comply, they can charge you a storage fee

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recibo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Receipt

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Semper ta consehabel pa exigi un recibo ora ta trata di cualkier compra of servicio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is always recommended to ask for a receipt for a product or service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso di drechamento di auto esaki mester extra atencion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event of car repair, one most pay extra attention

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si riba bo recibo tin para solamente e suma final y un descripcion cu no ta duidelijk, esaki lo por ta den bo desbentaha ora problema surgi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If the receipt only includes the paid amount and a vague description, this will become unfavorable for the consumer in the event of disputes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Garantia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Warranties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos ta conoce 4 tipo di garantia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are four types of warranties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Garantia di fabrica hopi biaha tin un periodo di 1 pa 2 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Factory warranties usually provide coverage for 1 to 2 years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta e garantia cu fabrica ta pone riba e producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is the warranty the factory gives on their products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun ley si e fabrica no ta situa na Aruba, e compania cu ta importa e product ta esun cu ta keda responsabel pa e producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to laws, if the factory is not established in Aruba, the importer is responsible for the product’s warranty

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Garantia di tienda ta e garantia cu e tienda mes ta pone riba e producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Store warranty is provided by the store on to the product

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Garantia legal ta garantia cu ta regla pa ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Legal warranty is warranty regulated by local laws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki kiermen cu e consumido tin e derecho riba un producto bon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This means that consumers are entitled to a good product

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E garantia aki no ta necesario ora ta trata di producto defecto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This warranty is unnecessary for defect products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Unico ora cu por conseha pa cumpra garantia adiconal ta si e garantia ta brinda e consumido mas derecho cu e garantia legal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The only reason to purchase the extended warranty is in case it provides more coverage than the legal warranty

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den bo proceso di selecciona un auto nobo pa cumpra, semper tene cuenta cu garantia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One should always pay attention to the warranties when purchasing a new car

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos ta conseha bo persona pa purba di uza e garantia di fabrica como guia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A good advice is to use the factory warranty as reference

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E motibo pa esaki ta pasobra companianan hopi biaha ta cumpli cu e garantia di fabrica mas lihe cu garantia legal of garantia di tienda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Reason for this is that in most cases factories will honor their warranties quicker than the legal or store warranties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sinembargo, mas balor y calidad e auto of piesa tin, mas largo esaki mester funciona sin problema segun ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, the more quality and value a car or part has, the longer it has to perform well according to the law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si bo ta di opinion cu bo auto of piesa no ta conforme e acuerdo, tuma contacto cu e a garashi di auto y trata hunto di yega na un solucion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you think that, your car or part dos not comply with the agreement, please contact your garage and try to solve the issue together

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si tin cualkier duda, pregunta of mester di intermediacion of conseho legal, por fabor tuma contacto cu DHC pa asistencia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event you are not sure, have questions or need legal intermediation or advice, please contact the DHC for assistance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa entrega un keho of registra un abuso contra consumido yama of pasa personalmente na DHC na Wayaca 33
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To report a complaint or register consumer abuse please call or submit your report personally at the DHC at Wayaca 33

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proyecto SISSTEM mercado di informacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SISSTEM project meet and greet
