Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Universidad di Aruba den colaboracion cu KU Leuven ta inicia un proyecto di educacion y di investigacion nobo: Sustainable Island Solutions through Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (SISSTEM)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The University of Aruba (UA), in collaboration with KU Leuven, starts a new education and research project: Sustainable Island Solutions through Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (SISSTEM)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proyecto unico y innovativo aki ta nifica un rumbo nobo pa UA y Aruba, cual nan kier comparti cu un y tur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This unique and innovative project opens new pathways for the UA and Aruba that they would like to share with the general public

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Representantenan di UA y di KU Leuven lo ta presente na e mercado di informacion aki pa presenta e proyecto y e programa di educacion y di investigacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Representatives of the UA and the KU Leuven will be present at this informative meet and greet to inform you on the overall project as well as on the education and research plans

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Examen y ripiticion di examen pa cuater cacho special di listra di KIA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Exam and repeat exam for four KIA tracking dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di un training di mas cu diesdos siman, K9 Acenta, e cacho special nobo di listra droga di KIA, a gradua pa su examen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After a training of more than twelve weeks, the new KIA detective drug, K9 Acenta, passed her exam

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas di Acenta, cu a haya su prome certificado, otro cacho di servicio Noa, Pipo y Sting a pasa nan ripiticion di examen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition to Acenta, which received its certificate for the first time, the service dogs Noa, Pipo and Sting took their repeat exam

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Publicacion Relato anual 2018 Conseho Consultativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Publication Annual Report Advisory Council 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 3 di mei 2019 Presidente y Secretario di Conseho Consultativo  a entrega relato di e trabounan di Conseho Consultativo pa aña 2018 na Prome Ministro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On May 3, 2019 the Chairman and Secretary of the Advisory Council presented the report of the Council's activities for the year 2018 to the Prime Minister

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera custumber, e relato no ta duna unicamente un bista riba e trabounan, pero tambe ta contene algun observacion critico riba e desaroyonan durante e aña di relato
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As usual, the annual report not only provides insight into the activities, but also contains a number of critical considerations on developments during the reporting year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por consulta e relato anual 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information, you may consult the annual report 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Anochi informativo tocante abuso sexual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Information evening on sexual abuse

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa aumenta conscientisacion, pa combati y preveni abuso sexual di menor, Aruba Pandvindersgilde (APG), Fundacion Lisete Gomes y Gobierrno di Aruba ta organisa un anochi informativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To raise public awareness and to combat and prevent sexual abuse of minor, the Aruba Scouting Unit (APG), the Lisette Gomes Foundation and the Government of Aruba organize information evenings regarding sexual abuse

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adhunto por haya e schedule di e anochinan informativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below you will find the schedule of the information evenings

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banco Central di Aruba ta lansa oficialmente e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bank of Aruba holds the official launch of the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di mas di 7 aña di preparacion intensivo y trabou duro, Banco Central di Aruba (BCA) riba 17 di mei, 2019 a lansa oficialmente e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After more than 7 years of intense preparation, on May 17, 2019, the Centrale Bank van Aruba (CBA) held the official launch of the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e evento aki, e Presidente di BCA, Jane Semeleer, a duna un presentacion di e trayectoria di BCA pa realisa e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During this event, the President of the CBA, Jane Semeleer, gave a brief presentation on the journey of the CBA towards realizing the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues, sra. Miriam Gonzalez, Directora Ehecutivo, y sra. Penelope Tromp-Gomez, Manager di Division, a elabora riba e temanan escogi pa e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin, como tambe riba e caracteristicanan di siguridad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Afterwards, Mrs. Miriam Gonzalez, Executive Director, and Mrs. Penelope Tromp-Gomez, Division Manager, elaborated on the themes chosen for the new 2019 series florin banknotes, as well as the security features contained therein

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e trayectoria aki, BCA a traha hopi di cerca cu diferente artista local, varios experto local y internacional di banconan central y asesornan di sector priva, como tambe e productor di biyete internacionalmente renombra, esta Crane Currency
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During this journey, the CBA worked in close cooperation with several local artists, various local and international experts from central banks and private sector consultants, as well as the internationally renowned banknote producer Crane Currency

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: BCA a expresa su gratitud y a presenta un muestra chikito di aprecio na e colaboradornan presente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The CBA expressed gratitude and presented a small token of appreciation to those present

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues sra. Semeleer a invita sra. mr. Evelyn Wever-Croes, Minister President di Aruba, y sra. mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro, Minister di Finansas, Asunto Economico y Cultura, pa conhuntamente desvela e diseñonan di e serie nobo 2019 di e biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Hereafter Mrs. Semeleer invited Mrs. Evelyn Wever-Croes, Prime Minister of Aruba, and Mrs. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro, Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture, to jointly unveil the designs of the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tema principal di e biyetenan ta “Bida na Aruba”, cu ta contene elemento di e flora, fauna, herencia cultural, monumentonan  y lugarnan prominente di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The main theme of these banknotes is “Life in Aruba”, containing elements of the Aruban flora, fauna, cultural heritage, monuments, and landmarks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banda cu e diseñonan ta hopi colorido, e biyetenan ta contene tambe e caracteristicanan di siguridad mas avansa disponibel riba mercado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Apart from the very colorful designs, these banknotes also contain the most advanced security features available on the market

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu introduccion di e serie 2019 di biyetenan di florin, BCA tin como obhetivo pa mantene e confiansa den e florin y contribui na  promocion di e caracter unico y beyesa di Aruba su flora, fauna, herencia cultura, monumentonan y lugarnan prominente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the introduction of the 2019 banknote series, the CBA aims to maintain confidence in the florin and contribute in promoting the uniqueness and beauty of Aruba’s flora, fauna, cultural heritage, monuments, and landmarks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e futuro generacionnan por tambe sigui aprecia nan, ta di suma importancia pa sigui conscientisa nos comunidad pa preserva y conserva nan na un forma adecua
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For future generations to be able to appreciate this as well, it is of utmost importance to continue to promote public awareness for the adequate preservation and conservation hereof

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cronologia di emision di e serie nobo 2019 di e biyetenan di florin ta lo siguiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The timeline for the emission of the new 2019 series florin banknotes is as follows

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 3 di juni 2019 - Emision oficial di e serie nobo 2019 di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: June 3, 2019 - Official emission of the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 4 di juni te cu 11 di augustus 2019 - Co-circulacion di e serie di 2003 y e serie nobo di 2019 di biyetenan di florin (10 siman)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: June 4 - August 11, 2019 - Co-circulation of the 2003 series and the new 2019 series florin banknotes (10 weeks)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 12 di augustus 2019 - E serie 2003 di biyetenan di florin ta sali for di circulacion y no por uza nan mas pa haci pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: August 12, 2019 - The 2003 series florin banknotes is taken out of circulation and is no longer legal tender

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 4 di juni te cu 4 di december 2019 - Por haci e cambio di e serie di 2003 pa e serie nobo di 2019 di biyetenan di florin solamente na e banconan comercial (6 luna)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 4 di juni te cu 4 di december 2019 - Por haci e cambio di e serie di 2003 pa e serie nobo di 2019 di biyetenan di florin solamente na e banconan comercial (6 luna)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 5 di december 2019 te cu 12 di augustus 2049 - Por haci e cambio di e serie di 2003 pa e serie nobo di 2019 di biyetenan di florin solamente na e BCA (30 aña)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: December 5, 2019 – August 12, 2049 - Exchange of the 2003 series for the new 2019 series florin banknotes only at the CBA (30 years)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e lunanan venidero, BCA lo tene campañanan di informacion extensivo via di varios canal di comunicacion, manera corant, radio, television y BCA su Facebook, Instagram y website p’asina duna e publico e informacion mas importante di e serie nobo 2019 di e biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the coming months, the CBA will conduct extensive information campaigns through various media channels, such as newspapers, radios, TV, and CBA’s Facebook, Instagram and website in order to provide the public at large with important information about the new 2019 series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas, BCA lo tene sesionnan di informacion pa gruponan selecta y lo tin material informativo disponibel na e MFAnan, biblioteca nacional, scolnan, oficinanan di post, y banconan comercial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The CBA will also hold information sessions for targeted groups and will provide information materials at the MFA’s, the national library, schools, post offices and commercial banks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa loke ta trata e sesionnan informativo, BCA lo publica e dianan, horario, y lugarnan den corant, como tambe riba BCA su Facebook, Instagram, y website
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With regard to information sessions, the CBA will publish the dates, times and venues in the local newspapers, as well as on CBA’s Facebook, Instagram and website

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 18 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum Prices May 18, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 18 di mei 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per May 18, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO,  BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 18 mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison May 18, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 18 mei 2019” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 14 y 15 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras May 18, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on May 14 and 15, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba su Prikichi ta un especie protegi pa ley y nan ta na peliger di extincion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba’s  Parakeet is protected by law and is about to go extinct

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Prikichi ta forma parti di nos naturalesa y cultura pa hopi aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The parakeet has been part of our nature and culture for many years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mescos cu varios otro fauna local, e ta un sorto endemico di Aruba y unico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Like other local fauna, it is an Aruba native and unique

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cada dia nos ta mira menos Prikichi ta bula rond
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Every day we see less and less of these parakeets around

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin caminda unda antes tawata tin hopi, ya nos no ta mira nan mes mas, manera na Rooi Prikichi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Typical places that were once homes to these parakeets, are abandoned, like Rooi Prikichi

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: rosamento di  hopi mondi, sin haci e inventarisacion necesario prome, pa construi y expande proyectonan di hotel, cas y caretera di dobel via
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deforestation, without proper assessment, to make room for hotel expansion, home building, new roads

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tene cuenta cu un parha den un haula no ta yuda na ‘conservacion’ di esaki,  pero alcontrario e ta pone e Prikichi di Aruba den peliger di extincion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Be aware that keeping the parakeets in cages is not the way to save the specie, but will only help in the decline of the population

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: En general un parha domestica tin poco oportunidad di sobrevivi den mondi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is well known that domesticated animals have a minimum survival rate when released in the wild

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ley cu ta proteha e Prikichi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Parakeets protecting laws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta estrictamente prohibi pa ley pa gara un bestia protegi y/of strob’e, sin un motibo valido, den su habitat natural
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is strictly forbidden to remove or disrupt any protected animal without a valid reason from its original habitat

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta prohibi pa ley pa destrui of causa daño na cualkier especie protegi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is also prohibited by law to destroy or harm any protected species

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esey kiermen cu coy’e y bend’e ta contra ley y ta castigabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: That means that plucking and illegal trade is against the law and punishable

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico por haci pa yuda aumenta e cantidad di Prikichi?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What can be done to help increase the parakeet population?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Door di planta matanan di fruta por atrae e parhanan, nan gusta e fruta di e Seida, dadel cu ta crece na Cadushi, boonchi di Tuturutu, mispel y tambe mango
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Planting fruit trees can attract these birds in your yard since they like to eat bellyache bush fruits, cactus fruit, Tuturutu beans, the Manilkara zapota or mangos

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome minister tabata na Washington den un mission conhunto relaciona cu Venezuela y refineria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever Croes attended joint mission in Washington regarding Venezuela and the refinery

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Promer Minister a atende un total di 16 reunion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister had a total of 16 meetings

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tres tema importante cu a cubri ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Three topics discussed were

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E situacion na Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the situation in Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Refineria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the refinery

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desaroyo Economico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: economic development

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E crisis na Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The crisis in Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tocante e situacion na Venezuela y e situacion humanitario, e Premiernan a reuni cu; representante di USA International Development Agency (USAID), sra. Bonnie Glick; cu representante di State Department sr. Elliott Abrams; Under Secretary di State Department sr. David Hale; Secretario General di Organization for American States (OAS) sr. Luis Almagro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For this important topic, the prime ministers met with Deputy Administrator of the USA International Development Agency (USAID); Mrs. Bonnie Glick, Mr. Elliott Abrams Special Representative of the State Department; Under Secretary of the State Department David Hale, Secretary-General of Organization of American States (OAS) Mr. Luis Almagro

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Temanan trata tawata e crisis di Venezuela y e efecto cu esaki tin riba nos paisnan; e tema humanitario, tema di salud y tema di siguridad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current situation in Venezuela and the impact it has on the islands were discussed in detail including the humanitarian, public health and security aspects

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reunionnan pa atende cu e tema di refineria a tuma luga na State Department, como tambe  na OFAC
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The meetings about the refinery were held at the State Department and also at the OFAC

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: finalmente a reuni tambe cu Under Secretary of Treasury sr. Sigal Mandelker riba e tema di licencia cu Citgo a haya recientemente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Lastly they met with the Under Secretary of Treasury; Mr. Sigal Mandelker and talked about the license CITGO recently received

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Informacionnan nobo a wordo treci dilanti cu Gobierno no tawata tin prome
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Valuable information was received that were so far unknown to the Government

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E bon noticia cu a sali afo ta cu si Aruba mes tuma over e refineria y especialmente e terminal, e ora lo no tin problema cu OFAC pa esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The good news is that if Aruba takes over the refinery and specifically the terminal, then we won’t have any issues with the OFAC

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reunionnan cu Camara di Comercio na Merca y cu varios grupo di Banco Mundial pa yuda Aruba cu e desaroyo economico tambe tawata fructifero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The meetings with the Chamber of Commerce in Washington and multiple delegations of the World Bank to seek assistance for economic development in Aruba were very beneficial

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister a presenta e vision economico cu Minister di Economia y Gobierno di Aruba a presenta recientemente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Prime Minister presented the economic vision recently proposed by the Minister of Economy and the Government of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ambos instituto a keda hopi interesa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Both institutions were very intrigued by the plans

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A haci varios contacto pa sigui negosacionnan y pa hunto busca inversionistanan pa inverti den nos economianan di Aruba y Corsou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many contacts have been made in order to continue negotiations to further seek investors willing to invest in the economy of Aruba and Curacao

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas a reuni cu ‘Doing Business Team’ di Banco Mundial, cu tin un proyecto hopi interesante pa yuda paisnan haci nan sistema mas facil y agil
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A special meeting was also held with the “Doing Business Team” of the world Bank, a very interesting project to help countries make their system simple and nimble

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo ta un gran beneficio pa comerciantenan haci negoshi na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will be very beneficial for investors to do business in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba ta cla pa keda baha fo'i lista preto di Union Europeo (UE)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba ready to be removed from the blacklist of the European Union

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Recientemente a pone Aruba riba lista preto di UE debi cu algun cambio den nos leynan no a keda efectua promer cu 1 di januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba was recently listed on the blacklist of the EU since the adaptations in some laws where not ready for introduction effective 1 January 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambionan necesario a keda pasa na april den Parlamento  y cu esaki awor Aruba ta cla pa keda baha fo'i e lista preto di UE
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The needed changes where approved in parliament in April which is the reason of the removal of Aruba from the blacklist of the EU

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Union Europeo siguiendo e pasonan di e Organisacion pa Cooperacion y Desaroyo Economico (OECD)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The European Union is closely following the steps of the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: OECD a haci un investigacion na aña 2015 riba regimen fiscal cu por ta causa daño y competencia inhusto entre paisnan miembro di e organisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In 2015, the OECD conducted an investigation on the fiscal regime  that can harm and cause unfair competition among the organization’s members

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e investigacion aki a sali na cla cu ta considera 3 regimen fiscal como competencia inhusto y no ta cuadra cu e reglanan di OECD
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The conclusion of the investigation was that 3 fiscal regimes are creating the unfair competition and do not coincide with the rules of the OECD

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata aki di e San Nicolas Regime, e patent box di e IPC regime nobo y e Transparencia di Vehiculo Corporativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The fiscal regimes are the San Nicolas Regime, the patent box of the new IPC regime and the Transparency of Corporate Vehicles

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: UE a acerca Gobierno di Aruba pa  por haci e cambionan necesario, ya cu si no cumpli cu e reglanan, lo bay riba e lista preto di paisnan cu ta permiti pa negoshi paga hopi menos of keda sin paga impuesto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The EU reached out to the Government of Aruba to make the needed adaptations, since the consequences for not complying would be the listing on the blacklist as country allowing businesses to pay very little taxes or no taxes at all

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno a logra elimina e patentbox di e IPC regime nobo entrante 18 di oktober 2017 y a aboli e San Nicolas Regime na october 2018 conforme acuerdo cu UE, pero no a logra keda cla na ora cu e cambionan na e Transparencia di Vehiculo Corporativo promer cu e deadline di 1 di januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government has removed the patent box on the new IPC regime as per October 18, 2017 and abolished the San Nicolas Regime in October 2018 as requested by the EU, but has not managed to finish with the changes in the Transparency of Corporate Vehicles before the deadline of January 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki, EU a dicidi di pone Aruba riba nan lista preto di paisnan cu no ta coopera cu un sistema fiscal husto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This was the reason for the EU to list Aruba on their blacklist of countries not cooperating with the fair fiscal system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 4 di april 2019 e cambionan necesario den e leynan 'Algemene Landsverordening Belastingen' y e 'Landsverordening winstbelasting' a keda aproba pa Parlamento y dia 10 di april e 'Landsbesluit aanwijzing reële economische aanwezigheid transparante vennootschap' tambe a keda decreta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The needed adaptation within the “Algemene Landsverordening Belastingen” and Landsverordening Winstbelasting” have been approved by Parliament on April 4th 2019 and on the 10th of April 2019 the “Landsbesluit aanwijzing reële economische aanwezigheid transparante vennootschap” has been proclaimed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mei 15 Dia Internacional di Famia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: May 15 - International Day of Families

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 15 di Mei  ta celebra Dia di Famia tur rond di mundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On May 15, International Day of Families is celebrated around the world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asamblea General di Nacionnan Uni a proclama 15 di mei di cada aña como Dia Internacional di Famia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The United Nations General Assembly proclaimed that May 15 of every year should be the International Day of Families

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E dia ta refleha e importancia cu comunidad internacional ta duna na famia como e unidad basico di famia, como tambe e preocupacion pa loke ta trata nan situacion rond di mundo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The day reflects the importance that the international community attaches to families as basic units of society as well as its concern regarding their situation around the world

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke famianan rond di mundo a transforma hopi durante e ultimo decadanan pa loke ta trata nan structura y como resultado di trend global y cambio demografico, Nacionnan Uni ainda ta reconoce famia como e base di sociedad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Although families all over the world have transformed greatly over the past decades in terms of their structure and because of global trends and demographic changes, the United Nations still recognizes the family as the basic unit of society

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia Internacional di famia ta duna e oportunidad pa promove conscientisacion di asuntonan relaciona cu famia y pa aumenta conocemento di e procesonan social, economico y demografico cu ta afecta nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The International Day of Families provides an opportunity to promote awareness of issues relating to families and to increase knowledge of the social, economic and demographic processes affecting them

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta inspira un serie di evento pa aumento conscientisacion, manera dia di famia nacional
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It has inspired a series of awareness-raising events, including national family days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na hopi país, e dia aki ta duna e  oportunidad pa duna atencion na e diferente area di interes y importancia pa famianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In many countries, this day is an opportunity to highlight different areas of interest and importance to families

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actividadnan riba Dia di Famia ta inclui tayernan y conferencianan, programanan di radio y television, articulonan den corant y programanan cultural cu ta resalta temanan relevante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Activities on the International Day of Families include workshops and conferences, radio and television programs, newspaper articles and cultural programs highlighting relevant themes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SDG 13 meta 13.3: Mehora educacion, aumenta conscientisacion, y capacidad humano y institucional pa alivia cambio di clima, adapta, reduci impacto y duna advertencia na tempo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SDG 13 target 13.3: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SDG 13 meta 13.2: Integra medidanan di cambio di clima den maneho nacional, strategia y planeamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SDG 13 target 13.2: integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Curso Keeping an Art Journal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Course Keeping an Art Journal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta ofrece un curso tocante di ‘Keeping an Art Journal’ pa e personanan creativo cu tin gana di explora e forma di expresion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library of Aruba offers the course ‘Keeping an Art Journal’ to creative persons who like to explore the form of expression

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E curso ta cuminsa 14 di juni, 2019 y tin duracion di 7 siman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The course starts on June 14, 2019 and has a duration of 7 weeks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Registracion ta posibel via info@bibliotecanacional.aw
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration is possible via info@bibliotecanacional.aw

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sesionnan ta diabierna atardi 5or pa 7or riba e siguiente dianan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sessions will be hold on Friday afternoons from 5 to 7 on the following days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta un ‘Art Journal’?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is an Art Journal?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un 'Art Journal' ta un diario caminda ta warda idea, imagen, haci experimento, traha composicion nobo, experimenta cu material y color, dibuha, corta/pega (collage), uza tur sorto di material y tur tecnica pa yega na algo cu bo ta gusta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: An Art Journal is a diary where people keep ideas, images, make  experiments, make new compositions, experiments with material and colors, paints, cut/paste(collage), use all kinds of materials and techniques to create something one likes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe bo ta skirbi den dje, un combinacion di texto y imagen
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You can also writ in it, with a combination of texts and images

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Docente pa e curso ta sra. Lilly Peterson
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Instructor for this course is Mrs. Lilly Peterson

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por yama na biblioteca 582 1580 y puntra pa Gina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information, you may call the library at 5281589 and ask for Gina

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba ta cera frontera cu Venezuela
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government of Aruba closes its border with Venezuela

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den oranan di diabierna atardi, 10 di mei, 2019, Gobierno di Aruba a ricibi e notificacion oficial di Gobierno di Venezuela cu nan a habri e frontera entre Venezuela y Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Friday afternoon, May 10, 2019, the Government of Aruba received the official notification from the Government of Venezuela that the border between Venezuela and Aruba has been opened

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mirando e situacion di crisis sin precedente cu e pais bisiña ta pasando aden, un aumento di migracion por tin efecto pa orden publco y siguridad, den interes general, a decreta cu Aruba ta cera frontera cu Venzuela pa un periodo di un luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Taking in to account the unprecedented crisis that the neighboring country is going through,  the effect an increase of migrants can have on the public order and security and in view of general interest the decision was made that Aruba will close its border with Venezuela for the period of one month

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Notificacion di e decision aki a bay pa tur autoridad concerni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All authorities concerned were informed of this decision

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Organo Consultativo Aruba ta yama bonbini na su Secretario nobo mr. A. Braamskamp
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: mr. A. Braamskamp appointed as new Secretary of the Advisory Board Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 1 di februari 2019 a nombra mr. Braamskamp, kende ta reemplasa mr. dr. H. A. van der Wal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: He was appointed on February 1, 2019 and is the successor to mr. dr. H.A. van der Wal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 1 di augustus 2018 ya mr. Braamskamp tawata encarga cu e maneho di e ‘Wetenschappelijk Bureau van de Raad van Advies’, unda desde 2004 e tawata eherce e funcion di Secretario adhunto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mr. Braamskamp was already in charge of managing the Scientific Office of the Advisory Board from  August 1, 2018 where he has been working as deputy secretary since 2004

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 24 di april 2019 Gobernador a firma e decreto di su nombracion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Governor signed the appointment decision on  April 24, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ‘Wetenschappelijk Bureau Raad van Advies’ ta encarga cu brindamento di sosten general na e Organo bou di cual preparacion di conseho y ehecucion di investigacion huridico ta cay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Scientific Office of the Advisory Board is responsible for the overall support of the Council, including the preparation of advice and the conduct of legal research

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e nombramento di mr. Braamskamp e Organo por conta cu un hurista cu experiencia riba tereno di legislacion y maneho na cabes di dicho departamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the appointment of mr. Braamskamp, the Board will have an experienced jurist in the field of legislation and administration at the head of this office

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Macutu di compras 10 mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison May 10, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto ”macutu di compras 10 mei 2019“ por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 7 y 8 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macuto di compras May 10, 2019" you will find the price comparison that was made on May 7 and 8, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 3 di juni proximo ta e ultimo dia pa entrega e declaracion di winstbelasting 2018 y haci e pago corespondiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Deadline for filing and paying profit tax 2018 is June 3, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta informa cu dialuna, 3 di juni 2019 ta e ultimo dia cu por entrega e declaracion di winstbelasting 2018 y haci e pago corespondiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Tax Office announces that Monday, June 3, 2019 is the deadline for filing the tax return and paying the income tax due 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E fecha final pa entrega e declaracion provisional y haci e pago corespondiente ta 3 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The deadline for submitting the provisional tax return and paying the income tax is June 3,2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no cumpli cu entregamento di e declaracion of e declaracion provisional, e cliente lo haya un cobransa adicional esta un ‘naheffingsaanslag’ inclui boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you do not submit and pay the tax return form or the provisional tax return form , you can receive a supplementary tax assessment with a fine

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki tambe ta e caso si acaso e cliente a paga un suma menos cu locual el a declara na winstbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is also the case if a customer pays an amount that is less than what is stated on the tax return form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E boet pa no cumpli cu entregamento di e declaracion ta maximo Awg. 2.500
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The default penalty for non-submission of the tax return form is a maximum of Awg. 2,500

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si no haci e pago di winstbelasting of no haci e pago corectamente, e boet ta maximo Awg. 10.000
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If no profit tax is paid or an incorrect declaration is filed, the fine can increase to Awg. 10,000

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta haci un yamada na tur persona local of turista cu a bishita e barco Freewinds
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recent Freewinds Cruise visitors please contact the Department of Public Health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta haci un yamada na tur persona cu a bishita e barco Freewinds, entre 14 pa 29 di april 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health is seeking the help of all who recently visited the Freewinds Cruise ship during April 14th and 29th of 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si bo a haya sintoma manera tosamento, wowo ta pika of bira cora y basha awa, nanishi ta core, rash y keintura prome cu dia 21 di mei 2019, por fabor tuma contacto cu e enfermeronan di Seccion di Malesanan Contagioso di Departamento di Salud Publico na 5224-224/237/236/261/264 of presenta na nos oficina na Avicenastraat 1, di dialuna pa diabierna entre 7:45 – 12:00 y 1:30 – 16:30
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This action is due to the measles virus detected on board. In the event you boarded the Freewinds Cruise ship during the above mentioned dates and have symptoms like coughing, soared, red or watery eyes, runny nose, rash or fever before the 21st of May 2019, you should contact the nursing care facility of the Department of Public Health at the Section of Contagious Diseases by calling 5224-224/236/237/261/264 or visit our office at Arivencastraat 1 from Monday to Friday between 7:45-12:00 and 1:30-16:30

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den weekend por yama na cel 592-2009
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During weekends please call 592-2009

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke e chens ta minimo cu nos localnan cu a subi e barco ultimo por a keda infecta, toch nos ta pidi, pa tuma contacto cu Departamento di Salud Publico pa yena un formulario di investigacion y evalua e grado di riesgo pa cada persona individual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Even though the chances of infection on board by local visitors are minimal, the Department of Public Health is still encouraging visitors to contact them to fill out the investigation form so they can assess the risks of each individual

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier pregunta of informacion encuanto esaki, por tuma contacto cu Departamento di Salud Publico na nos Seccion di Malesanan Contagioso, telefon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please call the Department of Public Health at the Section of Contagious Diseases at

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Acuril 2019 in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Association of Caribbean University, Research and Institutional Libraries (ACURIL) ta tene su di 49 conferencia aki na Aruba di  2 pa  6 di juni 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Association of Caribbean University, Research and Institutional Libraries (ACURIL) will hold its 49th Annual ACURIL Conference in Aruba from June 2 to 6, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante conferencia ta focus riba e UN 2030 agenda cu ta e marco di e 17 Metanan di Desaroyo Sostenibel y e progeso logra te cu awo pa implementa e SDGs
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the confrence the focus will be on the UN 2030 agenda, a framework of 17 Sustainable Development Goals and the progress that has been made in the implementation of the SDG’s

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tema di e conferencia ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Theme of the conference is

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library of Aruba has the honor to host and organize this conference which will take place at the Renaissance Aruba convention center

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tin presentacionnan  di oradornan renombra, tayer,  exhibicion di proveedornan di productonan y sistemanan pa bibliotecanan y centronanan di informacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will be presentations, well known keynote speakers, workshops, exhibition of providers of products and systems for libraries and information centers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sub temanan ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sub topics are

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Local Organizing Committee di Aruba ta invita tur esnan interesa den e temanan interesante pa participa na ACURIL Conference
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The local organizing committee of Aruba invites iterested parties to attend the ACURIL Conference

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Registracion ta habri dentro di poco dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration will open in a few days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aumento salario minimo y limite di salario Ordenansa Laboral 2013 entrante 1 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Increase minimum wage and income limit Labor Ordinance 2013 per May 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministerio di Asuntonan Social y Labor Departamento di Labor y Investigacion  ta anuncia aumento di salario minimo y e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 entrante 1 di mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Ministry of Social Affairs and Labor and the Department of Labor and Research announces the increase in minimum wage and income limit for the application of the Labor Ordinance 2013 as per May 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E suma di salario minimo pa un empleado cu tin 18 aña di edad of mas ta wordo ahusta entrante 1 di mei 2019 na Awg. 1.762,48,00 pa luna y Awg. 411,07 pa siman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The minimum wage of a worker who has reached the age of 18 years will be adjusted as per the 1st of May 2019 to Awg. 1.762,48,00 per month and Awg. 411,07 per week

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa un empleado cu ta haci trabou domestico den un residencia priva, e salario minimo ta bira Awg. 822,25 pa luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For a domestic worker performing labor in a private residence, the minimum wage will be Awg. 822,25 per month

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e empleado domestico cu ta traha 22 ora of menos pa siman e suma di salario minimo lo bira Awg. 9,17 pa ora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For a domestic worker working 22 hours or less per week, the minimum wage will be Awg. 9,17 per hour

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como consecuencia di e ahustacion di e salario minimo e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013  tambe lo subi entrante 1 mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As a result of the minimum wage adjustment, the income limit for the application of the Labor Ordinance 2013 will also increase as per the 1st of May 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Ordenansa Laboral 2013 ta e ley cu ta regla condicionnan di trabou manera entre otro e oranan maximo cu por traha pa dia of pa siman, dianan di sosiego, pago di overtime y pago riba dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Labor Ordinance 2013 regulates the working conditions such as the maximum working hours per day or per week, rest days, overtime payments and payments on holidays

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Ordenansa Laboral no ta aplicabel pa tur trahado pero ta conta solamente pa trahadonan cu ta cay bou di e limite di salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Labor Ordinance is not applicable to all workers, but only to those who fall under the income limit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E limite di salario nobo lo bira entrante 1 mei 2019, e salario minimo  Awg. 4.406,20
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new income limit as per the May 1, 2019 will be Awg. 4.406,20

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta encera cu trahadonan cu ta gana un salario di Awg. 4.406,20 pa luna of Awg. 52.874,40 pa aña of menos, ta cay bou di proteccion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 y tin derecho riba tur e condicionnan di trabou stipula den e ley aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Workers who earn a monthly salary of Awg. 4.406,20 or an annual salary of Awg. 52.874,40 or less fall under the protection of the Labor Ordinance 2013 and are entitled to all the working conditions this law provides

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DAO ta pidi tur trahado y principalmente dunadonan di trabou pa tene bon cuenta cu e cambionan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: DAO kindly requests all workers, and in particular, all employers to take due note of this adjustment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Koninkrijksoverleg buitenlandse betrekkingen na Sint Maarten
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Kingdom consultation on foreign relations on St. Maarten

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna 29 april 2019 ta tuma luga na Sint Maarten un reunion entre e Prome Ministernan di Aruba, Evelyn Wever-Croes, di Corsou Eugene Rhuggenaath y di Sint Maarten  Leona Marlin-Romeo y Minister di Relacion Exterior Stef Blok
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On April 29 a meeting will take place in St. Maarten between the prime ministers of Aruba,  Evelyn Wever-Croes, of Curacao, Eugene Rhuggenaath, of St. Maarten Leona Marlin-Romeo and the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands Stef Blok

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un punto crucial cu lo wordo trata ta e crisis di Venezuela y su impacto riba e islanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A crucial point on the agenda is the Venezuelan crisis and its impact on the islands

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes lo trece padilanti cu e impacto riba nos comunidad ta grandi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prime Minister Evelyn Wever-Croes will bring forward the huge impact of the crisis on the community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cantidad di peticionnan pa asilo politico a aumenta hopi pero ta mustra tambe cu mayoria di persona ta haci mal uzo di e procedura di asilo pa keda riba e isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The amount of asylum requests has increased substantially, however it also demonstrates that the majority of asylum seekers are misusing the asylum procedure to stay on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E situacion na Venezuela ta hopi dificil, y Gobierno di Aruba ta convivi y lo kier yuda unda cu por
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Venezuela situation is very difficult and the Aruba government understands and want to help as much as possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Contrario na criticanan den comunidad, Aruba ta tene su mes na tratadonan internacional di derecho humano y ta respeta e derechonan di esnan cu ta deteni pendiente claridad di nan estadia riba e isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Contrarily to criticism, Aruba adheres itself to international human rights treaties and respects the right of the persons detained who are awaiting clarity on their stay on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aparte di e tema di Venezuela lo trata tambe e tema di visa pa Aruba y relacion internacional comercial exterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Besides the topic of Venezuela the topic of visa for Aruba and international commercial relations will also be discussed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prome Minister lo bolbe Aruba diamars mes y Minister Hulandes Stef Blok lo ta na Aruba diahuebs pa trata algun tema bilateral
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The prime minister of Aruba will return on the island this Tuesday, whereas Mr. Stef Blok will be on the island on Thursday to address some bilateral issues

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Condecoracion real 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Royal awards 2019 in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 26 di april 2019 Gobernador di Aruba, Su Excelencia Alfonso Boekhoudt, a otorga condecoracion real durante e ceremonia anual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On April 26, 2019, Governor of Aruba, His Excellency Alfonso Boekhoudt, presented Royal honors during the annual royal award

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki no menos cu 35 ciudadano di Aruba, cu a aporta y sirbi comunidad na un forma extraordinario, lo ricibi condecoracion real
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year, no fewer than 35 residents of Aruba, who have made a particularly good contribution to society, are being awarded a Royal Award

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e ceremonia anual ta otorga condecoracion real den e Orde van de Nederlandse Leeuw y den e Orde van Oranje-Nassau, na ocasion di hacimento di aña di Su Mahestad, e Rey
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the annual ribbon shower Royal awards are awarded in the Order of the Netherlands Lion and in the Order of Oranje-Nassau, on the occasion of the birthday of His Majesty the King

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E Orde van de Nederlandse Leeuw ta existi desde 1815 y ta specialmente designa pa personanan cu ta duna aporte di un caracter sumamente excepcional na comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Order of the Netherlands Lion has existed since 1815 and is primarily intended for exceptional achievements of a very exceptional nature for society

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa por bin na remarke pa un condecoracion den e Orde van Oranje-Nassau, mester trata di merito y prestacion extraordinario pa comunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To qualify for a distinction in the Order of Orange-Nassau, there must be special merit for society

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki riba 26 di april 2019 na ocasion di Dia di Rey a otorga condecoracion real na un total di 2.880 persona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year, on the occasion of King's Day, a total of 2,880 people were awarded a Royal Award

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A nombra 18 persona como Ridder in de Orde van de Nederlandse Leeuw y a nombra 2862 persona den un di e gradonan di e Orde van Oranje-Nassau
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are 18 people named Knight in the Order of the Netherlands Lion and 2862 people named one of the levels in the Order of Orange-Nassau

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e parti Caribense di Reino 63 persona ta ricibi un condecoracion real
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the Caribbean part of the Kingdom, 63 people receive a Royal honor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Aruba 35 persona ta ricibi un condecoracion real, na Corsou 14 y na Sint Maarten 3
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A royal award has been awarded to 35 people in Aruba, 14 to 3 and 3 to Sint Maarten

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Su Mahestad e Rey a nombra, segun Decreto Real, e siguiente ciudadanonan di Aruba como
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: His Majesty the King has appointed the following residents of Aruba by Royal Decree

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Activity calendar King's Day 2019

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Saturday 27 April 2019, Aruba celebrates King's Day in honor of the birthday of King Willem Alexander

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E celebracion ta yena cu actividad, manera evenemento cultural, social y deportivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The celebration is full of activities such as cultural and social festivities sports events

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following is an overview of various activities on 27 April 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Calendario di actividad Dia di Rey 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Activities Calendar King's Day 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Exitoso encuentro di e oficinanan di Asuntonan Publico di Hulanda Caribense, Aruba, St. Maarten y Corsou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Successful meeting of the civil affairs departments of the Caribbean Netherlands, Aruba, Curaçao and St Maarten

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E encuentro asina yama plataforma PIVA, tawata exitoso y di gran balor
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The meeting called PIVA was a success and of great importance

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna 15 y diamars 16 di april miembronan di e Plataforma di Informacion Personal di Antia Hulandes  y Aruba (PIVA) a reuni na Corsou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Monday April 15 and Tuesday April 16, members of the Platform for Personal Information for the Netherlands Antilles and Aruba (PIVA),  met in Curaçao

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E proposito di e plataforma aki ta pa dialoga dos biaha pa aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this platform is to enter into dialogue with each other twice a year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Y ta discuti loke ta necesario pa garantisa e calidad di datonan personal, e registro adecua y e datonan nobo di personanan pa fortalece e cooperacion entre e islanan y Hulanda ora mester yega na tumamento di decision corecto for di un nivel administrativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: And to discuss what is necessary to guarantee the quality of personal data, proper registration of new personal data, to strengthen cooperation between the islands and the Netherlands and to carry out the correct decision-making from an administrative level

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tema di e biaha aki tawata “Sin vision no tin mision, sin accion no tin exito”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This time the theme of the meeting was "Without vision no mission, without action no success"

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plataforma PIVA ta forma door di
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The PIVA platform is formed by

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e hefe nan di departamentonan di Asuntonan Civil di Aruba, Bonaire, Corsou, Saba, Statia, Sint Maarten
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the heads of the civil affairs departments from Aruba, Bonaire, Curaçao, Saba, St. Eustatius, St. Maarten

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gabinete di Gobernadornan di Aruba, Corsou y Sint Maarten
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Cabinets of governors of the Aruba, Curaçao and St. Maarten

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National Service for Identity Data

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: di Ministerio di Relacion Interior di Reino, departamento Información di Sociedad y Administración
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the Ministry of the Interior and Kingdom Relations, department of Information Society and public administration

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No menos cu 34 persona tawata presente y tawata tin varios presentacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: No fewer than 34 people were present and various members gave a presentation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E futuro y e desaroyo di e Plataforma PIVA y e accionnan necesario relaciona cu e ambicionnan y actividadnan a keda discuti den terminonan concreto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The future and development of the PIVA Platform and the actions that are needed to match the ambitions that are there with the activities that are needed to realize them have been discussed in concrete terms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: 2019 ta un aña special pa e Plataforma PIVA como cu ta conmemora 20 aña di existencia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 2019 is extra special for the platform because it has been around for 20 years this year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prome presidente, sr. Pacheco Römer, tawata t’ey  presente y a comparti brevemente e historia di PIVA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pacheco Römer, the very first PIVA Platform chairman, was also present  and briefly shared the history of PIVA

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Planning and Services was also present during the festive dinner

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ainda tin oportunidad pa inscribi pa e Curso “Empresario Prepara II
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is still opportunity to register for the IDEA course for entrepreneurs that starts on April 29, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asuntonan Economico, Comercio y Industria/IDEA, ta informa cu ainda tin cupo disponibel pa e curso pa tur empresarionan cu kier siña maneha nan negoshi eficientemente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce and Industry / IDEA informs that one can still register for a course for entrepreneurs who want to start a business or manage an efficient business

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 29 april 2019  IDEA (Iniciativa pa Desaroyo di Empresa Arubano) ta presenta su curso “Empresario Prepara II” cual ta wordo organisa dor di Departamento di Asuntonan Economico, Comercio y Industria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On April 29, 2019, IDEA (Iniciativa pa Desaroyo di Empresa Arubano) will present its "Prepared Entrepreneur II" course, organized by the Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce and Industry

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e curso aki ta pa yuda nos clientenan con pa crea un cultura innovativo den nan negoshi, con pa diseña un website
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The aim of this course is to guide entrepreneurs to create an innovative culture in their business and to instruct them in website design

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E curso ta consisti di e siguiente topico nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The course is divided into the following subjects

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Empresario Prepara lo cuminsa dia 29 april 2019 y ta consisti di 19 les  (10 siman largo) dos biaha pa siman
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This course starts on April 29, 2019 and consists of 19 lessons (10 weeks total) with 2 weekly lessons

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tene cuenta cu e dianan liber den luna di mei
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The free days in May will be taken into account

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E curso lo termina 3 juli 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The course ends on July 3, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Curso ta costa Afl. 220
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Course fee is Awg. 220

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester completa tur e fasenan pa por logra un certificado na final
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All phases must be successfully completed in order to obtain a diploma

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta preferibel pa tin nivel di MAVO of equivalente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Preferred MAVO level or equivalent

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester tin conocemento di computer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Computer skills

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Basic knowledge of Papiamento, Dutch and English

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No perde e oportunidad aki y registra mesora
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not miss the opportunity and register now

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration is open till Monday April 29, 2019 till 12:00 pm, as long as there are spots available

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Price comparison April 27, 2019

Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto ”macutu di compras 27 april 2019“ por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 23 y 25 di april 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inauguracion tugboat Colorado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Official inauguration tugboat Colorado launched

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 23 di april 2019, a pone e tugboat nobo Colorado oficialmente den servicio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On April 23, 2019 the new tugboat Colorado was officially put into service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A toca Minister di Finansa, Asuntonan Economico y Cultura mr. Xiomara Ruiz Maduro e honor pa hunto cu Minister di Turismo, Salud Publico y Deporte Sr. Dangui Oduber inaugura e tugboat Colorado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture mr. Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro and the Minister of Tourism, Public Health  and Sport, Mr. Dangui Oduber had the honor to officially inaugurate the Colorado tugboat

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adkision di tugboat Colorado ta encera un inversion di casi 14 miyon florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The acquisition of the tugboat  entails an investment of almost 14 million florins

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta di gran beneficio pa nos sector turistico y comercio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: is a value asset for the tourism and business sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E modelo nobo  ASD Tug 2811 ta actualmente e tugboat mas moderno den region di Caribe, cu e forsa y ekipo moderno necesario pa por brinda un excelente servicio na barco crusero y di carga cu ta frequenta nos isla
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This new model ASD Tug 2811 is currently the most modern tugboat in the Caribbean and is equipped with the most up-to-date tools to offer an excellent service to cruise ships and freight ships that visit our island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un tugboat ta un herment basico y necesario pa un bon servicio portuario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A tugboat is a necessary tool to provide good port service for our island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa largo tempo Aruba Ports Authority (APA)  tabata lease servicio di tugboat di otro compania
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For a long time Aruba Ports Authority (APA) depended on another company to provide tugboat services

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Presentacion Maneho economico 2019-2022
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Economic policy: a strong and resilient economy 2019-2022 launched

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a presenta su maneho economico pa e periodo di 2019-2022
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The government of Aruba introduced its economic policy for the period 2019 -2022

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E maneho economico lo concentra riba desaroyo di crecemento economico duradero cu e siguiente metanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This economic policy will focus on the development of a sustainable economic growth with the following objectives

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Contribui na un calidad halto di bida di tur ciudadano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: to contribute to a higher quality of life for all citizens

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Crea cuponan di trabou inclusivo y adecuado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: to create inclusive and decent jobs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Facilita oportunidadnan comecial nobo y innovativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: to facilitate new innovative business opportunities

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stimula inversion local y di exterior
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: to stimulate local and foreign investment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mercado di buki segunda mano riba Dia di Rey
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Book market at the National Library on King’s Day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional di Aruba ta organisa su Mercado di buki segunda mano diasabra dia 27 di april cu ta Dia di Rey, di 9 ‘or pa 2 ‘or di merdia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The National Library of Aruba is organizing it's second hand book market on King’s day, this Saturday April 27, 2019 from 9am – 2 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bishitantenan por busca for di un coleccion grandi di buki pa adulto y pa mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Visitors can grabble in the huge collection of adult and children books

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin cos dushi, snacks, co’i bebe na benta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will also be sweets, snacks, refreshments and other articles for sale

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta un actividad festivo den un ambiente dushi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This market is known to be a festive activity with a nice ambience

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrega buki sin paga boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Penaly free return of books

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Miembronan di biblioteca cu tin buki na cas por entrega buki e mainta aki sin paga boet
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Library members that have unreturned books can return these without paying any penaly fees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur hende ta bon bini diasabra mainta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Everybody is welcome on coming Saturday

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prijsnan Maximo 20 di april 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Maximum Prices April 20, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 20 di april 2019 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per April 20, 2019 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan maximo stipula ta inclui BBO,  BAZV y BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The established maximum sales prices include BBO, BAZV and BAVP

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na caha di un supermercado no por bolbe cobra BBO, BAZV y BAVP riba e productonan regula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocers are not allowed to calculate BBO, BAZV and BAVP again on the regulated products at checkout

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa cualkier keho por yama tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you have a complaint please call tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DEA a presenta PEN 2030 na stakeholdernan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: PEN2030 presented to stakeholders

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diabierna dia 12 di april Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba tawata tin e honor pa presenta e Plan Educacion Nacional "PEN 2030" na stakeholdernan di sector social, economico y di medio ambiente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Friday April 12,  2019, the Department of Education of Aruba had the honor to present their National Education Plan “PEN 2030” to stakeholders of the social, economic and environmental sectors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na final di aña 2017 Minister di Enseñansa sr. dr. A.R. Lampe a encarga Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba cu e Plan Educacion Nacional "PEN 2030"
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At the end of 2017, the Minister of Education Mr. Lampe, put the Department of Education of Aruba in charge of the National Education Plan “PEN 2030”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e plan di educacion ta pa hunto cu tur stakeholder yega na un vision comun pa Educacion na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this education plan is to have all stakeholders reach a common vision for the Aruban education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe a organisa actividadnan pa intercambia pensamentonan tocante calidad, innovacion y best practices den Enseñansa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Multiple session were organized to brainstorm on elements like quality, innovation and best practice within education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa duna docentenan e oportunidad di vocifera nan opinion, a tene un encuesta digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A digital survey was held to give educators the opportunity to provide feedback

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na mes un manera comunidad tambe a contribui na yega na e vision di PEN 2030
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The same opportunity was provided to the community for the creation of the PEN 2030

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A tene Expert analyses na diferente ocasion unda directivanan di scol, Inspectoria di Enseñansa hunto cu Departamento di Enseñansa a evalua e situacion actual di educacion y e rumbo cu nos kier tuma como pais
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many expert analysis sessions were held where school boards, the education inspection together with the Department of Education had to chance to evaluate the current situation within our education system and set the new direction in which we as country want to go

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas a toca e tema di e cuadro di calidad cu ta encera meta di desaroyo, resultadonan desea, procesonan primario, fuentenan nucleo y mecanismo di sosten
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additional quality related topics presented were development goals, desired results, primary process, nucleus sources and support mechanism

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e resultadonan cu a bin di tur e actividadnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the results of all the activities held

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta e puntonan di bista cua bin dilanti di parti di e stakeholdernan interno y externo y e buraco cu tin y con pa yena esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the feedback received from the internal and external stakeholders while assessing the gaps and finding solutions to fill the gaps

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e mision, balornan, vision nobo, metanan strategico, puntonan clave di cada meta strategico y con lo bay di plan pa accion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the mission, values, new vision, strategic objectives, main points of each strategic goal and the action plan

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministerio di Enseñansa y Departamento di Enseñansa Aruba kier a  gradici tur stakeholder cu a contribui pa realisa PEN 2030
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Ministry of Education of Aruba is thankful to all who contributed with the realization of the PEN2030

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por haya mas informacion tocante PEN 30 den e documentonan adhunto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You will find more information regarding PEN 2030 in the following documents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Encuesta online di Universidad di Aruba tocante abuso sexual di mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Online survey University of Aruba about sexual abuse of children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Universidad di Aruba, Anton de Kom University of Suriname den colaboracion cu Departamento di Asuntonan Social - Social Crisis Plan ta tene un encuesta online tocante abuso sexual di mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The University of Aruba and Anton de Kom University of Suriname in collaboration with the Social Affairs Department and the Social Crisis Plan of Aruba are conducting an online survey about child abuse in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa participa na e encuesta por click riba e siguiente link
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To participate in this survey, you can click on the link below

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di proyecto di investigacion aki ta pa colecta informacion pa desaroya maneho y servicionan di prevencion y di intervención dirigi, como tambe pa implementa programa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The aim of this research project is to gather information to develop policies and to set up targeted prevention and intervention services as well as programs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por por experiencia incomodidad ora di contesta algun pregunta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You may feel uncomfortable answering some questions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero, bo por salta e preguntanan cu bo ta desea di contesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: But you are free to skip the question that you do not want to answer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu Clementia Eugene,Docente y Doctoraat Kandidaat Universidad di Aruba via tel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information you can contact researcher mw. Clementia Eugene,PhD Candidate at the University of Aruba at tel

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e foyeto adhunto por haya mas informacion tocante e proyecto di investigacion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You will find more information about this research project in the enclosed flyer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Prolongacion entrega formulario Registro di Personal 2018-2019 te cu 31 mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Prolongation deadline submission personnel register form 2018-2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor informa cu a prolonga e fecha pa entrega registro di personal te cu 31 mei 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Labor and Research has prolonged he deadline to submit their personnel register for six weeks, namely May 31, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun articulo 30 di Ley di Labor 2013, 1 inciso e dunado di trabou ta obliga di entrega e registro di personal na Departamento di Labor (DAO)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In accordance with article 30, paragraph 1 of the Labor Ordinance 2013, employers are obliged to submit the personnel register to the Department of Labor and Research (DAO)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E registro di personal ta consisti di 3 parti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The personnel register consists of 3 parts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Modelo 1A :e personal actual na december 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Model 1A: current staff as of December 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Modelo 1B: e necesidad pa personal pa 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Model 1B: the personnel requirement of 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Modelo 1C: e necesidad di personal pa cada proyecto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Model 1C: the personnel requirement associated with specific projects

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adhunto por haya e formulario necesario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below you will find all necessary forms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki e unico forma cu por entrega e Registro di Personal ta den e forma digital
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year, you can only send the Personnel Register  digitally

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe por haci un peticion via via e-mail adres aanvraagpr@gmail.com y DAO lo mail bo e formulario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is also possible to request this form via e-mail address aanvraagpr@gmail.com and DAO will mail it to you

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tene na cuenta cu entrega d’e Registro di personal 2018-2019 ta obligatorio
