Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The submission of the Personnel Register 2018 - 2019 is mandatory

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di e periodo di entrega aki DAO lo por aplica un sancion administrativo di Awg. 5000,-
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After the expiry of the submission period, the DAO can impose an administrative fine from Awg. 5000, -

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si tin mas pregunta tocante e Registro di personal por tuma contacto cu Sra. Louisetty Croes via email louisetty.croes@aruba.gov.aw of c’un funcionario di Bureau Arbeidsmarktonderzoek na 5237720
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more questions you can contact Mrs. Louisetty Croes via e-mail Louisetty.Croes@aruba.gov.aw or an employee of the Labor Market Research Office via telephone 523-7720

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Reduccion di tarifa riba compensacion di retiro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Fee reduction on dismissal compensation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evaluando e situacion di nos economia actual y tambe e efecto cu circunstancianan di politica internacional tin pa nos trahadornan, Minister di Economia, Finansas y Cultura Xiomara Ruiz-Maduro a duna aprobacion pa reduci e peso fiscal riba compensacion di retiro temporalmente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After evaluating the current economic situation and the effects international political circumstances have on our labor force, the Minister of Economics, Finance and Culture Xiomara Ruiz Maduro has approved a temporary reduction on the fiscal weight on dismissal compensation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E reduccion aki ta pa un grupo grandi di trahadornan na Aruba cu lo por perde nan trabou y lo tin dificultad pa haya un otro trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This reduction will benefit a large group of employees in Aruba who can lose their jobs and who will have difficulty finding a new job

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tarifa manera stipula den articulo 24, inciso 5, Landsverordening Inkomstenbelasting (AB 1991 no. GT 51) a keda reduci na 15% y ta valido solamente pa pagonan di compensacion di retiro cu ta tuma lugar den aña 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The fee as stipulated in article 24, paragraph 5, of the National Ordinance Income-tax (AB 1991 no. GT51) has been reduced to 15% and is only valid for dismissal compensation payments that take place during in 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta concedi compensacion di retiro, manera stipula den articulo 11, inciso 1, parti a, Landsverordening Inkomstenbelasting (AB 1991 no. GT51), na trahadornan retira como consecuencia directo di retiro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Dismissal compensation is granted, as stated in the article 11, paragraph 1, section a, of the National Ordinance Income Tax (AB 1991 no. GT51) to those fired directly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E maneho aki ta na vigor desde publicacion di Landscourant AB2019No.07 fecha 29 di maart 2019 y ta keda vigente te cu dia 31 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This policy is valid since its publication in the Official Journal AB2019No.07 on March 29, 2019 and is valid until December 31, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proceso administrativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Administrative process

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso di retiro y e empleado ta bin na remarca pa compensacion, e empleado por haci un peticion por escrito pa aplica e tarifa special di 15% na Departamento di Impuesto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event of dismissal and the fired employee is entitled to the compensation, the employee can request the special rate of 15% in writing at the Tax Office

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues Inspector di impuesto lo duna su decision por escrito na e empleado kende na su turno ta entreg’e na su doño di trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once this is submitted the tax inspector will give a final decision in writing to the employee who in turn should forward this to the former employer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Solamente riba peticion di e empleado ta evalua si por aplica e tarifa special teniendo cuenta cu e compensacionnan envolvi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Only with a request of the employee, an evaluation will be made to see if the employee is entitled to the special rate based on the compensation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si e empleado no haci un peticion, su doño di trabou tin e deber di aplica e tarifa normal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event the employee does not request the special rate, the employer has the obligation to apply the regular rate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta bon pa tene na cuenta cu e tarifa di 15% no ta obligatorio y no tur ora e ta cumbini e empleado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Keep in mind that the special rate of 15% is not mandatory and does not always benefit the employee

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Banco Central di Aruba trahando riba un serie nobo di biyetenan di florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bank of Aruba is planning to issue a new series florin banknotes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Manera stipula den articulo 7 di e Centrale Bankverordening (AB1991, no.GT 32), Banco Central di Aruba (BCA) ta apunta como e banco di circulacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In conformity with article 7 of the Central Bank Ordinance (AB1991, no.GT 32), the Centrale Bank van Aruba (CBA) is the designated issuing bank

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esey ta encera cu BCA mester percura cu e biyetenan cu ta circula ta di bon calidad y ta cumpli cu exigencianan halto di siguridad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In this regard, the CBA must ensure that the circulated banknotes are of good quality and meet high security standards

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki pa mantene confiansa den nos florin, contibuyendo asina na un mihor eficiencia y efectividad di nos sistema di pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is to maintain the trust in our florin, and thereby contribute to an enhanced efficiency and effectiveness of our payment system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e cuadro aki, BCA ta informa cu e ta ehecutando un proyecto pa introduci un serie nobo di biyetenan di florin pa reemplasa e serie actual
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The CBA informs that it is working on a project to issue a new series of florin banknotes to replace the current series

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E serie nobo di biyetenan di florin lo tin un diseño completamente nobo y lo contene elementonan di siguridad di mas moderno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new series florin banknotes will have a complete new design and contain the latest security features

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa realisa e proyecto sumamente importante aki BCA a colabora estrechamente cu artistanan local, expertonan local y internacional, y e productor di biyete internacionalmente renombra, esta Crane Currency, cumpliendo asina mas tanto posibel cu standardnan internacional halto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To realize this important project the CBA has worked closely with local artists, local and international experts, and the internationally renowned banknote producer Crane Currency, and thereby meet as much as possible the high international standards

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 2 di mei proximo BCA lo informa e publico Arubano tocante e serie nobo di biyetenan di florin pa asina prepara pa e introduccion di esaki, cual lo tuma lugar den luna di juni proximo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On May 2, 2019 the CBA will inform the Aruban public about the new series of banknotes in order to prepare for its introduction, which will take place during the month of June 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lansamento eLearning Pilot Project
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Launching of eLearning Pilot Project

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 11 di april 2019 den presencia di Prome minister mr  Evelyn Wever-Croes y Minister di Enseñansa, Sciencia y Desaroyo Sostenibel dr. Rudy Lampe a presencia  lansamento di un proyecto piloto innovativo eLearning Pilot Project na e scolnan na Macuarima
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On April 11, 2019  the innovative eLearning pilot project for primary schools was launched in the presence of the Prime Minister mr  Evelyn Wever-Croes and the Minister of Education, Science and Sustainable Development dr. Rudy Lampe at the primary school Macuarima

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Meta di e proyecto ta pa stimula e 21st Century Skills for di un edad hoben caba y ta fungi tambe como un acelerador pa implementacion di e Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) di Nacionnan Uni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This aim of this project is to stimulate the 21st Century Skills from an early age and it serves as an accelerator for the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG’s) set by the United Nations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas e lo mehora enseñansa, stimula innovacion y encurasha colaboracion den trabou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Furthermore it should improve education, stimulate innovation and encourage collaboration at work

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E eLearning Pilot Project lo cuminsa den e aña escolar nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The eLearning Pilot Project will kick off in the upcoming scholastic year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante hopi aña inversion den educacion di Aruba a keda neglisha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Investments within the education of Aruba has been stalled over the past years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e eLearning Pilot Project lo drecha e situacion aki, eleva educacion y prepara nos muchanan pa trabounan di futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the eLearning Pilot Project, these issues will be addressed, education will thrive and students will be better prepared for their future career

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di e forma aki tambe ta duna nos maestronan e oportunidad pa haya mas conocemento di e materianan nobo unda cu tin mester
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will also serve as an opportunity for teachers to upgrade their knowledge where needed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM a constata cu e fenomeno di yerb’i lama ta bek den nos awanan na noordkust
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Huge Sargassum masses detected at the northern coast of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Algun siman atras por a tuma nota di e fenomeno di Sargassum, cu ta acerca nos costanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A few weeks ago big masses of Sargassum seaweed was detected approaching the northern coast of the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E sucedido aki a cuminsa bira mas bisto na aña 2011 den Caribe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This occurrence has been detected more frequently since 2011 in the Caribbean

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: El a haci un impacto riba e recurso maritimo, piscamento, bunitesa di beachnan como tambe riba turismo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The massive drifts affects the marine resources, fishing, beaches and tourism

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actualmente  e yerb’i lama ta solamente na costa Noord di Aruba na unda mayoria biaha no ta tuma accion como cu e ta un fenomeno natural y e organismo aki no tin niun efecto riba salud di hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: So far the seaweed is only concentrated on the northern coast of Aruba which has no direct impact on the beach users and since it is a natural phenomenon and does not present any harm to the public health, no action will be taken

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta Sargassum?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is Sargassum?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pelagic Sargassum ta un alga color bruin, of tambe yama yerb’i lama, zeewier y seaweed, cu ta flota liber den oceano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pelagic Sargassum is a brown algae, better known as seagrass or seaweed that floats on the surface of the ocean

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E yerba aki ta hay’e den oceano Atlantico den e asina yama Sargasso Sea y ta move cu e coriente di lama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They are frequently seen in the Atlantic Ocean in the so called Sargasso Sea and move with the ocean’s currents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta dificil pero no imposibel pa sigui su movecion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This movement is hard to track but not impossible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E sargassum ta di sumo importancia pa especienan migratorio y ta un habitat pa un total di 120 especie di pisca y 120 otro especie
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Sargassum weed is very important for the migrating species and forms a habitat for more than 120 fish species and another 120 other species

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cua scenario DNM lo haci algo?
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In what scenarios will the DNM act?

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si Sargassum yega beachnan na Arashi, Palm Beach, Eagle Beach, Baby Beach & Rodgers Beach
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event the Sargassum bloom reaches the beaches like Arashi, Palm Beach, Eagle Beach, Baby Beach & Rodgers Beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sargassum ta un fenomeno natural y tin un rol den e parti di nutricion di nos beachnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sargassum is a natural occurrence and serves an important role in the nutrition of the beaches

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ta hunga un rol importante den e stabilidad di nos costanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It serves an important role in the stability of the coast

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM ta encurasha un y tur pa carga pasenshi cu e presencia di e Sargassum y recomenda pa landa caminda no tin e yerba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM encourages all to have patience with this occurrence and recommends to use the  beaches not affected by the Sargassum seaweed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No por haci limpi si no tin un anuncio publico oficial emiti door di Bureau Rampenbestrijding (BRA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not clean up sargassum seaweed unless the Bureau for Disaster Relief (BRA) officially announces this

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No kita e yerba como cu haciendo esaki ta acelera e proceso di erosion di nos beachnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not remove the seaweed as this will only accelerate the erosion of the beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kitando e yerba ta haci mas daño cu bon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More harm is caused by removing the seaweed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No aplica ningun tipo di producto ariba e yerba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Do not applying product on the seaweed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No uza ningun tipo di mashin of heavy equipment riba nos beachnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: do not use any machines or heavy equipment on the beach

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decision pa no interveni of stroba e proceso di naturalesa ta cuadra cu e acuerdonan estableci mundialmente durante un reunion internacional pa establece Sustainable Development Goals(SDG)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The decision to not intervene or disturb nature coincides with the worldwide established agreements during the international summit to establish the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SDG#13, SDG #14, SDG#15 ta algun di e metanan  relaciona cu best management practices pa cu e conocemento y fluho di Saragassum
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SDG #13, SDG #14, SDG#15 are just a few goals set for the best management practices for the knowledge and flow of the Sargassum

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e caso cu tin areanan di costa Zuid unda tin beachnan publico y sargassum a yega un cantidad di 3 cm halto, por haci un melding na DNM
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event the Sargassum seaweed reaches the popular beaches on the southern coastline and is more than 3 cm  thick, this should be reported to the DNM

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Full House na Open House di Universidad di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Full House at University of Aruba Open House

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diasabra mainta 6 di april 2019, Universidad di Aruba (UA) a habri su portanan pa tur esnan interesa pa inscribi pa e aña academico 2019-2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Saturday morning, April 6 the University of Aruba hosted an open house for anyone interested in enrolling in the 2019-2020 academic year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di un caluroso bonbini, UA a ricibi e futuro studiantenan di tur edad den e area tropical publico situa pafo di e campus
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After being treated to a warm, UA welcomed prospective students of all ages to the campus’ tropical, outdoor common area

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cada un di e mesanan instala tabata representa un di e areanan principal di estudio di Universidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Tables were set up - each representing one of the university's major fields of study

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan cada mesa studiante como profesor prominente di cada facultad tabata accecibel pa pregunta, por a identifica nan facilmente na nan t-shirt diseña pa studiante di UA
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They were manned by both students and prominent lecturers of each faculty, who were accessible for questions and easily identified by their student-designed, UA T-shirts

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cuminsa un fase nobo di bo educacion ta un experiencia cu por haci bo poco nervioso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting a new phase of your education can be a slightly nerve-wracking experience

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Universidad di Aruba ta orguyoso di sa con pa pone hende sinti nan mes bonbini
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the University of Aruba prides itself on making people feel welcome

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tanto e graduadonan di scol secundario como e profesionalnan cu ta traha y kier avansa den nan carera, tabatin acceso facil na informacion tocante e shete areanan di concentracion di estudio di universidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Both, recent high school graduates and working professionals who want to advance their careers, had easy access to information about the university's seven concentrations of study

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Algun participante tabata sa exactamente kico nan kier studia, nan a para den rij na e facultad di nan interes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Some attendees knew exactly what they want to study and made a beeline for the faculty they were interested in

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Otronan a cana rond un poco, absorbando tur e opcionnan di educacion avansa cu UA ta ofrece
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: others roamed about a bit - drinking in all the options of higher education offered at UA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e dos sesionnan cada facultad a suministra mas detaye cu un splicacion cortico pa duna un bista general di nan programa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Further details were provided during two sessions, when each faculty gave a brief presentation outlining a general overview of their program

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Universidad di Aruba tin un acercamento hopi progresivo pa cu educacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The University of Aruba has a very progressive approach to education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nan ta un institucion academico cu ta pensa adelanta y ta ofrece un experiencia educativo cu ta duna e studiantenan un base academico firme y ta atende cu e necesidadnan specifico di e comunidad Arubiano
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They are a forward-thinking academic institution which offers an educational experience that provides students with a strong academic foundation and caters to the specific needs of the Aruban community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: UA tin algo pa tur hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: UA has something for everyone

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E atmosfera di e ‘open house’ tabata festivo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The atmosphere of the open house was festive

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas di un studiante a bisa cu e evento tabata mas cu un ‘open house’- tabata sinti manera bo a yega cas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More than one student said that the event was more than just an open house - it felt like coming home

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Universidad di Aruba tabata anfritrion di e conferencia ‘International Academic Island States/Island Territories’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The University of Aruba hosted the International Academic Island States/Island Territories Conference

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ley di prohibicion di producto dañino pa medio ambiente na vigor entrante 1 di juli 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Environmental unfriendly products will be banned starting July 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na 2018, Ministerio di Desaroyo Teritorial, Infrastructura y Medio Ambiente a traha e concepto di ley di prohibicion di producto cu ta dañino pa medio ambiente di Aruba (AB2019 no.67)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In 2018, the Ministry of Spatial Development, Infrastructure, and Environment presented a law concept that prohibits the use of some products that are harmful to the environment in Aruba (AB2019 no.67)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E productonan prohibi ta inclui
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The banned products are

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Productonan di plastic di un solo uzo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single-use plastic

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Productonan traha di foam “polystereen” di un solo uzo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single-use foam products “polystyrene”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Productonan anti-solar cu e ingrediente kimico “oxybenzone”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Oxybenzone containing sunblock

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Uzo di blas y plastic confetti den aire liber
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Outdoor use of balloons and plastic confetti

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta stipula den art. 17 di e ley y tambe ta segun e Algemene politieverordening (APV) art. 55a (AB1995 no GT8)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is stipulated in art. 17 in the law and according to the General Police Ordinance (APV) art. 55a (AB1995 no GT8)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na december 2019, Directie Natuur en Milieu a anuncia un periodo di transicion y cu e ley ta drenta na vigor pa 1 juli 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In December of 2019, the Department of Nature and Environment (DNM) announced a transitory period for the introduction of the new law which was planned to be officially enforced on July 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Algun siman atras, Directie Natuur en Milieu (DNM), conhuntamente cu Directie Economische Zaken, Handel en Industrie (DEZHI) y nan departamento IDEA, a informa e sector di comercio riba e cambionan di e ley cu nan mester tene cuenta cune pa un medio ambiente mas sostenibel y saludabel pa naturalesa y hende
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A few weeks ago the DNM, Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce and Industry, and their subdivision IDEA, informed the commercial sector about the upcoming changes in the law which will benefit our environment and is fit for our nature and community

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mundialmente ta haci hopi campaña di conscientisacion y informacion cu e meta pa stop of minimalisa uzo di e productonan di plastic di un solo uzo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Worldwide many awareness campaigns are being held to inform the communities about the reduction or complete stop of single-use plastic products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba tambe lo intensifica e campañanan di conscientisacion pa asina por trece un cambio den mentalidad, como tambe e habitonan cu ta causa demasiado desperdicio loke ta afecta bida marino y terestre
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Awareness campaigns will also be intensified in Aruba to change the mentality as well as habits which translates in creating much more waste which in turn affects marine and terrestrial life

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Varios estudio scientifico a determina cu e kimico “oxybenzone” ta afecta nos coralnan y bida marino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Many scientific studies have shown that the chemical compound “Oxybenzone” is toxic to corals and marine life

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta ta prohibi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is banned

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Saco di plastic cu tin poni den supermercado pa hinca fruta of berdura aden
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Grocery bags at supermarkets for fruits and vegetables

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bekers/cups di un solo uzo di plastic of foam (polystyrene)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single-use plastic or foam cups (polystyrene)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bestek di plastic di un solo uzo manera: cuchiu, cuchara y forki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single-use plastic cutleries like knives, forks, and spoons

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Straw (Pijp) di plastic
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Plastic straws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin excepcion pa straw cu ta uza den hospital pa motibo medico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Plastic straws used at the Hospital are exonerated due to medical use

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tayo di un solo uzo di plastic of foam (polystyrene)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single-use plastic or foam (oxybenzone) plates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Roerstaafjes (stirrers) pa bebida
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Drink stirrers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plastic di un solo uzo/foam(polystyrene), manera e cahitanan (foam boxes) cu of sin tapadera cu ta uza pa pone cuminda aden na fast food/restaurantnan, supermercado y food trucks pa uzo inmediato
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Single-use plastic/foam(polystyrene), like foam boxes with or without cover used to store food at fast food/ restaurants, supermarkets, and food trucks for immediate use

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Productonan anti-solar cu ta contene kimico “oxybenzone”
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Oxybenzone containing sunblock

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Uzo di blasnan y plastic confetti den aire liber
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The use of balloons and plastic confetti outdoors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pues no por laga esakinan bay den biento of den lama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These cannot be released in the air since they can end up in the ocean. Balloons should be used responsibly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester uza blasnan na un forma responsabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: TBalloons should be used responsibly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico e prohibicion di e productonan ta encera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What does this ban entail

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prohibicion aki ta encera importacion, produccion, benta, distribucion y otorgamento di e productonan menciona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This ban entails the import, production, sale, distribution, and the giving of the above-mentioned products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki no a bin sin mas, e ley ta uno funda y tin un base solido
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This law is well-substantiated and has a solid base

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A brinda comercio y comunidad suficiente tempo pa haci e cambionan necesario pa por cumpli cu e ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The commercial sector and community were provided enough time to adapt to the new law

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin producto alternativo y ecologico cu por uza cuta apto pa nos medio ambiente (milieuvriendelijk)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are many alternatives and ecologic friendly products that do not harm the environment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ley aki por yuda sigura un medio ambiente mas saludabel pa nos futuro generacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This law will assure a healthier environment for the next generation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: DNM a haci e yamada pa adapta nos manera di consumo y compra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM urges everyone to adapt their consumption and purchasing behavior.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E comunidad por haci uzo di productonan alternativo, duradero of natural
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The community can use alternative durable or natural products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa luna di juni SVb ta registra 1663 aplicacion pa subsidio di salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 1663 applications received for the Salary subsidy for June 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di un cantidad di 3200 dunado di trabou cu pa luna di juni a bin na remarke pa por aplica pa e programa Subsidio di Salario, 1663 a haci uzo di e oportunidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From 3200 employers who qualified for the salary subsidy for June 2020, only 1663 applied for the subsidy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu esaki por bisa cu pa luna di juni alrededor di 22.800 di trahadonan a keda cubri cu un garantia di pago parcial di nan salario pa un suma di 40.7 miyon florin
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: That means that for June, around 22.800 employees are guaranteed partial salary payment totaling 40.7 million

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SVb ta controlando tur e formularionan Akkoordverklaring Vermindering Arbeidsomvang cu e dunadonan di trabou mester a yena y entrega pa e luna aki.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The SVb is verifying all declaration of approval Reduction of the scope of work forms that have been submitted by employers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tuma contacto cu mas o menos 300 dunado di trabou cu no a yena e formulario corecto of completo pa brinda nan e oportunidad pa coregi nan eror
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The team will contact approximate 300 employers who filled out the forms incorrectly and/ or incompletely and will provide them with the opportunity to correct the applications

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di esaki ta premira cu pa diaranson awor ta cuminsa cu e transferencia di e suma di subsidio di salario pa e dunado di trabou cu tabata tin cos na ordo y ta sigui despues cu esunnan cu mester a drecha e formulario Akkoordverklaring Vermindering Arbeidsomvang
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Once this process is complete, they aim to start transferring the salary subsidy amount by Wednesday, June 24, 2020, to all employers who had their applications correct in the first instance, followed by payments to those who had to fix their Declaration of approval Reduction of the scope of work form

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SVb ta recorda tur dunado di trabou cu e ta su responsabilidad pa percura cu su informacion bancario ta registra corectamente na SVb
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The SVb reminds all employers that it is their responsibility to have their accurate bank information registered at the SVb

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si esaki no ta e caso, e por resulta den retraso innecesario den pago di e subsidio di salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the case the bank info is not accurately registered at the SVb, the payments can be unnecessarily delayed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa facilita e dunado di trabou y brinda e ayudo mas lihe posibel e Subsidio di Salario ta wordo paga den forma di un adelanto (na Hulandes un voorschot) a base di e perdida di entrada di benta premira pa e dunado di trabou pa luna di mei
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To facilitate employers with the partial salary payments, all payments are transferred as an advanced payment based on the loss of revenue due to drop in sales anticipated by the employer during May

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues lo controla y fiha e suma di subsidio a base di entrada di benta real di e dunado di trabou pa luna di juni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The actual revenue losses will be verified in June based on the actual sales and the subsidy amount determined

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunadonan di trabou cu ainda tin pregunta relaciona cu e programa Subsidio di Salario por sigui manda nan pregunta pa e Service Center na
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers that still have questions related to the Salary Subsidy program can send their questions to the Service Center email

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Plan nacional pa atende cu e problematica di cacho na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: National Plan to address dog problems in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta ehecuta e plan nacional pa atende e problematica di cacho na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The national plan to address the dog issues in Aruba is being executed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plan ta uno cu ta rekeri atencion multidisciplinario for di diferente ministerio, tambe di diferente NGO’s y varios stakeholders
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The plan is one that requires multidisciplinary attention from different ministries as well as NGOs and stakeholders

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plan ta parti den accionnan cu tin di tuma luga inmediatamente y accionnan den corto y largo plaso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The plan is part of the actions that has to be executed immediately and actions on the short and long term

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E plan aki a keda aproba door di Conseho di Minister den su totalidad na juni 2019 y porfin lo cuminsa ehecut’e
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This plan has been approved by the council of ministers in June 2019 and will finally be executed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo ta e prome biaha cu Gobierno huntu cu NGO’s ta bay atende ampliamente cu e problematica aki, pa asina hunto yega na un solucion duradero pa e problema
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is for the very first time that the Government and NGO’s will address this problem extensively to solve this issue with durable solutions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta un hecho cu na Aruba tin demasiado cacho riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba has too many stray dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero e hecho mes ta, cu na Aruba nos tin demasiado doño cu no ta atende debidamente cu nan mascotanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Too many dog owners in Aruba do not provide adequate care for their pets

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Enbes di papia di e problematica di ‘kill cage’ of e problematica di e ley di cacho, of di cachonan riba caya y e tantisimo cachonan cu auto ta dal, ban papia di e problema real, cual ta e doño iresponsabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Instead of focusing on the “Kill cage” problem, the problem with the current stray dogs or the number of stray dogs being killed in traffic, the focus should be shifted towards the irresponsible owners

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: NGO’s cu ya pa añanan ta atendiendo cu e problematica aki, ta inverti nan tempo y esfuerso den campañanan di conscientisacion, sterilisacion y adopcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The NGOs have been addressing this issue for a long time, investing hours and efforts in awareness, sterilization, and adoption campaigns

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno a inverti semper den eutanasia di e bestianan indesea y tambe, ora por, den campañanan di conscientisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government always invested in euthanasia of the unwanted pets and when possible invest in awareness campaigns

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E efecto di tur locual Gobierno y NGO’s a yega di haci ta mustra cu e efecto ta uno temporario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The effects of these campaigns is usually temporary

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cantidad di cacho y pushinan cu Servicio Veterinario ta pone drumi pa aña ta baha un temporada cortico, pero despues, e cantidad ta bolbe subi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: he number of stray cats and dogs euthanized yearly by the veterinary service declines during these campaigns but increases back after these campaigns are over

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E efecto di tur esfuerso di Gobierno y NGO’s mester ta uno duradero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The effects of all these efforts should be long-lasting

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: P’esey un Plan Nacional cu ta atende cu e problematica di cacho riba caya, incluyendo e killcage y e Ley di Cachota esencial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is the reason for the national plan to address the stray dog problem, including the kill cage

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E metanan di e Plan Nacional ta pa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The objectives of the National Plan are

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: stimula doñonan pa ta mas responsabel cu nan mascotanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To make pet owners responsible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: mehora salud y bienestar di e cachonan cu tin doño y tambe di esunnan sin doño
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To improve the health and wellbeing of dogs that have owners as well as dogs with no owners

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: reduci e cantidad di cachonan cu ta riba caya
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To reduce the number of stray dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: preveni importacion y negoshi ilegal di cachonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To prevent the import and illegal sales of dogs

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Cultura, mr. Xiomara Maduro ta informa cu COVID 19 a trece cambio den e celebracion di Dia di San Juan riba diaranson 24 di juni.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Culture announced the changes in the celebration of the Saint John’s on June 24 due to COVID 19

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Debi cu no por tin aglomeracion di hende, no por tin e celebracion den Centro di Bario manera custumbra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since crowds are restricted there cannot be any celebrations at the neighborhood centers like they used to

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña ako lo bay bek na e manera di celebracion di antes, esta un fiesta den sabana na cas hunto cu famia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year’s celebration will go back to the basics of many years ago, a celebration at home with the family

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes tin un peticion di brandweer pa no cende candela, ya cu esaki ta malo pa nos salud, specialmente awor cu na Aruba tin e situacion di e stof di Sahara
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally, the Fire Departments urges everyone not to light fires, since this can affect many, especially now with the Sahara Dust

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Shon Wantomba y e Fiesta di San Juan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: “Shon Wantomba” and the Saint John festive

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Cultura (DCA) a prepara un Proyecto Escolar di Dera Gay 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Culture (DCA) has prepared a school project for “Dera Gay 2020”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aña aki lo ofrece na tur alumno di e prome klas di scol basico, como na alumnonan cu a bin di scol preparatorio, e buki titula: Shon Wantomba y e celebracion di Dia di San Juan, un buki di storia di e celebracion di Dia di San Juan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This year all first-grade students of primary schools and students from prep schools will receive a copy of the book titled “Wantomba and the Saint John’s Day festivities”, a book about the origin of Saint John’s Day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E storia ta skirbi pa Edselyn Figaroa y ta diseña y ilustra pa Sra. Leidys Ledezma
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The book is written by Edselyn Figaroa and designed and illustrated by Leidys Ledezma

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas tur scol basico lo ricibi un USB cu e contenido di un film cortico di e buki Shon Wantomba y e celebracion di Dia di San Juan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In addition, all primary schools will receive a digital copy of the book on a USB including a short film that will be delivered by the DCA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E scolnan por haci un presentacion pa e scol completo of cada klas por pas’e pa e muchanan wak
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This can be presented to the entire school or each class

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu señora Marlene Lampe na number di telefon: 582-2185
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please contact Mrs. Marlene Lampe at 582-2185

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Programa Special na Television Fiesta di San Juan ‘Dera Gay’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Special TV program about Saint John’s day. “Dera Gay”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministerio di Cultura, UNOCA, Departamento di Cultura y Comision Celebracion di Dianan Nacional hunto cu TeleAruba ta bay presenta un programa di television Fiesta di San Juan ‘Dera Gay’
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Ministry of Culture, UNOCA, DCA, and Commission for the Celebration of Saint John’s day together with TeleAruba will host a live program about the Saint John’s day “Dera Gay”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo ta un programa en bibo cu lo pasa diaranson dia 24 di juni, di 6 ‘or di atardi pa 8 ‘or di anochi na canal 23 y canal 42
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This program is scheduled for June 24 from 6 pm to 8 pm on channel 23 and 42

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e programa aki lo trece dilanti con tabata celebra Dia di San Juan antes den sabana di cas hunto cu famia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This program will talk about Saint John’s day festivities as they were celebrated back in the days, with family at home

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tin presentacion di banda Tipico, Grupo di Baile, Entrevista, Wega pa medio di pregunta cu e televidente lo por participa y gana premio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will be live music, dancing, interviews, and interactive games for the viewers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Minister di Cultura ta invita pueblo en general, specialmente mayornan pa wak e programa aki hunto cu nan yiunan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Culture invites the community to watch this program, especially with their children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta importante pa nos muchanan ta bon informa riba e fiesta y tradicion popular di  Fiesta San Juan, Dera Gay cu ta un di e celebracionnan mas popular di herencia cultural di Pais Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important for the children to be well informed about the festivities and traditions of the popular Saint John’s Day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Fiesta cultural di San Juan (Juan Bautista) den boca di pueblo yama Dera Gay ta data desde aña 1862 y ta celebr’e tur aña riba 24 juni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The cultural celebration of St. John the Baptist (San Juan) popularly known as Dera Gay (Bury the Rooster) dates from 1862 and is greatly celebrated every year on June 24

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tanto gobierno como organisacionnan cultural particular ta haci e preparacionnan necesario pa e fiesta cultural riba 24 juni proximo, e dia di San Juan Bautista y e deramento di gay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Both the government and private cultural organizations make the necessary preparations for the cultural festival on June 24, the day of John the Baptist, and the burial of the rooster

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin varios storia tocante origen di e fiesta religioso y cultural di pueblo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are several stories about the origin of this religious and cultural festival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Origen religioso ta relaciona cu fecha di nacemento di San Juan Bautista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The religious origins may have to do with the birth of John the Baptist

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Origen cultural ta mustra riba e fiesta di cosecha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The cultural origin refers to the harvest festival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke Dera Gay ta mas tanto conoci como un fiesta cultural cu entre otro musica, baile y canto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, Dera Gay is known more as a cultural festival with music, dance, singing, and the like

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Colornan cu ta domina ta cora y geel.  Geel ta simbolisa e palo di Kibrahacha cu ta floria y cora como simbolo di candela cu ta cende riba e anochi prome pa anuncia e fiesta di e siguiente dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The predominant colors being used are yellow and red: Yellow symbolizes the Kibrahacha tree that is in full bloom in June and red as a symbol of the fire that is lighted everywhere on the eve of St. John Day (to announce the festivities the next day)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun tradicion e fiesta ta cuminsa dia 23 di juni ora cu e cunukeronan ta cende sobra di palo di maishi na candela y p’asina cuminsa prepara pa e temporada nobo di cosecha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The tradition dictates that on the day before the Dia di San Juan, so on June 23, farmers will burn remnants of corn sticks to begin than with a new planting and harvesting period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cendemento di candela ta manera un limpiesa pa despues pa cuminsa di nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The burning also symbolizes the cleansing that must first take place before you can start again

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia 24 di juni, despues di bahada di solo, e fiesta di San Juan ta cuminsa den diferente districto cu baile di Dera Gay, baile di bula candela y baile di bandera. E baile di candela ta pa proteccion contra malesa y mala suerte
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The festivity takes place on June 24 and begins at sundown and consists of several components, including a jump dance over burning wood to ward off and/or overcome illnesses and accidents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E baile mas conoci t’esun di Dera Gay, unda e hende homber cu su wowo tapa y c’un palo den su man mester purba mata e gay
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The famous dance entails that each blindfolded participant gets a turn to kill the rooster with a stick

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Antes e bailamento aki ta tuma luga den sabana cu un gay bibo dera. Awendia ta uza sea un gay traha y e baile ta den club. Esnan cu ta baila ainda den sabana of riba veld di tera ta uza un calbas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For ethical reasons currently no live rooster is used but a fake cock or a calabash

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin un baile di bandera, unda ta pone diferente banderin den suela y un persona cu wowo tapa cu lenso ta busca e banderinnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is also a flag dance. Several flags are put in the ground and a blindfolded participant must find the flags

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ceremonia ta acompaña pa musica y cantica folklorico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ceremony is accompanied by folk songs and music

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E instrumentonan musical cu ta resalta ta violin, wiri y tambu
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The musical instruments that predominate are violin, wiri and tambu

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cantica ta data desde 1862
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The song that is sung dates from 1862

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe tin hopi cuminda y bebida durante e celebracion aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The festival also involves a lot of eating and drinking

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Henter e baile ta tuma luga bou tocamento y cantamento di e cantica di San Juan. E instrumentonan musical mas uza ta fio, wiri, raspa y tambu. E cantica ta conoci for di 1862. Cuminda y bebida na abundancia tambe ta  parti di e fiesta.  E fiesta di San Juan y Dera Gay a bira hopi popular atrobe despues di añanan setenta bou di poblacion local como tambe na e scol ta duna atencion na e fiesta popular aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The festivity itself has enjoyed since the seventies again much popularity among locals and also in the school's attention is paid to this cultural event

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento Meteorologico di Aruba recientemente a saca un comunicado riba e fenomeno di naturalesa referi como “Sahara Dust” y con esaki lo afecta nos atmosfera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Meteorology Department of Aruba recently released a press statement about the natural occurrence known as “Sahara Dust” and how this phenomenon can affect the atmosphere

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E fenomeno aki no ta nada nobo, eta sosode na mas cu un ocasion pa aña na momento cu e stof di Sahara ta wordo transporta atraves di aire pa nos region
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This phenomenon is not new as it happens multiple times a year where the Sahara Dessert dust plume gets blown into our region. According to the Meteorology Department, this season’s dust level is considerably higher than normal and causes severe complaints

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun Servicio Meteologico di Aruba e temporada aki e cantidad di stof den nos atmosfera ta hopi mas cu normal cu ta ocasiona cu e kehonan por ta mas severo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the Meteorology Department, this season’s dust level is considerably higher than normal and causes severe complaints

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu yegada di e stof aki, nos por experencia aumento den keho relaciona cu malesa respiratorio. Esaki debi cu e aire ta consisti di hopi mas stof cu nos ta custumbra cune. Esnan cu ta sufri di malesanan respiratorio, manera bronkitis, alergie of sinus por presencia aumento den nan sintomanan manera dificultad pa hala rosea, presion den pecho, hopi tosamento, grawatamento di cuero y wowo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: With the arrival of the dust, there has been an increase in respiratory-related complaints. Those who suffer from respiratory illnesses like bronchitis, allergy, or sinus can notice an increase in their symptoms like difficulty breathing, chest pressure, coughing, itching of skin, and eyes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Stof di Sahara ta ocasiona tambe cu tempo ta bira mas calor pa cual motibo ta recomenda pa bebe mas likido durante dia pa tene e curpa hidrata
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Sahara dust also causes hotter temperatures and people are recommended to drink more liquids during the day to keep hydrated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como Departamento di Salud Publico nos ta conseha tur persona cu ta sufri di un of otro malesa respiratorio pa percura pa tin nan medicamentonan na nan alcanse na tur momento y tuma esakinan manera dokter ta prescribi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health urges everyone suffering from any respiratory condition to have their medications on hand at all times and to take these according to the prescription

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Haci superficienan limpi mas frecuentemente como cu stof ta drenta cas, camber y oficina apesar cu esaki por ta cera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clean with more frequency, since the dust penetrates homes, rooms, and offices despite being closed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evita di haci actividad fisico den aire liber den e dianan benidero y si tuma nota cu e sintomanan ta empeora, tuma contacto cu bo dokter di cas pa un consulta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Avoid outdoor physical activities these days and if your symptoms become worst contact your family physician

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Directie Natuur en Milieu (DNM) a haya un notificacion cu tin varios persona y mucha cu a bira victima di un encuentro menos placentero cu jellyfish/ kwal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Nature and Environment (DNM) has been notified by many concerned citizens about unpleasant encounters with jellyfish

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues di un tempo largo di secura y hopi calor, porfin nos por a disfruta recien di poco awacero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: After a long period of drought and hot weather Aruba has finally received some rain

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tempo no tur dia ta mescos mas y tin dia biento ta cambia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The weather conditions vary from day to day as the winds' direction changes constantly

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta haci cu e coriente den lama tambe ta varia cu e consecuencia cu nos por haya bishita di animalnan inusual den lama
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These changes also cause the ocean’s currents to change direction bringing along different unusual animals in our surrounding waters

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Apesar cu ningun sorto di jellyfish/ kwal ta protegi pa ley
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Jellyfish are not protected by any laws

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: nan ta actualmente presente den nos awa teritorial y ta yega hopi cerca di canto na nos playanan en particular
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They are currently present in our territorial waters and can be found very close to the shores

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Loke nos ta experiencia no ta nada mas cu e temporada cu jellyfish ta abundante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The situation is nothing out of the ordinary; an abundance of jellyfish

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta nan temporada
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is the Jellyfish season

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ciclo di bida di e jellyfish ta hopi peculiar. Ora e jellyfish caba di reproduci e ta laga su webonan, cu ta den forma di larva yama planula, los
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The life cycle of Jellyfish is very peculiar; when they are done reproducing, they release their eggs, shaped as a larva, and called “planula”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E larvanan ta cay y pega riba baranca of otro structura den fondo di lama y ta crece den forma di polyp cu ta parce zeeanemoom (sea anemone
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The larva sinks to the bottom and attaches to smooth rocks or any other structure on the bottom of the ocean and grows in the shape of a polyp (Sea anemone)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki na su turno ta clone nan mes y despues ta drenta den un otro fase di bida di e jellyfish, yama ephyra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These will at a certain point clone and bud into an “ephyra’

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta den e forma aki cu nan ta crece bira jellyfish adulto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From this stage, they grow into a jellyfish

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin especie cu ta peligroso y otronan no
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There are many types of jellyfish, some dangerous and some not

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Como cu esaki ta casi transparente bou di awa, nos no ta not’e na tempo y por yega demasiado cerca cu consecuencia cu e ta defende su mes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since they are almost transparent underwater they are often not seen until they are too close to humans, with the consequence that they will eventually defend themselves from humans

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta pasa pa medio di su tentakelnan, cu ora nan yega den contacto cu bo cuero, e ta hinca’Bo cu miles di microhangua cu ta contene veneno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They use their tentacles when they touch humans and sting multiple poisoned microneedles into your skin

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E por causa hopi daño na nos curpa. Depende di e sorto /especie di jellyfish/ kwal, esaki por tin consecuencianan fatal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This can cause harm to humans and depending on the type of jellyfish, can even be fatal

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: P’esey nos ta pidi un y tur pa ta mas cauteloso den e dianan aki y pa tene cuenta cu ora nos kier disfruta di un dushi dia na lama, nos por tin encuentro cu e especienan aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DNM urges everyone visiting the beaches during the coming days to handle with caution, as encounters with jellyfish is possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si en caso bo sinti algo straño y of bo cuero cuminsa kima/irita y/of bira cora, sali for di lama mas liher posibel pa evita mas encuentro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Should you feel something strange of feel itching or skin becomes red, get out of the ocean as soon as possible to avoid more encounters

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si ta necesario acudi na hospital pa haya tratamento medico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If treatment is needed seek medical help immediately

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Regularmente Departamento di Asunto Economico ta haci un observacion di prijs den diferente supermercado y ta publica esaki den corantnan local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs regularly carries out price comparison in various supermarkets on Aruba and publishes this information in the local newspapers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E meta ta pa yuda e consumidor haya un comparacion di prijs di diferente producto basico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purpose of this price observation is among others to give the consumer an overview of the price differences of various basic consumer goods on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e documento adhunto “macutu di compras 19 di juni 2020” por mira e observacion di prijs cu a tuma luga entre 17 y 18 di juni 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached document "macutu di compras June 19, 2020" you will find the price comparison that was made on June 17 and 18, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba diabierna mainta 19 di juni, Gobernador di Aruba, S.E. Alfonso Boekhoudt, a haci un bishita di trabou na e luga di cuido H.O.P.E. (Helping Our Precious Elderly) na Tanki Leendert
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Governor of Aruba, Z.E. Alfonso Boekhoudt, paid a working visit to residential care location H.O.P.E. on Friday morning, June 19, (Helping Our Precious Elderly) in Tanki Leendert

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobernador a combersa durante su bishita cu entre otro e director, trahadonan, como tambe e dokter di cas fiho di e fundacion H.O.P.E , unda nan a informa Gobernador con nan ta enfrenta e retonan cu e situacion di crisis ta trece cune
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During his visit, the Governor spoke, among other things, with the director, employees, and the regular General Practitioner of the H.O.P.E. and was informed about how they deal with the challenges posed by the crisis

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E luga di cuido ta conta cu 19 habitante y nan tin un permiso oficial pa por opera un cas di cuido
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The care location with 19 residents is in possession of an official permit to operate a care home

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den colaboracion cu Inspectie van Volksgezondheid, H.O.P.E. a implementa varios forma di traha cu por considera como un ehempel pa e sector di cas di cuido particular
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: H.O.P.E. has, in collaboration with the Health Inspectorate, implemented a number of practices that are seen as an example in the private care home sector

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Asina nan ta traha cu un dokter di cas fiho pa tur habitante, pa promove e calidad y continuidad di cuido door di dokter di cas.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For example, they work with a permanent general practitioner for all residents to promote the quality and continuity of general practitioner care and they have developed a protocol for a visitor scheme that has been largely adopted in the national visitor protocol for what now applies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas nan a desaroya un protocol pa un reglamento pa bishitante, cu e protocol nacional pa bishitante, cu ta na vigor actualmente,  pa un gran parti ta basa riba dje.  Tabata di sumo importancia pa e cas di cuido pa reanuda bishita na un forma responsabel, pasobra un parti di e habitantenan tabata sufri di e consecuencia mental, door di e prohibicion pa haya bishita di nan sernan keri.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Making it possible to visit again in a responsible manner was very important for the care home because some of the residents suffered from mental consequences due to the prohibition of visiting their loved ones

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E compromiso y dedicacion di e trahadonan ta hopi grandi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The involvement of the employees is very high

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un parti di nan a keda biba na e cas di cuido boluntariamente pa asina preveni cu e personal eventualmente por contagia e habitantenan cu e virus COVID-19
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Some of them temporarily went to live on site of the nursing home in order to prevent staff from possibly infecting residents with the COVID-19 virus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E personal riba nan mes a bay den cuarentena, door di preocupacion pa nan clientenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The staff has quarantined themselves, out of concern for their clients

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobernador a expresa su aprecio pa e dedicacion grandi di e trahadonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Governor expressed his appreciation for the great dedication of the employees.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa medio di e combersacionnan y, si ta posibel, bishitanan di trabou, Gobernador Boekhoudt ta informa su mes tocante e consecuencianan di e brote di coronavirus y ta expresa su apoyo y aprecio pa e esfuerso di hopi persona den e lucha contra e pandemia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Through conversations and, if possible, working visits, Governor Boekhoudt informs himself about the consequences of the Corona outbreak and expresses his support and appreciation for the efforts of so many in the fight against the pandemic

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta tuma medida, den consulta cu e organisacionnan involvi, pa asina e bishitanan di trabou por tuma luga na un manera sigur
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Measures are taken in consultation with the organizations involved to allow working visits to take place in a safe manner

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Oficina Central di Estadistica a publica e Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa luna di mei 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS) published its  Consumer Price Index for the month of May 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den nan relato adhunto por haya informacion detaya tocante Indice di Prijs di Consumo pa mei 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the attached press release of the CBS you will find more detailed information over the CPI for May 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den cuadro di e COVID-19 crisis y riba peticion di gobierno di Aruba y di Hulanda, AZV a analisa diferente scenario y instrumento pa por yega na e corte sustancial di 5 miyon pa luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In connection with the COVID-19 crisis and by demand of the Government of Aruba and the Netherlands, AZV analyzed multiple scenarios and instruments available to meet the 5 million monthly cost reduction

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa por baha gasto den cuido, AZV a introduci e 5 wave model pa asina cumpli cu e peticion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This lead to the introduction of the AZV 5 wave model

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A yega na un asina yama ‘AZV 5 wave model’, cu ta un pakete di diferente instrumento (medida) cu ta introduci inmediatamente pa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The AZV 5 Wave model is a package of spending cuts that have been introduced immediately by the AZV

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora a analisa e diferente instrumentonan, a dicidi cu nan mester cumpli cu 3 criteria yama “PID”:
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The AZV concluded that the analyzed instruments should meet the 3 criteria called “PID”:

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: mester ta Practico (mester por aplica na u forma facil, lihe y sin excepcion);
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It needs to be Practical (should be easy and quick to implement with no exceptions);

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: mester tin un Impacto (un impacto / influencia directo riba e gastonan y consumo di cuido medico);
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: it needs to be Impactful (Direct impact/influence on costs and health care consumption);

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: mester ta Directo (por wordo ehecuta di biaha dentro di algun siman)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: it needs to be Directly (is executed immediately or within weeks)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un di e instrumentonan ta transporte local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: One of the instruments affected is the local transport of persons with physical limitations or sickness

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambio oficialmente a cuminsa entrante 1 di juni 2020. Pero mirando e impacto di e instrumento aki, AZV ta duna un periodo transitorio loke ta nifica cu e instrumento ta drenta na vigor entrante 15 di juni 2020 y lo keda vigente te cu otro aviso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The official changes are effective June 1, 2020, but based on the impact of this instrument, a transitory period was given until June 15, 2020, and is valid until further notice

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aseguradonan por haci uzo di transporte local solamente ora nan ta den rolstoel of mester wordo transporta via brancard
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Only AZV insured who are wheelchair-bound or need to be transported on a stretcher is entitled to the local transport

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aseguradonan cu por cana (no obstante si ta cu medio auxiliar) no por haci uzo mas di transporte cubri via fondo AZV
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: AZV insured that are mobile (despite needing auxiliary support) are not entitled to transport paid for by the AZV

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E aseguradonan cu si por haci uzo di transporte local ta pashentnan cu ta interna den hospital y cu despues di tratamento (wondenpoli of radioterapia) atrobe mester bay hospital pa sigui nan ingreso (sinta, den rolstoel of transporte drumi)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Only patients that are hospitalized and patients that are admitted to the hospital again after treatment at the wound clinic or radiotherapy can use the transport (seated, either in a wheelchair, or on a stretcher)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asuntonan Economico, Comercio y Industria mediante su unit di Iniciativa pa Desaroyo pa Empresa Arubano (IDEA) a organisa un Webinar cu su partner Departamento di Naturalesa y Medio Ambiente (DNM) riba e ley di Single-use Plastic Ban cu lo drenta oficialmente na vigor dia 1 di juli 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs, Commerce, and Industry through its Initiative for Aruba Business Development (IDEA) organized a Webinar with collaboration with its partner DNM, about the single-use plastic ban that will be in effect as per July 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den aña 2015, un total di 193 gobierno rond mundo, cu ta miembro di e organizacion di Nacionnan Uni, a firma un acuerdo pa e resolucion pa transforma nos mundo, cu ta ‘e Agenda 2030 pa un Desaroyo Sostenibel’(SDGs)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In 2015 hebben in totaal 193 lidstaten van de Verenigde Naties een resolutieovereenkomst ondertekend om onze wereld te transformeren: de Agenda 2030 voor duurzame ontwikkeling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aruba cu ta pertenece na e Reino Hulandes, a tuma e metanan di Desaroyo Sostenibel den su programa di gobernacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Aruba as a partner in the Kingdom of the Netherlands has taken these SDG goals in its Government Program

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E metanan ta parti den 3 diferente topico, People, Profit y Planet. E Departamento di DNM ta esun encarga cu e topiconan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These goals are split in 3 topics, People, Profit, and Planet and the DNM is responsible for these topics

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ley di prohibicion di productonan cu ta haci daño na nos medio ambiente, ta pa garantisa un naturalesa y medio ambiente sostenibel pa nos futuro generacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The law that prohibits the use of products that harm our environment is to guarantee a sustainable nature and environment for future generations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No ta tur producto cu ta haci daño na nos medio ambiente por prohibi den un solo biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Not all harmful products are banned at once

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den nos ley di prohibicion. solamente tin stipula algun producto cu ta conoci pa tin un efecto negativo y dañino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The law bans certain products that are known to have a negative effect and are harmful

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E ley aki a haya aprobacion di Parlamento dia 27 di november 2019, y a public’e dia 2 di december 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This law was approved on November 27 2019 in Parliament and was published on December 2, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E lo drenta oficialmente na vigor dia 1 di juli 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The ban will officially enter into force starting July 1. 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa e motibo aki IDEA a dicidi di organisa un webinar pa informa nos comerciantenan y pueblo di Aruba tocante e cambio aki y a presenta esaki riba 11 di juni 2020, consistiendo di dos topico:
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is, for this reason, that IDEA decided to organize the webinar on June 11 2020 to provide valuable information to the public and businesses about these changes.The webinar presented 2 topics:

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Awareness on the Single-use Plastic Ban for Entrepreneurs;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Awareness on the Single-use Plastic Ban for Entrepreneurs;

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: How We can adapt to a Circular Economy
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: How We can adapt to a Circular Economy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sra. Vivianne Gomez a presenta e webinar aki.. Sra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Vivianne Gomez presented this webinar

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gomez tin un Master Degree den kimica y ta traha como Policy Advisor na Departamento di Naturalesa y Medio Ambiente (DNM).  Sra. Gomez a presenta e.o.:
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Mrs. Gomez has a Master's Degree in Chemistry and works as Policy Advisor at the DNM.  Mrs. Gomez talked about:

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cua ta e articulonan/productonan cu ta prohibi y pakico nan ta prohibi;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The list of prohibited products/items and why

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: cua ta e alternativanan cu tin y cua ta e actonan cu ta prohibi;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Available alternatives and prohibited articles

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con bo ta reconoce e materialnan plastico y ‘polystyrene’;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: How to recognize plastic material and polystyrene

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: cua di e cremanan di ‘sunblock’ ta prohibi;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Which sunblock creams are prohibited;

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: pakico e cremanan di ‘sunblock’ cu ta contene ‘oxybenzone’ ta prohibi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Why oxybenzone containing sunblock is prohibited

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siguiente orador Sra. Kareesha Mohamed, tin un Bachelor degree den Economia Comercial y un Minor den Economia Circular y Innovacion di Negoshi. Sra
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The second speaker was Ms. Kareesha Mohamed, who has a Bachelor's degree in Commercial Economy and a minor in Circular Economy and Business Innovation

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mohamed a presenta e siguiente topiconan informativo y interesante tocante Economia Circular:
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Ms. Mohamed talked about the Circular Economy:

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico ta Economia Circular;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is Circular Economy;

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: dicon e ta importante pa Aruba;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The value of Circular Economy for Aruba;

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con companianan por adapta na un modelo di negoshi cu ta circular;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: How businesses can adapt to a circular business model

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con gobierno por yuda stimula un Economia Circular;
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Governments role in stimulating Circular Economy;

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con nos como habitante di Aruba por yuda stimula un Economia Circular
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: How we as a community con stimulate a Circular Economy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E webinar aki a haya un participacion di un total di 45 persona. IDEA ta sumamente contento cu e contenido y acogida di e webinar y tambe di e bon comentarionan ricibi di su participantenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A total of 45 participants joined this webinar and IDEA is very pleased with the contents presented and the number of participants including their reviews

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un seccion di topiconan sigur hopi interactivo cu hopi pregunta di parti di e participantenan y un tremendo presentacion di parti di ambos orador
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It was a webinar filled with interactive topics including many questions by participants and a great presentation by both speakers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IDEA lo sigui organisa mas webinar, e.o. tocante con pa lanta un negoshi, como tambe riba diferente topico comercial pa negoshinan existente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA will continue to organize more webinars with topics like how to start a business and a variety of commercial topics for existing businesses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por sigui nos riba Facebook page @Idea-Aruba pa mas webinar y otro actividadnan di IDEA den futuro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please follow IDEA on Facebook @Idea-Aruba for more webinars and future activities organized by IDEA

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: IDEA ta sigui brinda su servicio di duna informacion na clientenan virtualmente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: IDEA will continue to provide information to clients in a virtual way

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke no por atende e cliente ainda na nos oficina
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Unfortunately IDEA can not attend any guests at their offices at this moment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: por mail na L.croes@deaci.aw of J.trim@deaci.aw of por yama IDEA na 521-2439/440 pa haya tur informacion necesario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please send email to L.croes@deaci.aw or J.trim@deaci.aw or call 521-2439 or 521-2440

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto a saca e cobransanan di grondbelasting 2020 y den e dianan venidero e contribuyentenan lo ricibi esaki via post.  E cobransa tin fecha di 1 di juni 2020.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Department has recently mailed the Land Assessment Tax 2020 bills and soon they will arrive in the mail box. The bills are dated June 1st 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ley ta duna e opcion pa paga e grondbelasting den un solo biaha of den termino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The law indicates that the Land Tax can be paid in full at once or in terms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta conseha tur contribuyente pa lesa e texto imprimi riba e cobransa cu hopi atencion pa cu e terminonan di pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please read the invoice accordingly for the payment terms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aki ta sigui un skema di e terminonan di pago manera stipula den ley:  Grondbelasting 2020 fecha 1 di juni 2020  Termino di pago  Fecha final pa haci pago  Suma di pago rekeri segun ley E prome 2 terminonan di pago  1 di juli 2020 50% di e suma di cobransa pa cubri e prome y di dos kwartaal (jan – maart y april – juni) Di tres termino di pago  30 di september 2020  25% di e suma di cobransa pa cubri e di tres kwartaal (juli – sept)  Di cuater termino (ultimo termino)  4 di januari 2021 25% di e suma di cobransa pa cubri e ultimo kwartaal (oktober – december) Pa dia 4 di januari 2021 e cobransa di aña 2020 mester ta completamente paga
