Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payment terms as stipulated by law:  Land Assessment Tax 2020 dated June 1, 2020: Payment terms        Deadline        Amount due according to the law First 2 payment terms        July 1, 2020        50% of the billed amount which covers the 1st and 2nd quarter (January – March and April – June) Third payment term        September 30, 2020         25% of the billed amount that covers the third quarter (July – September)  Fourth term        January 4, 2021        25% of the billed amount that covers the last quarter (October – December) January 4, 2021, is the deadline when the land tax assessment must be fully paid

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por haci pago na Departamento di Impuesto mes, na un MFA of via banco
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payments can be completed in person at the main office of the Tax Department as well as at the MFA’s or by bank transfer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No obstante nos servicionan di caha, Departamento di Impuesto ta sigui recomenda pa preferiblemente haci pago di impuesto online via Aruba Bank of Banco di Caribe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Despite the payment options at the cashier, the Tax Department recommends their preferred choice of payment, online using Aruba Bank or Banco di Caribe

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E sistemanan di e banconan aki ta conecta automaticamente cu e sistemanan di DIMP y e mesun dia e transaccion ta keda registra den e sistema di Departamento di Impuesto.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These banks’ system are automatically connected with the payment system of the Tax Department and all transactions are registered on the same transaction day

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ora di haci pago online mester scoge e opcion di Bill Pay y no Transfer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: When paying online please select Bill Pay and NOT transfer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta importante pa menciona: grondbelasting 2020, e number di cobransa y e persoonsnummer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is important to include “grondbelasting 2020, invoice number and personal tax number (persoonsnummer)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Di e forma aki Departamento di Impuesto por procesa e pagonan corectamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This way the payments can be correctly processed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cliente cu no por paga su cobransa di acuerdo cu e terminonan legal, por haci un peticion pa areglo di pago
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Clients that cannot afford to pay the bill as indicated in the fixed term payment schedule, can request a payment arrangement

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester haci e peticion aki mas pronto posibel. Asina e cliente mes por evita cu Departamento di Impuesto ta continua cu e proceso di cobramento cu gradualmente por bira mas severo, locual por nifica tambe gasto extra pa e cliente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This request should be made as soon as possible to avoid the Tax Department from proceeding with the billing process, which will gradually become more severe and may include additional charges

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actualmente e contribuyentenan por haci uzo di e areglo di pago flexibel cu e Plan di Alivio Fiscal 2020 ta brinda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Taxpayers can also make use of the flexible payment arrangements that are offered by the Fiscal Relief Plan 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E contribuyentenan por paga nan cobransa den un termino mas largo y asina haya mas espacio financiero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Taxpayers can pay their taxes in longer terms and thus get some financial space

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion tocante e cobransa di grondbelasting por yama 5227423 of 5227424
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information about the Land Assessment Tax bill 2020 please call 5227423 or 5227424

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SVb ta notifica cu e ultimo dia pa aplica pa Subsidio di Salario pa luna di juni ta bira 19 di juni, 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The SVb is announcing June 19, 2020, as the last date to apply for the Salary Subsidy 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur dunado di trabou cu ta bin na remarke pa aplica pa Subsidio di Salario pa luna di juni a ricibi un notificacion di SVb dia 3 di juni ultimo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All employers who qualify for the application of the Salary Subsidy for the month of June received an email from the SVb on June 3, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E notificacion a wordo manda automaticamente pa e e-mail cu e dunado di trabou tin registra na SVb como su e-mail
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This notification has been sent automatically to all email addresses registered at the SVb

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: (paga tino na e junk of spam folder!)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please check your junk mail

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e notificacion a splica e rekisito nobo cu ta aplicabel pa luna di juni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The notification explains the new requirement that applies for the month of June

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta trata aki di e acuerdo pa reduccion di arbeidsomvang di parti di e trahado cu minimo 20%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is the agreement to reduce the job scope of the employee with a minimum of 20%

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den esaki a bin un cambio importante cu e dunado di trabou mester tene cuenta cune
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This requirement has undergone some changes that employers should be aware of

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a tuma e decision pa flexibilisa e condicion ariba reduccion di arbeidsomvang
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba has decided to make the reduction of the job scope flexible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E flexibilisacion aki ta encera cu e dunado di trabou y trahado por yega na acuerdonan individual con ta yena e 40% ariba e 60% di subsidio di salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The flexibilization implies that employers and employees can reach mutual agreements on how to cover the 40% on top of the 60% covered by the salary subsidy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: SVb ta categorisa e dunadonan di trabou den 4 grupo:
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: SVb categorizes employers in 4 groups;

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou cu a entrega peticion caba cu e formulario di reduccion di 20% y cu no ta desea flexibilisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers that already submitted their requests with the form for the 20% reduction and do not wish flexibilization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou cu a entrega peticion caba cu e formulario di reduccion di 20% y cu si ta desea flexibilisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers that already submitted their requests with the form for the 20% reduction and do wish flexibilization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou cu no a entrega peticion ainda y cu no ta desea flexibilisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers that have not submitted their request yet and do not wish flexibilization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou cu no a entrega peticion ainda y cu si ta desea flexibilisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers that have not submitted their request yet and wish flexibilization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou den categoria 3 ta sigui e procedura riba MiSVb manera stipula den e notificacion di 3 di juni ultimo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers in group 1 do not have to take any further actions and should wait on the evaluation of the petition

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou den categoria 2 mester haya un lista nobo pa nan aplica e flexibilisacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers in group 2 should receive a new list for the reapplication in order to request the flexibilization

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E grupo aki tin cu manda un e-mail na lsflex@svbaruba.org y solicita un lista nobo pa nan yena
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: They have to send an email to lsflex@svbaruba.org and request a new list

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E dunado di trabou ta ricibi un lista nobo y ta debolbe esaki yena y firma pa trahadonan cu ta acepta e condicion na lsflex@svbaruba.org
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This completed list should be returned to lsflex@svbaruba.org and should be signed by all employees accepting the conditions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou den categoria 3 ta sigui e procedura riba MiSVb manera stipula den e notificacion di 3 di juni ultimo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers in group 3 should follow the procedure on MiSVb as stated in the notification published on June 3, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou den categoria 4 tin cu manda un e-mail na lsflex@svbaruba.org
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers in group 4 should send their email to lsflex@svbaruba.org and request the new list

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: y solicita un lista nobo pa nan yena. E lista nobo yena y firma e ta upload den su MiSVb na momento di  E lista nobo yena y firma e ta upload den su MiSVb na momento di completa su aplicacion pa subsidio di salario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new list should be completed, signed, and uploaded into their MiSVb once the application for the salary subsidy is completed

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa por duna tur dunado di trabou e oportunidad pa entrega nan aplicacion  pa subsidio di salario pa luna di juni SVb a hala e fecha cu ta cera e aplicacion pa luna di juni
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To provide employers sufficient time to apply for the salary subsidy for the month of June, the deadline has been extended

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou tin awor te cu dia 19 di juni, 2020 (fin di dia) pa aplica pa subsidio di salario pa luna di juni, 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Now employers have until June 19, 2020, to apply for the salary subsidy for the month of June 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambio aki pa luna di juni y e control cu SVb mester haci pa cu e declaracionnan di acuerdo cu firma di trahado tin como consecuencia cu pago di subsidio di salario pa luna di juni di parti di SVb pa e dunado di trabou lo cuminsa entrante 26 di juni, 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These changes and the controls that are needed by the SVb regarding the employees' agreement declaration and the payment of the salary subsidy by the Svb in June will start June 26, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dunado di trabou ta responsabel pa verifica cu su cuenta di banco ta corectamente registra na SVb
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Employers have the responsibility to verify that they have registered the correct bank account at the SVb

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa facilita e proceso di aplicacion y contesta pregunta di dunado di trabou y trahado relaciona cu e programa di Subsidio di Salario por tuma contacto cu e Service Center via mail na loonsubsidie@svbaruba.org
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To facilitate the application process and more information for both employers and employees related to the salary subsidy please contact the service center by email at  loonsubsidie@svbaruba.org

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe por subi ariba e pagina di SVb www.svbaruba.org y bay na e topico Subsidio di Salario (na Doño di Trabou)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please visit SVb on www.svbaruba.org and check the “salary subsidy” tab (for employers)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hibando un maneho pa reduci e transmision di COVID-19 Departamento di Salud Publico (DVG) ta informa cu nan lo no tuma placa cash mas pa su servicionan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To reduce the possibilities of COVID-19 infections, the Department of Public Health (DVG) is announcing that they will no longer accept cash payments for any service

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta duna diferente servicio na comunidad, entre otro vacuna pa biahero, aplicacion of renobacion di certificado di salud (carchi berde) y mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The DVG renders a variety of services to the community including travelers vaccinations, application or renovation of health certificates (green card), and many other services

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den pasado por a paga pa tur e servicionan aki cu placa cash of via carchi di swipe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Until recently cash payment and debit card payments where both accepted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa motibo di COVID-19 nos maneho a conoce diferente cambio y uno di nan ta encera cu clientenan lo no por paga mas cu placa cash
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Due to the COVID-19, management decided to make some changes, including stopping cash payments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pago di tur servicio mester sosode pa medio di carchi of swipe pa di e manera aki limita e intercambio di placa cash y e risco di transmision di COVID-19
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From now on payments can only be completed by debit cards, to reduce interchange of cash and to reduce the risk of COVID-19 transmission

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante dialuna, dia 8 di juni 2020, Departamento di Impuesto a introduci un otro number di telefon pa asina su contribuyentenan por tin mas posibilidad pa comunica cu e departamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting on Monday, June 8, 2020, the Tax Department has an extra contact phone number to make itself more accessible to the public

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E number di contacto nobo ta 522 7424
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new number is 522 7424

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E number aki lo ta den funcion hunto cu e number central 522 7423
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new number will be in addition to the current number of 522 7423

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Impuesto ta un organisacion grandi y tin hopi persona ta yama diariamente pa un servicio y no tur ora por drenta den contacto mesora cu e departamento
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Department is a big organization that receives countless calls daily and with one contact number, many incoming calls take a while to be answered

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pesey e number nobo 522 7424 ta wordo introduci y lo wordo atendi pa un team dinamico di mas of menos 11 persona cu lo ta cla pa duna guia y ayudo basico riba tereno fiscal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The additional phone number will help ease this situation and a team of 11 highly motivated individuals is ready to provide guidance and support

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Alabes Departamento di Impuesto ta anuncia cu e seccion “Servicio na cliente” cu antes tawata atende cliente personalmente na Camacuri, awor ta dunando servicio via e number di contacto nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax Department also announced that the customer service that was being provided in person at the Camacuri could now be provided by phone

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E orario di servicio na telefon ta fiho: 7:45 - 11:30 y 1:15 - 3:30
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Customer service by phone is available between 7:45 am - 11:30 am and 1:15 pm - 3:30 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta e mesun orario cu lo mantene pa atende tur otro yamada cu ta drenta diariamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: All other calls are answered in these same hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico ta informa tocante e prijsnan maximo p’e periodo aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Economic Affairs announces the maximum prices for the coming period

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 13 di juni 2020 a fiha e prijsnan maximo pa diferente producto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per June 13, 2020 the following prices are established for various products

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa bo conveniencia por download e lista di prijsnan maximo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information see attached list
