Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: https://www.government.aw/document.php?fileid=76909&f=7f8f643fc298e475f074d6ca8f136d22&attachment=1&c=47176

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa eventual kehonan, fabor tuma contacto telefonico na 5212423
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Note: If you have any complaints, please call tel: 5212423

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Proximo publicacion lo tuma lugar dia 27 di juni 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Next publication of maximum prices is on June 27, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mester entrega peticion pa aumento di prijs prome cu 20 di juni 2020 pa por procesa esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Requests for price increase must be submitted before June 20, 2020 for processing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Relaciona cu e crisis di Coronavirus COVID-19 Gobierno di Aruba a tuma e siguiente decisionnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In connection with the Coronavirus COVID-19 pandemic, the Government of Aruba took the following crisis measures to prevent the spread of COVID-19

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 10 di juli 2020 ta habri frontera pa henter Merca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting July 10, 2020, borders will reopen for travel to the United States

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di juli 2020 lo habri frontera pa Europa, Canada y Caribe cu excepcion di Republica Dominicana y Haiti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting July 1, 2020, international borders for Europe, Canada and the Caribbean will reopen for travel with the exception of The Dominican Republic and Haiti

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 15 di juni 2020 lo habri e “Bubble ABC” cual ta encera; Aruba, Boneiro y Corsow. Lo por biaha entre e islanan aki di Reino Hulandes den Caribe sin cu mester bay den cuarentena pero haciendo medische screening of test ora di yega
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 15, 2020, “Bubble ABC” will begin, which includes; Aruba, Bonaire and Curacao. Travel is possible between the Dutch Kingdom Islands in the Caribbean without having to go into quarantine, but doing a medical screening or a test on arrival

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 10 di juni 2020 centronan di fiesta por habri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 10, 2020, establishments for holding parties can open

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 10 di juni 2020 bar y club nocturno por habri (segun orario di ciere)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 10, 2020, bars and nightclubs can open (according to their closing time)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 10 di juni 2020 conferencianan y lugarnan di reunion por habri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 10, 2020, conferences and places to meet/gather can be reopened

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 10 di juni 2020 por haci deporte paden
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 10, 2020, indoor sporting activities are permitted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 10 di juni 2020 por bishita pa Cas di Cuido di nos grandinan, segun protocol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 10, 2020, visiting Elderly care homes is permitted, following the protocol’s guidelines

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di juni 2020 luganan di Spa, Salon di Massage y Sauna por habri
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 1, 2020, Spa, Massage Services and Sauna's are allowed to reopen

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di juni 2020 parti paden di restaurant por ta habri te cu 10'or di anochi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 1, 2020, restaurants with inside seating are allowed to stay open till 10:00 PM

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 di juni 2020 e oficinanan di Lotto y di otro weganan por habri te cu 6'or y mei di atardi. Casinonan si ainda meser keda cera
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting June 1, 2020, lottery kiosks and other lottery games will remain open till 6:30 PM. Casino's will remain closed for now

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 28 di mei Toque de Queda ta ser kita, manera stipula den AB2020No.80
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting May 28, 2020, the curfew is lifted, as stipulated in the AB2020No.80

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 25 di ,mei 2020, toque de queda ta entre 12.00 am te cu 5.00am y orario di cierre di establecimento ta 10.00 pm segun AB2020No.78
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting May 25, 2020, the curfew will be from 12 am to 5 am and all establishments must close by 10 pm, according to the AB2020No.78

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 8 di mei 2020, Minister di Turismo, Salud Publico y Deporte, Sr. Dangui Oduber, a anuncia cu e frontera di Aruba lo habri tentativamente entre 15 di juni y 1 di juli, 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On May 8, 2020, the Minister of Tourism, Public Health and Sport, Mr. Dangui Oduber, announced that the Aruban border will open tentatively between June15 and July 1, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 28 april 2020 adapta e toque de queda, pero e ta keda na vigor di 10 or di anochi te cu 5 or di mainta cu excepcion pa Botica na Warda y Hospital, conforme AB2020No.62
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting April 28, 2020, the curfew has been adapted and is now in effect from 10:00 pm until 5:00 am. Exceptions are the pharmacies on duty and the hospital as stated in the Official Gazette AB2020No.62

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 28 di april, 2020 e orario di ciere di establecimento a cambia pa 9.00 pm
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting Starting April 28, 2020, all establishments must close at 9.00 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta extende e lockdown aereo te cu 31 di mei 2020, manera anuncia door di Prome Minister, mr. Evelyn Wever-Croes riba 20 di maart 2020. E-mail pa Arubianonan residente cu ta pega den exterior: RegresoAruba@crisis.aw
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: who are stuck abroad (due to the border closure) can send an email to RegresoAruba@crisis.aw

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scolnan ta keda cera te cu 11 di mei 2020, manera anuncia riba 9 di april 2020 door di Minister di Enseñansa, dr. Armando (Rudy) Lampe
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Schools remain closed until May 11, 2020, as announced on April 9, 2020 by Minister of Education, Dr. Armando (Rudy) Lampe

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E-mail pa Arubianonan residente cu ta pega den exterior: RegresoAruba@crisis.aw
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: E-mail for assistance for residents (inscribed in the civil registry of Aruba) stuck abroad: RegresoAruba@crisis.aw

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Medidanan ta na vigor te cu 19 april 2020, segun AB2020No.46
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These measures are valid till April 19, 2020, pursuant to AB2020No.46

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante diadomingo 29 di maart un estado di Shelter in place ta drenta na vigor segun e AB2020No.43. Esaki ta encera cu hende ta prohibi pa sali di cas, si no ta pa cosnan esencial manera cumpra cuminda, bay botica, of pa haci ehercicio. Esaki medida aki ta aplica pa e gruponan no esencial. Adhunto e lista di e gruponan No esencial. Negoshinan cu ta ricibi cliente mester maneha nan clientela manteniendo distancia di 2 meter leu entre cada persona. Si no haci esaki gobierno por cera e negoshi y compania ta haya un multa. Tambe a decreta samenscholingsverbod, unda no ta permiti pa 4 hende of mas ta hunto riba caya, solamente si ta famia biba bou mesun dak
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting March 29, 2020, a Shelter in Place is into effect for the entire population, as announced in the AB2020No.43. This means that you are not allowed to leave the house, only for necessary things, such as buying food, going to the pharmacy, exercising or getting gas. The measures apply to non-essential groups. See overview of non-essential businesses/ activities. Businesses must instruct their customers that they must keep 2 meters apart. If the social distance rule is not enforced, companies will be closed and fined. A ban on gathering (loitering) has also been issued, in particular the prohibition of group formation in public space by 4 or more people, with the exception of families living under the same roof

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scolnan lo ta cera entrante dialuna 16 di maart te cu 20 di april2020, despues lo evalua e situacion.  E medida tuma ta conta pa scol, creche y tur instancia cu ta encarga cu educacion y cuido di nos muchanan. Wak e carta di Minister di Enseñansa di 26 maart 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Schools are closed starting Monday, March 16 till April 20, 2020. This measure applies to schools, daycare centers, and all organizations that are in charge of the education and care of our children. After this date the situation will be evaluated. See letter of the Minister of Education

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Toque de queda ta keda na vigor di 9 or di anochi te cu 6 or di mainta cu excepcion pa Botica na Warda y Hospital, conforme AB2020No.39
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The curfew is still in effect from 9:00 pm until 6:00 am. Exceptions are the pharmacies on duty and the hospital as stated in the Official Gazette AB2020No.39

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scolnan lo ta cera entrante dialuna 16 di maart te cu 20 di april2020, despues lo evalua e situacion.  E medida tuma ta conta pa scol, creche y tur instancia cu ta encarga cu educacion y cuido di nos muchanan. Wak e carta di Minister di Enseñansa di 26 maart 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Schools are closed starting Monday, March 16 till April 20, 2020. This measure applies to schools, daycare centers, and all organizations that are in charge of the education and care of our children. After this date the situation will be evaluated. See letter of the Minister of Education.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 24 maart 2020 tur bar y restaurant mester ta cera. Unico excepcion ta pa take-out, drive thru y delivery di cuminda. Tur establecimento mester cera 8.00 pm. Pompnan  di gasoline por keda habri te cu 8 or di anochi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting Tuesday, March 24, 2020, all bars and restaurant must close. Only exceptions are take-out, drive thru and food delivery. All establishments must close at 8.00 pm. Gasoline stations must also close at 8.00 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 24 di maart 2020 ta prohibi pa bende lotto, catochi of otro sorto di loteria
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting March 24, 2020 it is prohibited to sell or offer lotteries, lotto, catochi or other forms of gambling

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: A tuma e decision cu tur residente pega den exterior y cu ta inscribi na registro civil (Censo) por regresa Aruba. Aruba Tourism Authority ta encarga cu coordinacion di nan regreso. Linea di contacto pa Arubianonan residente cu ta pega den exterior 569-6897, 5689251 of 5637928. Na yegada lo pone e personanan den cuarentena pa 14 dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The decision was made that all residents (inscribed in the civil registry of Aruba) stuck abroad are allowed to return to Aruba.The Aruba Tourism Authority is in charge with the coordination of their return. Contact numbers for assistance or registration are: 569-6897, 5689251 of 5637928. Upon arrival these people will be placed in quarantine for 14 days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 21 di maart ta introduci un toque de queda (verplichte avondklok, curfew) for di 9'or di anochi te 6'or di mainta. Unico excepcion ta e trahadonan di instancianan vital. Nan tin cu haya un prueba di nan doño di trabou cu nan por mustra polis. Persona cu no cumpli cu e toque de queda por haya un multa di te cu AWG. 10.000,00. Por haya mas informacion den e AB2020No.38 di 20 maart 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting Saturday, March 21, 2020, a compulsory curfew will be set from 9 pm to 6 am. Only vital groups are allowed to go to work, but employees of the vital authorities must be able to show proof of their employers to the police. Persons who do not observe the curfew can be fined up to AWG. 10,000.00. For more information, you may consult the Official Gazette AB2020no.38 of  March 2020, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 19 di maart tur Casino y Teatro di pelicula y gym tin cu cera. Actividadnan deportivo den grupo tin cu stop di tuma lugar. Tur establecimento mester cera 8:00 PM. Esaki ta conta pa bar y restaurant di hotelnan tambe.Tin excepcion pa:botica na warda, restaurant solamente via drive tru  y delivery, nan por cera 10:00 PM. Pompnan di gasoline por keda habri te cu 10:00 PM sirbiendo via di bentana. Instancianan cu no cumpli e orara di cierre di tienda obligatoria por haya un boet te cu AWG. 1.000,00. Por haya mas informacion den AB2020No.35
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Starting Thursday, March 19,  2020, all casinos, movie theaters and gyms must close. Team sports activities are not allowed. All establishments, shops, restaurants and businesses must close at 8.00 pm. This also applies to hotels bars and restaurants. Exceptions: Pharmacy on duty, restaurants that offer  drive-thru and delivery service, Gasoline stations. only with service through the window. These establishments must close at 10:00 pm. Companies that do not adhere to the mandatory closing time can be fined up to AWG. 1000.00. For more information, you may consult the Official Gazette AB2020No.35

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Scolnan lo ta cera entrante dialuna 16 di maart te cu 30 maart 2020, despues lo evalua e situacion.  E medida tuma ta conta pa scol, creche y tur instancia cu ta encarga cu educacion y cuido di nos muchanan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Schools are closed starting Monday, March 16 till March 31, 2020. This measure applies to schools, daycare centers, and all organizations that are in charge of the education and care of our children. After this date the situation will be evaluated

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante diasabra 21 di maart te cu 31 di maart 2020 no ta admiti residente na Aruba (update 19 di maart 2020). Mas informacion por haya den e AB2020No.36.  Ta restringui vuelonan for di tur pais entrante 17 di maart te cu 31 di maart 2020, cu excepcion di residentenan y carga. Linea di contacto pa Arubianonan residente cu ta pega den exterior 569-6897, 5689251 of 5637928. Por fabor, tene cuenta cu lo siguiente: Por tuma yamada regular of via WhatsApp – tambe por manda texto via WhatsApp; Mester ta residente (ingezetene ) inscribi den registro civil di Aruba; Aerolineanan Mericano ta exigi 2 tipo di ID – pa prueba cu un persona ta residente di Aruba (cedula); Aerolineanan di Latam no ta exigi esaki; Personanan dependiente di asuntonan di AZV, por fabor yama AZV pa regla regreso pa Aruba, y mustra bo kaarchi di AZV; Lamantablemente, na e momento aki, Venezuela ta full sera; no por move ciudadanonan f’or di e pais; nos ta conseha pa e personanan aki tuma contacto cu embahada Hulandes na Caracas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As per Saturday, March 21 till March 31, 2020 Aruban residents are not permitted to return to Aruba (update March 19, 2020). For more information, you may consult the Official Gazette AB2020No.36. As per Tuesday, March 17, 2020, till March 31, 2020, the entry of travelers (inbound flights) will be restricted, except for legal residents and cargo.  Contact numbers for residents of Aruba stuck abroad (because of the border closure) are: 569-6897, 5689251 of 5637928. Please take into account: You can also call via Whatsapp or send a Whatsapp text message; You must be a citizen meaning you must be registered in the civil registry of Aruba; The USA airlines require 2 types of ID, as proof that the person is a resident of Aruba (ID card). Latin American airlines do not have this requirement. Persons who were send abroad by AZV, must call AZV to make arrangement to return to Aruba and must show the AZV card. Unfortunately the border with Venezuela is totally closed, hence citizens cannot return. We advise persons stuck in Venezuela to contact the Dutch Ambassador in Caracas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 14 di maart Aeropuerto Internacional Reina Beatrix a eleva su control riba buelonan procedente di paisnan cu no ta cay bou di e lista di restrincion, pa ser exacto paisnan Europeo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since March 14, 2020, the Queen Beatrix International Airport elevated its control on flights arriving from other countries that do not fall under the travel restriction

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta prohibi haci bishita na e casnan di cuido di nos grandinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Visits at nursing homes are prohibited

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Gobierno lo traha a base di personal minimo. Lo duna servicio  na publico, lo evita aglomeracion (wak carta di Minister President mr. Eveln Wever-Croes)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Government departments will operate with minimal staffing (see letter of the Prime Minister Mrs. Evelyn Wever-Croes in Dutch)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Awor nos mester concentra pa contene y preveni cu e virus ta wordo transmiti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Now we must focus on containing and preventing the transmission of the virus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Nos ta pidi tu hende atención pa esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: We urge everyone to comply with these measures

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E decisionnan aki a ser tuma despues di amplio deliberacion cu e comision di crisis di Gobierno di Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: were taken in close consultation with the crisis committee of the Government of Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esnan di mas riesgo ta nos grandinan riba 60 aña e esnan cu ta sufri di malesa cronico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Those most at risk for serious complication from COVID-19 are people older than 60 years and people with chronic diseases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Laba man mas tanto posibel pa 20 seconde y uza habon of hand sanitizer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Wash your hands as frequently as possible with soap for 20 seconds or use hand sanitizers with at least 60% alcohol

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Evita di bin den contacto cu otronan, saludo otro sin duna man, brasa of sunchi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Avoid physical contact, greet one another without shaking hands, hugging or kissing

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Wak e video tocante con coronavirus ta plama di un hende pa otro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Watch the video about the spread of coronavirus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Wak e video conoce e sintomanan di corona virus
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Watch the video about the spread of coronavirus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Wak e video fight the transmission of CoronaVirus  with Carl Roosberg- Galloway Jr. It starts with you
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Watch the video of the Department of Public Health fight the transmission of Coronavrus  with Carl Roosberg- Galloway Jr. It starts with you

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a anuncia cu despues di consulta profundo cu tur instancia concerni, e frontera lo habri entrante 15 di juni 2020
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba announces that after many deliberations with all parties concerned, the government of Aruba has decided to open the borders as of June 15, 2020

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Frontera lo habri den diferente fase
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The borders will be open in different phases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo tuma e medidanan necesario di prevencion pa protega e comunidad di Aruba como tambe nos bishitantenan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Necessary precautions will be taken to protect the Aruban community as well as our visitors

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo habri frontera pa Europa, Canada y Caribe cu excepcion di Republica Dominicana y Haiti
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: International borders for Europe, Canada and the Caribbean will reopen for travel with the exception of The Dominican Republic and Haiti

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta habri pa henter Merca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Borders will reopen for travel to the United States

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas informacion por haya riba e website di Aruba Tourism Authority (ATA):
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More information is provided on the website of the Aruba Tourism Authority:

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Discurso di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Governor Christmas speech 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobernador di Aruba Alfonso Boekhoudt a duna su mensahe di Pasco riba 24 december ultimo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Governor of Aruba Alfonso Boekhoudt gave his traditional annual Christmas speech on 24 December

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por a wak e prome discurso di Pasco di Gobernador via e canalnan di television local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The governor's Christmas speech was broadcast on the local television stations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por lesa aki e texto integral di e mensahe di Pasco di Excelencia Gobernador Boekhoudt
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Read Governor Alfonso Boekhoudt 's speech transcript

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siguiente condicionnan ta aplicabel riba e potret
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following conditions apply to the photo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gabinete di Gobernador di Aruba (KabGA tin derecho di autor riba e potret den e seccion aki y ta reserva esaki explicitamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The copyright on the photograph in this section rests with the Cabinet of the Governor of Aruba (KabGA) and is expressly reserved

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin embargo, ta permiti pa uza e potret pa uzo editorial door di e medionan di comunicacion, pa exhib’e den lugarnan publico, pa uzo priva y pa meta educativo. Sin embargo, KabGA ta reserva e derecho di actua si e metodo di publicacion di e potret, segun opinion di KabGA, ta contra dignidad gubernamental, ta considera su uzo como di indole promocional (propaganda) of ta uz’e cu un proposito idealista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, it is permitted to use the photographs for editorial use in news media, for display in public places, private use and educational purposes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: KabGA lo no reacciona riba pregunta di tercera personanan si tuma medida (legal).den algun caso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The KabGA does not respond to questions from third parties if in certain cases (legal) steps are taken.

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cambio di clima
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kiko e ta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is it

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Directie Natuur en Milieu kier informa mas tocante e significado di cambio di clima
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Nature ad Environment wants to inform the community about climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: con esaki ta tuma lugar, kico ta e consecuencianan y kico nos por haci na Aruba pa aporta na un reduccion di e efectonan di e fenomeno aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What is climate change? What is causing climate change and what can we do in Aruba to reduce the impact of climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E terminologia cu ta uza, manera Carbon dioxide, fossil fuel, methane, nitrous oxide halocarbons (CTC’s, HFC’s, PFC’s), Sulphur hexafluoride, hopi biaha ta confundi hende, pero nan ta referi na e fenomeno mas tanto papia di dje rond mundo, cu ta cambio di clima
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The frequently used terms like Carbon dioxide, fossil fuel, methane, nitrous oxide halocarbons (CTC’s, HFC’s. PFC’s) Sulphur hexafluoride can be confusing for many, but they all refer to the most common discussed phenomena: Climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Carbon dioxide ta keda produci ora uza fossil fuel pa genera energia y ora corta, rosa, kima y elimina gran cantidad di area (mondinan)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Carbon dioxide is produced by burning fossil fuels to generate electricity and all other forms of mechanical use of fossil fuels like deforestation with heavy equipment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actividadnan humano tambe ta contribui na cambio di clima door di laga atras greenhouse gases
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Human activity is also contributing to climate change with the emission of greenhouse gasses

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Otro actividad cu ta contribui na e fenomeno aki ta agricultura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Agriculture is also a contributor to the climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Methane ta produci nitrous oxide den cantidad grandi y esaki ta keda emiti ora, por ehempel ta uza fertilisante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Methane produces large amounts of nitrous oxide which is released when using fertilizers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cria di bestia ta produci 37% y 65% di e emision di methane y nitrous oxide, respectivamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Animal farming produces 37% methane emission and 65% of nitrous oxide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Aunke cu carbon dioxide ta e gas cu ta mas mal mira rond di mundo como e gas cu mas ta aporta na cambio di clima, e dos tipo di gasnan aki ta 30 biaha mas potente y daniño cu carbon dioxide
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: While the focus has primarily been on carbon dioxide as being the wrongdoer, methane and nitrous oxide are 30 times more harmful compared to carbon dioxide

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cambio di clima ta afectando e produccion di cuminda y e impacto lo ta devastador den fututo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Climate change is affecting food production and it will only become worst in the future

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cambio di clima ta trece cune periodonan extremo, por ehempel periodo di secura cu lo aumenta, como tambe temporada di horcan cu lo bira mas y mas potente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Climate change will cause extreme weather periods; droughts will last longer, while hurricanes will become stronger and bigger

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Temperatura mas halto lo causa cu den e areanan unda poco awacero ta cay, lo bira mas dificil pa cria bestia y/of planta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Increasing temperatures will make it impossible to produce any kind of food in drier areas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E datonan di United Nations ta sugeri cu mundialmente, mester reduci pa aña 2050, 80% di e emision di gasnan di greenhouse den paisnan desaroya, p’asina por keda bou di e average stipula di un aumento di temperatura cu 2 grado Celcius
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: According to the United Nations, 80% of greenhouse gasses should be reduced by 2050 in order to stay below the average temperature increase of 2 degrees celsius

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Halocarbons ta kimiconan artificial y e otro cu ta contene sulphur cu ta keda emiti door di proceso industrial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Halocarbons are artificial chemicals and together with sulphur hexafluoride are emitted by the industrial productions

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambio di clima lo tin un impacto riba e medio ambiente globalmente, incluyendo Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Climate change will have a global impact on the environment, including for Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: En general mas liher e cambio di clima, mas halto e riesgo pa sufri dañonan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The quicker the climate changes, the higher the risks for potential disasters

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambio di nivel di lama ta proyecta di subi entre 9 pa 88cm pa aña 2100, causando inundacionan den areanan abou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The sea level is projected to rise anywhere from 9 cm to 88 cm by 2100, causing inundations on the lower areas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tin temporada cu e temperatura lo subi mas cu nos ta custumbra y lo tin riesgo mas halto di horcan y di mal tempo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will be seasons where the temperatures will be higher then usual with a higher risk for storms and hurricanes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E efectonan na caminda pa Aruba, cu awor caba ya nos ta experencia, ta inundacionnan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The upcoming effects for Aruba, will be flooding

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki lo aumenta, si nos no haci nada cu e fluho di awa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will only become more frequent in the event nothing is done with the discharge of rainwater

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mal tempo, olanan tropical y e frecuencia, como tambe e magnitud di horcan lo aumenta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Storms and tropical waves will increase in frequency, while hurricanes will also become stronger

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Consecuencia di esaki ta cu Aruba lo core mas riesgo, particularmente na unda a construi riba beach of na unda a kita matanan di mangel pa desaroya tereno
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Consequently Aruba will be at risk, particularly near the constructed areas on the beach and where mangroves have been removed for developments

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Temperatura lo subi y na unda tin mas construccion esaki lo aumenta mas cu na unda tin vegetacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The temperatures will rise, in particular near the developed areas compared to the green areas

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Kico nos por haci localmente pa contribui na un reduccion di e cambio di clima
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: What can we do in order to help reduce the effects of climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Spaar energia door di uza luz y aparatonan cu no ta uza hopi electricidad
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Save energy by using energy efficient lightbulbs and appliances

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Core auto cu ta uza menos gasoline
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Drive fuel efficient cars

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Come menos carni y mas berdura
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Eat less meats and more produce

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Conserva mata local den bo cura, planta mata rond di cas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Preserve local flora while growing more plants around your house

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Refleha riba bo uzo di electricidad y reta bo mes pa reduci bo footprint pa e aña venidero
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Contemplate about your electrical use and set new goals to reduce your footprint for the upcoming year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo ta un bon idea pa calcula bo carbon footprint
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Know your carbon footprint, use the carbon footprint calculator

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Directie Natuur en Milieu kier haci un yamada di urgencia pa nos como humanidad considera y haci cambionan necesario pa contribui menos na Climate Change
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Directie Natuur en Milieu is pleading the community to consider and make the necessary changes to have a minimal impact on climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No ta importa con chikito nos Aruba ta, pero si cada un di nos haci algo, lo contribui grandemente na e reduccion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It does not matter how small Aruba is, together we can have a positive effect on climate change

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Limite di salario a aumenta entrante 1 januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Increase wage limit as per January 1, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ministerio di Asuntonan Social y Labor y Departamento di Labor y Investigacion (DAO) ta informa cu e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 (Arbeidsverordening 2013) lo subi entrante 1 januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Ministry of Social Affairs and Labor and the Department of Labor and Research (DAO) announces that as per January 1, 2019 the wage limit for the application of the Labor Ordinance 2013 will increase

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 1 januari 2019 e factor cu ta uza pa calcula e limite di salario pa aplicacion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 ta aumenta di 2.4 pa 2.5
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: As of January 1, 2019, the factor for calculating the wage limit for the application of the Labor Ordinance 2013 will increase from 2.4 to 2.5

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta determina e limite di salario door di multiplica e salario minimo cu un factor di 2.5
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The wage limit is determined by multiplying the minimum wage by a factor of 2.5

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Salario minimo (Awg. 1.711,15) x factor 2.5= Awg. 4.277,88
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Minimum wage (Awg. 1.711,15) x factor 2.5 = Awg. 4.277,88

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta encera cu trahadonan cu ta gana un salario di Awg. 4.277,88 pa luna of Awg. 51.334,56 pa aña of menos ta cay bou di proteccion di e Ordenansa Laboral 2013 y tin derecho riba tur e condicionnan di trabou stipula den e ley aki, manera orarionan maximo di trabou pa dia y pa siman, dianan di sosiego, pago di overtime y pago riba dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This means that employees with a monthly salary of Awg. 4.277,88 or Awg. 51.334,56 per year or less fall under the protection of the Labor Ordinance 2013, and are entitled to the conditions specified in this ordinance, including maximum working hours per day and per week, rest days, overtime pay and paid holidays or holiday and commemoration days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Discurso di Pasco Gobernador 24 di december 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Christmas speech Governor on December 24, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 24 di december 2018, bispo di Pasco di Nacemento, Gobernador di Aruba Sr. Alfonso Boekhoudt lo duna su discurso di Pasco via e canalnan di television local
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Christmas Eve, December 24, the Governor of Aruba Alfonso Boekhoudt will give a Christmas speech on the local television stations

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E programa special aki lo pasa anochi pa 8.00pm na Canal 22, DiarioTV-Canal 48 y Telearuba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Canal 22, Diario TV-Canal 48 and Telearuba will broadcast this special program at 20:00 hrs (8.00pm)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta invita henter e comunidad di Aruba pa sintonisa television local diadomingo 24 di december pa e mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador Boekhoudt
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The entire community is invited to watch the Governor’s Christmas message on local television this Monday, December 24

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Potret: ©Gabinete di Gobernador
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Photo: © Cabinet Governor

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E siguiente condicionnan ta aplicabel riba e potret
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The following conditions apply to the photo

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gabinete di Gobernador di Aruba (KabGA tin derecho di autor riba e potret den e seccion aki y ta reserva esaki explicitamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The copyright on the photograph in this section rests with the Cabinet of the Governor of Aruba (KabGA) and is expressly reserved

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin embargo, ta permiti pa uza e potret pa uzo editorial door di e medionan di comunicacion, pa exhib’e den lugarnan publico, pa uzo priva y pa meta educativo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, it is permitted to use the photographs for editorial use in news media, for display in public places, private use and educational purposes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sin embargo, KabGA ta reserva e derecho di actua si e metodo di publicacion di e potret, segun opinion di KabGA, ta contra dignidad gubernamental, ta considera su uzo como di indole promocional (propaganda) of ta uz’e cu un proposito idealista
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However, KabGA reserves the right to act if according to KabGA opinion the (method of) publication of the photo is contrary to governmental dignity, can be regarded as pomotional use (advertising) or is used with an idealistic purpose

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: KabGA lo no reacciona riba pregunta di tercera personanan si tuma medida (legal).den algun caso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The KabGA does not respond to questions from third parties if in certain cases (legal) steps are taken

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico ta informa: Accion di vacunacion contra Influenza
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Public Health: Get your influenza vaccine

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde dialuna dia 17 di december e vacuna contra Influenza pa temporada 2018/2019 ta disponibel na seccion di Malesanan Contagioso di Departamento di Salud Publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Since Monday december 17th 2018, the new Influenza vaccine for 2019 is available at the Department of Public Health’s office of Contagious Diseases

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diahuebs dia 20 di december lo bay tin un accion di vacunacion solamente pa e grupo di risico cu lo tuma lugar na ImSan for di 9:00-11:00 di mainta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Thursday, december 20th 2018 there will be a vaccination day at the ImSan in San Nicolas from 9:00 am - 11:00 am

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Personanan riba 60 aña mester bin solamente cu nan carnet di AZV valido y e grupo di risico bou 60 aña mester bin cu nan carnet AZV valido y un recept di dokter
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This vaccination day is specifically for those with a high risk of complications due to the flu virus. 60 plussers should only show their AZV card while those at higher risk but under the age of 60 years should present their AZV card together with the doctor’s prescription

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa personanan cu no por cana bon, nos seccion lo duna e servicio di vacunacion den auto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Those with limited mobility will receive their vaccination in their car in the parking lot

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba e dia aki y na e localidad aki lo no ta posibel pa cumpra vacuna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The purchase of the vaccination is not possible on this day at the ImSan

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Por cumpra vacuna solamente na Departamento di Salud Publico di dialuna pa diabierna for di 7:45-11:45 y di 1:15-3:30
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For those wanting the vaccination without being in the higher risk group, can only purchase the influenza vaccine at the Department of Public Health’s office from Monday to Friday from 7:45 am-1:45 am and from 1:15 pm - 3:30 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu Departamento di Salud Publico na 5224200
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please contact the Department of Public Health at 5224200

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Vacuna di influenza pa temporada 2018/2019 ta disponibel na servicio di Malesanan Infeccioso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Influenza vaccine for the 2018-2019 season is available

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur aña di nobo entre luna di november pa december ta un custumber cu e grupo di riesgo den nos comunidad ta acudi na Departamento di Salud Publico pa busca nan vacuna contra griep (influenza)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Every year, in the months of November and December, the higher risk part of the community find their way to the Department of Public Health in order to have the new influenza vaccine administered

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Bou di grupo di riesgo nos ta referi na personanan cu ta na risico pa desaroya complicacionnan grave manera bronkitis y pulmonia pa motibo di griep
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The higher risk group includes all those with high risk of severe complications like bronchitis and pneumonia due to the flu virus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E personanan aki ta hende grandi riba 60 aña, mucha bou di 2 aña, personanan cu ta sufri di malesanan cronico of malesa di nan sistema respiratorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This includes those at age of 60 and higher, infants up to 2 years, those with chronic illnesses or respiratory issues

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe personanan cu obesidad, na estado y cu ta sufri di un sistema inmunologico abou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This also includes obese individuals, pregnant individuals and those with a low immune system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Salud Publico kier informa na e grupo di riesgo y comunidad completo cu e vacuna contra influenza ta disponibel na nos servicio di Malesanan Infeccioso pa Afl 20,-
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This is available at the office of the Infectious diseases for Awg. 20,00 for the general public while free for those in the higher risk group

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur persona cu ta cay bou di e grupo di riesgo por pasa busca nan vacuna completamente gratis cu nan carnet di AZV y un recept di nan docter di cas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Those in the higher risk group will receive the flu vaccine free of charge, but they should get the prescription at the office of their general practitioner

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adulto riba 60 aña por presenta cu nan carchi AZV solamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: 60 plussers will also receive the flu vaccine free by showing their AZV card

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa mas informacion por tuma contacto cu servicio di Malesanan Infeccioso di Departamento di Salud Publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For more information please contact the office of Infectious Diseases at the Department of Public Health

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Boticanan na warda 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Night service pharmacies 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Segun e Landsbesluit dienstregeling apotheken AB 1991 GT. No. 16, Departamento di Inspectie Volksgezondheid ta anuncia e boticanan na warda pa 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In accordance with the National Decree pharmacies schedule AB 1991 GT. No. 16, the Public Health Inspection Division announces the night and Sunday schedules for pharmacies for 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adhunto ta haya un resumen di e boticanan na warda pa 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Below you will find an overview of the on-duty pharmacies for 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ciere di fin di aña na biblioteca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Changed opening hours National Library in connection with the holidays

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca Nacional Aruba ta anuncia cambio di orario pa e dianan di fiesta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In connection with the festive season, the National Library announces its modified opening hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca ta cera otro siman, diabierna dia 21 di december, 12or
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The library is closed the following week

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Biblioteca lo ta habri normal dia 3 dia januari
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: From January 3, 2019 the normal opening times will apply again

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Staf y personal ta desea su bishitantenan dianan di fiesta dichoso, trankilo, yena cu paz
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The management and staff of Biblioteca Nacional Aruba wish all visitors happy holidays and a beautiful new year and hope to welcome everyone again in 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Maneho orario di tienda
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Policy opening hours shops

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Asunto Economico, Comercio y Industria ta informa cu e orarionan cu un negoshi ta permiti pa ta habri pa publico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Department of Economic Affairs, Trade and Industry announces that shops may be opened to the public at the following times

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dialuna pa diasabra di 6.00 or di mainta te u 12:00 or di anochi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Monday to Saturday from 6.00 am to midnight

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diadomingo y dianan di fiesta di 9:00 or di mainta te 10:00 or di anochi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Sundays and certain holidays and memorial days from 9 am to 10 pm

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Dia di Labor no ta permiti pa un negoshi ta habri pa public
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On Labor Day is it not allowed for shops to open to the public

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta den cuadro di e maneho faborabel pa cu orarionan den cual ta permiti pa un negoshi ta habri segun :Landsverordening Winkelsluiting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This in the context of the favorable policy for opening hours of shops, in accordance with the Land Ordinance of shop closing hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe esaki no ta conta pa sector horeca ni pa tiendanan cu ta situa den un hotel cu tin hotelvergunning
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: However,its does not apply to the hotel industry or to shops in hotels that have a hotel permit

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Desde 10 di juli 2018, minister di Finansa, Asunto Economico y Cultura a dicidi cu no mester pidi dispensacion mas pa lokee ta trata e orarionan di operacion di un negoshi manera ariba menciona
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In accordance with the decision of the Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture, from 10 July 2018 onwards, it is no longer necessary for shops to request an exemption to be open to the public during the aforementioned opening hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante dianan di fiesta e maneho di orario ta keda vigente y no ta haci excepcion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the holidays, the policy is still valid and no exceptions will be made

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo eherce control riba cumplimento di maneho di orario
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There will be controls on the compliance with the opening hours

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cambio den prijs di productonan petrolero 12 december 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: New prices for petroleum products December 12, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Basa riba e posting promedio di Platts US Market scan (Gulf Coast) pa e periodo di 1 te cu 30 di november 2018, Minister di Finansas, Asuntonan Economico y Cultura ta anuncia e prijsnan di benta di combustibel nobo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Minister of Finance, Economic Affairs and Culture herewith announces the adjusted prices for petroleum products based on the average postings as per the Platts US Market scan (Gulf Coast) for the period of November 1st through November 30th, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Compaña pa algun grafico ta presenta e prijs di combustibel entrante 12 di december 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Accompanied by some graphics commencing December 12, 2018 the prices are as follows

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: De hierboven genoemde benzine prijs houd in een aanpassing van +6,5 cent per liter voor benzine en +3 cent per liter voor gasolie en kerosine
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The new petroleum product prices include an adjustment of +6,5 cents per liter for gasoline and a +3 cents per liter adjustment for gas oil and kerosene

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pa entre otro trece e tarifa dia accijns bek na e suma di mei 2007
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This adjustment, among other things, serves to maintain the excise tax at the level established in May of 2007

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E prijsnan ta inclui BBO/BAZV/BAVP
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: BBO(turnover tax)/BAZV(Health tax)/BAVP is included in the prices

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Remedi Valsartan di e fabrica Pharmachemie saca for di mercado pa motibo di contaminacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pharmachemie produced Valsartan drug recalled due to contamination

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Inspectie Volksgezondheid Aruba (IVA) a haya notificacion cu saca un cierto produccion (batch) di e remedi Valsartan di e fabrica Pharmachemie for di mercado na Boticanan na Aruba pa motibo di contaminacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Inspection for Health Aruba (IVA) received a recall notification for the drug called Valsartan produced by Pharmachemie

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta prescribie remedi Valsartan pa individuonan cu ta sufri di presion halto y cu problemanan di curason
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The drug Valsartan is prescribed to individuals suffering from high blood pressure and heart related symptoms

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E accion di e batchnan di Valsartan di Pharmachemie cu a saca for di mercado na augustus 2018 ta trata di e producto N-nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A previous recall in august 2018 of the same drug was due to the content of N-nitrosodimethylamine (NDMA)

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E biaha aki e batchnan ta contene e stof N-nitrosodiethylamine (NDEA): un producto cu door di e proceso di fabricacion di Valsartan lo por wordo crea y cu posiblemente por aumenta e probabilidad pa haya cancer
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current recall is due to the contamination with N-nitrosodiethylamine (NDEA), an ingredient produced by Pharmachemie, suspected of being carcinogen

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Sinembargo, e chens cu en berdad por haya cancer door di bebe e remedi Valsartan cu ta contamina cu NDEA ta hopi chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is however is not yet proven to increase the risk of cancer in patients taking the with NDEA contaminated Valsartan

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na Aruba e remedi generico valsartan ta obtenibel cu receta di dokter na botica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In Aruba, the generic drug Valsartan is only available by doctor’s prescription at the pharmacy

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E compania farmaceutico Pharmachemie na Hulanda cu ta produci y distribui e remedi Valsartan a avisa e importadonan di remedi na Aruba y Inspectie Volksgezondheid Aruba di e contaminacion y e riesgo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Pharmachemie voluntarily notified importers and the Inspection for Healthcare in Aruba about the recall due the contamination and possible risks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Seguidamente, e boticanan a kita e batchnan aki for di nan botica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The imported batches have been identified as contaminated and thus removed from all local pharmacies

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba e potret tin indica con pa haya e RVG-nummer riba e paki di remedi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The contaminated batch numbers are produced by Pharmachemie with RVG numbers

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Public Request for Proposal na e industria di desperdicio pa energia pa un Waste Treatment Facility
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Public request for proposal to waste-to-energy industry for a Solid Waste Treatment Facility

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba tin intencion pa pidi e industria di waste-to-energy (di desperdicio pa energia) pa entrega propuestanan pa implementacion di un Solid Waste Treatment Facility pa medio di e proceso di destaho Request for Proposal (RFP)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba intends to solicit proposals from the waste-to-energy industry for the implementation of a “Solid Waste Treatment Facility” through a Request for Proposal (RFP) procurement process

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas informacion por haya den e documentonan adhunto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: More information is provided in the following documents

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Registracion ta posibel via e link aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Registration is possible via this link

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Love4Art Studio ta expone obranan nobo na biblioteca
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Love4Art Studio exhibits new works in library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Miembronan di Love4Art Studio ta organisa nan exposicion anual na Biblioteca Nacional Aruba di 3 pa 21, 2018
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The members of the Love4Art Studio will present their annual exposition at the public library from December 3 till December 21, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta habri pa publico durante orario regular di biblioteca na Playa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The exposition is open during regular opening hours of the library

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E exposicion di grupo ta un combinacion di cuadra y obranan di ansemblahe titula ‘Archetypes and sacred contracts’ cu a crea den ultimo aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The exposition is titled ‘Archetypes and sacred contracts’ and is a presentation of works made this year, both paintings and assemblage works

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Love4Art Studio a keda forma algun aña pasa door di un grupo di hende muher creativo cu a dicidi di keda hunto, inspira otro y siña hunto pa yega nan metanan artistico
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Love4Art Studio was formed a few years ago by a group of creative women who decided to stay together, inspire each other and continue pursuing their artistic goals

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Comision di Retiro ta tuma reces di 13 di december 2018 te 16 di januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Recess Termination of Employment Commission from December 13, 2018 to January 16 2018, 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Departamento di Labor y Investigacion ta informa tur cliente cu e Comision di Retiro ta bay cu vakantie di 13 di december 2018 te 16 di januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Department of Labor and Research informs its clients that the Termination of Employment Commission will recess from December 13, 2018 to January 16, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Director di Departamento di Labor y Investigacion ta ricibi conseho di Comision di Retiro cu ta delibera ariba tur peticion di retiro entrega na Departamento di Labor y Investigacion pa un of mas dunado di trabao cu e meta pa por ricibi un permiso pa termina un relacion di trabao cu un of mas trahado
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Director of the Department of Labor and Research obtains advice from an independent committee consisting of employer and employee representatives in the process of dismissal applications submitted by employers who seek permission from the Director of the Labor and Research Department to terminate the employment relationship with one or more employees

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Un comicion independiente cu ta consisti di representantenan di organisacion di dunado di trabao y representantenan di e mundo di sindicato (Artikel 3 Landsverordening Beëindiging Arbeidsrelatie)
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The so-called Dismissal Committee finds its basis in article 3 of the National Ordinance Termination of Employment Agreements, AB 1989 GT 14

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tur peticion pa por termina un relacion di trabao ta keda den proceso
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The pending applications will be processed through the normal procedure

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Casonan cu ta rekeri pa bay Comision di Retiro y cu ta pendiente di e proceso di contradeci (verweerproces) lo mester tene cuenta cu un retraso den esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event that the process in which employees defend themselves, which precede the advice and decision, are completed after December 13, 2018, you will have to take into account any delay in the handling of the dismissal requests

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Januari 2018 tur caso pendiente lo wordo entrega na Comicion di Retiro
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The relevant documents will in this case be presented for the first time in January 2019 to the Dismissal Committee for advice

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Gobierno di Aruba a lansa plan di Reforma Fiscal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Government of Aruba presents its plans for the fiscal reform

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Riba 3 di December 2018 Gabinete Wever-Croes a lansa e plannan di Reforma Fiscal
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: On December 3, 2018, the government revealed their plans for the fiscal reform

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante un presentacion a splica con den e siguiente dos aña lo traha den diferente fase pa trece e cambionan fundamental na nos sistema di belasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the presentation it was explained the the fiscal reform will include a two years transition time, in order to properly execute the fundamental changes into the tax system

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: lo trata e belastingnan mas personal, manera loonbelasting, inkomstenbelasting y grondbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: will deal with the personal taxes like income tax, wage tax and ground tax

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe lo trata e belastingnan cu ta causa comportacion negativo, manera alcohol y esnan cu ta afecta salud, manera sigaria, y kier frena nan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It also includes taxes on products that can have a negative impact on consumers, like alcohol and on product that can cause health issues like tobacco, in order to reduce its use

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta yama esakinan “sin” taxes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: These are called: “Sin taxes”

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo introduce e prome fase dia 1 di januari 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The first phase will be executed as per January 1st 2019

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: lo trata e belastingnan indirecto, manera BBO, invoerrechten y mas di e “sin” taxes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: will be the indirect taxes, like BBO, import taxes and more “Sin taxes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: lo trata e belastingnan cu comerciantenan ta paga, manera winstbelasting, y dividendbelasting, y e reforma di inkomstenbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: includes commercial taxes like profit taxes, dividend taxes and the reform on income taxes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: finalmente lo trata e belastingnan cu turista ta paga, manera roomtax, car rental tax, etc
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the implementation of tourism related taxes like room tax, car rental tax etc

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: INKOMSTENBELASTING
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Income taxes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e prome fase ta inclui un rebaho di e tarifa di loonbelasting y inkomstenbelasting, haciendo e mas husto
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Phase 1 includes a reduction of the loan tax and income tax rates, making this fairer

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tarifa actual cu tin 14 brackets ta cambia den un tarifa di 5 brackets
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This current rate is split in 14 brackets, with the reform this will be reduced to only 5 brackets

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta elimina e belasting riba entrada te na Awg.0027.751 Pues tur esnan cu tin entrada bou di Awg. 27.751,00 pa aña, of Awg.2.300,00 pa luna, NO ta bay paga belasting mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A 0% tax rate will apply to incomes up to Awg. 27.751,00 per year. This means that anybody with an monthly income of Awg. 2.300,00 (Awg. 27.751,00 yearly) will not pay any income taxes

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ademas tur tarifa ta baha, y e tarifa maximo cu tabata 58.95%, ta baha te na 52%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally the maximum rate will also be reduced from 58.95% to 52%

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambionan aki ta trece beneficio pa tur 55 mil persona cu awor ta paga inkomstenbelasting of loonbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will have a positive impact on all the 55 thousand income and loan tax payers on the island

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na prome luga 30 mil persona no ta bay paga e belasting aki mas, di cual gran mayoria ta pensionado y esnan cu ta gana salario te na Awg. 2.300,00
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: About 30 thousand will not pay any income or loan tax anymore, which are mainly pensioners and all receiving income lower than the Awg. 27.751,00 yearly bracket

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Na di dos luga 25 mil hende cu ta sigui paga e belastingnan aki, lo paga un tarifa mas abou
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Additionally the 25 thousand tax payers will profit from the rate reduction

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: GRONDBELASTING
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Ground tax

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tarifa di Grondbelasting, e belasting cu bo ta paga si bo ta doño di un cas of propiedad, tambe lo cambia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The rate for ground tax, a tax paid by home and or property owners will also be adapted

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Cu e cambio aki ta diferencia e tarifa basa riba e balor di e propiedad: mas abou e balor ta, e tarifa ta baha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The changes will be based on the value of the property; the lower the property value, the lower the rate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mas halto e balor ta, e tarifa ta subi
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: the higher the property value the higher the rate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe ta introduci un tarifa nobo, mas halto, pa esnan cu no ta biba na Aruba y pa companianan cu tin propiedad comercial
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A new and higher rate is also introduced, for foreigners not residing in Aruba and companies owning commercial properties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta trece un reparticion mas husto den e forma pa cobra grondbelasting
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This will make the ground tax rates more reasonable

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta baha pa esnan cu tin un cas so, y ta subi pa esnan cu tin mas propiedad, of propiedad cu ta bal hopi placa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A rate reduction for a single home owner while increasing the rate for those owning more properties or high valued properties

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E tarifa actual ta 0.4% pa tur hende, sea cu bo ta biba na Aruba, of si bo no ta biba na Aruba pero bo tin condominium na Aruba
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The current rate is 0.4% for everybody, residents or non-residents owning condos in Aruba

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E cambio di tarifa ta pone cu esnan cu tin propiedad cu balor te na Awg. 120.000,00 no ta bay paga belasting mas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The rate changes include a 0% tax rate for property valued up to Awg. 120.000,00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esnan cu tin propiedad cu balor di entre Awg. 120.000,00 pa Awg. 250.000,00, e tarifa ta baha cu mitar, te na 0.2%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Those owning a property valued between Awg. 120.000,00 and Awg. 250.000,00 will notice an reduction of 50%, from 0,4% to 0,2%

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esnan cu tin propiedad cu balor di entre Awg. 250.000,00 y Awg. 500.000,00, e tarifa ta baha cu 25%, te na 0.3%
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Those owning a property valued between Awg. 250.000,00 and Awg. 500.000,00 will receive a reduction of 25% from 0,4% to 0,3%

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esnan cu propiedad na balor di entre Awg.500.000,00 pa Awg.750.000,00 nan tarifa ta keda mescos, pero debi cu no por deduci e Awg. 60.000,00 mas cu por deduci actualmente, nan cobransa ta aumenta cu Awg. 240,00 pa aña, cu ta Awg. 20,00pa luna
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Property owners with a home valued between Awg. 500.000,00 and Awg. 750.000,00 will see no changes in their ground tax rates, however since the Awg. 60.000,00 current reduction will no longer be applied, it will cause an increase of Awg. 240,00 per year

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Rotavirus afectando salud nos muchanan: Labamento di man ta di sumo importancia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Rotavirus affecting many children: Properly washing hands is absolutely important

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e ultimo luna, Departamento di Salud Publico a tuma nota di un crecemento den casonan di diarea y sacamento bou di muchanan di 0 pa 7 aña
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the past months, the Department of Public Health has noticed an increased amount of rotavirus related symptoms like diarrhea and vomiting among children between the age of 0 and 7 years

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Mucha ta laba su man cu habon
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Child washes his hands with soap

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den mayoria di casonan raporta ta trata di muchanan entre 1 cu 4 aña y e causa principal ta Rotavirus confirma door di laboratorio
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In most cases the symptoms have been seen in children between the ages 1 and 4 years, which have been confirmed as rotavirus by lab tests

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E sintomanan di Rotavirus ta diarea,  keintura, sacamento y dolor di barica
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Symptoms of the Rotavirus are: diarrhea , fever, vomiting and abdominal pain

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki por causa deshidratacion y por conduci na hospitalisacion di 2 pa 3 dia
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This can cause dehydration and may require hospitalization for 2 to 3 days

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Rotavirus ta wordo transmiti via boca door di mannan, obhetonan, cuminda y bebida contamina cu pupu di un persona infecta
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The virus spreads easily through hand-to-mouth contact, from objects, food and beverages infected with contaminated feces

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E lugarnan mas comun pa transmision ta na cas, creshe of scol
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Most infections take place at home, school or daycare

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Baby y mucha chikito por transmiti Rotavirus for di 2 dia prome te cu 8 dia despues cu diarea cuminsa
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Infants and toddlers can spread the virus as soon as 2 days prior to getting diarrhea and up to 8 days after the diarrhea started

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den caso cu un baby of mucha chikito tin diarea, ta hopi importante pa mantene un bon higiena general
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event of diarrhea, absolute hygiene should be applied to avoid spreading further spreading of the Rotavirus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Esaki ta encera cu muchanan mester laba nan mannan bon y frecuentemente cu awa y habon, principalmente prome cu come y despues di bay baño
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This includes proper and frequent hand washing with antibacterial soap, prior to handling food and after using the toilet

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Adultonan tambe mester laba mannan bon despues di atende cu un mucha malo, prome cu prepara cuminda of bebida pa muchana
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Adults caring for infected children should also wash their hands properly before preparing food or drinks for the children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe mester mantene tur obheto cu muchanan ta hunga cu ne limpi door di labanan cu tiki desinfectante
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Any objects or toys that are used by infected children should be cleaned using a disinfectant solution

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: No tin tratamento specifico pa Rotavirus, ta keda unicamente e curpa pa deshaci di e virus pasobra antibiotica ni tampoco antiviral no ta yuda den e caso aki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: There is no specific treatment for the Rotavirus, the immune system will take care of the virus, since antibiotics nor antivirals do not affect the Rotavirus at all

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si un mucha ta malo,  haci e maximo  esfuerso pa tenele na cas
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event of ill children, it is advised to keep the children home for as long as possible

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta sumamente importante pa mantene e baby of mucha chikito cu diarea bon hidrata door di dunanan hopi likido pa bebe, preferibel awa of Pedia Lite
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Proper hydration is very important; children should be given plenty of water or PediaLite

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Pero fabor duna mucha ningun tipo di bebida pa deporte
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Please do not give any sports drinks

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si presenta sintomanan manera boca seco, hopi sed, ta orina tiki, ta slap of ta sin animo, keintura mas cu 40 grado, dolor fuerte den barica of tin diarea cu slijm of sanger consulta cu bo dokter di cas inmediatamente
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: In the event of symptoms like dry mouth, thirsty, little or no urination, weakness, fever above 40 degrees, sharp abdominal pain, slimy or bloody diarrhea, please consult your doctor immediately

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Ta di sumo importancia pa nos siña nos muchanan e custumber di laba man na un edad trempan y asina evita malesanan manera ta e caso di Rotavirus
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: It is very important to teach the children at a young age the importance of frequent and proper hand washing, in order to avoid the spreading of illnesses like the Rotavirus

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Entrante 4 di december, 2019 ta cuminsa acepta pago di impuesto di vehiculo di motor 2019
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Payment for motor vehicle tax 2019 on December 4, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Diamars awor, 4 di december, Departamento di Impuesto ta cuminsa acepta pago di impuesto di vehiculo di motor di aña 2019.
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Departamento di Impuesto (Tax Office) announces that customers can pay their motor vehicle tax for the year 2019 starting Tuesday December 4, 2018

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E clientenan cu tin un number di e categorianan A, TX, DT, B, O, MFA of V por scoge pa paga e impuesto den un of dos biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: You can pay your motor vehicle tax (A, TX, DT, B, O, MFA or V plates) in 2 equal installments, per half year, or in one installment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E clientenan cu tin number personalisa y e motociclistanan mester paga e impuesto di 2019 den un solo biaha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: If you own a personalized license plate or a motorcycle, you must pay the motor vehicle tax in one installment

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E clientenan cu ta paga via banco mester menciona e siguiente informacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Customers paying through a bank must provide the following information

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: e nomber completo
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Full name

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E gastonan lo ta Afl. 12 pa e plachinan grandi y Afl 8 pa e plachinan chikito
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The costs are Awg. 12.00 For the large license plate and Awg. 8.00 for the small license plate

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si ta paga e prome mita di aña, mester paga Afl. 12 pa e plachinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the 1st term (half year) one must pay Awg. 12.00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Si ta paga full aña e gasto total di e plachinan ta Afl. 20
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For the full year the total costs are Awg. 20.00

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Actualmente e plachinan di number no ta disponibel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Currently the new license plates are not available

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Lo anuncia na comienso di aña 2019 ki momento por pasa busca esakinan
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The Tax office announce at the beginning of 2019 when customers can collect the license plates

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Hunto pa Derecho di Mucha den Reino
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Our Kingdom united for Children’s right

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E paisnan y entidadnan publico cu ta forma parti di Reino Hulandes kier a firma un “Memorandum of Understanding” (MoU), pa stimula colaboracion riba tereno di derecho di mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The countries and public entities forming the Dutch Kingdom signed an MoU, a “Memorandum of Understanding”, in order to collectively stimulate and improve children rights

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den e acuerdo di colaboracion aki, 7 punto ta para central: educacion positivo, prevencion di maltrato di mucha, desaroyo di “safetynets” (contenido pa tempo liber despues di scol), participacion di mucha y hoben, asistencia profesional, sosten di mucha y famianan y atencion special pa muchanan vulnerabel
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This MoU includes 7 important key elements; positive education, the prevention of child abuse, development of “safety nets” (after school contents), children’s and adolescent ’s participation, professional assistance, support to children and family, special attention for vulnerable children

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: E MoU ta bira realidad despues di un declaracion di intencion cu 7 mandatario a firma na Corsou, durante e di tres conferencia di e Taskforce di Reino encarga cu derecho di mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: The MoU was signed after a declaration of intent signed by 7 officials in Curacao, during the 3rd Kingdom Taskforce conference for Children’s Rights

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: For di seis rapport di Unicef titula “Muchanan den Reino: derecho di mucha den Reino Hulandes”, a sali na cla di forma convincente cu medidanan adicional ta sumamente necesario, pa por mehora derecho di mucha na e seis islanan cu tabata forma Antias Hulandes
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: Based on the six Unicef reports titled “Children within the Kingdom; the rights of children within the Kingdom”, it became clear that in order to improve the children’s rights, additional actions should be taken

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Colaboracion y comparti conocimento entre e isla y paisnan den Reino ta esencial pa por logra esaki
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: To achieve this, a strong collaboration between the partners is essential

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Durante e Conferencia di Reino di 2 di april 2014 na Aruba, mandatarionan a reitera cu cada mucha den Reino tin derecho riba un bon infancia y hubentud, manera e Tratado Internacional tocante Derecho di Mucha (IVRK pa su abreviacion na hulandes) ta stipula
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: During the Kingdom conference held back in 2014, government officials confirmed their stance that every single child within the Kingdom had the right to a good childhood and youth as stated in the International Convention on the Rights of the Child

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Tambe durante e conferencia a dicidi pa institui e Taskforce di Reino encarga cu Derecho di Mucha, cu tin como tarea pa stimula colaboracion den Reino riba tereno di derecho di mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: A Dutch Kingdom Taskforce was created during the last conference with the mission to enhance the collaboration within the Kingdom for Children’s rights

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Despues durante conferencia di e Taskforce, cu a tuma luga di 14 pa 16 di mei 2018 na Corsou, mandatarionan responsabel pa mucha y famia di e cuater paisnan y tres entidadnan publico den Reino, a firma un declaracion di intencion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: At the task force  conference which took place in Curacao between May 14 to 16, 2018, government officials signed a declaration of intent, which also concluded to the signing of a MoU

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: saki a conduci na firmamento di e MoU, cu Reino a publica riba Dia Internacional di Derecho di Mucha
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: This was published on the International day for Children’s Rights

Mensahe di Pasco di Gobernador di Aruba: Den Memorandum of Understanding por haya mas informacion
Governor’s Christmas speech 2019: For additional information one can consult the Memorandum of Understanding
